name: Color Balm Lipstick

{'title': u'Wonderful, creamy lipstick', 'text': [u'I use Stila lipstick in the Isabelle shade as one of my two or three go-to shades. Depending on the color of lip liner, Isabelle can either be warm or cool. Very flattering and ultra creamy and long-lasting. No longer available in the stores. Waaaaahh!'], 'author': u'Monnalena ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'It Delivers!', 'text': [u'This does what it says! I love that it hydrates and is a good full coverage lipstick.', u'I would love a bit more of corally peach shade as well.', u'The amount of product does seem to be very little for $22. i apply twice a day. let\'s see how long it lasts.'], 'author': u'RiRiDel ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': u'NY, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love the peppermint taste awesome color'], 'author': u'penguinlady ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'popping perfect pink', 'text': [u'Where do i start? Stila never lets you down from the creamy silky feel when it slides on effortless promising a light glossy sheen. Then is forever causing compliments from the moment i walk out the door vividly displaying such a beautiful array of colors which seem to pop with whatever outfit you wear. I love it and one of the most enjoyable qualities is the scent a candy scent that not only am i addicted to but my husband and our pomeranian absolutely love it too. Oh and lastly I find the case quite attractive and easy to spot in my purse .'], 'author': u'bbmorse ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bright, beautiful color', 'text': [u'The Bite Beauty High Pigment Pencil in Velvet is a bold color but it looks good. It doesn\'t dry out my lips and it lasts a fairly long time. You do have to re-apply right after eating because the outer rim of the lips are still this bright color but the middle is back to your natural lip color and that doesn\'t look good. So be sure to have it in your purse after meals.'], 'author': u'PerfectSa ', 'date': [u'2016-10-04'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'New Favorite', 'text': [u'I bought Chablis (soft coral rose) and I adore it! I have a few different Bite Beauty lip products, but this is by far my favorite product and color. It looks great with my Benefit Dandelion blush, FYI. This looks great with a full face of make up or concealer, mascara, blush, and a touch of powder!(I have fair skin with pink undertones and dark hair. Coral products tend to look good on me, for reference).'], 'author': u'SarahCarolina ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Audacious Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'Long wearing and creamy'], 'author': u'NR0788 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Better Than Ever', 'text': [u'I\'ve always loved Nars lipstick and have used it for years. But this "audacious" formula is by far the best ever. Even the case is better; it has a satisfying magnetic snap. Wonderful texture, not to dry or mat, but also not sticky or too shiny. Perfect. Lasts well. And the color selections are wonderful. Do choose carefully. The first shade I bought was SO wrong for me -- they don\'t always look like they do online. Can\'t think of a solution for that, unless it were possible to order tiny samples. I would do that, it would be worth it to get the perfect shades. This is definitely a lipstick to have on hand, a shade for everyday, and several for going out. Love all the choices of reds, so you can find the one which is right for you, with the right undertone. Most of all I love how it feels on my lips -- luxurious.'], 'author': u'skypillar ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love it. Rich in pigment. It does notcause your lip become dry. Perfect color.'], 'author': u'MaryLoveBeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: HD Microfinish Powder
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this product but it just didn\'t work out that way. While it did a pretty good job at keeping the shine away but it essentially erased any signs of makeup in pictures. I was already cautious when looking for a powder because I\'ve had similar issues with foundations that look great but made me look pasty white in photos. I was careful to apply the least amount of powder possible and it actually took me quite awhile before I even realized it was the powder that was making me look washed out in pictures and like I hadn\'t applied any makeup at all.'], 'author': u'LaughingNinja ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Must Have!', 'text': [u'this is a daily product for me! i have combination skin - throughout the day my tzone gets so oily that if i touch it you can see my smeared foundation! gross! but this powder is a life saver! i use a little, goes a long way, every morning as my last step. and my make up stays in place all day! i like to use it under my eyes and on my lids as well, it helps not to get oily and my winged eyeliner doesn\'t come off bc of so much oil. if you\'re one to retouch through out the day - i\'d recommend this too! when i wan\'t to retouch my face a bit i just use my brush with a little product and swipe on my tzone and around eyes.'], 'author': u'hernamee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'MY MUST HAVE PRODUCT', 'text': [u'This makes the finish on your skin FLAWLESS. I have oily skin and enlarged pores.. and no matter what I makeup products I choose to use, this one is always the final touch and it really does make my pore size diminish. I can\'t tell if this helps with oiliness, because my skin gets oily no matter what I try, but I can say that it does not add to the oiliness, it does not irritate my skin or cause blemishes, and it will give you a smooth finish. Definitely will always be a staple of mine.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Dallas, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE THIS STUFF', 'text': [u'It sets my makeup (foundation & concealer) and makes my face feel like skin again. It doesn\'t feel like I\'m wearing makeup after putting it on. It is also oil-absorbing. I will put it on over my self-tanner lotion so it\'s not sticky any longer. I\'ve purchased it 3 times over the years. It lasts a long time too. I\'ve had my current container for 10 months!'], 'author': u'theonlyfoxyroxy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Tampa, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: No Frizz Leave-In Conditioner
reviews: {'title': u'effective but not perfect for me', 'text': [u'My hair is rather frizzy and wavy. I have complexes because of it :( so I hoped to get slicker hair but it is only possible if you use this conditioner AND a straightener. Which I don\'t want to do because my hair is also tend to be dry. But I have to admit that my husband noticed that the hair looked less frizzy and nicer. So, 4 stars! Thanks for the absence of silicones. They totally destroy hair if they are used'], 'author': u'MCNail ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great leave-in conditioner!', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this product and absolutely love it. I apply it to my roots after I wash my hair and notice a huge difference in the softness of my hair and the next time I wash it, it isn\'t as tangly. As far as the no-frizz goes, I\'m not sure it does much but it makes my hair really smooth and easy to detangle.'], 'author': u'chelsmith ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'Phoenix, AZ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'disappointing in every way', 'text': [u'I found nothing to like about this anti frizz line of products. The price is extremely unreasonable considering I never saw any benefit. I was traveling in very humid areas so I didn\'t expect magic, but this literally did nothing to control the frizz. It smells subtly like a chemical factory. Saving my money next time.'], 'author': u'Jenland ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'It actually works!', 'text': [u'Now that some of my hair is gray, I have a problem keeping my hair smooth and not frizzy without losing all the volume. I was worried that a leave-in conditioner would leave my hair oily or limp, but this one really works. My hair feels smooth and silky but still has body. I have finally found something that works!'], 'author': u'proflouise ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': u'Athens, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Give this a chance!', 'text': [u'So I received this as part of Bite\'s spring fling set and I threw it in a drawer because I didn\'t understand what it was for. Found it and decided to look up its purpose and actually use it and I\'m so happy I did! I own about six lip liners because I don\'t have issues with bleeding or feathering and I can get a precise application just fine without them, so the concept of this product was perfect for me. Now, I do agree with people that this does not hydrate or even really condition the lips. It does also require a bit of work to apply because of the formula but nothing crazy like people have said. Feels like a drier version of a Chapstick. The reason I love this now is because it serves as the PERFECT lip base for me. I am of a medium/deep skin tone and have issues with MANY lip colors not showing up true to color because of my skin tone or not translating the same way on me as they do on fair to light complexions. This solves that problem perfectly!! Now I can actually use all those lip products and get my money\'s worth. Also I find that this does in fact make my lip products last A LOT longer and make them wear even better. This has been amazing with my very creamy, almost balmy lipstick formulations but especially for liquid lipsticks!! Im not a big fan of liquid lipsticks in general, but when I wear this primer underneath, my lips don\'t feel as dried out and the liquid lipsticks lay SOO much better on my lips. It prevents the liquid lip from sinking into my lip lines too much and looking gross and old which has been awesome so I\'m now able to wear them. This lip primer also helps with the way my liquid lipsticks wear as well. They last even longer without fading and when they do start to go, it\'s very subtle and they fade very evenly. I\'ve tested this with many lip products and formulations and all in all I\'m super happy with it and will definitely repurchase once I run out!!'], 'author': u'AngeliqueL ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'nope', 'text': [u'Not a fan of this product at all! I don\'t feel it was hydrating at all and it honestly felt like a dried up glue stick trying to rub it in my lips .. didn\'t notice any different applying lipstick on top. Won\'t purchase again.'], 'author': u'epati ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Airflash CC Primer - Radiance Booster Color Correcting Primer
reviews: {'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'First review and I felt compelled to write this to hopefully prevent anyone else from wasting their money. I would have much rather paid an extra $4 and purchased the 1oz bottle of Hourglass Mineral Veil Primer which I will now have to do. My biggest qualm with this product is that it does not last long. I purchased this 5 weeks ago and by the 4th week I was completely out. I only used it sparingly maybe 3-4 times a week. I did enjoy the convenience of just spraying on my primer but I couldn\'t tell much of a difference as far as correcting and brightening goes which was the MAIN reason I purchased this primer. If you\'re looking for something that moisturizes and corrects check out Origins VitaZing which is definitely HOG status.'], 'author': u'LindsNico ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Le Rouge
reviews: {'title': u'Rose Dressing', 'text': [u'I received a one-time use sample of this in the color Rose Dressing, a very pretty springtime coral pink... I must say, this is one of the creamiest and most comfortable lipsticks I have ever worn. I wore it on a night out and obviously didn\'t bring the little foil pack sample with me to reapply, so I figured when it wears off, aw well for me... Well, I was happy to find that it didn\'t wear off at all. It had the long lasting effect of a lip stain with the color opaqueness of a lipstick. I was very pleased with the formula even though the color isn\'t my usual choice. I took off one star because I feel the price point is a little high for what it is. Granted, I haven\'t seen the leather packaging in person so that\'s probably what makes it so expensive,... But it is a very beautifully made lipstick and if it went on sale or I was able to get another sample, I would jump on it immediately.'], 'author': u'JessLess ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not my Favorite', 'text': [u'I don\'t like the way these feel. My lips dry out. The color just doesn\'t come through either. {'title': u'The package provides the hype.', 'text': [u'Rose Ruban is far more pale than it appears on the screen. So pale in fact that this was the third of four GIVENCHY purchases that went back to the store. The lipstick is creamy and light in texture. The package I believe is what is causing so many to rave about it. It\'s lightweight silver bullet with a leathery band wrapped around the cover. The bottom has a design that sticks out like a stud on both sides that helps hold the tube to remove the cover. Not worth the price unless you like to apply lipstick in public places to impress the masses of onlookers.'], 'author': u'Amsugr ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Northwest Indiana', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Gorgeous!', 'text': [u'This is such a gorgeous illuminator! I got the shade "Copacabana" and it\'s a beautiful baby pink pearl shade. It only takes 1-2 small drops, and then easily blends with a Beauty Blender. It\'s sooo pretty! Like, way prettier than my other highlighters. What I like about this too, is that it\'s so easy to build it up and make it as dramatic, or as subtle as you want! And also, because it\'s a liquid and not a powder, it works great if you have dry skin! It doesn\'t cling to dry patches or extenuate lines, nor is it chalky. I love this so so so much! As noted in some other reviews, this did not come completely full... about 3/4 full actually. Which is a bit of a drag since it is in clear packaging, but when I went to exchange it they were all like this, so I guess that\'\'s just how they come. Still a bit disappointing, but oh well, I\'ll live.'], 'author': u'samkeaysxo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Moncton, NB, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Gel Coat
reviews: {'title': u'Staying power', 'text': [u'My manicures last a week or more and I work as an engineer. I lift weights and work with my hands daily. My nails are fairly long, sometimes people think they are fake. Great stuff! I use it with nail polishes other than Dior, as well as Dior brand polishes. Definitely recommend. One coat seems to hold up better than two.'], 'author': u'buckeyegirl1989 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gel Look&Feel For The Non Gel Manicure Gal', 'text': [u'I\'ve never gotten a gel manicure - something about the extensive process to set the polish and then to remove scares me, and (while it may be completely unfounded) I\'m afraid it\'ll mess with my nail beds. However, I saw this and wanted to try to try and extend the life of my manicures (which usually last a week). The first time I used it, I had the salon apply, and they didnt do the best job - the polish where the top coat wasn\'t applied came off more quickly than normal. The second time I used it, I applied myself (to an already week old manicure) and it extended the life of my manicure for another 5 days, and looked fantastic. Definitely gives the high-gloss look associated with gel manicures, and fooled the nail salon into thinking they couldn\'t take it off with a little polish remover.', u'Bonus: my mom accidently used polish remover to remove her listick at her local sephora, partially ruining her 2-hour old manicure on her thumb; I told her to throw some of this on it in store, and it saved the day!'], 'author': u'EllePea1211 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': u'Hoboken, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Gotta Try This!', 'text': [u'I LOVE this top coat. It makes my nails so shiny! I\'ve had co workers ask me if I go to a salon to get my nails done because they look so nice and shiny with this top coat. I think you could use this top coat over any nail polish to prolong your manicure. My nails stay shiny, for almost 2 weeks. name: Studded Kiss Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u"kat's lipstick", 'text': [u'i still like the original intonation of her lipstick version...it didn\'t cake as much on my lips and had more staying power. That being said..however; this new formation is smoother and is not as "sticky" and smells better.'], 'author': u'themadcat ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Olympia, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Clumpy and kind of dry. I prefer the everlasting liquid lipstick.'], 'author': u'FrankenStitch ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Kat Von D lipsticks', 'text': [u'I will combine my review of all the Kat von D lipsticks since all the colours are great!The Cons are that they are all very dry, and the colour does not last long at all.I was so disappointed with that aspect since I do not have any opportunity during the day to re-apply.'], 'author': u'catica001 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'So when I was shopping on of the employees had this Kat Von D lipstick on. I had to have it but unfortunately I was there shopping for a gift and not for myself so I had to wait to get it. I almost didn\'t go back because it isn\'t normally a color I would wear. But I am glad I did. It is now my favorite lipstick and everywhere I go I get asked what brand and color it is. Even my husband who never notices loves this color.'], 'author': u'cgem ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nice!', 'text': [u'Applies well and stays put. Excellent product'], 'author': u'pammyvancouver ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Vancouver, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Roses De Chloé
reviews: {'title': u'Like Fresh Roses', 'text': [u'If you want to smell like a bouquet of roses, this is for you! A very simple, straightforward scent. Like a little gift of fresh flowers.'], 'author': u'laurabee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A perfect rose', 'text': [u'Rose has not been my thing since the 70s when I wore the original Perfumer\'s Workshop Tea Rose before entering my 40 year Chanel obsession. However I have found myself drawn to rose scents over the past year. I got a deluxe sample of this and I have fallen in love with it over the past few months. The rose smells like my grandma\'s garden after a rain and not like a funeral parlor as so many rose scents do to me. The amber in the drydown makes this smell sophisticated and a little sexy. I\'d say this is closer to a skin scent after the first hour or so which is how I like my perfume. I am not a fan of fragrance announcing itself to the public or leaving a vapor trail so if you want monster sillage this is not for you. The scent lasted a!! day on me.'], 'author': u'icecheermom ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"nice but doesn't last", 'text': [u'I got a sample of this in an order and the rose smell is lovely--actually like roses, but not overpowering--but the scent lasts like three seconds (more accurately, maybe around an hour tops). I expected it to last longer. Pretty, and glad I can experience it, but certainly wouldn\'t buy it.'], 'author': u'katydidxo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I love this perfume. It always manages to put a smile on my face whenever I put it on.'], 'author': u'angiesaaol ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': u'fresno', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'all the rose and none of the old lady powder', 'text': [u'I love a rose fragrance but many are "old lady powder" (not for me) or develop into something else that completely ditches the rose notes. Not this one - very fresh rose that develops into a sexier, warmer rose. And best of all - it lasts through the day. I highly recommend this fragrance.'], 'author': u'dianaisme ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Eau de Cartier Goutte de Rose
reviews: {'title': u'Old favorite', 'text': [u'I was searching for a new floral perfume after being slightly disappointed with another brand. I remembered I had this fragrance years ago and thought to give it another try. I loved it then and I love it now! Light and fresh scent that lasts a long time.'], 'author': u'gal505 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Albuquerque, NM', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Perfect balance', 'text': [u'I found this marked half off so of course I had to buy it. This is a nice even keeled rose scent. Not too overwhelming and definitely not an "old lady" floral. Wish it lasted longer but for half price I can\'t complain.'], 'author': u'natska240 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lovely and Subtle', 'text': [u'Comes on strong at first, but mutes to a pleasant, ladylike scent. Not old ladylike, however.'], 'author': u'elbyem ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'turned musky', 'text': [u'It smells amazing at first; like a beautiful bouquet of roses. So feminine and flirty. I had to return it because the floral scent vanished so quickly after application and all that stayed was a pungent musk scent... bleh!'], 'author': u'catannecharr ', 'date': [u'2016-03-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'This is my new all time favorite! It\'s light and soft. Perfect for everyday wear <3 <3 <3'], 'author': u'NMY1 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-29'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Rose Deep Hydration Face Serum
reviews: {'title': u'almost unbearably sticky', 'text': [u'i use the rose deep hydration cream as well and this has the same sticky texture the cream does. the product does what it\'s supposed to (smooth, hydrate, even out skin tone) but the texture is awful and i\'ll definitely be trying other products before i come back to this.'], 'author': u'yveszaynlaurent ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love this for my combo skin/acne', 'text': [u'I have combination skin, I get extremely oily in my T-zone during the day, but I still have some dry patches on my nose and all over my face. I used to think that hydration wasn\'t necessary because I have acne and thought it would get worst by hydrating, but no! Using this helped so much with my dry patches, and because of the rose extracts it is really good for sensitive skin and it never caused me any breakouts. This product soaks in really quickly, so it is good to use before applying your moisturizer and makeup. I use it every morning before applying my moisturizer (FROM FAB) and at night I use the seaberry oil (also from Fresh). I really really recommend this product and pretty much all Fresh products!'], 'author': u'mathou ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Smells like a dream!', 'text': [u'This serum goes on smooth and soaks in to hydrate without leaving any trace of the product, except for the divine rose scent.'], 'author': u'alyssalotus ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"it's okay", 'text': [u'Very moisturizing but it\'s not worth the price because I thought that as a serum would do more then just hydration and I have the lotus youth preserve cream that does hydrate my skin and do so much more for my acne prone skin.. this was not a necessity for my skin so I will not be repurchasing this serum because I need something that\'s age defying but if you have extremely dry skin this is for you.'], 'author': u'huneybear ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Pretty plump visage', 'text': [u'This is my first hydrating serum use and with combo/oily skin I was scared to use it. I was pleasantly surprised a hydrating serum could be better for me than creams because it sinks into skin rather than sit on the surface. I used at night and was highly skeptical and was pleasantly surprised by how soft, plump and healthy my skin looked. This is pricey, but I will definitely be adding a hydrating serum into my routine and would recommend for others who want hydration without having to choose between dry spots or oil and breakouts. And extra shout out for a lovely glamorous smell!'], 'author': u'JenRachel ', 'date': [u'2016-08-13'], 'location': u'Rural NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
ingredient: Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Maris Aqua (Sea Water), Butylene Glycol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Dimethicone, Pentylene Glycol, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract,  Pyrus Cydonia Seed Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Voandzeia Subterranea Seed Extract, Cucumins Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, PEG-6, Xanthan Gum, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Polyacrylamide, Tromethamine, C13-14, Isoparaffin, Disodium Phosphate, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Alcaligenes Polysaccharides, Tetrasodium EDTA, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEF-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Laureth-7, Citric Acid, Caramel, Fragrance, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Citronellol, Geraniol.

name: Rose Deep Hydration Face Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Rich but not greasy', 'text': [u'I have a very sensitive combination skin. Anything could make me break out for no reason, gel formulas don\'t moisturize enough and rich creams just don\'t get absorbed! I settled for this cream after trying many brands and I am beyond satisfied. To maintain the effects however I can\'t even skip one day of skin routine.'], 'author': u'Boulz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'not an immediate repurchase', 'text': [u'this definitely hydrates my skin, and i\'ve noticed smoother, softer skin in the few days of using it. however, it\'s very heavy and sticky. my skin is extremely dry, and usually absorbs even the heaviest creams without a problem. i\'ll definitely be trying other products once i finish this jar, but i might repurchase in the future.'], 'author': u'yveszaynlaurent ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Awesome', 'text': [u'I luv this product, it definitley makes my skin feel hydrated and so soft.My skin tends to get dry here and there but this truly does the trick for me I luv the frangrance as well and plan to trying other things from the Fresh Line. I will purchase again.'], 'author': u'Brissy84 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I put this on before bed and it absorbs into your skin so quickly. Wake up the next day with super soft and plump skin. Like a baby\'s bottom'], 'author': u'llisalloves ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Deep drink for your skin!', 'text': [u'This gel moisturizer is perfect for my slightly sensitive, combination skin. It sinks in quickly and makes my skin feel plump and silky, not at all greasy. Bonus: I happen to love the rose fragrance...it is not overwhelming & dissipates quickly.'], 'author': u'catriona ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Water, Glycerin,  Etbylhtxyl Isononanoate, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Caprylyl Methicone,  Isostearyl Isostearate,  Dimethicone, Behenyl Alcohol, Nylon-6/12,  Steareth-2, Xantham Gum, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil,  Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Algin, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Acacia Senegal Gum, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ammonium AcryloyldimethyItaurate/VP, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Dimethiconol, Laureth-7, Tetrasodium EDTA, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, BHT, Caramel, Serine, Fragrance,  Phenoxyethanol, Citronellol, Geraniol.

name: Yachiyo Brush #27
reviews: {'title': u'Expected More from $55 Brush', 'text': [u'Beautiful handle and guides smoothly for highlighting cheekbones, but after two uses hairs were coming off of brush. Would not recommend.'], 'author': u'Korijoey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Ventura County, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Not worth your money', 'text': [u'This brush was SO underwhelming. Bristles fell out every time I used it, so I returned it immediately.'], 'author': u'cali4802 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Poor Quality', 'text': [u'I love NARS makeup, but if their other tools can be judged by the quality of this one, I would say they should stick to makeup product only. Bristles have fallen out everywhere-- I thought this was a temporary thing when it was new, but it continues months later. Today, the handle on this snapped, and the binding has been moving downward from the top of the bristles so the bottom is now exposed. For the price of this, I expected better. You can find the same shape of brush (which I liked) from another brand for a much more reasonable price and quality.'], 'author': u'juliax7 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Ridiculous price.', 'text': [u'It\'s funny how expensive this is. While it was a good brush overall, I don\'t find it to be any better than a brush from your local drugstore... Don\'t recommend this. The price for this in Canada is $70CAD. Like, really? Who should pay $70 for a brush that\'s not "mind-blowing" or a "game changer". I\'m sorry, I love NARS, but this is not worth my money. I wish I didn\'t purchase it! The quote "you get what you pay for" didn\'t really apply to this situation. :/ Disappointed.'], 'author': u'bunobrows ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for blush and bronzer', 'text': [u'I am in love with the NARS kabuki range. Beautiful and very well made, perfect for applying blush and bronzer and looks great on your vanity tray. Some reviewers have posted complaints of the brush shedding and the bristles being too coarse for their skin, this couldn\'t be further from the truth. While washing the brush for the first time, it shed a few hairs but no more after that and I\'ve had it for two months. Unless you have super sensitive skin, this brush is soft and doesn\'t irritate the skin when in use. I also own the NARS botan kabuki brush and it is equally beautiful and soft. Definitely a must have!'], 'author': u'knorr5 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Lilac Path
reviews: {'title': u'Gorgeous scent', 'text': [u'I absolutely adore this perfume!'], 'author': u'NuggetBrain ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'So Beautiful', 'text': [u'So Beautiful!!Smells exactly like you are in a field of lilacs. I love all of the Aerin fragrances and you can blend them too, there is no bad combo. I am addicted to this lilac one though.'], 'author': u'trekgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-07-08'], 'location': u'Cincinnati, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Spring in a bottle!!!', 'text': [u'Lilacs are my very favourite flower. They are nearly impossible to recreate in a fragrance but Aerin succeeded. This is so beautiful and well made.It\'s my signature scent.Not just a lilac, it\'s a garden with a variety of lilacs as well as greenery and white flowers in the background blending into a heavenly scent.Good sillage and great longevity Don\'t expect an exact replica of a lilac, that\'s impossible. This is a dream of lilacs. Not the reality.Beautiful!!!!!'], 'author': u'MsErin ', 'date': [u'2016-05-11'], 'location': u'London, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Adore this', 'text': [u'It\'s like someone squeezed lilac into the bottle. I\'ve been wearing it to work the last few days and my coworkers follow me around like bees to a flower. It\'s amazing. So fresh and pretty without being too strong. My coworkers call it spring in a bottle. Lovely.'], 'author': u'msalanna ', 'date': [u'2016-05-04'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'love!', 'text': [u'This smells just like the lilac bushes that were outside my bedroom in New York! I love it, and it lasts a long time on my skin! Definitely my favorite and will be repurchasing!'], 'author': u'kng6783 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Velvet Orchid
reviews: {'title': u'the perfume equivalent of the little black dress', 'text': [u'It\'s not too strong and just sweet enough to get noticed. For those who love to wear perfume but do not want to overpower the room. It\'s an alluring floral scent with a hint of sexy and playful sophistication. It\'s definitely for mature audiences only.'], 'author': u'msgail18 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love It', 'text': [u'one of my favorite TF scents. Classy, sophisticated, and strong. will last forever.'], 'author': u'KeeganBrunell ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sophisticated Woman', 'text': [u'I loved this on first sniff and this is not the case for most tom ford\'s. I\'m not a fan of black orchid. Smells weird on me.', u'Velvet orchid is amazing however!! Warm, sweet, velvety, potent. ', u'When I smell this, I smell a grown woman. She\'s sexy, she\'s confident and she\'s a Bosschick.', u'If you like soft girly scents, you won\'t like this.If you love sexy, mature (not grandma )scents, this is for you.', u'For reference, other warm scents I like: Tom ford Noir Femme and Tobacco Vanille, Elizabeth &James-Nirvana Black, Dolce and Gabanna the One.'], 'author': u'SimplyStacyB ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The Perfect Musky Scent', 'text': [u'I had been debating between this one Black Orchid, and Noir for quite a while and this is the one. Compared to the others it is a little sweeter and more personable, I felt the others were more of a decorative smell like a scent you might find in a fancy elevator or department store. I went with the 1.7 oz size, have a been using it just about everyday for a month and have yet to make a dent in it. Altogether the scent is the perfect amount of sweet while still being classy and sophisticated.'], 'author': u'KarGMZT ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'As soon as I smelled this scent I fell in love. I wore it for two days and started to hate it. I had to return it.'], 'author': u'alijose ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Dahlia Noir
reviews: {'title': u'Light mature slightly sweet and lingering', 'text': [u'My mom gifted me this for my birthday and I really like it. I was not so sure at first because I normally go for sweeter, floral, fresh smells but I have really enjoyed using this perfume. This is a perfume I use for day and night, for a more mature smell rather a fun. I get a lot of compliments and questions about my perfume. It lasts a long time. I forget I smell good and whenever people pass my or stand next to me, they tell me I smell really good. They way I would describe this smell or what I would use it for... for more like interviews, dates, or going out but also can be for work'], 'author': u'CindyEveryday ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'sublime', 'text': [u'This is the 2nd bottle I\'ve purchased of this eau de toilette. 1st bottle was a gift. It is such an amazing scent. Very feminine but soft enough to wear every day. I LOVE IT!!!'], 'author': u'jjten ', 'date': [u'2016-05-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Awesome', 'text': [u'The first time I have a smell that I always admire. Feels so rich right now because this smell is for luxurious life!'], 'author': u'kuroko ', 'date': [u'2015-11-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'chic, elegant and classy.', 'text': [u'i really like the scent of this perfume I like all Givenchy fragrances not powdery or strong or overly floral it is just like the perfect balance.'], 'author': u'SimplyLaura23 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-02'], 'location': u'Montreal, Quebec', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'Too Granny For Me', 'text': [u'I used points for a deluxe sample of this and actually forgot I had it.The other day, having just moved, I was running out the door and wanted to try something new from my sample stash. I dabbed this on my pulse points and ran out the door, and boy, did I regret it.As I rode the subway, I kept wondering what elderly woman had spritzed too much perfume on that morning. Imagine my surprised when I discovered it was me!The powder factor in this perfume is off the charts. I can\'t imagine a young woman (or more mature one, for that matter), who would enjoy wearing this.Upon reaching my destination, I immediately made my best attempt at washing this perfume off my wrists and using a wet paper towel to wipe it off my neck. When I got home, it went in the trash.'], 'author': u'TJGroth ', 'date': [u'2015-07-10'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Satin Hair Serum
reviews: {'title': u'Really like this', 'text': [u'I have a lot of thin hair that frizzes and I really love this product. It tames my frizz without flattening the curls. A little bit goes a long way and if I only use a small amount then it doesn\'t make my hair greasy.'], 'author': u'AnnetteBright ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The Best', 'text': [u'I have thick her cut in a short bob. It is also chemically treated. I went from dark to silver/platinum. The Satin Hair Serum is by far the best thing I have ever used on my hair. Blow drying is not a chore anymore and I don\'t have to use so many products to keep my hair sleek and free from frizz No silicone build up or oils. This will stay in my rotation.'], 'author': u'sueshop ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Yes!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried everything I could think of to keep my hair from curling up in hot, humid Florida. I have fine strands but a lot of hair and it\'s pretty wavy. It\'s a shoulder length bob and that makes it wave/curl easily. I dry it straight and flat iron it and halfway through the day it starts to flip all over. I used this today after the phd shamp and conditioner (what I always use) and we made it to the evening with no curls! I mean, it\'s not stick straight but it never is. Plus this stuff did not make my hair greasy looking. It did make my ends that are usually tangled and dry look really good. I\'m really impressed. I know silicone serums do the same but they never seem to last.'], 'author': u'purslaneprov ', 'date': [u'2016-09-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'first impressions', 'text': [u'The scent of this product is AMAZING. I love it so so so so so much.'], 'author': u'skinittowinit ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'a little goes a long way', 'text': [u'I think the complaints of greasiness is due to using too much. You will see a major effect with a tiny drop. I love how quickly my hair air dries after distributing through my washed hair. It does what I hoped Bumble& Bumble could achieve with Don\'t Blow It but didn\'t.'], 'author': u'scorpionqueen ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Surf Creme Rinse Conditioner
reviews: {'title': u'Very good', 'text': [u'I just finished writing a review for the shampoo, and this section for the conditioner has even more confused people. So let\'s get the basics right:', u'-These are specialty products for a specific look.-This conditioner is meant to provide very light moisturizing and specifically not weigh down your hair for the "surf" look.-The shampoo leaves your hair deep cleaned and bone dry.-The conditioner applies only the lightest moisturizing to keep your hair healthy yet completely non-oily, in order to maximize natural curl/volume.', u'If you like very light hair that smells clean and retains a "natural" look, this is what you want.', u'In a sense, it leaves your hair "open to suggestions" when it comes to using secondary products. Due to the light conditioning and a lack of oily substances, your hair will respond better to hair sprays or smoothing oils, without making your hair too oily or artificial looking.', u'My notes:-Bad for detangling, much like the shampoo. For detangling, pick something that\'s specifically moisturizing.-Lightly moisturizing. Leaves hair soft, clean and dry.-Scent is pleasant, mild and lasting.-Great for allowing natural waviness/curls to show through.-Plays well with light hairsprays, allowing you to use minimal product to get the level of control you want - however, because it exaggerates your waves, if your hair is very wavy, it may actually be harder to force it into a less natural shape.', u'Both the shampoo and the condioner maximize your hair\'s natural appearance. Which could be exactly what you want, or the exact opposite. ;)'], 'author': u'mixt ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'like it alot', 'text': [u'One of my favs, great for a Sunday nite wash'], 'author': u'chagan ', 'date': [u'2016-09-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

When picking a conditioner I look for detangling and this does not detangle at all! I actually had to lather on my normal conditioner to help get this product out. I\'ll give it 3 stars just because it has an okay smell and people who don\'t care about detangling may like it, I just see you\'re hair looking smooth if you use it.'], 'author': u'DaniVanVeck ', 'date': [u'2016-07-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Holy Grail', 'text': [u'I have fine, wavy hair, but a lot of it. It also gets oily quickly. I wash my hair everyday. I need conditioner regardless though because my ends get dry and frizzy. This is the perfect conditioner for my combination hair! I focus the conditioner on my ends and then put whats left over through my roots. It\'s the perfect amount of conditioner to keep my hair healthy. It also helps give me an oomph of volume.'], 'author': u'remilikethegun ', 'date': [u'2016-07-21'], 'location': u'Mililani, HI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Surf Foam Wash Shampoo
reviews: {'title': u'Very good', 'text': [u'Got this shampoo and conditioner as samples. Liked enough to end up buying both. Review is based on full size versions.', u'I\'ve actually used many regular and premium shampoos and conditioners in the past and I have a pretty wide range of experiences to compare these products to.', u'Basically, this is a specialty product. It\'s a very "strong" shampoo, in a sense that it leaves zero oil behind. Very good for deep cleaning your hair, and guaranteed to be extremely drying if used on its own. If you think about it, this is exactly what it\'s trying to do - give you messy and wavy surf-style hair. To that end, it can\'t afford to leave oils or conditioning substances behind since that would weigh down the hair and subdue natural curls.', u'Unless you want bone dry hair, you MUST pair this shampoo with a conditioner. And the choice of conditioner depends on your goal. If you want to complete the dry/surf look, then get the matching conditioner - which is only lightly moisturizing and won\'t weigh down your hair. Its goal is to make your hair soft but dry. If you want to use this shampoo as a "deep clean" but want smooth/silky hair afterwards, then pair it with a deeply moisturizing conditioner. Simple.', u'My notes:-Medium lather; product can be used efficiently. I\'ve seen far worse.-Scent is light and pleasant both for this and the conditioner, but I suppose it\'s a bit on the generic side. You\'ll have to decide.-Great for removing product/oil from your hair-Wouldn\'t be great for detangling hair - for that, you need to look for something more "moisturizing" (aka oily) with a stronger lather.-Always use a conditioner with this shampoo. Matching conditioner for the "surf" look with minimal moisturizing, or another conditoner for your regular look.'], 'author': u'mixt ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'THE BEST', 'text': [u'The best shampoo ever for beachy waves. I have lots of fine hair and this does the trick!'], 'author': u'wickedvegan ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love & Mixing Products', 'text': [u'I\'ve used this shampoo for about 2 years and still love it. I have thick, wavy hair. As common with thick hair, it gets really oily and this works really well to combat that. It makes my hair really light and has not been drying in my experience. However, I don\'t use the matching conditioner--I use the B&B Hairdresser\'s Oil conditioner. I had to stop using the Hairdresser\'s Oil shampoo because it made my hair heavy and greasy. But I think the use of a more clarifying shampoo (Ocean) and a richer conditioner (Hairdresser\'s Oil) balance it out. Just a suggestion. ', u'The smell is great as an added bonus!'], 'author': u'24kRoseAu ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Thickening Creme Contour
reviews: {'title': u'Great for Thick Hair!', 'text': [u'This was a recommendation from a Sephora associate. I needed something to help my long, thick, heavy hair hold a curl better. It has a little wave to it naturally, but it\'s so long and heavy that it wasn\'t curling well anymore. This is a great product for adding texture and hold for curling and updos! It smells nice as well, and you don\'t need to use much to get good hold. It feels a little tacky when you put it in your hair, but once you add heat and get it curled, it looks and feels fine, not crunchy. I like it!'], 'author': u'MrsEvans2016 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Of all the hair creams I have tried, this one is one of the best since it doesn\'t make your hair greasy or weigh it down and keeps stray hairs in place.'], 'author': u'MeleficentC ', 'date': [u'2016-07-16'], 'location': u'Toronto', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Totally awesome!', 'text': [u'I have tried at least a dozen texturizing sprays and every single one, without exception, has been incredibly sticky. They left a strange coating on my hair and weighed it down. So I posted a question on makeupalley asking for recommendations for a product that would give me that piece-y separation of my layers that\'s so on trend right now. I got several recommendations for Creme Contour so I went to the Bumble and Bumble website and posted a photo of the style I\'m trying to achieve and the SA said that this product would be perfect for the look I want. So I bought Creme Contour at my local Sephora and I really love it. It gives my hair some nice volume and delivers the piece-y-ness I\'ve been looking for. It also gives my hair incredible shape and some light hold and my style lasts for several days when I use it. It also has a thickening effect and makes my hair look a lot fuller. It only takes about a dime size dollop for my shoulder length hair, which means this jar will last for months. I warm the product in my hands and scrunch it into my hair. However, you\'ll want to use a little bit every day so don\'t use much at first. I use a tiny amount on the 2nd and 3rd day to revive and refresh my style. If you use too much initially, subsequent applications will make your hair look dirty. This product also adds some nice shine. I really like everything about it. It gives my hair the exact look I\'m going for without the slightest hint of stickiness. I highly recommend it for all hair types.'], 'author': u'dotinfla ', 'date': [u'2016-04-01'], 'location': u'Gainesville, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I was very excited to try this paste out as I tend to need dense cremes to style my hair. While I did give my hair a bit of moulding and staying power, and didn\'t look greasy, it wasn\'t as strong as I expected it to be. It wasn\'t as effective at lending height to my pompadour as I was hoping. The styling paste from Living Proof is more the strength that I need.'], 'author': u'frenchebilly ', 'date': [u'2015-09-16'], 'location': u'Cathedral City, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

It gives my hair some extra poof, but doesn\'t make my hair sticky or crunchy like some other mousses. The volume isn\'t very extreme, but I can definitely tell a difference. I will repurchase just because of the smell alone, its not overwhelming and goes away after awhile but I love it. If anything, out of the DB products I\'ve tried, this has the least scent.'], 'author': u'nikki25gee ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': u'Aiea, HI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Very good without a sticky mess', 'text': [u'Loved and still love this product. I\'m on my 3rd bottle. Not only does it give a nice volume the day you use it, but even better the next day! The best part is that it\'s not sticky or tacky in any way. It also has a nice clean fresh scent. As with most mousse products you have to use a bit so if you feel you\'re not getting the volume most of us rave about, you\'ll need to try a bit more. Once I got the right amount compatible w/ my own hair, it\'s been a dream.'], 'author': u'Melissa6169 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'favorite hair product ever!', 'text': [u'love this stuff! i use this when i want to let my hair dry naturally to help my curls form better and stay(i mix it with a little bit of Bumble and bumble Dont Blow It too) adn when i want to curl my hair the day ive washed it to help add volume and hold (otherwise my curls fall if i do it on a day i wash my hair :() its lightweight and never leaves my hair crunchy, if anything it makes it softer! love love love <3 only downside is my boyfriend doesnt really like the smell and it can give me a headache if i use too much and the scent lingers. i will definitely continue to use this though'], 'author': u'JuliaRachel ', 'date': [u'2016-08-20'], 'location': u'Virginia', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: The Chaser Shine Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Surprisingly good!', 'text': [u'I have what I refer to as crazy hair. It is thick, dry, coarse texture, enough wave to be frizzy, color treated shoulder length reddish brown hair. If there is any ounce of humidity in the air, my hair will frizz and get pouffy. I put a dime size amount of this product in my towel dried hair from mid-shaft to ends and then combed it through. I let my hair air dry since I had errands to run. When I got home and let my hair down from its bun, I was amazed at how soft and smooth my hair looks. I didn\'t notice any special shine to my hair but then again I have coarse hair that never looks glossy/shiny. But smooth and frizz-free hair makes me very happy. As far as scent goes, when I emulsified the product in my hands and before running it through my hair, I detected the same smell as Detox dry shampoo which I do not like the smell. However once I ran the product through my hair, I could no longer smell it. After my hair was dry, I didn\'t detect any scent in my hair whatsoever. Will definitely repurchase when my deluxe sample is gone.'], 'author': u'desertgirl501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'works well, but use very little', 'text': [u'This cream is extremely moisturizing and will weigh hair down somewhat. I have very thick, wavy hair that is difficult to weigh down and I have to be careful with the amount I use of this product. If used in a very small amount throughout wet hair (dime-sized), and only applied on ends and midshaft, this product works great. It leaves my hair silky and moisturized at the ends. Do not put this anywhere near your roots and I cannot stress enough to use VERY little or this will make your hair greasy. Products rarely are ever too much for my hair to handle, but this one you must be careful with. I will buy again.'], 'author': u'Italiana800 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'WOW! PERFECT HAIR IS POSSIBLE', 'text': [u'I wish I would have discovered this product sooner because my platinum blonde locks have been frizzy, dry, fuzzy and making me annoyed in the humidity all summer. I received a sample of this product and I rubbed about a dime size dollop with a bit of my living proof styling product which is good but not quite enough. My hair was damp. Then I styled as usual and my fried hay hair is currently transformed to silky strands of platinum paradise. Wow. Summer is almost over but my hair is gonna rock this fall and winter thanks to this product. I am ordering the full size ASAP.'], 'author': u'steamin ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Hot Toddy Heat & UV Protectant
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Really impressed. My hair felt like I had just left the salon. I worried it would be a first time fluke- but has kept on delivering. Only reason I gave it four stars was the price...'], 'author': u'TephiM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Fruita, Colorado', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Does what it says', 'text': [u'I first received this as a free sample and was reluctant to try it because I have very fine, oily hair. I have never found a product that doesn\'t make my hair heavy and more oily. ', u'However, I find this product works great! I use just the tiniest bit and only apply it to the ends of my hair. It is very light weight and doesn\'t dry heavy or leave an oily film in your hair. I use this before I blow dry my hair and then straighten it after, and it leaves my hair so soft and looking shinier and healthier. It has also made my split ends look a lot better.', u'I only use this when I plan on blow drying my hair (roughly 3x a week) so I don\'t know what this product is like if you use it daily.'], 'author': u'melissavd ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'made hair soft, not heavy on fine hair'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'FortMcMurray', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Perfect Lipstick', 'text': [u'A perfect lipstick. This "pink in Paris" #13 shade is beautiful and so flattering on my light, yellow undertoned coloring. It goes on smooth with more color than I expected. The shine is pretty and my dry lips are so comfortable. It\'s even quite lasting. I don\'t have to put Carmex on first or add gloss after: it\'s perfect in itself alone.I am now done with liquid lipsticks - I went through that faze and all the rigmarole it entailed with lip balm and liner,etc. And the inescapable chapped lips from it. I may even have to get "nude in private" now I\'m so impressed. Costly, but no extra steps or products. I pop this in my purse and "c\'est ca"!'], 'author': u'JosetteDP ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Florida', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Great lipstick?', 'text': [u'It looks gorgeous and really natural. It is perfect for that naturally-pretty-and-healthy-lips look (if applied once, but you can make it "more" opaque if you layer it). It feels really smooth and it is not too oily or glossy or heavy. The formula is great and the color is great, it slightly tints your lips so that is another plus!But, I did not give it 5 stars because it does wear off quickly and it does transfer easily. Though it wears off nicely (not patchy or in any ugly way), it just constantly requires reapplication. And it is completely gone once you eat.. So you end up using quite a bit of product quickly. BUT IT IS SO PRETTY.'], 'author': u'hys051698 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"it's not drying", 'text': [u'first of all, i like the color, it\'s not too sheer and not too loud. just right. i like the texture the most and it actually moisturize my lips instead of drying them out.the color lasts a long time. i wipe it off when i eat but i can still see the color on my lips.just bought the 2nd tube today....it tastes bit sweet on my lips...i can\'t say i like it nor hate it.'], 'author': u'juneping ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'new york', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Unfortunately...', 'text': [u'I have to give this a 1 star. I love some of their other products and wanted to try everything with the same fragrance as the Hot Toddy, so I tried the 100 proof. It made my hair shiny but after a few uses I noticed my hair felt crunchy like something was building up on there and changing the texture. For that reason I cannot recommend it. I know there are alot of natural oils in this product but I wonder if some of the other ingredients are silicone-based or made of who-knows-what other ingredients to where my hair would react like that. I use professional shampoo and have a mineral-removing water filter on my shower head; this was the only change I made to what I was using on my hair.'], 'author': u'sonianistan ', 'date': [u'2016-08-07'], 'location': u'New Albany, IN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dual-ended Disappointment', 'text': [u'*Nice, creamy texture*Excellent coverage, especially for eyes*Non-irritating*Packaging is flawed', u'I was excited to try this due to the dual ends and sale price, however the performance of the packaging was very disappointing. The dual ends are indeed helpful for making coverage easy on both blemishes and dark circles\u2026that is, if you can get the product to dispense properly from the pen. The twisting mechanism on the smaller end refuses to budge without major force, and you have to be careful not to open the wider end upside down otherwise the product slides out.The concealer itself has great texture and coverage \u2014 since I only use concealer on rare occasions, I\u2019ll deal with the packaging problems once in a while. The corrector hasn\u2019t produced any obvious results for me after a week of use, but it also hasn\u2019t made things worse (tinted coverage usually irritates my skin and produces more blemishes). A re-release of this product with better quality packaging would be a real winner.'], 'author': u'MuseInRouge ', 'date': [u'2016-01-26'], 'location': u'Mountain View, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Eye Art Artist's Palette
reviews: {'title': u'Beautiful palette', 'text': [u'This is my first LM eyeshadow palette and I wasn\'t sure what to expect. I use her loose translucent powder and tinted moisturizer and love them. I also have read people raving about her products so I thought there is a really good chance they would be pretty and good quality. I was right. They\'re beautiful and high-quality. I love that the shadows are easy to blend, almost no fallout like someone said earlier if you tap the brush or just use your brush gently in the pallet. I have fair skin with a pink undertone, dark brown eyes and natural light strawberry blonde hair. Some of the strong colors i\'ve seen in a lot of eyeshadow palette\'s and in magazines overwhelm my coloring and stature\u2026 I\'m 4ft11....so a lot of dark heavy make up looks off on me. Think little girl playing dress-up or possibly a tiny showgirl! LOL :-) For the last few years the world of beauty seems to be focused on large bootys and beautiful dark brunettes. Since I look nothing like that I\'ve been kind of sticking to a soft natural pinks and browns. Because this girl is neither on fire nor bootylicious\u2026 my husband says I\'m more like a porcelain doll or Scottish pixie :-) What I love so much about this beautiful pallet is that it has Colors that are on point and have buildable color. So I can make soft colors on my brown eyes to go with my porcelain skin and strawberry blonde hair. And my friend who definitely has been gifted in the booty department and has beautiful brown hair can use the same pallet and The colors look different but just as beautiful on her! The shadow stays where you placed it and lasts all day. I\'m in my late 40s and I don\'t see any creasing. I do use a shadow primer. I have a couple I\'m using now. The shadows work great with my UD and smashbox primers. So I think as long as you use a primer that suits your skin you\'ll be great. The colors stay where you put them. blend out beautifully and don\'t get muddy. I like the case that it\'s in it\'s good quality and I\'m really really happy with this product! In fact Ilove this pallet so much I bought a second one so that when I\'m finished with it I\'ll still have another year to use these beautiful colors!! I also got one of those magnetic pallets where if you\'re finished with most of the colors in that purchased pallet and just have a few stragglers left you can pry them out and put them in the magnetic palette and accrue a whole bunch of colors that you still use without having to keep large pallets with just a couple eyeshadows left in them. My friends and I get together sometimes with our colors and trade but kids with baseball cards colors the fit us better it\'s pretty fun and it makes good use of make up we\'ve paid good money for :) so try it I really think you\'ll like it whether you\'re going out for date night I want to soft natural look LM did it again! :-)'], 'author': u'cinderchella ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Instant Detox Mask
reviews: {'title': u'great product highly recommend', 'text': [u'I got it as a deluxe sample with serum and moisturizer . What can i say I\'m truly impressed it\'s makes my skin look clean and radiant. I read some of the other reviews that compared caudalie vs glam glow. Please note it\'s 2 different masks I owe both of them as well the glam I use once every 2-3 weeks only. And caudalie 2-3 times a week. And it does makes a huge difference to your skin.I got very sensitive skin and easy to develop allergies so I\'m very careful with face product. And this mask as well as their serum and moisturizer I would give 10 plus stars.Try it out you won\'t be disappointed it\'s a great product to have.'], 'author': u'ViolaKay ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It also really helped my whiteheads. It has not been overly drying on my skin. I love that it doesn\'t have chemicals but the smells is not the best.'], 'author': u'rrhunt ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

Glam Glow had been one of my favorite and also did home made masks as well that did good for my skin. I got this product since I had enough point ... might as well try it. It came with the Miceller cleaning water, anti-age serum, moisturizer, and the detox mask. I haven\'t used the cleaning water yet but have used the rest. ', u'I used the mask once and let me tell you how amazing my skin looked and felt. My pores completely disappeared. I followed up with the lotion and serum but this detox mask is the true winner!'], 'author': u'maiyamhs ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Best color of a sunless tanner', 'text': [u'This is my 3rd time buying. its my favorite sunless tanner but it\'s not perfect. I have tried St Tropaz and Bareminerals Faux tan among others. Pros: The smell is great. This does not smell like your typical sunless tanner. With'], 'author': u'fmeaton ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'loving it', 'text': [u'First time self tanning, i have been using this for about two weeks, price is decent,Smells great, love that it comes with a mitt. The gradual tan is just what i wanted, but I feel as if the amount of product could be bigger for price and a less running formula to avoid dripping, or possibly a different bottle design'], 'author': u'LizzettaAGB ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love a self tanning oil', 'text': [u'Goes on nicely with the mitt. I love that it is an oil to treat my skin. Color is a light golden sheen on my very pale skin.'], 'author': u'doxiegirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Natural glow', 'text': [u'This is really the first self tanner I have ever used and I was super impressed! I am super pale and it didn\'t look orange or anything, the smell is a bit strong but I liked it! I would highly recommend smelling them before you buy because they are strong. But coverage is great and lasts pretty long if you take care of it- exfoliate before and really moisturize after all the time! Definitely good for first time self tanners!'], 'author': u'carlala24 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect Glow', 'text': [u'I\'m now on my second bottle, a great alternative for a nice bronze when you don\'t have time to tan outside or hit a tanning booth. I usually apply it on after exfoliating in the shower before going to bed. I apply generous layers (sometimes two rounds on some sections) and let it sit for 10-15 minutes before putting on PJs. I\'ve never had the product transfer to either my sheets or PJs. It\'s important to note that you won\'t be able to tell a difference initially, but by morning time you\'ll see a glowy beautiful bronzed tan. I\'m so in love with how smooth and tan my skin looks after using this product, it definitely helps with the appearance of problem areas (cellulite, stretch marks, etc).'], 'author': u'MayraMC ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Ambient® Lighting Bronzer
reviews: {'title': u'AHhhhmazing!', 'text': [u'I was browsing in the store and a very nice makeup artist introduced me to this amazing product. It is lightweight, easy to apply and stays on my skin perfectly! Love the fact that it\'s vegan too! I would definitely buy again.'], 'author': u'YouAreWorthIt ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'beautiful glow!', 'text': [u'This gives you very beautiful shines on your face. It makes you look very healthy and glowy like you just came back from beach. Now, this is a bronzer, not a contour, and it has quite a lot of glitters in it. If you use this as contour, it might gives you opposite results. The price of this is high, however, you do get a lot of products . I have been using this almost daily since I got it months ago, and it still looks like I just brought it. The packaging is very unique as well, and you get a good mirror inside. In my opinion, this is a product that will suit every skin tone and every age. And I believe, just like me, the more you use it, the more you grow to like it.'], 'author': u'zanham123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'natural glow', 'text': [u'At first I thought I wouldn\'t like it because when I swatched it on my hand it came odd as very sparkly/glittery. But the glitter is actually very finely milled and when applied to the face it gives you a very soft subtle bronzey glow. I am very happy with my purchase :)'], 'author': u'pinki3 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Perfect eye contouring!', 'text': [u'Love this eye palette. Great packaging. Perfect shades for eye contouring. Very much impressed with the pigmentation. I don\'t know if its just mine but I find that the shadows are decent, but they don\'t blend perfectly (sometimes I have to sit there forever with my blending brush and I still can\'t get what I want) and they kick up A LOT of dust with the brush. That said, it\'s a lovely all-matte palette great for everyday looks.'], 'author': u'boose17 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'excellent!', 'text': [u'This is the best palette I\'ve ever owned. Shadow is extremely pigmented and blends beautifully. Highly recommend!'], 'author': u'meetmeinfl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Doesn't stay on at all", 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this palette. I absolutely love the colors - it\'s exactly what I\'ve been looking for in an all neutral palette. I gave it a week of use but had to return it. It creases and doesn\'t stay on at all, even with use of my urban decay eyeshadow base and a finishing setting spray. By lunch time it would crease and raccoon down my eyelids. When I returned it, the lady at the register did mention that they recently reformulated their makeup. I was just surprised how terrible it was considering the high rating of the product.'], 'author': u'ssykim ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Cauldalie has been one of my favorite skincare brands for over 10 years. This night cream is very hydrating and my skin is looking noticeably more youthful after a few weeks of using all the products in the Resverastrol line.'], 'author': u'leiamaria ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: REVEAL Concentrated Color Correcting Drops
reviews: {'title': u'perfect!', 'text': [u'I have rosacea and this is seriously a miracle worker. I either mix it with my primer, or do primer, let it dry, do a few drop directly to my super red spots with the dropper and blend out. Then apply foundation. It really feels so nice and smooth on my skin, it\'s great!'], 'author': u'kourganic ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Non-paraben, non-sulfate makes mama happy', 'text': [u'Happy to have found a non-paraben color corrector that works. Only wish it were in brush/tube form because the dropper is hard to get uniform amounts onto skin.'], 'author': u'shamrox ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Green drops', 'text': [u'I am very fair with pink undertones and I tend to get very red around my nose and chin just due to allergies, weather changes, etc. I mix three drops of this with my primer and apply foundation/concealer over top. I think this goes a long way with the redness, as I need much less concealer and don\'t need to spot-correct at all. You can also mix this with foundation or moisturizer, but I\'ve had the best results mixing it with my primer (LM or tarte, depending on my foundation). I don\'t suggest applying this alone except to target a very small area, as it doesn\'t blend well on its own due to the very liquid texture.'], 'author': u'grace6824 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'awesome', 'text': [u'I was shown this product during a 90 minute appointment back in March. I can honestly say it is one of the best redness reducers I\'ve used.
