name: TOUCHE ECLAT Neutralizers
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have hereditary dark circles under my eyes that have never been easy to conceal and now that I\'m older it\'s a flat out challenge. Until I can across this product. I use the copper colored tube which does an excellent job of neutralizing the dark circles without emphasizing the fine lines around my eyes. I have it three stars because it\'s pricey for the amount of product you receive.'], 'author': u'Ree36 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Useful', 'text': [u'This neutralizer does what it is supposed to do-neutralize. I use it under my eyes to lighten my dark circles. I lightly add my concealer on top, and the skin under my eyes looks brighter, and I look well rested. As a 40 year old woman, I appreciate products that give me a more youthful look without much effort.'], 'author': u'MakeIt40 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'the ultimate color corrector', 'text': [u'This product is everything I read it to be and more. I must admit I dwelled on buying it given its price tag but now I\'m glad I did. It conceals redness without having a cakey feel to it. It blends perfectly with my bb cream or my foundation and is very easy and practical to apply.'], 'author': u'Mareis ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'It works but even better if it is combined.', 'text': [u'I bought the Bisque one and used it as a stand alone concealer first to cover my dark circles. I have quite an issue with them and most of the concealers I have used have been bad. ', u'However, this one worked really well; It is creamy, not extremely light or orange\' and stays on for hours. Now, the reason I give it 4 stars is, that if you use it as a concealer and have severe dark circles, it works best with another product combined. I use a stick concealer of a lighter tone than the neutralizer for my desirable results.'], 'author': u'Homura ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'Las Vegas', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This product is amazing. Works wonders neutralizing/concealing and still is light weight. Covers everything, giving you a flawless work. It\'s a must have & definitely worth the money!'], 'author': u'tegan118 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Resveratrol Lift Eye Lifting Balm
reviews: {'title': u'I Believe', 'text': [u'I tried this product from a sample and fell in love with it. I noticed a huge difference with my dark circles so I purchased the item. After I bought it, I felt like I wasn\'t seeing a difference so I stopped using it and stopped using under eye cream all together. I work 40 hours a week and go to school so let me tell you, I get really dark circles if I don\'t use anything. After I notice how bad my dark circles had gotten I went back to using this under eye cream and saw results. After that day I no longer doubted the potency of this product. I believe!'], 'author': u'h3len ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not worth the price', 'text': [u'I received this in my Sephora play box and it is an okay eye cream. I was shocked when I saw how darn expensive it is. There are so many other great eye creams that are way better and way cheaper! First of all I don\'t think a cream can actually make anyone\'s dark circles go away. It did nothing to mine. It also made my under eye concealer and my eyeshadow crease so bad. I have never had a problem with creasing until using this. But it does hydrate well. But like I said before, you can find a great hydrating eye cream for cheaper.'], 'author': u'jennacouture ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Incredible results', 'text': [u'This came in my Play box. I use it under my eyes morning and night. It does help with reducing dark circles, puffiness, and wrinkles. I haven\'t decided if I can afford to buy the full size product but I really want to.'], 'author': u'PerfectSa ', 'date': [u'2016-10-04'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Got in my Play! Box, totally amazed', 'text': [u'I really didn\'t think I would find an eye cream that performed better than my current one...but I started getting a bit dissatisfied with my current one, it just didn\'t seem to be working well for me anymore. I got this in my Play box and decided to try it, and OMG. just OMG. I have used it for a week and this was a very stressful week where I didn\'t get as much sleep...and this stuff is working for me. I can tell a visible difference in my dark circles! I\'m buying more when this sample runs out. Thank you Play!!!'], 'author': u'Cutecake ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': u'IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'finally!', 'text': [u'An eye cream that actually works! I got this as a sample in my play box and I\'ve been using it for a few weeks with really amazing results. I\'m 34 so my under eye area is starting to have more discoloration and fine lines had been developing for a couple years now. However, after a few weeks of using this the darkness under my eyes is noticeably lighter, but even better, all the fine lines are completely gone! I have the under eyes of a teenager again! ;) get this product- it\'s amazing!'], 'author': u'angiem1982 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Touche Eclat Blur Perfector
reviews: {'title': u"It's good but I don't love it", 'text': [u'It\'s waxy at first but turns to super soft powdery air on your face! I really love it on it\'s own, but it just doesn\'t blend well with any of my foundations. Maybe powder based products will be better!'], 'author': u'hannarrr ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not Worth It', 'text': [u'Really wanted to love this product, briefly tested it out in store and it made my skin feel so smooth I couldn\'t help but buy it. I gave it a few tries, but it did nothing for me. I tried using it with the applicator puff which was just weird for this product, I tried applying with my fingers, I tried everything but it left my skin shiny and kind of sticky and worst of all it broke me out. Returned the product and I\'m definitely not missing it.'], 'author': u'mackoula ', 'date': [u'2016-10-04'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Luxurious', 'text': [u'Everyone needs to treat themselves once in a while. This pretty little pink compact contains one of the coolest cosmetics products on the market right now. At first the texture feels like a dry balm and once you apply it to your face, magic happens. It\'s crazy soft and mattes down any imperfections in your makeup. I just adore it.'], 'author': u'tompy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'West Palm Beach', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'\u2764\ufe0f', 'text': [u'Lovely packaging and good job of blurring my little under eye lines that I\'ve started to have recently. My suggestion is to use a little bit of product whether with the sponge provided or your fingers so that your concealer won\'t crease. I reapply it 1-2 times throughout the day. I didn\'t think that it would help me to reduce the shine on my T-Zone, hence I don\'t use it for these purposes.'], 'author': u'kerencoen ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gorgeous Packaging', 'text': [u'It looks stunning on my vanity, that\'s about all it does though. This going on like a cream and then turns into a powder by some miracle and it feels amazing but it didn\'t change the look of my skin.'], 'author': u'AliceVoltaire0 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: TOUCHE ÉCLAT - Radiant Touch
reviews: {'title': u'best concealer', 'text': [u'This is the best concealer I have ever tried. It matches my skin tone perfectly, and I have a deep complexion that is often not covered in the range of shades offered by list brands. It doesn\'t crease into fine lines, and adds a nice, natural touch of radiance to your eye area. My only recommendation is to set the concealer with powder to make it a bit more long-wearing.'], 'author': u'kimemo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"CAN'T LIVE WITHOUT IT!", 'text': [u'This is one of the products I could not live without on a deserted Island! I have been using it for years. Perfect for dark circles and to color correct lids. The older I get the more I love it! It makes you look more awake. High quality, lasts all day. It provides full coverage sheer, but it\'s sheer.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Pure Truth™ Vitamin C Youth Activating Oil
reviews: {'title': u'IN LOVE!!!', 'text': [u'In LOVE!! Great product. I use this product at night after I clean my face and then I finish with a moisturizer to seal the oil. Try it a few days and then make your decision. {'title': u'best thing for my skin', 'text': [u'I was hesitant to use this on my oily adult acne prone skin, but I got a sample and forgot to pack my moisturizer during a trip. My skin looks and feels so youthful.'], 'author': u'joannc830 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Ceramic Slip Clay Cleanser
reviews: {'title': u'Holy Grail', 'text': [u'This cleanser is nothing short of AMAZING and God sent. Today marks 3 nights in a row of using the Ceramic Slip Clay Cleanser followed by the Power Duo of Luna and the Lactic Acid Treatment. After only THREE consistent nights of using the three together my skin looks X100 better, I have had red marks/splotches on my cheeks from past pimples that I couldn\'t get to go away, after THREE NIGHTS of using, the product the red splotches are almost gone! Black heads on my nose have disappeared, and my white heads on my chin are diminishing. I have gone to dermotologists, used numerous name brand cleansers and serums and Sunday Riley has been the only product that worked. I am so happy and will continue to use! Skin tone even and clear, face feels fresh and alive during the day. LOVE LOVE LOVE.'], 'author': u'aveg16 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Effingham, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'what difference!', 'text': [u'I\'ve struggled with extremely oily skin for many years, this cleanser has changed my whole face! My oil is finally under control and it really balances out my tone and texture as well!'], 'author': u'Numbphased ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love love love this cleanser', 'text': [u'Love this cleanser, the delicate scent reminds me of my favorite spa! Leaves my skin fully clean without being stripped! {'title': u'I will never buy anything else', 'text': [u'I live this cleanser but I also love this line! I have normal to oily skin and I am Afro-Latina who is prone to high pigmentation in certain areas. I usually have clear skin but can get oily throughout the daily I saw results with my pores right away! My face get cleaner and my pores were almost invisible. It also lasts forever! I use one squeeze in the morning and one at night. After 2 months my skin is clear, doesn\'t get oily anymore; more dewy- usually matte.'], 'author': u'gambit216 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'awesome', 'text': [u'I love this product . Highly recommended .'], 'author': u'Maddy15 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing!!', 'text': [u'I love this product, Im new to using oils. I have really sensitive and dehydrated skin and now that I\'m 31 I want to have extra moisture and this product is perfect!!!! I use it at night instead of my moisturizer and it helps me hydrated all night without feeling oily or greasy. I don\'t like the smell but I can get passed it! I strongly recommend it and will keep on repurchasing !!!!!'], 'author': u'mariadi789 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I love putting this on before I apply my foundation!!!'], 'author': u'Betulirem ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not bad!', 'text': [u'I should start off saying that I\'m a newbie as far as cleansers and face oils go. I just turned 30 and I\'m allergic to most things under the sun. I just went from never washing my face with anything except warm water ( because EVERYTHING makes me dry and itchy and breaks my skin out! Not by choice. lol ) bought the sample size and the first few days it did nothing for me. I have two dry patches on my cheeks that drive me nuts. I used a creamy cleanser and an over night face mask followed by this in the am and holy moly- it worked! I\'ve kept up this ritual of cleaner, light face mask either a 10 min one or an over night, and then the oil or just the oil sometimes after washing and I have zero dry patches. ZERO. I do add a few dabs to my body lotions now as well! The smell isn\'t great but it isn\'t bad either. It smells like oil. Lol there is no fragrance in it which I\'m sure is actually why it worked for me. I do feel a tiny bit greasy in the AM but I also use a little more than instructed! All in all, I would purchase again. Why mess with a good thing?'], 'author': u'JessicaGuelker ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Relevée Lash Curler
reviews: {'title': u'not a huge fan', 'text': [u'Should have read the reviewsBefore buying ..Doesn\'t curl my eyelashes real well like it said it would. I have to pump it 6 times per eye in order to get it nice and curled. A tad disappointed.'], 'author': u'crazymom750 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So disappointed....', 'text': [u'I went into Sephora and when I asked the Beauty Advisor where the lash curlers were, he walked me over to the display and absolutely RAVED about the new Surratt version. Said it was even better than the Shu Uemura ones (which aren\'t as easy to find anymore). Naturally, it turned out they were out of stock-- (because they\'re so popular, he said). Of course then I HAD to have it. Called a couple of other Sephora\'s nearby and they didn\'t have them either. Finally called a store that I had to actually drive to... which I did... and was so excited I bought 2. Needless to say, not good!!! Doesn\'t fit my eyes well...kind of clunky and thick. And when I finally get my lashes in there... not much curl. So frustrating.'], 'author': u'BabsieT ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love it!! The best curl tool i ever have'], 'author': u'stephielnm ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Curler', 'text': [u'I only used Shu Uemura because no other eyelash curlers worked well for me but since they are no longer carried in Sephora and heard great reviews on Surratt\'s; I decided to try it. Works great just like my Shu does. It\'s slightly better because it\'s flatter so it gets every eyelash. Def recommend it. Also, as someone else mentioned, mine didn\'t come with the little chainlink charm as pictured.'], 'author': u'younggorgeous ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not as pictured', 'text': [u'Bought this eyelash curler due to wonderful reviews and it looked good, like a typical eyelash curler. What I received was one that is matte deep black, with a black pad. I have black eyelashes. It is impossible to use or place without feeling like you will pinch your eyelids, I can\'t see my lashes in the curler. So this is a bit of a terror to use, can\'t see if I have all my lashes or if I am crimping them strangely or if I will be pinching my eyelids. As least if the pad was a different colour it would be leaps and bounds better. Whoever decided on the black in black should be let go.'], 'author': u'3blindmice ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Winnipeg, Manitoba', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Smoky Eye Baton
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I love the convenience and idea of this, but that\'s about it. The pencil is TINY... it is smaller than my hand. Pigmented and blends easily, but doesn\'t stay at all. I used eyeshadow primer, but it still transferred and creased. Had to return because I don\'t want to pay $35 to have raccoon eyes.'], 'author': u'Etceteri ', 'date': [u'2016-02-16'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great concept but poor wearability', 'text': [u'I had high hope for this product. Love the concept and the packaging. It is tiny, but that makes it easy to carry. I don\'t mind the price if the product is as great as it claims. The liner isn\'t that smooth to apply but it looks good after blending with the sponge tip. However, it does smear in a bad way. I understand it needed to blend well but it\'s not ok if every time I touch my eye I leave a streak across my bridge. I even tried staying spray. Maybe this product requires a primer? But that defeats the whole purpose of streamlining.'], 'author': u'mitten ', 'date': [u'2016-01-21'], 'location': u'new york, ny', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'amazeball', 'text': [u'I read a few reviews before I purchase this product but first I bought cendres and I wasn\'t really happy at all because I have olive colour skin and I couldn\'t see the eyeshadow colour very define on my eyelids so I exchange it to vapour mauve and I Love it!! Can\'t say enough of it. So easy to apply and smokey eyes just look right! Very important thing tho, you need eye primer for sure before you use it. Without eye primer I see a very different result. It is quite long lasting but I need to touch up in the middle of the day ( I have oily skin) I love the cooling effect feeling. I will try another may be dark brown in future for sure. (Asian, brown eyes with olive skin colour)'], 'author': u'amourmoe ', 'date': [u'2015-12-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'A true dummie proof way to apply eye makeup and it goes on so well. I love that the eye pencil and shadow are in one stick so I don\'t have to carry around too much.'], 'author': u'janelee501 ', 'date': [u'2015-09-18'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE!!!', 'text': [u'I just found this product in my local Sephora store, and can\'t say enough about it!!! It\'s the BEST! Totally worth the money as it is an eyeliner and shadow combo. At first it did seem to run, but after I added primer before I put it on, it was perfect! Long lasting, and no running! Couldn\'t be happier!'], 'author': u'kathleen28 ', 'date': [u'2015-09-11'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
ingredient: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Barium Sulfate, Dextrin Palmitate, Talc, Dextrin Palmitate / Ethylhexanoate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Diisostearyl Malate, Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Simethicone, Mica (Ci 77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492).

name: Auto-Graphique Eyeliner
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Best liquid liner ive ever used. Ive been doing cat eyes for years so ive tried just about everything. Primer or no primer this eyeliner stays on forever. I have slightly hooded and slightly oily eyelids and ive never had a problem with it staying on. The only warning i will give is that you need to be quick and precise because it will dry quickly.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been wearing eyeliner for decades, and this is sensational! Absolutely perfect! I\'ve never written a review before, but this product warranted it! The glide couldn\'t be better...and with older eyelids that is essential. And I used it for months, but as I was going overseas for 2 months, I thought I must buy another, as surely it would go dry during that amount of time. Unfortunately, at the time, it was out of stock, so Kat Von D\'s was recommended, but I was so disappointed in it, but amazingly my original Surratt still kept performing during my 2 month stay abroad, and still is going strong! That\'s approximately 6 months of use...without even a refill! I love this eyeliner....the best I\'ve ever used!!'], 'author': u'diva9 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not worth the price...', 'text': [u'The idea of buying it once and being able to refill is nice but the ink quality is not great. I feel like if you were going to spend money on a high end liner, go for the shu uemura one over the surratt. The brush is nice because it doesn\'t fray and is very precise but the ink needs work. It comes out dark, opaque, dries matte black but smears within the hour of application. I\'ve even tried setting it with a powder and tried using a primer underneath. I don\'t have oily lids and the liner still won\'t stay in place. Even the stila is better in terms of longevity/not smearing.'], 'author': u'princessvics ', 'date': [u'2016-08-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'new Favorite eyeliner', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this eyeliner. only once did i have an issue where shortly after I applied it my eyes were watering and it got smeared. Otherwise it\'s fantastic'], 'author': u'JoLynlind ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'New London, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'The Best!', 'text': [u'Just finally received this very pricey eyeliner, and it\'s perfect! Draws a beautiful, precise shiny black line, easy to control the thickness, and does not smear or bleed. I don\'t understand the reviews that say there was transfer... I didn\'t have any. Maybe if you have oily lids? No transfer for me at all-- using this pen/brush was a beautiful experience. I usually use Kat Von D\'s Ink Liner pen in Trooper. This pen is superior. I hope the cartridge lasts a while, though, because it was $$$$'], 'author': u'DocKaly ', 'date': [u'2016-07-08'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

reviews: {'title': u'Still undecided', 'text': [u'if i purchase this one more time then i will review again with a better rating. i am undecided as I have set it down after several attempts to make it a part of a daily routine. {'title': u'The Best', 'text': [u'I \u2764\ufe0f my SURRATT retractable refillable brow pencil holder & brow pencil cartridge. Yes, you have to get past spending $40 just for the holder, but then it\'s $15 per refillable pencil, which is pretty reasonable. No sharpening, just re-filling. I think it\'s smart packaging, and I love the weight of the holder. Sometimes I outline with this and fill in with Tarte Brow Mousse, other times I just line and fill all with this. I\'ve used many a brow product. This is tops.'], 'author': u'trixiefaux ', 'date': [u'2015-12-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'misleading copy - not a review of the product', 'text': [u'It\'s not clear that this product is ONLY the holder. A holder by itself does not bolster and refine arches as described in the "What it is" section. I see farther down in the paragraph that REFILL cartridges are sold separately, but doesn\'t that imply that the product is already FILLED?', u'I\'ll post another review after I get the cartridges, but BOO on having to place another order on something that\'s already kind of spendy.'], 'author': u'elkay ', 'date': [u'2015-11-12'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'The Best!!!', 'text': [u'I got this a few months back in a Wantable box. At first I blew it off as just another brow pencil...WRONG! It is the best I have ever used, and I\'ve been using them over 30 years! It is very small, tiny, but lasts a long time. I love the fact that you can refil it, instead of wasting materials! {'title': u'A++ mask', 'text': [u'I got 2 pods of this mask as part of the 500 points perk set they had out a few weeks ago. This is the only thing in the set that I liked, but the mask was so amazing that I don\'t feel like I wasted 500 points at all! This mask made my face so soft and smooth after using it. My husband even commented that it was really soft and he never notices things like that. I usually put it on Sunday evening after supper, leave it for 10 minutes and then get in the shower and rinse it off as I am washing my hair and have no problems rinsing it off. And I found that it left my skin nice for the entire week, got rid of some little bumps I had and smoothed it all out. I didn\'t notice anything about my pores, I didn\'t really look for that though. Its been 2 weeks since I used up my last pod and I am going this weekend to buy a tube of it because all this week I feel like my skin hasn\'t been as nice as the 2 weeks previous.'], 'author': u'meliebean ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Ottawa, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love', 'text': [u'I\'ve purchased a few masks and IGotta say this is my favourite. It applies nice, I love the tightening feeling while it\'s on. Also my nose usually has access oil and this seemed to suck it up. Will buy again.'], 'author': u'abchicka30 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'double cleanse dream', 'text': [u'I work at Sephora and when I told my co-worker I only use make-up wipes and a cleanser to remove my make-up she recommended I add this oil-to-cleanser to my routine in place of my wipes. I find doing both removes every inch of my make-up and leaves my skin feeling super fresh (which is a must have for me considering I work at Sephora and wear a ton of make-up).'], 'author': u'steff13 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'HG Brow Pencil', 'text': [u'Glides on with a very light touch, very fine tip so can make hair strokes. Makes doing my eyebrows easier & super speedy. Joy to use. It is so precise, but still looks very natural. Buildable. Wear time longer than most. Love!', u'Note: I have bushy eyebrows (but tweezed/shaped) that have bare patches I need to fill in, plus I need to add some shape at the top. I love this because I can get way in there between the bushy brow hairs. Other pencils I cannot do that at all (the pencil wax on others clings into weird balls on the hairs; not this one). {'title': u'Pricey but worth it', 'text': [u'Excellent mask for chapped lips. My lips were so dry they were on the verge of cracking. One use over night and they were better. On the second night, it was as if they had never been chapped.', u'It\'s really thick, so wear your hair back on a windy day! Also, doesn\'t wear well with lipstick, but that\'s OK. Perfect for overnight or going outside on frigid days. Also no weird taste/smell'], 'author': u'coffeedrinker ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'boston', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'The best lip balm ever! It lasts long and even after having meal you still feel it. Minimum color which is a good thing as for me, I try to go natural.'], 'author': u'honeymelon ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Fantastic, but a Bit Too Pricey!', 'text': [u'I had the opportunity to try deluxe samples of the Agave Lip Mask in all three finishes. The formula is unlike any other lip products I have tried before. These can be worn as a nighttime treatment or during the day. When I used it overnight, my lips felt incredible the next morning no matter what shape they were in the night before. It smoothed, plumped, hydrated, moisturized, and softened the lip surface for me. I detected a subtle exfoliation (chemically, perhaps?) because the rough bits on my lips seemed to be gone the next day and dead skin was easy to swipe off. It is very thick and heavy feeling (hence a "mask"), and but the supreme moisturization is worth the slight discomfort.', u'As far as the color selection goes, each shade looked different on the lips, and the colors were flattering on me (fair, yellow undertones, cool/pink overtones, but fairly pigmented lips). ', u'The reason I gave this 4/5 stars is that I think the price tag is too steep. Yes, this is an effective product with many benefits that surpasses all of the other lip moisturizers I have tried, but for what is essentially a balm, I won\'t spend this much. If it is in our budget, I\'d go for it. If not, get it through sample kits or with Sephora points!'], 'author': u'jaymeshore ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Stay All Day® Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner
reviews: {'title': u'Best eyeliner ever', 'text': [u'Love this eyeliner. It goes on easily and stays on all day, without any smudges. The brush tip is tapered so that application is goof-proof. I have to put this on without my glasses and even then I don\'t mess up. I\'ve tried many others and this one is the best.'], 'author': u'Scottysgirl103 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Mixed Feelings', 'text': [u'I have mixed feelings about this eyeliner. Like most people, I have tried many different eyeliners trying to find the one that is easy to apply, dries quickly, long lasting, and looks great.', u'As a bit of background, my eyes are somewhat hooded, more visibility on one eye. I often have difficulty finding an eyeliner that doesn\'t transfer to my eyelid, and this frequently happens with powder and pencil eyeliners.', u'The first time I bought this eyeliner I was impressed. I compare it to Kat Von D\'s Tattoo eyeliner, but with a shorter, better controlled tip. It was with this eyeliner that I perfected my cat eye/wings. As previous reviewers have mentioned, it did dry out somewhat quickly but I attributed this to using it almost everyday. I also found the tip broke apart/disintegrated after some time, making it harder to be as precise as I wanted. However, as I mentioned, this was after considerable use so I didn\'t mind too much. I probably would have given it a 4.5/5.', u'Because I liked this liner so much I repurchased. I had a different experience the second time around. Right at the beginning the applicator was much drier and I needed to shake it a lot before it would apply smoothly. Even with shaking, I had some difficulty and it always felt very dry on my eyelid, to the point where it felt tight. I needed to re-draw the line several times to achieve that dark, inky colour. I also find the cat eye/wings extremely difficult as the tip is so dry I need to redraw and it\'s never as sharp as I would like. I would rate the second purchase a 2.5-3/5 as yes, it dries quickly and lasts all day, but the applicator does not last very long.', u'I\'m not sure if my second purchase was just a bad or old batch, or if this is what it\'s normally like. I am hesitant to buy it again after my last experience. I am giving this a rating of 3 because of the lack of longevity of the applicator. I will perhaps buy it again to give it one more shot and compare it again to Kat Von D\'s Tattoo liner.'], 'author': u'JSKM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'awesome!', 'text': [u'Fav liner in the whole world!!! Stays on all day and i have very oily eye lids but this doesnt even move. {'title': u'Amazing Value', 'text': [u'Picked this up last week when looking for a new cleaning soap. I was tired of the Dawn/Olive Oil thing, and felt a competitor\'s soap was just too high. Figured I would give this a shot and I am so glad that I did. It smells so good, but the smell hasn\'t transferred to my brushes. When I clean them, they feel brand new - soft and gentle, and not dried out. I even used this on my sponge and it worked great. I even like the little pink scrubber that comes with it for my eyeshadow brushes. ', u'The biggest trial that I had for this was my fluffy fan brush that I use for fall out - after using it and drying, the fan was in its original shape, and felt brand new! I highly recommend anyone seeking a new cleaning solution to give this a shot - and if you\'re not sure, get the smaller size. When this one runs out, I\'ll definitely be reordering.'], 'author': u'dorkasarusrex ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Florence, SC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'New favorite eyeliner', 'text': [u'I have been using liquid eyeliner since forever and have not had much success with gel liners. {'title': u'Hard to Use', 'text': [u'The instructional video by Benefit says turn the dial one click and go. I have to turn the dial 2-3 times for each eye and work and work to get it in place. It works better for me when I also use a small brush to smooth the line out. I have opened the tube up at times and found a dry glob of gel from where it has worked out while sitting. I can only assume it\'s because of having to twist the dial so much to try to get something out during use. The triangular applicator is plastic and the gel is distributed through a channel inside. The sharp plastic point has jabbed me in the eye more times than I can count and it HURTS! I do LOVE the wear, but I don\'t like the trouble.'], 'author': u'LadySouth ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Knoxville, TN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Color Is Off', 'text': [u'I ordered this because I was looking for a "my-lips-but-better" look and I was hoping this would be what could do it. I ordered Bowery, which is supposed to be for light skin tones and have pink undertones. I am light-skinned (closer to fair than medium) and so I figured this would be the way to go. Putting it on felt great, it\'s very moisturizing and feels nice on the lips. However, the color was terrible. It had orange undertones, not pink. It brought out any orange in my face and it just looked bad, so I had to return it.The two stars are for the consistency of the product and the packaging (it\'s like a chubby stick). But beware of the color Bowery if you have any orange, yellow, or red undertones in your skin!'], 'author': u'MsKitt ', 'date': [u'2015-05-08'], 'location': u'Boca Raton, Fl', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: They're Real! Remover
reviews: {'title': u'Pretty Awesome but Flawed', 'text': [u'Super heavy duty makeup remover! Loved the product but I don\'t recommend getting to close to your actual eyeballs because it blurs vision pretty hardcore and messes with contact lenses. Overall pretty awesome but pretty flawed.'], 'author': u'emmaphobic ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'meh', 'text': [u'I was really impressed when I tested it in the store to take off all the swatches I did on my hand so I bought it. I dont know if I\'m just not using it correctly but it does little to remove the actual makeup and if you get it in your eye forget about it! Blurry vision for a while after that, I would recommend using it with something else.'], 'author': u'TyffM ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': u'Bremerton, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'waste of money', 'text': [u'you can save a lot of money and just use regular eye make-up remover. I love They\'re Real mascara, but this does not help remove the make-up from my lashes any more easily or effectively than anything else I have/do use'], 'author': u'SunnyinPgh ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': u'Pittsburgh area', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Little Goes a Long Way', 'text': [u'I bought this remover after a Sephora employee was helping me swatch urban decay\'s new all nighter foundation. It took off all of the patches that weren\'t my shade and when I used it on my eyes at home it was amazing. I use Clinique\'s take the day off balm but it doesn\'t get Urban Decay\'s razor sharp liner off. I take a little dot of this on my eye and rub all over my eye and then the same with my other eye. Once I let it sit for a few seconds, I wipe my face with a makeup remover wipe and everything is gone! I always struggled to get all of my eye makeup off but this product makes it so easy. I use such a small amount that I think the bottle will last me for a few months.'], 'author': u'katybennett ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Works Wonders', 'text': [u'I regularly use the They\'re Real mascara and eyeliner, and they\'re nearly impossible to get off with any other remover that I\'ve tried. A little bit of this product goes a long way, I usually take off all of my eye makeup with a super small amount of this product on a q-tip.'], 'author': u'MusicalsMakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-07-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'One of the best lip balms', 'text': [u'I got this in a duo with the lipstick color Forward a while back. This balm/primer doesn\'t work so great as a primer for me, it usually lightens the color a bit instead, but I always use it as a balm after I put on the lipstick. I\'ve used this as a balm with other lipsticks and alone by itself and if it were not so expensive I would never use any other kind of lip balm (Eos is what I use on the daily and Ardency Inn is even smoother). It smells and tastes really good, kind of minty sweet. Have not used it as a primer for any other lipsticks so I don\'t know how that works. However I highly recommend this to use as a balm over matte lipsticks or no lipstick at all!'], 'author': u'k8tzin ', 'date': [u'2016-07-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Cream Lip Stain
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Love this product! I have the shade 14 Blackberry Sorbet. My go to lip colour for special occasions or whenever feel like being bold!'], 'author': u'Beckah87 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wanted to love this', 'text': [u'Based on my favorite writers recent FB video post, and a 3 yr old gift card, I stopped into my local Sephora on a whim to try BlackBerry Sorbet for a good fall lip color. I fell in love with the shade in store and bought it along with a lip liner to match. I wore it that night to dinner and was suprised the color transferred to my straw, glass and from a dab of my napkin...guess I was falsely under the expression that lip stains are just that, a stain unlike a lipstick. I reapplied after dinner and about 2 hours later it felt very gritty on my lips, I popped into a restroom to check it the stain had cracked and was peeling and pilling in my lips and looked horrible. I was so embarrassed and washed it off immediatly. Guess my lips are not comparable with this brand of lip stain.'], 'author': u'golfgirl4par ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'AMAZING!', 'text': [u'This liquid lip is amazing. It is SO comfortable on the lip- I don\'t even feel like I have any product on. It is not drying at all, which is amazing or a liquid lipstick. It transfers the slightest bit, but still stays on extremely well during eating/drinking. The color selection is very poor in my opinion- I wish sephora would come on with newer, on trend colors in this formula, however, the formula is truly amazing. My favorite colors are #01 and #13! Definitely worth a try for the affordable cost.'], 'author': u'melsyp ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'life changing', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this product. I wear the shade "fawn". Air brush formula is like nothing else. It\'s watery. Doesn\'t feel like you\'re wearing foundation. You can go as light or as full coverage as you want. ', u'I am fair skinned but still have a lot of yellow in my skin. I\'m also quite oily. I have never been able to find a foundation that doesn\'t make me ghost white (nothing else on the market seems to understand light can still be yellow) or orange (being super oily means my foundation ends up oxidizing and turning me some weird dirty orange colour ). ', u'My BF doesn\'t like the sound of the metal balls inside rattling first thing in the morning. Oh well ! ', u'People literally stop me on street to ask what I use. <3'], 'author': u'DodoElectro ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Contour Eye Pencil 12hr Wear Waterproof
reviews: {'title': u"My mum's fave eyeliner", 'text': [u'My mum is the one who purchased this. She got the Blonde Ambition - Beige one. It\'s a nice shimmery beige. She uses it to line her eyelids and it looks nice and bright even with her wrinkled eyelids. I\'ve used it myself and I love it. I would say it doesn\'t smudge or budge but I\'ve never had eyeliner that did so I don\'t think this is really an amazing characteristic. I just love the colour.'], 'author': u'cassxndre ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Toronto, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'Love the color and sparkles in Tango Night', 'text': [u'I purchased this recently from Sephora. The color is absolutely fantastic. If you have greasy eyelids (which I do by the end of the day) then it does smudge a bit underneath the eye. My only complaint is that I feel like it is a bit expensive for literally one small pointy tip (this doesn\'t retract and there isn\'t any additional pencil down inside of the pencil). So, once you\'ve used the tip then it is completely gone. If you sharpen the tip then you are losing good pencil. Not sure if I would buy this particular one again even though the color and sparkles make my eyes pop.'], 'author': u'maggie63 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Portland, OR', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Beauty Amplifier Lip Plumper
reviews: {'title': u'Best lip conditioner!', 'text': [u'I bought this to use as a lip conditioner because my lips are so dry. Most balms just sit on the top of my lips but they are still dry underneath or others I have tried immediately absorb into my lips and they are dry again. This is a moist barrier that sits on top of your lips (kind of like gloss) and it stays put. I actually put it on before bed and my lips are still moist by morning. I know this is intended to plump lips which it does not so I didn\'t give it a high rating but if you want a fantastic conditioner then this is it!'], 'author': u'mizeet ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

You do have to shake it before every use so that the pigment comes out well, but otherwise it\'s great!'], 'author': u'brdie04 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'NOT WATERPROOF!', 'text': [u'I bought this with excitement and high hopes. I suffer from chronic dry eyes from wearing contacts, so my eyes tear a lot. I\'m the perfect candidate to test this product out to see if it truly lives up to its claims. So I applied this product to my upper eye lid, lining close to the lash line for my wings. None applied to bottom lash line. First off, when my eyes teared, the eyeliner went into my eyes. Then, the eyeliner totally faded off. What\'s going on Sephora? Even drugstore eyeliner is better than this. I was praying to find a matte black waterproof liquid eyeliner. I\'ll be returning this product asap, and continue the hunt :-/'], 'author': u'JesseniaO ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Beauty Amplifier Lid and Liner Primer
reviews: {'title': u'Must Have!', 'text': [u'This product is not named right! It IS NOT A PRIMER. It is used over your primer. Before this I would set my primer with eyeshadow. This is similar as setting your primer with eyeshadow except this is BETTER! It has a silicone feeling and is extremely smooth. Using this as your setting over primer makes blending eye shadows easier and better. The silicone powder base on your eyes is better than any traditional powder or eyeshadow. It gives you a smooth surface the eyeshadow glides over. Permanent part of my makeup routine!'], 'author': u'MichelleJo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best for blending eyeshadow', 'text': [u'I bought this because of how soft and buttery it is. I use it as a base for my eyeshadow. It helps the colors blend out really nicely due to the slip the powder has. I don\'t think it would prolong eyeshadow, you would need to apply it over something. but it definitely help shadows blend seamlessly together.'], 'author': u'anniferwally ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'NOt a primer, but sets your primer', 'text': [u'Alright folks.. before you completely write this product off. I have to say the name is misleading. If you use this as a primer ofcourse it is going to crease. Trust me. BUT.. if you use this to set your eye primer I kid you not, nothing moves. I have used this over Nars Pro Prime, UD Eden,, KAt von D lock it, and the Becca Primer and its amazing for ALL of them. So for the more pigmented eye shadow primers, this just creates a blank canvas so your shadows show up true to color. I know that when you use Eden or the Kat Von D lock, the primer tends to change the color of the eyeshadow. BUT this just helps. Use it to set your primer not as a standalone primer.. Hope this helps.'], 'author': u'naturelskin ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': u'Pleasanton, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Instant Smooth Perfecting Touch
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Silica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene Glycol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Ci 77019/Mica, Ci 77491/Iron Oxide, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Ci 75470/Carmine.
reviews: {'title': u'Worth it!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried smoothing primer\'s and other primers that have claims of reducing pores and minimizing fine lines. But I have a beauty mark that is where Marilyn Monroe\'s was and because of that location my smile lines aren\'t necessarily deep but my foundation always settles in that exact area around that beauty mark. This is the only product I have found thus far that has made it where my foundation will absolutely not settle in those foundation lines. The only downside is the small amount of product you get. Half an ounce for Price tag is the only thing I would change. But the product works and you only need such a small amount. If any of these reviews are saying the product doesn\'t work for them then it\'s probably because they are using too much product.'], 'author': u'RWilson ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I bought for all the 5 star reviews but it did not work for me at all. aside from the fact it broke me out horribly, I didn\'t notice a very large difference in the appearance of my skin after applied. It also did not increase the wear time of my foundation. My makeup was actually slipping off after a few hours and I looked like a greaseball. And my skin is not super oily or anything so this is not normal for me.'], 'author': u'MayaGH ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Miracle Cream', 'text': [u'As an Esthetician, I am always on the look out for good products. This is one of the best primers that I have ever used. My pores seriously look smaller and the texture of my skin is absolutely dreamy. There is no fragrance to this product and it comes with a spatula to scoop out the proper amount needed.'], 'author': u'FlutterbiDiva ', 'date': [u'2016-08-30'], 'location': u'Oklahoma City, OK', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Life changing!!!', 'text': [u'No seriously. I have been plagued with acne, and as a result, acne scars. Ice pick scars (or potholes as I like to call them) are THE hardest to cover, because no matter how much concealer you use, it almost highlights the fact that you have a pit in your face. I take a pea size amount, warm it between my fingers, and gently smooth all over. On my "special dents", I\'ll use the tiny spatula it comes with, put a small amount on it, and lightly glide it across those areas - like you would if you were spackling a hole in the wall lol the tiny of this also is amazing in helping to conceal the hyper pigmentation that inevitably comes with acne scarring. Give it a try - seriously! Whenever I use it under my makeup, everyone compliments what beautiful, pore less skin I have :)'], 'author': u'arielgc ', 'date': [u'2016-08-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'no more fine lines', 'text': [u'I pat this primer on fine lines around my mouth and under my eyes and it makes them disappear. I don\'t like to use this all over my face as I can feel it sitting on my skin, but it\'s perfect to use along with another primer, I use it with the Becca backlight priming filter for a flawless face.'], 'author': u'graciab ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love the colours', 'text': [u'I have green eyes so pink always makes my eyes pop. That\'s why I purchased this one. Honestly, the main reason I bought this palette was because of N o o n e r. It\'s just such a gorgeous shade. Some of the shadow however are paler or darker than they appear when applied, and some are pretty much just purely glitter. I also realised that this palette is kind of an awkward shade that kind of doesn\'t go with very many colours, other than grayish neutrals. Not the everyday palette I thought I was buying. However, there is no regret; it\'s gorgeous. Some of the colours need a bit more building up to get a good colour payoff but whatever.'], 'author': u'cassxndre ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Toronto, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

name: Soothing Cleansing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Gentle and Effective', 'text': [u'This ckeansing oil works great to pre-cleanse. It leaves my skin feeling soft, not tight. and it does not burn my eyes. I received a trial bottle and used every drop. Definitely full bottle worthy. It does not contain shea butter which tends to break my skin out. I have never used a cleansing oil or pre-cleanser before and I am hooked.'], 'author': u'Antonia99 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Oklahoma City, OK', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Effective and soothing', 'text': [u'Because I have combination skin, I am skeptical of cleansing oils fearing they will leave my oily areas more so. I also wear multiple layers of makeup (ie, BB cream, foundation, concealer, powder) and often have trouble removing all of it. This product is very effective; it removed all the layers gently without leaving my skin feeling slick or oily; it felt clean and slightly moisturized.'], 'author': u'drghost ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'NJ', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'love this stuff', 'text': [u'I have been using this cleansing oil for two years now. I love how it helps to take off my make up, does not dry out my skin while cleans it.'], 'author': u'sylviazhang ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love so hard!', 'text': [u'I got this as a sample a few months ago, a sample I wasn\'t even going to cash in on, but I am so glad I did. I ended up buying the full size before I even finished the sample. This cleanser removes all of my make up, I think people may be having problems with this removing all of their eye make up because they are not taking their time. I take a minute and massage my face with this oil, not only to get everything off but because it\'s enjoyably with this lightly scented cleanser. This cleanser has also helped clear my skin after a disastrous attempt using the Tarte cleansing gel, which made me break out. I follow with Ole Henrickson Red Tea foam cleanser because I like to make sure there is no oily residue (which I never noticed by the way). And my skin has never looked better. ', u'Also, yes this cleanser is expensive. But the bottle is very large! I have been using this for the past 2 weeks and it is difficult to tell I used any at all. I can see the smaller bottle lasting a good 6 months. Unlike Tata Harper\'s Regenerating Cleanser which was almost gone by week 3.'], 'author': u'JupitersGlow ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'good oil cleanser', 'text': [u'I use this oil cleanser first to remove my makeup. After rinsing, I still have residue left over and may have left over eyeliner but when I use another cleanser, EVERYTHING comes off. But using my second cleanser alone does not do the same job. The oil does not dry out my skin, it leaves it nice and soft. I really like this cleanser, I\'m more than halfway done and will purchase again!'], 'author': u'sailormun ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Lip 20 Mask
reviews: {'title': u'A TRULY Redefining Product for Lips', 'text': [u'Lip 20 Mask is truly amazing. A little goes a long way & with the amount of product in this jar (ALOT!) the price is right.'], 'author': u'Darylann ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Annapolis, MD', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Rose Anonyme Cologne Absolue Pure Perfume
reviews: {'title': u'New obsession', 'text': [u'I\'m a fan of many Atelier fragrances, especially Santal Carmin, Patchouli Mistral, and Grand Neroli. When I got a sample of Rose Anonyme, at first whiff I thought "ew, no way, smells like an old lady\'s attic!" But about ninety seconds later I was snuffling at my wrist like a lunatic. A week later I\'d used up pretty much all of the generous sample; so, here to Sephora I came to buy a bottle. I\'ve been wearing it happily for about a two months now as my stand-by work fragrance. I like the Turkish rose a lot (more than I ever would have thought, because I\'m usually not a fan of deep, feminine florals), but I think what really makes me mad for this is the ginger. I\'ve not gotten compliments on Rose Anonyme in the way I always do when I wear Santal Carmin, but neither do people edge away! And whatever anyone else thinks, I always feel happy when I spritz this on.'], 'author': u'13sarah13 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Brighton, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'What a great line of scents', 'text': [u'I walked into Sephora to browse, and there was a promotion going for Atelier Cologne - monogrammed leather case for a free mini bottle scent of your choice. The rep - Homer!! (amazing rep!) - gave a great presentation and the scents are just gorgeous!!! The Rose Anonyme was just...it. On its own, I loved the scent, and then my husband was spritzed with it, and that was even better!! On him it smelled really fresh, and on myself it had a more woodsy scent. This is the one I purchased as a big bottle, and for my little free bottle, I chose Sud Magnolia. I receive compliments on these scents all the time. I love it!'], 'author': u'RissaBear ', 'date': [u'2016-08-20'], 'location': u'San Francisco, ca', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Nirvana Hydrating Treatment Mist
reviews: {'title': u'Does more than you think', 'text': [u'I\'ll start off saying I never write reviews cause I rarely feel strongly enough about anything to do so. I\'m always trying new products and looking for that elusive perfect routine. I bought this sort of on a whim cause I love a lot of the other Josie Maran products. I didn\'t really feel at first like this made a huge difference, especially as I had started using the Josie Maran lotion with SPF daily under primer and makeup and assumed my skin felt so much nicer with that addition (because it is a really nice moisturizer). I was planning on just using this till I ran out but not repurchasing. Expect then I stopped using it when I was almost out (it last quite a few months) and I noticed my skin not being as soft and supple. I didn\'t immediately think it had to do with this since I was changing up some other products I was using. However as soon as I went back to using this twice daily after cleansing and toning and before moisturizing, I noticed within a day or so that my super soft skin was back, and realized that this bottle was actually making a huge difference in how moisturized and soft and nice it felt. I have combo skin, some acne but also occasional dry spots so it\'s always a tricky balance with my skincare but this adds no oil or anything but really makes my skin feel more moisturized and honestly just so soft like my skin has never been. It\'s a bit pricey but it actually does a lot and lasts quite a while and for me it\'s worth it for beautiful skin. I highly recommend it and don\'t see why it would be a problem for other skin types. Also the mist isn\'t really steady but I just do a few spritzes on my face and pat it so it really soaks in and that works fine.'], 'author': u'amandab25 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'glow glow glow', 'text': [u'I bought this item and I fell in love with the aroma and the way it feels on my face very fresh. Awakes my face after a long morning and this just gives life to my full face. Doesn\'t feel oily or greasy and doesn\'t smear makeup. I have combination skin and dry skin but this is my go to mist!!'], 'author': u'PitaChula ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Rosarco Oil™
reviews: {'title': u'Super soft', 'text': [u'I love this stuff. It was the 1st oil I tried on my hair and still the best I have tried. The scent is not very strong and it leaves my hair incredibly soft. It is not cheap, but better than any oil I have tried so far. also a fan of their shampoo, leave in reparative conditioner and I just got a overnight oil treatment I am looking forward to trying'], 'author': u'TomD ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': u'Boynton Beach, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Nice, but too thick. Doesn't absorb", 'text': [u'This is a great product, and I can tell it would do as advertised, especially when used while the hair is still wet as directed. It gets rid of frizz and detangles nicely. I really love that it\'s natural, and especially silicone free. It smells great too. Unfortunately it was just a bit to heavy for my hair. ', u'I have only used hair oils for years, but wanted something silicone / chemical free. I really wanted to love this, so I tried it a few different ways, and different amounts, but it would just never quite absorb into my hair fully. While my hair had no frizz left, it just stayed greasy. It also took way way way longer to air dry. (I never blow dry). ', u'However this did not weigh my hair down, so although it looked greasy, it didn\'t feel heavy so my waves / ringlets, we\'re defined. I\'ve had other hair oils that way my hair down so much it ends up almost straight. It also did not leave any colour in my hair - some leave an orangey tint. ', u'I used this on the ends of my hair only, never at the scalp. I used just one pump, then just 1/2 a pump, but my hair was left looking and feeling really greasy. I tried it on wet hair, which worked better, but then thought I\'d try it on dry hair, and that didn\'t work at all, my hair looked really really greasy to the point that I had to re-wash my hair to remove it. ', u'For reference I have white blonde, course, dry, wavy hair. I don\'t colour, blow dry, or use any styling products. I use Briogeo Co-wash mainly, and Rosarco Shampoo / Conditioner once a week.'], 'author': u'Cynderlou ', 'date': [u'2016-07-27'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'I was afraid to try this because I had never heard of the brand and I have such a rough time with eyeliners. Now, I\'m wishing they made a thin eyeliner. That is literally my only complaint! I will need to sharpen this but i hate to waste it that\'s how amazing this is. It went on smooth and dark (cocoa) with absolutely no problems and is the first eyeliner I\'ve used that had no smearing at the corner of my eye. Puts both every eyeliner and smudge crayon to shame in application and smear resistance although I have never used a smudge crayon with the intentions of actually smudging it so I don\'t know how it handles that. name: Color Control Cushion Compact Broad Spectrum SPF 50+
reviews: {'title': u'Great for dry skin, buildable,', 'text': [u'Love this, have been using it for a couple of years. Dewy finish, buildable coverage, sunscreen actually works. {'title': u'Surprisingly Versatile', 'text': [u'1) YOU GET TWO so $60 isn\'t as bad once you realize you are getting a refill :)2) Smells just like the face wash, which I now use and love. The case is durable, leak proof, travel ready, and feels like it stays clean (by clean I mean sanitary..)3) it does not NEED to be set, however, if you run oily, this is not for you. It will likely run or separate.4) I use this product either as a sunscreen or light foundation in the AM. Sometimes I set it with a little bit of mineral veil or hourglass lighting powder. or I often use it at work after I have run and washed my face to help with my natural flush. It helps just even out my skin tone if I am using just a little. 5) the only reason I did not give it 5 starts is because some of the product seeps out of the cushion and gets wasted around the crevices in the case.'], 'author': u'amgra4 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'On my second jar. Very pleased with the results.'], 'author': u'keholmes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SO STICKY', 'text': [u'Maybe this has good moisturizing properties - I wouldn\'t know, because I couldn\'t force myself to use it more than a few times. And trust me, after dropping 60 bucks on it, I really really tried. First off, the gel has a strong alcohol smell that reminds me of nailpolish remover, and definitely stings when applied over any blemished. But I could forgive that. What I couldn\'t get over was the stickiness.. on my face it didn\'t bother me so much, since I try not to touch my face throughout the day regardless, but my HANDS stayed sticky for hours after applying this stuff. You definitely cant put this on and rub the residue into your hands, because they will feel gross and unclean for hours afterwards. You really have to wash your hands - soap and water - to get rid of that super unpleasant feeling. Still have the whole jar sitting in my washroom, untouched.'], 'author': u'annapremy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Calgary, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Ships safely!', 'text': [u'Thank you for your reviews! The botanical ingredients in Sake Balm\'s natural ingredient blend sometimes possess slight differences (for example, no two naturally occurring ingredients look the same), which in turn, can result in a variance in the product\'s color or scent. However, this does not alter their benefits, and the moisturizer can be used as directed. Having Sake Balm shipped to you as opposed to purchasing in store will not alter its appearance!'], 'author': u'bosciaskincare ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Premium Hot & Cool Pore Pack Duo
reviews: {'title': u'Cool combo', 'text': [u'I like this product. I was looking for a nice clay type mask to help cleanse and tighten my pores. I found this and decided to get it because of the description and pricing point. I love the little scoop it comes with to help ration the product and keep it sanitary. The hot mask does warm up when I use it on my face. I love the little scrubbies in it as it really helps to remove white/blackheads and unclog pores for me. Once I finish with the hot portion, my skin looks so much brighter! Then I finish with the cooling mask and it feels amazing too. I have acne prone, oily skin. This hasn\'t broken me out and has delivered on what it says it will do. I have already used is 4-5 times and still have plenty left! Be sure to utilize the scoop each time.'], 'author': u'MichelleDizzle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not enough bang for my buck,..', 'text': [u'I anticipated better based off the reviews but the hot wasn\'t HOT and the Cool wasn\'t really COOL. It was no different than any other menthol based mask I\'ve tried.. Definitely does not STEAM, at least not per my definition.. face did feel cleaner and pores tighter so I guess it does what it says for the most part. But if you\'re looking for a TRUE hot/cool feel don\'t get it. I\'m going to finish it but I wouldn\'t buy again... for the money you can find drug store or beauty supply face products work the same..'], 'author': u'Scope ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Hawthorne, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Skin felt brand new!', 'text': [u'Recently my skin care routine has been more of a priority than my make up routine. Gotta have a good base! This duo had such polarizing sensations that felt amazing. The Hot Pack is great to start off with and is really HOT! I also want to note i have roseaca and generally very sensitive skin but this did not irritate it especially since they placed the second step as the cooling mask. The end result is smooth baby soft skin with visibly smaller pores and over all even skin tone. I\'m not sure it reduced my black heads but i saw amazing results after one use. reviews: {'title': u"you don't even know you need this", 'text': [u'I am not big on moisturizers, usually if I use a treatment at night my skin is fine. {'title': u'new favorite moisturizer', 'text': [u'I am now on my second of two of the Sephora 100 point perk deluxe samples of this face cream which were available a while ago. Once I started using the fist sample I knew I needed to get more, but after seeing the $48 price tag on the full size I decided to opt for a second sample. The samples have lasted me a very long time so I can\'t even imagine how long this big tube will last me when I eventually cave and buy it! I even cut open my first tube to make sure I got every last drop. You don\'t need a lot of this stuff, but it\'s worked wonders on my skin. I use it after I shower and before I go to bed and when I wake up I have moisturized, firm, even toned skin. I have combo skin, with both oily and dry patches between my eyebrows, on the sides of my nose, and on my chin but this stuff takes care of both issues. I\'m obsessed!! It has a slight citrusy-type smell but it goes away once the product is fully rubbed in. Love it!!!'], 'author': u'ejanebrigid ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Total instant lift', 'text': [u'This product is just amazing!!! Never used anything with vitamin C before , but I like this brand , so I decided to give it a try. I \'ve been using it for 2 days so far, but the results are VERY impressive. I have pretty much good complexion,very fair skin with freckles and it gets a bit oily on the T-zone. So, I thought it would just even out and brighten up my skin. It does make it brighter ,but the most impressive thing I\'ve noticed , is the amazing lifting effect! I am thrilled to use it! Looking forward what would it do to my skin in a month!P.S. The product does dry out very fast, leaving your skin tight with matt finish, as previously commented here. So, it might not be that great for very dry or sensitive skin. I apply a good amount of moisturizer right away, so I do not feel any discomfort.'], 'author': u'julie7777 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-08'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'How I use this!', 'text': [u'I really love this product. The difference in my skin was noticeable within a few weeks of use. name: Ceramidin™ Oil Balm
reviews: {'title': u'Great for very dry, flakey skin', 'text': [u'Such a great product! I use this as a last step for my very dry skin. I use it on dry spots where I typically experience flaking or peeling during the day, and when I use it, I never have any issues. I\'ve also found that it\'s great if my skin peels unexpectedly during the day (like if I forgot to use it) -- using it as a spot-treatment helpfully hides any flakes while preventing more from forming. ', u'My neighbor recently told me that I look "glowier" recently, and I definitely credit this :)'], 'author': u'kippster91 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for dry skin', 'text': [u'I get eczema under my eyes and this stuff works great. Fast absorbing. I will continue to repurchase'], 'author': u'jaw5420 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Pittsburgh', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Absorbing balm ...love it !', 'text': [u'Had a few crow lines around the eye area and very dry skin in the winter (live in Quebec) ! Tried several expensive creams and treatment regimes ... I then fell on this and my dryness problem along w the diminished lines were the results after less than 2 months of morning and night use ! I then ordered the cream in the tube but was not as pleased !! Returned to my daily routine w the balm !! I suggested it to my friends that have a combination skin , my daughter that was pregnant and developed scaly skin .... And my husband who swims on a daily basis ... I see the results it had on their skin too ! Result : Moisturized, Glowy skin !!! Love it !!!'], 'author': u'NanMini ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Heals Desert Heat', 'text': [u'I live in one of the driest cities on earth, and on top of that, it\'s summer and I LOVE to sun tan. Also, I\'m nearing 50! You would think that all of these facts would combine to give me dry, papery skin. Not at all. I use this Ceramidin oil balm at night, and not only do I wake up dewy, but a few light wrinkles have vanished.'], 'author': u'Jenny87112 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-17'], 'location': u'Albuquerque, NM', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bug Repellent?', 'text': [u'OK. The mosquito repellent smell of this balm is so distracting and awful. It does an okay job of moisturizing, but, I can\'t stand to use it because it makes me feel like I should be camping outdoors with bugs'], 'author': u'nattybeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Ceramidin™ Liquid
reviews: {'title': u'Absolutely Perfect!', 'text': [u'This liquid lotion / serum is great. I was suffering from very dry skin with flaky patches and I tried everything to get my skin to the point that I could wear my tinted foundation without having to put more lotion on to quench the dry patches. This product has done amazing things for my skin. No more dry skin or flaky patches of skin. I did read all of the reviews other purchasers wrote so I thought I would give it a try since Sephora is so great about taking back products you are not happy with. If you are suffering from the same kind of problem I was, don\'t hesitate to purchase this product ~ it has been a god send for me!'], 'author': u'ftwtex ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Fort Worth, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Finally!!!', 'text': [u'I\'m 52 and have been using serums for over 30 years. Have used high end, mid priced and nothing ever, ever gave me the hydration Ceramidin does. I made the purchase after reading several reviews, not only on Sephora, but other sites as well. From the first application, I felt the difference, and after about 3 days, I started seeing plumping and glowing, hydrated skin. I use along with Ceramidin Cream, or Gel Cream.'], 'author': u'amenas ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Champions Gate, Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Non-irritating', 'text': [u'I love this moisturizer! I have mild rosacea and while it doesn\'t reduce redness it definitely doesn\'t make things worse. I was using other "gentle" moisturizers and even those were stinging after washing my face. This didn\'t have that effect at all. I got a sample of the Cermadin cream which I use over the liquid on places where my face is really dry and it works great, I will be ordering a full size!'], 'author': u'cm124101 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great light lotion', 'text': [u'This is a great light lotion for the summer. It is very liquid, so be careful when you squeeze it out. I also found that the product worked best if I shook the bottle before. The lotion works great for humid, hot climates, but now that the weather in New England is cooling down, I need a more moisturizing product.'], 'author': u'lemmetellyou ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Did not help with dry skin', 'text': [u'I have extremely dry skin, not flaky, but face feels tight immediately after washing and need mid-day replenishment. I used this product together with the Ceramidin Cream, but this combination was not moisturizing enough for me unfortunately.'], 'author': u'owayzlost ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Chino Hills, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
ingredient: -Panthenol: Alleviates signs of sensitivity and softens skin.

{'title': u'Official Jurlique convert', 'text': [u'Tried some of a family member\'s, and fell completely in love with the light scent and thorough but gentle cleansing power of the mousse (I typically use one pump for light morning cleansing, and two to melt light make-up applications). I was a religious follower of the Origins line and depended on their "Checks and Balances" frothy face wash for years, but I find the alternative really maintains the drier parts of my combo-oily skin.'], 'author': u'doornick ', 'date': [u'2015-07-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'like washing your face with a cloud', 'text': [u'Best cleanser ever its makes my skin sooo soft and it takes my make up off!!!! I love the organic ingredients. I can\'t wait to explorer the rest of the line I\'m already hooked'], 'author': u'harleymoonridge ', 'date': [u'2015-07-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
