name: Dong Gong Minn Jello Color Eyeshadow Palette
reviews: {'title': u'disappointed', 'text': [u'This product is very Creasy and does not last on even with eye primer. I don\'t recommend it.'], 'author': u'goldie711 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I love.', 'text': [u'At a complete loss to find a shadow that stays in place on my incredibly sensitive eyes, I purchased this as a close-to-last-resort option. Happiness abounds. The shadows are beautiful, easy--and fun--to apply, and even the packaging is attractive. The pigment stays in place and does not create a mess while applying. Win.'], 'author': u'Laomuy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Wanted to love it but it's creasy", 'text': [u'I have very, very oily eyelids. Normally, using a primer is enough to keep shadows in place when I\'m using powders. However, with these jelly-like shadows they get creasy almost instantly. It\'s such a shame because I loved the colours. Also, I found that they don\'t pack as much of a pigment punch as you\'d expect and blending them even just a bit tends to make them look really muddy.'], 'author': u'Jenn088 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-29'], 'location': u'British Columbia', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Bright and glossy', 'text': [u'These creamy eye shadows brighten your eyes and the colors are perfect for blending together. unlimited amounts of style and fun <3'], 'author': u'Awesome01602 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-18'], 'location': u'Worcester, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'The solution to 15minute make up', 'text': [u'If you have 15minutes for your face before rushing off to work or play, this is your solution. No brush needed, just use your fingers. I did use the nars primer underneath and let dry for 1 minute before application. The pay off is a beautiful sheer and blend able coverage that looks NATURAL and not overdone. This formula is amazing at blending with each color on the skin. I\'ve been wearing it for 4 days straight in the summer. No creasing. I have an Asian hooded eye and I couldn\'t be more happy with this product. Not sure about the reviews below. Maybe they out too much? A little goes a long way. What a winner!!!!!'], 'author': u'cathyindc ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': u'Rockville, MD', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'Peachy Keen', 'text': [u'This is my new favorite blush. I pair it with a bb cream, and it gives the most peachy summer glow with just a hint of sheen. {'title': u'Beautiful color, easy to apply, but wears off fast', 'text': [u'I have this product in Lava Martini. I love the cool rosy pink color and the cushion applicator. It blends easily (I use my Beauty Blender sponge) and is very flattering to my fair skin with cool undertones.', u'But two stars off because this product DOES. NOT. LAST. I can put it on in the morning, and even if it\'s a cool day and I\'m not working out or otherwise sweating - POOF, gone by noon! I have mature skin (not oily) so it\'s not like it slides off, either! Boo! This would be a perfect product - pretty color, easy to apply, convenient to carry around - if only it lasted longer than four hours!'], 'author': u'crystalcat ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'Walnut Creek, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u"doesn't last", 'text': [u'I ordered rosy pink and it goes on my fair skin looking nice. Problem is it lasts about 20 minutes and then gone.'], 'author': u'trish006 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Mission Viejo, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'not enough pigment', 'text': [u'I have a very fair skin tone, and I can barely see the product in my face. Disappointing'], 'author': u'noeit ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'color not even/caked on any dry skin', 'text': [u'I was so bummed by this product. I love the lip balm and the color payoff has always been good with other products in this line but this blusher was a big miss. I like cream blushes but this is probably the worst alternative blusher I have ever used. The color was odd and patchy and very hard to even out. The use of the tube and the popular "cushion" applicator was not only messy and wasteful but it was incelredibly difficult to get the color even on the cushion which I believe is why the color comes out so patchy on your skin. I\'m completely dumbfounded by all the positive comments because this is truly a bad product. 75% of the product will end up stuck in the groves on for the screw on top or stuck in the cushion. Save your money on this and save up for a better product like nars multiple stick or the tarte sticks or almost any other blush product on the market other than this. Also the color claims to be peach, but it is straight up orange. It is the only warm tone option (the other two color choices are pale pink and paler pink).'], 'author': u'yayforboo ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'softens skin', 'text': [u'I struggle with keratosis pilaris (chicken skin) on my face so I\'m constantly looking for better ways to exfoliate and Moisturize. I\'ll be honest, the gorgeous packaging is what drew me to purchase this product. However, I\'ve been using it for over three months now and I\'ll never stop! I use it before my serum and moisturizer and it really does an excellent job of softening my terribly dry skin and prepping it for my heavier duty moisturizer. I notice a big difference in the texture of my skin and how it plumps up after each use. If the age of the product doesn\'t sway you to its usefulness, then I hope this review does!'], 'author': u'Rhov ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Bamboo Waterlock Mask
reviews: {'title': u'AMAZING!!!', 'text': [u'Let my start by saying I have extremely dry, sensitive skin. I have also had to start a couple of topical acne treatments lately, and while my dermatologist prescribed the gentlest, least drying meds she could, I still found my skin even drier than usual with scaly, painful, red patches on my eyelids and neck. I would have to stop my meds for a couple of days at a time, and also tried every moisturizer I had in my arsenal (sadly, I have a lot from trying so different kinds). None of them were helping at all. Then, I found a sample of the Bamboo Waterlock Mask that I received with a previous Sephora order, and read that it could also be used as a moisturizer when applied in a thin layer. OVERNIGHT my skin was 100% better, and I am not over-exaggerating. After weeks of struggling with painful, scaly skin, this product fixed it literally overnight. Now I use it every night as my regular nighttime moisturizer (although admittedly, this is more often that the label recommends). I cannot explain how much this product has changed my skin. I can now continue my acne treatments as prescribed with no concerns, and my skin is just more healthy feeling in general. ABSOLITELY RECOMMEND TO ALL OF THOSE WITH DRY SKIN!!!'], 'author': u'KTcat22 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'*heart eye emoji*', 'text': [u'I was super skeptical about this stuff when I got it as a sample. Usually moisturizing products just leave my face oily as all heck. But I gave it a try and I\'m so glad I did! Instantly after using this, my face felt like a baby\'s bottom and lasted that way for a few days afterwards. No more dry, flaky skin. AND no more oily skin either! It\'s like magic in a jar. Love love love!'], 'author': u'gbracci ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'so cooling!', 'text': [u'I have to say that I really really like this mask. I was a little iffy about it after the first use. It didn\'t immediately brighten my face or do anything super special but after repeated use I do have to agree that it does what it says. The mask does seem to plump my face a bit and my skin feels softer and brighter after multiple uses. The cooling sensation is an added perk since my skin is usually irritated due to my allergies and stress. This product, I find, does a good job of soothing my skin in general. I will say that I use this as a mask but I believe this might be a perfect moisturizer for us super oily girls. All in all, I would give this 5 stars if it wasn\'t so expensive. It does a good job but maybe not for $40'], 'author': u'KPS1221 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So hydrating', 'text': [u'I love love love this stuff. I apply it to my clean face before bed a few times a week and just sleep in it. Makes my skin so soft and hydrated! And a little goes a very lon way.'], 'author': u'endwarfin ', 'date': [u'2016-07-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Incredible smooth', 'text': [u'I purchased this from Sephora store last month and have been using it 2-3 times a week. This cooling gel mask is fantastic! I have combination to oily skin, it doesn\'t break me out!!! It actually provides tons of moisture into my skin! My skin now feel super smooth and plump! name: Crème Scrub Beautifying Exfoliating Pearls
reviews: {'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'This is definitely not a scrub. The micro-pearls feel nice and massage the face but do nothing a face scrub should do. {'title': u'Effective', 'text': [u'I was skeptical, but this scrub is so gentle, but very effective, and it leaves your skin supple and hydrating. I recently went back to using a caudalie serum, among a few other great brands of skincare and the combination of this cleanser a couple times a week with the rest of my daily routine has got my face feeling and looking better than it has in yrs. name: Perfect Morning BB Mask
reviews: {'title': u'honestly the best pick me up', 'text': [u'I\'ve never had a mask give me this kind of result. It is truly the best morning pick me up. Give this a try!'], 'author': u'beyoutee ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Undecided...', 'text': [u'Honestly, I thought I would love this addition to a morning routine... My face usually responds well to treatments or masks pretty noticeably. When I tried this mask, now several times, I really don\'t notice anything special about my skin or face after using. I will keep using it until the box is done, but without seeing or feeling noticeable results, it is just time-consuming in the AM with little payoff.'], 'author': u'les33 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': u'Troy, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'lovely little mask!', 'text': [u'My skin: Normal/Combination - Sensitive(Disclaimer: OBSESSED with Korean beauty products!)I bought this mask on a whim when I was trying to finish off a gift card (the struggle!). I use a pretty lengthy skincare regimen and often incorporate a mask in my a.m. routine if I have the time. This is my go-to mask for mornings when my skin is looking a little tired or dull and I don\'t want to do too much exfoliating, but I want a quick pick me up. Though this mask does remove impurities and cleanse the skin, I find I get the best results when I use this on pre-cleansed skin. I then finish my routine by patting on some essence, moisturizer, and eye cream. Some people don\'t seem to like the mix it yourself aspect of this mask, but I don\'t mind. I will definitely be repurchasing!(Side note: this mask does NOT make my finicky skin turn red or irritated at all)'], 'author': u'samanthagrace ', 'date': [u'2015-12-27'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m 41yrs old and for the last 5years my skin has changed a lot!! One of those changes is large pores and black heads. I also bought Sephoras detox mask which I feel these two products together are incredible! Have recommended to family and friends.'], 'author': u'verolikes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Murietta, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Takes some experimentation', 'text': [u'It took me a couple of tries to get the hang of this product, but once I figured it out, I do like it. Then splash some water on your face and massage again to get a nice lather, then rinse it off completely. Makes my face look nice and clean, and I also like the clean smell. Only 4 stars, because I don\'t love the stick delivery method.'], 'author': u'lillye ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Scottsdale, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Kakadu C™ Amethyst Clay Detox Mask
reviews: {'title': u'LOVE!!!', 'text': [u'Lately my face has been breaking out like CRAZY..all over. I use this mask at night every few days before I go to bed and when I wake up in the morning my face is almost completely cleared up. I love this mask, it does not dry my face out with using it and it works wonders! Size is a little small for the price and for the amount of times to use it a week, but worth the investment!'], 'author': u'erinmele ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Follow the Directions!', 'text': [u'Number one thing I can recommend with this mask is to follow the directions and put a generous layer on when using it. I did this initially when I first got this mask, but then halfway through the pot I started to be skimpy and put a thin layer on. It does not work nearly as well when using a thin layer. By the end of the pot I started putting a generous layer on again and I was back to having the great results I first experienced.', u'For me there is a strong tingle sensation while it\'s on. It\'s a bit of a pain to wash off but once you do, you have skin that is super smooth and has some glow to it (My face turns a bit flushed for a little while but then settles down to the glow).', u'Definitely a mask worth trying out!'], 'author': u'erinel ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'purple heaven', 'text': [u'this mask is so soothing and calming while it\'s on. it\'s gentle, ye effective. my skin felt so smooth after washing it off. when i Looked in the mirror I couLdn\'t beLieve my eyes! name: Brow Builder
reviews: {'title': u'Easiest to use brow product ever, stays on', 'text': [u'I walked into my local Sephora a total brow newbie. As in, I\'ve had waxes done in the past but these days I really prefer the total au-naturale androgynous brow with only a few strays removed under the arch or between. So I asked for "something that will help me with that 80s brooke shields natural fluffy brow, but intentional looking and not just unkempt" and was shown this product. ', u'The application wasn\'t intuitive for me but was easy once I was shown how. Wipe some of the product off inside the tube, and then work the flat side of the applicator in short strokes from the outside of the brows in so that you muss them up and coat the hairs (you can also start by running a spoolie backwards through your hairs to make them stand up first). Then from the inside out, do a similar motion to smooth them down. Comb into place with a spoolie and done! Neat and Intentional-looking natural androgynous brows in 1 minute or less!! It stayed on all day through the water rides at Disney, too. ', u'That said this is not the product I would choose if I was someone looking for a very neat and precise arched brow kind of thing. It\'s recommended for "natural to bold" in the description and that\'s exactly what it\'s good at. I wear it \'natural" but I easily see how it could be layered on again, or worked on closer to the skin (I only put it on the hair) for the "bold" look. I like that the applicator doesn\'t comb through my hairs to leave streaks on my skin the way I get with brow gels that have spoolie type brushes. This is easier for my lazy/newbie hands once you get a feel for how much product to load it up with.', u'My natural hair is a level 6 or 7 dark neutral blonde leaning cool, and I wear Midnight Brown in this product. The gel coloring does not lean warm.'], 'author': u'teacup5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Eye Brow', 'text': [u'I HAVE REALLY ENJOYED THIS PRODUCT. (See below) ', u'I first had the Anastasia Beverly Hills eyebrow pencil and I liked it but I found it a little expensive so I bought and try the Sephora one which is almost half the price of the Anastasia eyebrow pencil to see if there was a difference and it\'s actually the same thing! ', u'The only thing I don\'t like about the Sephora pencil is the brush so I kept my last Anastasia eyebrow pencil to use the brush or I use an unused eyelash brush which does the same! ', u'So unless you can\'t buy any other brand than Anastasia, I suggest you to buy the Sephora eyebrow pencil instead of the Anastasia one and you\'ll save some extra money :)'], 'author': u'vanepelo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Useless product', 'text': [u'initially loved the colour variety - everything looked so gorgeous from the packaging to swatches on my hand. Apart from the fact that attached smudge tips are ALWAYS pointless, I thought maybe I\'d give this product a shot. But upon bringing it home and using it.... turns out it was such a useless product.', u'The colour pay off was fine, but because it doesn\'t dry/set at any point, you can\'t use it on its own - ergo why it settles into creases - it moves. Which, to be honest, is the whole point of having pencil-based products. They should be quick and easy, and stick to the skin on its own. I don\'t have oily lids and have no problem keeping products on my skin - so if anything, something like this should work on me. Afterwards, when I tried to put black gel liner on top of it, because the product is so easily movable after application, nothing stuck. It turned out to be a mess. Returned it. Don\'t waste your time and money on this!'], 'author': u'viceinvirtue ', 'date': [u'2016-01-16'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'great eyebrow brush', 'text': [u'I really like how stiff the brush is. It allows for me to apply my brow powder smoothly. I use the Anastasia eyebrow powder and it goes on quickly and evenly with this brush. The other brushes I\'ve had in the past took many strokes to get the powder on and the bristles would bend. This brush does the opposite, it makes the application of my powder easier. Solid little brush! I didn\'t give it five stars because I eve though I really like the lid it comes with to protect the bristles from getting bent and dirty in my makeup bag, however, it\'s hard to slide it back on without pinching the bristles and messing up their shape. I finally figured out that I could pop off the top of the lid and slide down the lid like a sleeve and use the brush then slide it back up and put the top back on. Instructions for this would\'ve been nice from the beginning so I wouldn\'t have messed up some of my bristles. Aside from that I love the brush, great performance. I would recommend it to a friend and I would buy it again!'], 'author': u'hummingbird3 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Jasmin Rouge
reviews: {'title': u'A beautiful jasmine scent that is easy to wear', 'text': [u'This is a beautiful jasmine scent that can be worn year-round. The development of the scent (opening/nose, dry down, base) is quite flat; what you smell at the beginning is pretty much what you will smell for the rest of the day. But this allows you to layer Jasmin Rouge with other TF scents (Rive d\'Ombre, for example).', u'I give this 3 stars instead of 4 due to it\'s high price point for a scent that is relatively simple for the TF line.'], 'author': u'CosmicBeauty247 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I love jasmin smel but this one I didnt even expect how awesome, beautifyl, amazing, perfect, increadable, rich could be. It worth any peny I spend for this fragranse. That is my favorite and the best one I\'ve ever smeled jasmin fragranse in my life.'], 'author': u'Puppygirl ', 'date': [u'2016-07-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Secret weapon', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this and I\'ve been saving it for special occasions because it is just that PRECIOUS. It is pure, unapologetic jasmin. It really does smell like it\'s coming straight from the flower, like a previous reviewer said. And although it may cause me physical pain when my sample is all used up, I will definitely have to splurge and buy myself a full bottle. It is a truly magnificent scent. Powerful, provocative, and compelling. Strong "florientals." I don\'t know whether I should shout it from the rooftops or keep it only to myself.'], 'author': u'VIIXXIX ', 'date': [u'2016-06-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Try before you buy', 'text': [u'If Jasmine Rouge retained the complex blend of flowers and spice with which it opens, I would willingly bathe in this. Unfortunately, within ten minutes of application, it dried down to a single (read: simple) jasmine note. Credit where credit is due: it was a beautiful, true jasmine, not the sticky over-processed note I often come across in in other scents. If you prefer a lush, intense floral to the lighter variety, this may well be the fragrance for you. ', u'I personally found both the sillage and the lasting power to be strong. I applied three light spritzes in the morning and was trailing the scent all day. A few people paid compliments and one coworker (after stepping into my small office) asked where the bouquet of fresh flowers was. It was definitely fading by the end of the day, but I was still catching hints of the scent ten hours after application. Given that the other TF fragrances I\'ve tried have faded absurdly fast, I was pleasantly surprised this time around. ', u'Sadly, I am on the hunt for a complex fragrance and this one does not fit the bill when paired with my personal chemistry. If you\'re able to get a sample, do - even if the promise of the opening doesn\'t hold on your skin, you may still enjoy the creamy jasmine drydown.'], 'author': u'makemeover2122 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-13'], 'location': u'Washington, DC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I absolutely love this perfume! I wish it weren\'t so expensive :\'('], 'author': u'BasmaY ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Neroli Portofino Bath Soap
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I received a vial sample of this perfume and loved it, as it reminds me of Florida beach gift shops. I wasn\'t ready to spend that much on a bottle of it yet, but I wanted *something* else in this scent to try it and make sure. As I\'m also a bar soap junkie, I talked myself into splurging on this. ', u'I have to say that it IS the highest quality bar soap I\'ve ever used. It lathers amazingly with only a small amount. Typically, with any other bar soap, I have to stop mid-way and re-lather the washcloth. That\'s not necessary with this soap. It\'s very thick and rich. Because it was so expensive, I actually kept track of how many showers it lasted me, which was 18. (I didn\'t use it every day; more like an "I feel like splurging today" thing.) It confirmed my love of the scent as well, as it smells just like the perfume. So if you\'re looking for the cheapest way to try this scent, this is it. The scent didn\'t linger on my skin afterward, but for the time you\'re using it, it\'s awesome. I would certainly re-purchase again sometime and use it the same way, maybe 2-3 times a week, when I feel like pampering myself, to make it last as long as possible. :)'], 'author': u'Heather323 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'excellent, but expensive', 'text': [u'Very nice soap. Smells nice. But, expensive.'], 'author': u'catiaskinspa ', 'date': [u'2015-12-21'], 'location': u'duluth minnesota', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing Soap! Makes you smell like a million bucks', 'text': [u'This soap is amazing! Leaves you feeling clean and lathers amazingly! and the scent... It\'s awesome! Worth the money. It doesn\'t dry my skin out and it lasts a while. I have one bar I use in the shower and another bar that I leave on my vanity and use to wash my hands. This soap and the other soap, Oud Wood, are both worth purchasing.'], 'author': u'beautronic ', 'date': [u'2015-10-15'], 'location': u'Macon, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth it!', 'text': [u'So, I have been shopping around on the Sephora app for a LONG time... But I happened to stumble upon this soap, and it TOTALLY changed my look at soap. I thought that it would be something like that $3.00 bottle of ZEST\xa9 soap. When I spent almost $40.00 on SOAP... Of course I was gonna be suspicious! But the light and crisp floral scent, that smells like citrus heaven, makes you feel really alive, and changes shower time forever. Now, STILL... $35.00? Even if it was $20.00 I would be questioning its value. But, price aside, this is definitely a yes for bath time. Hope this helps! -Ben.'], 'author': u'Benward22 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Neroli Portofino Body Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Divine!', 'text': [u'I love the scent and feel of the Neroli body oil. Not heavy and seems to sink into the skin nicely. The only complaint I have is the cheap plastic bottle. A high end product like this should be bottled like a high end product.'], 'author': u'Leelee612 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': u'Poplarville,Ms', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Expensive Cooking Oil', 'text': [u'I honestly expected much more from this product not only considering the price for body oil, but because I am a fan of Tom Ford cosmetic products and own several of his other products. This was a complete waste of money and I instantly returned it for a refund. The scent is nice but is so minimal you can barely smell it even when you stuff your face right near the bottle. If this was an ordinary moisturizing body oil I wouldn\'t be too concerned with the scent and probably wouldn\'t want something too strong but since this is a "perfumed" scent I expected more. The moisturizing effect is also nonexistent. It feels like you have grease all over you. The lasting effect of the fragrance left my skin in 20 minutes. Be warned this product is not worth it but some of the other Tom Ford products definitely are.'], 'author': u'Jennifer926 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Neroli Portofino Shower Gel
reviews: {'title': u'I love this scent', 'text': [u'Other reviewers crack me up. Doesn\'t it occur to them to unscrew the cap and pour the product out? Anyway, the orange blossom has a lovely scent and makes the whole bathroom smell good; on the other hand, I can get orange flower water at grocery stores for a couple bucks. Difficult to justify this one, though it is nice.'], 'author': u'delamaine ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'Redmond, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'blah', 'text': [u'It has little distinct scent at all. How a guy based out of New York dubs himself an expert on italian fragrance is beyond me and his prices are ludicrous. smells like something the maid leaves in your bathroom at an Arizona spa resort mixed with Dawn dish soap.'], 'author': u'TomD ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': u'Boynton Beach, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I love this!', 'text': [u'I love this shower gel. I also have the bath oil, which I use after showering instead of the perfume. The shower gel smells divine and like orange blossoms (neroli is orange) and the scent is truly heavenly. My entire bathroom smells incredible after using this shower gel. It\'s very hydrating and the bubbles are incredible. It\'s truly a self indulgent treat. I can\'t afford the Neroli Portofino perfume but using the bath oil all over lasts all day and is a great option. It gives my whole body a luminous glow and is a great way to layer the fragrance. I splurged on the shower gel and I\'m so glad I did. This has got to be one of my favorite scents of all time. It\'s what I\'m wearing most this summer. It smells like my grandmother\'s orange grove when in flower. It\'s also got a very sensuous element to it that keeps it from being too flowery. It smells like a lovely southern garden in the springtime. Lucious!'], 'author': u'dotinfla ', 'date': [u'2016-06-22'], 'location': u'Gainesville, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'loved it for a try', 'text': [u'Smells great looks great . Fragrance is light and is not noticeable after using .'], 'author': u'dearjhstff ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Awesome Deodorant, horrible packaging', 'text': [u'This is a heavenly smelling product which does not seem to contain aluminum. So...it does not work as well as deodorant which does, but it\'s healthier. However, the packaging is not worthy of the Tom Ford name--I have purchased 3 of these, and all three had lids that cracked and fell apart, which made the deodorant stick shrink and dry out.'], 'author': u'Popoki ', 'date': [u'2015-12-04'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Scent does not last', 'text': [u'There is a very nice cooling effect as you apply (the stick is clear and goes on smoothly). As with most of the line, the actual scent fades within a couple of hours which makes it not worth the money to me. It does a fine job at being a deodorant however I don\'t think I will repurchase.'], 'author': u'cirqueDuParadis ', 'date': [u'2015-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lovely aromat but no staying power and overpriced.', 'text': [u'I fell in love with this cologne when tried it in store. I read reviews that were pointing to the fact that there is no staying power. I decidedto buy it and try for myself. Since I have a lot of different parfumes I decided to go with 30 ml size. When it arrived I was almost crying- that\'s how small the bottle was for the whooping $70. I understand that 30 ml is 30 ml, but when you\'re holding it in your hands you fully understand how small it is comparing to price. Another disappointment was the fact that smell stays for 30-45 minutes, not more. So I have to reapply it often-as a result the bottle doesn\'t last long. The bottom line is: I would not recommend this product. I feel robbed.'], 'author': u'Karaganda ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Summer in a Bottle', 'text': [u'I love this! It\'s like summer in a bottle, reasonable silage, no mile-wide perfume cloud here and the longevity is pretty good, it definitely lasts a lot longer through my day than many of the other fragrances from Atelier Cologne do.'], 'author': u'bb3926 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I got a ton of these as sample vials, and I\'d get the full size if I didn\'t already have the citrus scented Orange Sanguine from Atelier Cologne. {'title': u'Deja Vu Fragrance', 'text': [u'This is one of those understated fragrances that lingers in your mind after smelling it once. I received a sample in the Sephora Play bag, and was unsure how to feel about it at first. It induced some sort of nostalgia, though I\'m sure I\'ve never smelled the fragrance before, and made me want to wear it again. ', u'I purchased the full-size and am so glad that I did. This is a versatile perfume that can be worn any time of year--light enough in scent to not be overpowering, but memorable enough to receive loads of compliments. It\'s also unlike every other perfume I own.'], 'author': u'AliceIveBeen ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Wonderland', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Great scent and everyone compliments me on it when I wear it.'], 'author': u'SThought ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Neroli Portofino Acqua
reviews: {'title': u'sweet yet clean scent', 'text': [u'...but wears off SO QUICKLY! Usually if you spray a true Parfum rather than an ed du toilet, the parfum can still be smelled on your clothes the next day... Not with this parfum unfortunately. For the money I spent I should have purchased the 3.4 Oz bottle because a little over a month later on the 1.7oz bottle I\'m 1/2 way though it.. Wearing it 4-5 days a week. Found myself refreshing the scent at least 1-2x a day. Super disappointed because it\'s almost like this was a body mist. Feeling slightly ripped off. ', u'Love the scent but probably won\'t re-purchase this at the same price. 50% off then I\'ll reconsider'], 'author': u'MsBizzyBody ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'lovely but it does not last', 'text': [u'This fragrance is very beautiful. I loved it on myself in the store (my body chemistry makes it difficult to find a fragrance I truly like) and I was able to take a sample home to let my husband try it out. He can pretty much wear anything and it smells good. However, this fragrance did not emanate nor did it last long, on neither my husband nor myself. Such a bummer. I was willing to splurge since we both liked how it smelled but if it doesn\'t last long or if I can\'t even smell it without pressing my nose to the skin, it\'s just not worth it.'], 'author': u'Karen914 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Jasmin Rouge
reviews: {'title': u'A beautiful jasmine scent that is easy to wear', 'text': [u'This is a beautiful jasmine scent that can be worn year-round. The development of the scent (opening/nose, dry down, base) is quite flat; what you smell at the beginning is pretty much what you will smell for the rest of the day. But this allows you to layer Jasmin Rouge with other TF scents (Rive d\'Ombre, for example).', u'I give this 3 stars instead of 4 due to it\'s high price point for a scent that is relatively simple for the TF line.'], 'author': u'CosmicBeauty247 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I love jasmin smel but this one I didnt even expect how awesome, beautifyl, amazing, perfect, increadable, rich could be. It worth any peny I spend for this fragranse. That is my favorite and the best one I\'ve ever smeled jasmin fragranse in my life.'], 'author': u'Puppygirl ', 'date': [u'2016-07-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Secret weapon', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this and I\'ve been saving it for special occasions because it is just that PRECIOUS. It is pure, unapologetic jasmin. It really does smell like it\'s coming straight from the flower, like a previous reviewer said. And although it may cause me physical pain when my sample is all used up, I will definitely have to splurge and buy myself a full bottle. It is a truly magnificent scent. Powerful, provocative, and compelling. Strong "florientals." I don\'t know whether I should shout it from the rooftops or keep it only to myself.'], 'author': u'VIIXXIX ', 'date': [u'2016-06-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Try before you buy', 'text': [u'If Jasmine Rouge retained the complex blend of flowers and spice with which it opens, I would willingly bathe in this. Unfortunately, within ten minutes of application, it dried down to a single (read: simple) jasmine note. Credit where credit is due: it was a beautiful, true jasmine, not the sticky over-processed note I often come across in in other scents. If you prefer a lush, intense floral to the lighter variety, this may well be the fragrance for you. ', u'I personally found both the sillage and the lasting power to be strong. I applied three light spritzes in the morning and was trailing the scent all day. A few people paid compliments and one coworker (after stepping into my small office) asked where the bouquet of fresh flowers was. It was definitely fading by the end of the day, but I was still catching hints of the scent ten hours after application. Given that the other TF fragrances I\'ve tried have faded absurdly fast, I was pleasantly surprised this time around. ', u'Sadly, I am on the hunt for a complex fragrance and this one does not fit the bill when paired with my personal chemistry. If you\'re able to get a sample, do - even if the promise of the opening doesn\'t hold on your skin, you may still enjoy the creamy jasmine drydown.'], 'author': u'makemeover2122 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-13'], 'location': u'Washington, DC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I absolutely love this perfume! I wish it weren\'t so expensive :\'('], 'author': u'BasmaY ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Oud Wood
reviews: {'title': u'Very Nice', 'text': [u'When I first got this I was intrigued by the scent just pulling off the cap . The scent is fabulous but on me does not seem to last long at all. At 145.00 an ounce it would say it should be hard to get rid of. I have Extreme and Noir, both of which stays with me even after a shower. Of course it is hard to say because body chemistry differs so much . Still a five star because it is the awesome combo of scent I was looking for. Just wish there was something comparable that stayed with me.'], 'author': u'WoodnSpice ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'london ky', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Classic and Unique', 'text': [u'My husband just bought this and OMG, it smells GREAT! Although pricey, I can certainly see why and plus you don\'t need to liberally spray all over. Just one spritz on the wrist, rub and it\'s enough. Definitely will become of his signature scents.'], 'author': u'sfdomingo ', 'date': [u'2016-08-14'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u"The Best fragrance I've ever smelled!", 'text': [u'I own over 30 fragrances niche and designer and I can\'t imagine how many I\'ve sampled, this is the best scent I\'ve come across. Don\'t take my word for it, try it yourself, you may not like it as much as I do but you\'ll definitely like it. If I had to pick one flaw with this, it\'s the performance, this is pretty light and only lasts about 4-6 hours on me. I wish it projected more and had better sillage and longevity, especially for the price you pay.  I wish the performance was on par with Tobacco Vanille and Tuscan Leather. It\'s hard to justify paying this price for a below average performance but to me the scent alone is so amazing I just have to have it.'], 'author': u'ChristophR ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Gets the most compliments of the many fragrances I have owned. One of the best fragrances I have encountered'], 'author': u'jamshid ', 'date': [u'2016-05-08'], 'location': u'Westlake Village, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I buy a lot of fragrances - both men\'s and women\'s. I recently got my husband hooked on Acqua di Parma so I figured maybe he\'s got expensive tastes. So when I got a sample of this I sprayed some on and asked him what he thought and he asked me (honestly) if I was wearing Deep Woods OFF!'], 'author': u'britvk ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

For those who love to wear perfume but do not want to overpower the room. It\'s an alluring floral scent with a hint of sexy and playful sophistication. It\'s definitely for mature audiences only.'], 'author': u'msgail18 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sophisticated Woman', 'text': [u'I loved this on first sniff and this is not the case for most tom ford\'s. I\'m not a fan of black orchid. Smells weird on me.', u'Velvet orchid is amazing however!! Warm, sweet, velvety, potent. ', u'When I smell this, I smell a grown woman. She\'s sexy, she\'s confident and she\'s a Bosschick.', u'If you like soft girly scents, you won\'t like this.If you love sexy, mature (not grandma )scents, this is for you.', u'For reference, other warm scents I like: Tom ford Noir Femme and Tobacco Vanille, Elizabeth &James-Nirvana Black, Dolce and Gabanna the One.'], 'author': u'SimplyStacyB ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The Perfect Musky Scent', 'text': [u'I had been debating between this one Black Orchid, and Noir for quite a while and this is the one. Compared to the others it is a little sweeter and more personable, I felt the others were more of a decorative smell like a scent you might find in a fancy elevator or department store. I went with the 1.7 oz size, have a been using it just about everyday for a month and have yet to make a dent in it. Altogether the scent is the perfect amount of sweet while still being classy and sophisticated.'], 'author': u'KarGMZT ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'As soon as I smelled this scent I fell in love. I wore it for two days and started to hate it. I had to return it.'], 'author': u'alijose ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Sugar Lip Serum Advanced Therapy
reviews: {'title': u'Absorbs too quickly with no effect', 'text': [u'I have extremely dry lips so was hoping this would help with that. It absorbs into your lips instantly and there is no moisture so I still have to put a balm on top. Way too expensive if I have to do that so I ended up returning it.'], 'author': u'mizeet ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Saved my painfully dry lips!!!', 'text': [u'I got a sample of this from a friend who works at Sephora and I\'m so glad she told me how to properly use it otherwise I might have been disappointed. She was trained by a Fresh rep and this is what was explained to her:First, this is NOT an all day product, it should only be used at night (and maybe once in the morning). Excessive exposure to the product will not make it work any better/faster but might instead cause your skin to build up a tolerance. Second, gently exfoliate first. This will aid in the repairing process.', u'I have been dealing with painful,chronic dry lips for the last few months due to dehydration and a reaction to a medication. I put this serum on before bed, let it absorb for a few minutes and create kind of a film, then went to bed. I woke up the next morning to amazing results! I\'d say my lips were 50% more moisturized and 100% less painful. I did the same thing the next night and woke up to find that almost all of my dry patches had healed. ', u'I highly recommend getting a sample and trying it out as indicated above. I will definitely be purchasing the full size product :)'], 'author': u'ellebe ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Sacramento, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Dry lip sufferers...', 'text': [u'I received a deluxe sample size of this product and am so glad that I did. I\'ve now gotten into a routine using Fresh sugar lip products for my chronically dry chapped lips. Definitely a game changer for me. Instead of dry and burning lips throughout the day (yeah I know drinking coffee doesn\'t help either), my lips stay normal and healthy looking. I use the Fresh sugar lip polish a couple of times per week to exfoliate the flaky skin and then layer the advanced therapy balm on top in the evening. On the nights that I don\'t use the lip polish, I use this advanced therapy serum. Wait until it dries and then layer with advanced therapy lip balm. I awake with healthy looking lips that are smooth. I\'m over 40 and definitely have the fine lines due to the dryness of my lips. This particular product absorbs well into my lips and is such an effective moisturizer that my lips look smooth and more plump. It\'s not a lip plumper but fully moisturized lips naturally look fuller. This serum also acts as a lipstick primer by creating a smooth surface. A little bit goes a long way. If I use too much product, I will get a whitish cast on my lips. After a couple of times, I figured out how much to use to get the desired results without the whitish cast. Will definitely repurchase.'], 'author': u'desertgirl501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing lip primer!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using a sample and I\'ve used it consistently for 2 weeks. I still have a lot of it left. At first, I used this by itself and I didn\'t like it because my lips didn\'t feel moisturized. I started using it under my lip balm and it\'s amazing! I hardly have to reapply. It works so well especially underneath lipsticks and lip glosses. My lips usually flake after a whole day of wearing lipstick even with constant reapplication of lip balm and with this primer, my lips don\'t flake anymore. I will definitely purchase once my sample is done. I just hate how this product is so expensive.'], 'author': u'kgregorio ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE IT!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried a lot of "good" lip products that should\'ve left my lips feeling like THIS SERUM makes them feel. I tried the Bite Lip Mask (didn\'t really care for it), Clinique Superbalm (nothing special) but this is so great just a little drop goes a long wag and my lips stay moisturized all day everyday with just one use of it at night. Also, if you wear matte lipsticks this is a God send!'], 'author': u'sheilacmk ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Lip Color Sheer
reviews: {'title': u'A truly wonderful lipstick experience!', 'text': [u'Little wonder Paradiso has a cult following! Creamy & moist, a most satisfying lip colour in a vibrant and not too bright Coral which should look good on everyone. Prepping the lips beforehand and a good lip liner (I use Dior Bois de Rose) ensures this lippie is long lasting, but I apply straight from the tube (bad, I know) for that wonderful lipstick experience I crave. My first TF lipstick and, God willing, it won\'t be my last. Treat yourself -- worth every penny!'], 'author': u'sephorawoman ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Riverside-Albert, New Brunswick, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'in love with Paradiso!!!', 'text': [u'IMHO, it is not sheer at all! The color is lovely and so pigmented and bright! My husband was a little shocked as I had stopped using bright lipsticks a long time ago (too much maintenance, and I smooch my husband on the lips all the time and do not necessarily want him to wear my lipstick! LOL), but I think he learnt to appreciate it by the time we were done with dinner. I have SUPER-SENSITIVE and DRY lips, but the lipstick glided smoothly over the Lucas\' Papaw ointment that I use all the time. And it lasted throughout the dinner! Felt real good on my lips and wasn\'t drying at all. BTW, if you want a close-matching nail polish - OPI "A Definite Must-Have" NL M56 is it.'], 'author': u'lagirlinal ', 'date': [u'2016-05-13'], 'location': u'Madison, AL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'disappointing', 'text': [u'The formula the texture the feeling on your lips are very good. However, maybe because it\'s too sheer, or other reasons, I\'m not sure..... it couldn\'t apply evenly. And it makes all the wrinkles show on your lips clearly. You can see all the dry skin on your lips hanging there after you ware this lipstick. It\'s just awful. Returned'], 'author': u'ericaweng ', 'date': [u'2016-05-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Moisturecore Lip Color
reviews: {'title': u'Sheer, luminous tinted lip balm', 'text': [u'The color and shimmer melt into your lips to give them a natural, glowing tint. I purchased Scandola because I have naturally very pink lips and I wanted to tone them down to a neutral shade. Such a beautiful lipstick... though I think it would be more appropriate to call it a tinted lip balm because of the sheer color and light feel. Lovely!'], 'author': u'stylePeep ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'Phoenix, AZ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'flattering colors, but...', 'text': [u'I purchased pipa, and mustique. Both colors are very flattering on my recently tanned skin, but the formula isn\'t long lasting, or moisturizing. In fact, I am not a person who struggles with dry or chapped lips-ever, however, after a week of using thes my lips were very dry and flaky! That is a deal breaker for me. Tom Ford is known for high quality products, so I was disappointed to find that these lipsticks are not what they advertise: moisturizing.'], 'author': u'MireyaGriselle ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bad all over', 'text': [u'Barely any color (I got Otranto, the darkest shade), lasted all of 5 minutes. Add in the fact that it\'s insultingly, obscenely overpriced and that about sums up Tom Ford Makeup. Will never buy this brand again.'], 'author': u'Askenjuri ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': u'NYC, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gorgeous color but not moisturizing', 'text': [u'I purchased both Mustique and Scandola. Each is a gorgeous color somewhere between sheer and completely opaque. The lipsticks are light and fuse with my lips in a way that is so pretty and subtle. Mustique is the better color in my cool toned skin and is a summery grown-up pink (Read: not bubblegum). Scandola has a golden beige tint with very slight shimmer but nothing remotely glittery or obvious and also works with my fair skin. These would be perfect except that I find them slightly drying rather than moisturizing. They do last a long time on my lips, even after drinking coffee.'], 'author': u'littlemoon ', 'date': [u'2016-05-13'], 'location': u'Washington DC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Pretty and moisturizing, but fades', 'text': [u'I love this lipstick and it is indeed fairly moisturizing, but it fades very quickly. I have to reapply in only a couple of hours. That said, Carriacou is a beautiful my-lips-but-better shade that\'s appropriate for the office and I get a lot of wear out of it. It smells like vanilla frosting too, which is a nice bonus.'], 'author': u'elfity ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Soleil Blanc Shimmering Body Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I was on the waiting list for this. Based on the reviews I could not wait to purchase it. As soon as I was alerted that it was back in stock I ordered it. I absolutely love it! The scent is amazing, the shimmer is so pretty and it makes your skin so soft. Please remember that this is scented body oil, not perfume. The scent is light and fades a bit but it does linger on your skin. Transports you to a warm sexy beach. A must have!'], 'author': u'SeePennt ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'WASTE OF A HUNDRED BUCKS!', 'text': [u'I bought the oil since the perfume is $250 a pop. In retrospect I\'d rather have splurged and gotten the perfume. The oil itself is lovely, it\'s shimmery gold and the bottle is beautiful, BUT... the scent lasts literally about 10 minutes!!! :( Very disappointing considering it smells absolutely DIVINE.'], 'author': u'3cupcakes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'los angeles, ca', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'This was bought on chance that it would be great based on the reviews and popularity, and it delivered. Oil was sweet and sultry, definitely a summer scent. Product delivered on all levels and would be purchased again. Recommended for those searching for a lighter, warm, summer smell.'], 'author': u'Bragg66 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'Okanagan Falls', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Yum yum give me some', 'text': [u'I was intrigued by this product after seeing it in Elle magazine, & since I\'ve gotten it in the mail I\'ve worn it every day. The scent so sensually captures summer just as you imagine it would be in a bottle :). The shimmers are just enough to be noticeable without making you look like you bathed in glitter, and it leaves my skin feeling deeply moisturized & soft. LOVEEE!'], 'author': u'AmandaDevillier ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Terracotta Bronzing Powder
reviews: {'title': u'The Best Bronzer of them all!', 'text': [u'I love, love, love this bronzer. Guerlains has a wide variety of colors to chose from so you do not have to worry about turning orange and it always goes on smooth and does not cake within your pores. It is pricey but it is worth the money because it lasts for a very long time. You will not be disappointed with this bronzer!'], 'author': u'quin0928 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Yorktown, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Beautiful & long-lasting', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using Stila\'s bronzing powder but since they\'re out of stock, I needed a replacement. Guerlain\'s Terracotta Powder is an amazing replacement, one that I fell in love with. This product lasts from 7:30am till 10pm with no touch-up, just a light blotting. Unlike Stila\'s, Guerlain\'s bronzer doesn\'t oxidize. It looks amazing on my skin! When I opened the product at first, in the packaging, it appeared a bit orangey but this impression doesn\'t transfer onto skin. I\'m not sure what\'s in this bronzer that makes it look, feel and blend in such a heavenly way. For my fair skin I ordered the No. 1 | Brunette which is not too dark. It\'s a perfect color for a light-skin warm-tone blonde. One more thing, I have Rosacea and Dermatitis and this bronzer doesn\'t irritate my skin condition in any way. So, it\'s suitable for sensitive skin. Highly recommended product!'], 'author': u'ania8557 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Lasts 16 hours (all I calculated) in NYC humidity, even without setting spray. The smell is strangely addicting.'], 'author': u'mayamic ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it!', 'text': [u'This bronzer/contour was perfect for my olive/yellowish/light medium/ latin complexion...I have hoola, tarte, marc jacobs, too faced and all of them leave me kind of an ashy finish... I was torn between this one and the the one from smashbox, since it was 20 dollars less and kind of looked the same... Let me tell you, they don\'t and this one is worth every penny!... As soon as I applied it at home I fell in love with it and I knew why the price... Beware: I was convinced I was #3 (natural brunettes) but decided to go to the store and check em out... Turns out it was also kind of ashy on me, so I went with #2, even though it says "natural blondes" and I am nowhere close to being blond... but it was just the perfect shade! Also, it seems to have some shimmer but once you apply it, it goes on matte... Just beautiful! Try it on! You\'ll love it too...'], 'author': u'MaggieKaty ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'where is shade #8?', 'text': [u'I have been using this bronzer for years. Blends beautifully. I get tons of compliments. I was truly saddened to fin out it was discontinued. Dark skin girls need bronzer too.'], 'author': u'SephoraJunkie74 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Matte Radiance Baked Powder Compact
reviews: {'title': u'Highlight 01', 'text': [u'It\'s not matte, it\'s actually shimmery. It give you the most natural highlight. It\'s subtle enough to wear everyday but it makes your skin look healthy and glowy. You need this highlighter especially if you have fair skin.'], 'author': u'jo17 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Montreal', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'bronze 04 MY HOLY GRAIL BRONZER', 'text': [u'Bought the bronze 04 as a bronzer/contour. I have very pale skin in the winter, but get tan in the summer. I really liked it cause in the winter I just needed a little bit, and in the summer it\'s buildable without looking crazy. Bronze 04 is the perfect colour for a bronzer. It\'s warm without being too orange and cool enough to look natural without looking chalky. It blends so nicely as the powder is really fine once on the brush. It gives a really nice glow without being sparkly. I think I\'ve found my holy grail bronzer...'], 'author': u'shadeinfull ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not Matte, but a good highlighter', 'text': [u'I purchased this highlight in 01. This is a great highlighter, but it is NOT matte. It does not have any flecks of glitter or sparkle, but it does have a sheen to it. I have some fine lines, and despite the sheen, it does not make them more noticeable. If you are looking for a truly matte highlight, I would recommend the too faced cocoa contour chiseled to perfection. The shade "light cocoa" is truly matte and works well as a highlight. That being said, I do have'], 'author': u'BeOoT ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Arlington, Va', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Very pretty!', 'text': [u'I must say that this highlight doesn\'t show off the texture on my skin. It is soft and light and I look pretty glowy. I\'ve even worn this without foundation. Love it!'], 'author': u'miriam3303 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is my 2nd Guerlain brush. The first one lasted 25 years so it\'s worth every penny.', u'You can use this brush for blush, bronzer or any powder because it picks up just the right amount of product.', u'It isn\'t as soft as some brushes. For instance, Two Faced Teddy Bear brushes are the absolute softest brushes; they work perfectly with very fine powders such as Mineral Veil. But this brush IS still soft and does what it\'s supposed to do, that is, pick up the right amount of blush, bronzer or powder.', u'Yes, the handle is shorter, however, the hairs on the brush are the same length as any average brush. So you aren\'t losing out on bristle performance. I actually happen to love brushes with shorter handles. They are easier to use in my opinion. Plus, they are perfect for carrying in your purse.', u'Also, this brush comes with it\'s own fabric pouch which has a magnetic closure. It\'s perfect for travel and carrying around in your makeup bag for quick touch ups.', u'If I could only own one face brush, this would be the one. It\'s an investment; it stands up to frequent washing and will last decades.', u'If you don\'t want to pay this price, a similar outstanding brush is bareMinerals Flawless Face brush which comes in regular and full sizes. They aren\'t quite as soft but they are also excellent all purpose powder brushes.'], 'author': u'JJImage ', 'date': [u'2016-01-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Self Tan Luxe Dry Oil
reviews: {'title': u'decent glow with a terrible smell!', 'text': [u'I love the St Tropez line and as an athlete, I have a tough time with sweating off self tan easily. I had read good things about the dry oil and wanted to give it a shot. I\'ve used many different self tans for years and appreciate a great product that gives me a nice tan quickly and easily. ', u'The color indicator in this is tough to see initially and I am very pale skinned. The smell wasn\'t bad to start but just a minute or two into application, it starts to smell absolutely terrible. The application isn\'t the easiest and this seems to take an extended amount of time to dry compared to even lotions. No matter how long I wait to get in bed after application, I always feel sticky and worry that I\'ll look crazy the next day. As far as total application time, this takes me about 15-20 minutes to get on nice and evenly. ', u'I will say that it does give a nice color tone on fair skin, it\'s not a deep tan by any means but is a more natural looking glow for the fall and winter months. It does seem to fade evenly but I find myself reapplying every few days because the color just isn\'t visible enough. ', u'I\'m not sure that I\'ll purchase this product again due to the amount of time it takes to apply and awful smell, but I will finish out the bottle as we head into fall and winter. Once it is gone though, I\'ll be moving back to my easy and quick to apply/dry options.'], 'author': u'maegan713 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'easy to use', 'text': [u'I was using the express kit with the express mousse.. I was skipping the lotion part so it left my skin spotty.. So I decide to try something else and bought this oil. I exfoliate my skin and Used my mit and it was very easy to use but of course I have to ask my sister to help me with the back. I did it at night time and woke up with nice bronze color. However it didn\'t dry as fast as the mousse but it gave my skin a much better smooth application. I would not recommend using this product before you go out because it needs time to dry and absorb on to ur skin.'], 'author': u'Giovonni ', 'date': [u'2016-08-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Mess', 'text': [u'This is a mess if you use a mitt or your hands, the oil gets everywhere and I end up having to clean my floor every time I use it. Because it gets everywhere it ends up being really wasteful. Once you get it on, it is OK, but there are much better for less.'], 'author': u'sanfrankris ', 'date': [u'2016-08-24'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'crushed my dreams about this one', 'text': [u'I had such high hopes for this product after seeing how beautiful the color was swatched in the store. When I came home and applied it, however, there were some issues. It was extremely difficult to rub in with either hand or mitt, it didn\'t blend well, it would liquify if a single droplet of water came in contact with that area of skin (i.e. When I washed my hands, every particle of color washed off, and I was unable to blend between my wrist and hand without it just rubbing off,) and literally did not dry. Ever. I was frustrated, but I kept trying to use it and use different techniques to try to make it work. Nothing helped. ', u'One morning, I applied it around 9AM after showering, exfoliating, and shaving. I did not apply lotion because the directions suggested not to, and I applied it on dry skin. It rubbed off on my clothes and my car seat. I kept trying to like it, so I left it on. The next morning, I put on my bathing suit and went on the boat. I was mortified that everywhere I sat or stood on the boat was (temporarily but very clearly) stained by the self tanner. This product was designed with the hope that it could be used out in the sun with SPF, but it failed miserably at being practical for that use. In terms of the duration of color, when I got in the shower that afternoon, all of the color washed off. NOTHING stayed. I was just as pale as before, albeit with somewhat softer skin. In the multiple times I\'ve tried the product, it has never had any lasting effect. ', u'The only good things about this product are the color and how moisturizing it is. However, these characteristics are not worth how time-consuming, short-lasting, and ineffectual this product is. I don\'t return often, but this product is unfortunately going to have to go back to the store.'], 'author': u'skalbritton ', 'date': [u'2016-07-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great colour', 'text': [u'This tanner has a great colour (not orange, more brown with redder undertones) and is great if you have fairer skin. It is difficult to apply since it is very liquidy, but if you buy the tanning glove it works quite well. Smell is less intense than other tanners. Glass bottle is fragile. Just bought a new one and it tipped over on the counter and broke open. Lost 3/4 of the liquid! :('], 'author': u'Lucylove6 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Gradual Tan Plus Firming 4 In 1 Tan, Tone, Firm & Moisturise
reviews: {'title': u'Big waste of money', 'text': [u'This product simply did not do the job on my fair skin. {'title': u'Best summer perfume EVER', 'text': [u'I adoooore this perfume ! It was my first TF perfume. I bought it based on all the reviews and the fact that I absolutely love the smell of coconut. I purchased the oil and the perfume and tend to combine them to extend the smell until end of day. Although many have commented that it fades quite rapidly, I would tend to disagree, granted you are not left with a very present strong smell at 5pm, but I find this to be a good thing. Understated elegance, nothing else smells like this. Now I\'m hunting for my winter TF fragrance....white suede perhaps ?'], 'author': u'GeekyDiva ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': u'Montreal Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Just OK...Not Worth the Price', 'text': [u'Having owned both the Soleil Blanc parfum and shimmer oil, I can honestly say that this was my go-to scent this summer because it is the perfect mix. However, I don\'t think that I will repurchase because these products just aren\'t worth the price. The parfum is very faint and lasts for only an hour or two before you are tempted to reach for the bottle to reapply. At that rate, I will go through a $225 tax bottle in 2-3 months (yikes). This is surprising for a fragrance: 1-at this price point and 2-with such high concentrate of oil blends...The shimmer oil definitely has a bit more lasting power and helps to prolong the scent. Even still, I can only recommend if you want to sparkle (but not for the staying power). Warning: You will be glittery! Lol'], 'author': u'liyahbeat ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

I am a fairer skin tone. When I swatch them on my hand they show beautifully but on my face it\'s a different story. I feel like I have to use a lot of product to have it show. Dandelion and Coralista are the lightest ones and are barely visible. Dallas and Rock are better. The pigmentation is the best on the bronzer! I\'m still debating on returning it due to the first two colors but the last three is what\'s holding me back. Good thing Sephora has a great return policy!'], 'author': u'btybug ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'A little too glittery for me, but a good lipstick', 'text': [u'I will preface this by saying that I ended up returning this lipstick, however, I\'m still giving it five stars because it *is* a good lipstick.', u'I bought this in Plum, and while it ended up being too shimmery for me to like enough to keep, the color went on very easily, and the lipstick is very creamy and pigmented. The color is easily buildable, but do beware that the shimmer is more of a glitter finish. My typical makeup look and wardrobe tend to be understated, so this lipstick was a little too loud for me. For anyone looking for that, though, it will not disappoint.'], 'author': u'laney501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Okay Oil', 'text': [u'I got this after hearing about the product from so many Youtubers and had pretty high expectations for the product. I have always stored the product vertically, but the rubber part of the pipette got really sticky after about 6 months. It could be the vapor of the oil got inside and corrupted the rubber. Overall I believe the product would be great if you have really dry skin, but might need to take some time to massage the oil in.'], 'author': u'Wen314 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wonderful for fair and/or very sensitive skin', 'text': [u'I am VERY fair skinned and this matte bronzer looks beautiful both as a bronzer and contour on my skin. If you buy the smaller box, when you get it you will think it\'s too tiny but the color payoff is incredible, I overdid it the first swipe but it blends out easily. The little brush makes it easy to contour and fits right in the box and is of okay quality, and the box has a mirror. I am very pleased with this product and pair it with the dandelion blush, which is equally flattering on fair skin. Another note, I have insanely sensitive skin and most products break me out, make my skinburn, or cause my eyes to swell. I\'ve used a variety of benefit products from eye products to primers to powders and so far I have not had a reaction to ANY of them.'], 'author': u'catty81 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Whipped Argan Oil Face Butter
reviews: {'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'I have combination, oily, acne prone skin but I get dry patches in the colder weather. I decided to give this one a try after watching countless YouTube reviews on it because it is not cheap compared to a lot of other brands out there. I put this on as the last step of my night time skin care routine since it is quite thick. After using it for a while I find that a little goes a LONG way. If I put too much on it feels greasy, and with the right amount of product, it absorbs into my skin quite nicely. I wake up the next morning with super smooth and supple skin, no signs of flakiness. My make up applies so much easier and no patchiness because my skin is so hydrated but not oily. 100% recommend this product.'], 'author': u'michelleeey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Yummy!', 'text': [u'This is a super hydrating night cream (even though you can use it in the daytime too). I use this every night and my skin feels so hydrated and supple upon waking. It has a mild, soft and calming fragrance. I have added it to my nightly routine and arsenal.'], 'author': u'tltarleton ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'colorado springs', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Moisturizes but Not Heavy', 'text': [u'I use this primarily as a night cream most months since I live in a warm and humid climate and have been using it regularly for at least 4 months. The formula is rich, but it doesn\'t clog my pores or feel heavy on my skin. I definitely feel that my skin is more hydrated since using it. There also isn\'t a smell. I hate smelly creams on my face. I will definitely continue using this.'], 'author': u'AltGirlTX ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Texas', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

reviews: {'title': u'Natural Look that Lasts', 'text': [u'Love this cheek stain. {'title': u'Nice color, a bit heavy', 'text': [u'Bought Blushing Bride on sale. Hadn\'t used a cheek stain in a while (although I prefer them for ease & color). Beautiful color for a pale redhead like me, and a little seems to go a long way. However, although the formula glides on to my cheek relatively easily, I\'m aware of the feeling on my skin until I even out the product on my cheek, so there\'s that. I would imagine it might cause breakouts on oily skin. Lasts a good while (more than most of my powders) with some primer and a liquid-based foundation.I usually use sticks like these starting at my cheek and moving up just above my brows, then blend with my fingers. A sponge could probably help, but a brush wouldn\'t be able to spread the product easily.'], 'author': u'Inochi ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Columbus, OH', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Awesome.', 'text': [u'This stuff is great. It lasts quite a long time. My only problem is that the gloss doesn\'t last.. like basically at all. I love the applicator on both sides and I feel like the matte liquid lip probably would never come off unless I used makeup remover. So far, I\'ve eaten and drank with the lipstick and accompanying gloss on and the colour stayed although the gloss was not so resilient. But still, I bought another one anyway :)'], 'author': u'hanaleiezz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Jeddah, KSA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Le Rouge
reviews: {'title': u'Rose Dressing', 'text': [u'I received a one-time use sample of this in the color Rose Dressing, a very pretty springtime coral pink... I must say, this is one of the creamiest and most comfortable lipsticks I have ever worn. I wore it on a night out and obviously didn\'t bring the little foil pack sample with me to reapply, so I figured when it wears off, aw well for me... Well, I was happy to find that it didn\'t wear off at all. It had the long lasting effect of a lip stain with the color opaqueness of a lipstick. I was very pleased with the formula even though the color isn\'t my usual choice. I took off one star because I feel the price point is a little high for what it is. Granted, I haven\'t seen the leather packaging in person so that\'s probably what makes it so expensive,... But it is a very beautifully made lipstick and if it went on sale or I was able to get another sample, I would jump on it immediately.'], 'author': u'JessLess ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not my Favorite', 'text': [u'I don\'t like the way these feel. My lips dry out. The color just doesn\'t come through either. {'title': u'The package provides the hype.', 'text': [u'Rose Ruban is far more pale than it appears on the screen. So pale in fact that this was the third of four GIVENCHY purchases that went back to the store. The lipstick is creamy and light in texture. The package I believe is what is causing so many to rave about it. It\'s lightweight silver bullet with a leathery band wrapped around the cover. The bottom has a design that sticks out like a stud on both sides that helps hold the tube to remove the cover. Not worth the price unless you like to apply lipstick in public places to impress the masses of onlookers.'], 'author': u'Amsugr ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Northwest Indiana', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}
