', u'You can use it as a subtle highlighter, or if you put it on a little thicker, it can even double as a blush. <3'], 'author': u'Thinkbox ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Lip Tar - Matte
reviews: {'title': u'Converted me to lip color!', 'text': [u'I bought a stained gloss in the lip tar line -- it was an impulse buy from the Sephora checkout line -- and it made me a lip color convert. In general, I cannot stand the feel of lipstick, or the need to reapply it, or the fact that it comes of on everything. This product in a thin application goes on easily (I have no skills) doesn\'t need a liner, and stays color all day with no reapplication. It does fade a bit but not as much as typical lipstick. I also bought a couple as a present for a friend who wears hers much thicker and she is also in love with it. I am really disappointed that Sephora has discontinued carrying the line.'], 'author': u'raye215 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-30'], 'location': u'Philadelphia PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'CUTE ..... BUT.....', 'text': [u'Very happy I only purchased this for $9 and not regular $18 price. Had to reapply 3 times during a 7am - 3:15 pm day. Didn\'t eat and the product STILL faded/disappeared. Only a stain was left on lips. Did not use a liner and this lipstick was shifting all OVER my lips. I would have been HAPPIER if this product was $5 !!! The color is amazing but this product does NOT WORK 4 ME!! will use this product to run errands.'], 'author': u'8pERRYLAND1 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-04'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

reviews: {'title': u'Great perfume!', 'text': [u'I love the original and had to try this one! I love it! A little goes a long way. I am very picky when it comes to perfumes. Both perfume lasts all day.'], 'author': u'LISAxoxo ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'surprised!!', 'text': [u'I bought this on a whim one day. I was torn between two fragrances and couldn\'t decide. I have v&r which I saved for special occasions and date nights I wanted something I could wear every day and not be too over powering. A Sephora employee recommend this. To be honest I smelled the original jadore and didn\'t think it fit my style but I smelled this and right away without regrets bought it. It\'s definitely a must have. Great fragrance for day even night time wear.'], 'author': u'jjco ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'on my must have list!', 'text': [u'So when this came out a few months ago I spritzed it in store and I knew I had to have it! I\'m not a fan of the original J\'adore so it was a pleasant surprise to love this so much. It is unexpectedly strong and long lasting for an Eau de toilette. It smells like orange blossoms, jasmine and gives me the feel of standing on a balcony on the Italian coast looking at the Mediterranean Sea. Mind you I\'ve never done that before, so this perfume really is something special isn\'t it?! ;)'], 'author': u'danigail ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'beautiful smell!', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this fragrance! My new favorite scent!'], 'author': u'LoLovee ', 'date': [u'2016-04-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'No.', 'text': [u'So...Tory Burch. This is a brand that I really can\'t appreciate. What is it supposed to be? Light luxury? Over priced mediocre product? Anyway, like her other stuff, this perfume just doesn\'t cut it for me. The scent is extremely mediocre. I can find 100 other perfume brands out there that have the identical scent, but, cheaper. Also, she has tried too hard when it comes to the packaging. It\'s supposed to be luxurious I guess? Is it trying to copy the bottles of Maison Francis Kurkdjian perfume?? Which is on a whole different level in terms of true luxury, originality of scent and gorgeousness??? I mean ma\'am, if you can\'t emulate it right then you\'d rather be original, yeah? I call this Tory Burch perfume one of the bogus products in the market. Really, my money could have been better spent somewhere else.'], 'author': u'koalabingham88 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-07'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love!', 'text': [u'I received the sampler of the three new floral fragrances and ended up purchasing the rose scent. All three smell fabulous, but I adore the rose! I get tons of compliments on it!'], 'author': u'AmyS86 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I love the smell of the blue it it absolutely does NOT last.'], 'author': u'jadecat027 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Doesn't Last Long", 'text': [u'I absolutely love this scent but like a previous reviewer said it doesn\'t last and maybe it was the rollerball but on my skin it didn\'t even last a full hour. The scent I found does change from a more floral scent to a more leafy green scent within probably 30 min. I wish Tory Burch would tweak this to make it last much longer because the fact that the scent doesn\'t last combined with the price tag, I don\'t think I\'ll be repurchasing.'], 'author': u'KIKI95 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Generic', 'text': [u'This line turned out to be so disappointing, I thought the packaging was cute and for that price tag I thought they would be more interesting bordering niche quality. No. They are all generic floral scents but overpriced. They all have different bases: the green one is gardenia, the pink one is rose and this one is jasmine, but they have no depth or complexity to them. If you like them you will find other designer fragrances that smell just like these but you can get them for a cheaper price.'], 'author': u'PaulaMakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-02-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Solid Clean: Solid Brush Cleaner
reviews: {'title': u'okay', 'text': [u'This was okay, but I had a hard time getting my brushes I use for foundation, clean. It took me a long time to scrub all the foundation and even then I could still see foundation in the bristles. I just used the beauty blender solid cleanser and all the foundation comes off easily. For eyeshadow brushes and brushes I use with powder this cleanser worked fine.'], 'author': u'tay1994 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"It's ok..", 'text': [u'I wanted to like this very much because cleaning brushes is so important. That being said.. here are my issues:', u'- puck was difficult to remove from the case- did not \'lather\' well- did not clean brushes well without serious scrubbing', u'Overall I felt that I had to work too hard with this product in order to get my brushes well-cleased. Considering how much $$$ I have dropped on quality brushes, this product is a pass on maintaining them.'], 'author': u'Insomniacmuffin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Burnaby, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Amazing Value', 'text': [u'Picked this up last week when looking for a new cleaning soap. I was tired of the Dawn/Olive Oil thing, and felt a competitor\'s soap was just too high. Figured I would give this a shot and I am so glad that I did. It smells so good, but the smell hasn\'t transferred to my brushes. When I clean them, they feel brand new - soft and gentle, and not dried out. I even used this on my sponge and it worked great. I even like the little pink scrubber that comes with it for my eyeshadow brushes. ', u'The biggest trial that I had for this was my fluffy fan brush that I use for fall out - after using it and drying, the fan was in its original shape, and felt brand new! I highly recommend anyone seeking a new cleaning solution to give this a shot - and if you\'re not sure, get the smaller size. When this one runs out, I\'ll definitely be reordering.'], 'author': u'dorkasarusrex ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Florence, SC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Excellent product with hydrating properties but I give it 4 stars only because the pump needs improvement - it doesn\'t apply the even mist coverage I was hoping for.'], 'author': u'jackattack123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'pretty good for what it is.', 'text': [u'This product is convenient to carry around unlike most other face mists. ', u'Very refreshing scent.', u'It\'s not my absolute favorite face mist but it\'s once of the best for the purse and for slightly oily skin that wants refreshment without shine!'], 'author': u'AirArtAirHeart ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'great until it clogs my pores', 'text': [u'I\'m a huge fan of shiseido but this thing is going back. Meh.'], 'author': u'Duat98 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'AMAZING for Dry Skin', 'text': [u'I have extremely, extremely dry skin and this mask has changed my life! It\'s great every time I use it but especially after exfoliating. It makes my skin so smooth and hydrated which I honestly thought wasn\'t possible with my skin! My forehead is usually super flaky and every foundation sticks to my dry patches but now that I use this mask I don\'t have that problem. {'title': u'just WOWW', 'text': [u'Love this! Only have had it for a couple of days and I already notice a difference, my skin is more moist, even, and I havent broken out from using this. Before this I was using the Olay Regenerist Luminious night mask (this is only 10 dollars more and much better) it was ok however I stopped using Olay products because I find they go bad too quickly. This has a creamy gel texture, when you see it in the jar it looks like it will be thick and greasy but doesnt feel heavy at all on your face, a minute after you apply jt sinks into your skin and feels weightless. I apply this as the last step of my night routine, I feel it seals in my other moisturizers and serums and allows the benefits of this mask to work. NOTE: I have combination dry skin prone to mild breakouts.'], 'author': u'zek87 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'good product poor packaging.', 'text': [u'I received a couple of 100 point perk samples of this product, used them and liked the product. Right after I sprayed this my husband commented he could smell something (from downstairs)... and followed up with how much he hates it! I will pass on this one.'], 'author': u'skinnie ', 'date': [u'2016-06-25'], 'location': u'Toronto, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Husband loves it', 'text': [u'Review of sample: I have worn this a few times. It doesn\'t smell particularly special when I spray it, and after about an hour I can no longer smell it. However every time I wear it my husband goes nuts and says I smell so good. I\'m pretty conflicted because I like to smell perfume on myself throughout the day, and this doesn\'t do that for me. If there was a rollerball (by itself) I would probably purchase because my husband likes it so much.'], 'author': u'pgrann ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hip candied/fruity floral', 'text': [u'I\'ve flirted with buying this for a few on ths now. For many of us, dropping 100 bucks in a fragrance (a luxury item) is not akways feasible. I know that some Sephora clients have dropped 300+ on perfume, but I am not one if those individuals. That\'s just too rich for my blood. That said, i caved in and purchased a 1.7 of this after receiving a sample in the mail. Upon first spray Hi-Fi is tart--almost like some kind of candy from my childhood--and then It smells like floral--fresh floral, like fresh cut spring flowers in a vase. And then the boldness and sour tartness did salaries into a creamy and subtle skin scent. Despite loving this (It is gravely)? I almost returned it shortly after purchase because it\'s throw and longevity did not seem th pair with its price point. But I gave it a few more chances and realized it is supposed to calm down, for if it stayed tart for its duration? It would be too youthful and synthetic. I like Gucci\'s youthful "Envy Me," but there is something loud and synthetic about it. And your nose will get used to this scent quickly. If you whiff some coffee and resniff your wrists or clothing? You\'ll notice Hi-Fi\'s undeniable presence. It\'s a gorgeous, sweet-and-sour spring and summer scent. If you want something bold that will fill a room when you walk into it, then skip this. If you want something that is fresh, flattering, and inoffensive (but not boring; I disagree with Frangrantica\'s reviews), get this.'], 'author': u'pumpkinlove78 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'a fresh take on floral', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample with an online order, and I am loving it! My go-to fragrances are usually fresh, citrusy, light scents with a touch of floral (think Armani\'s Acqua di Gioia line, D&G Light Blue), and I think this is a great one for those who want a fresh scent that leans a little more towards floral. I love that it\'s a purely floral scent that doesn\'t smell to grandma-ish or overwhelming/heavy. ', u'My fave scent over the past year has been the Acqua di Gioia Jasmine. I\'m super sad that that was limited edition, but when my bottle runs out, I\'m seriously considering grabbing Hi Fi to layer with my other scents, since Hi Fi smells like Acqua di Gioia Jasmine minus the citrus and with a little more powdery-ness.', u'Hi Fi is freshly floral at first, but once it sits for 10 minutes and interacts with my skin chemistry, there is a slight hint of sweetness/warmness, like burnt sugar or a woody vanilla. I don\'t hate it, but I really loved the initial peony scent, and the base notes have long staying power (It\'s been 3 hours and still staying strong). Having said that, if you want something purely floral, ask for a sample vial from Sephora if possible to see how it changes on your skin.'], 'author': u'XeniaWasHere ', 'date': [u'2016-04-19'], 'location': u'Vancouver, British Columbia', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Elegant, feminine', 'text': [u'Just bought two bottles of Afloat and the Blackout Derek Lamb. Original. It\'s like everyone else on the perfume market tried to achieve this smell but didn\'t quite get it. Stays long if you layer it on the just moisturized skin. Everyone who complains about not staying power doesn\'t know this trick. I was looking for a new scent to celebrate my new love& life chapter. Possibly will be buying the rest of the collection of Derek Lamb. Also, check into Drunk on Youth and Something about Glass. I couldn\'t decide between these 4. Cons: No layering moisturizer/body lotion yet. Common, Derek! We need it, and we need it now. And the design of the bottle- would be nice to have an eye candy for my display, not the white cylinder object. So, Afloat is close to fragrances like J\'Adore, My Burberry, Chloe, fresh and feminine. Lingers behind you like a train. Very little goes a long way. I\'d say it satisfied my New York craving. Very city like. I hope this helps.'], 'author': u'elenabg ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Works fine', 'text': [u'I got this as one of the products in Sephoras favorites package and just used it this morning on second day hair on my ends only. {'title': u'works well', 'text': [u'This dry conditioner works well for me. I spray this mostly on my ends and on the midshaft, and this leaves my hair soft and less dry at the ends. reviews: {'title': u'Very Natural!', 'text': [u'This is one of the most impressive brow products out there! Its easy to use, blends in well, and no red tone! It just looks like your brows!'], 'author': u'evmav ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Mississauga Ontario', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'I really like the results', 'text': [u'I recently started doing my brows. A friend of mine uses unique and gave me a brow pencil to try. It was ok,but was really made my brow itch. I tried Marc jacobs eyeliner so thought I would try the brow pincer, it was wonderful!!'], 'author': u'enjoylife67 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Carmel,in', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Long Lasting', 'text': [u'Tired this bc a Sephora girl recommended it to me. Very good. Not super creamy which I like bc it makes last longer. Matches my hair perfectly.'], 'author': u'scillalynn ', 'date': [u'2016-06-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very nice, but returned', 'text': [u'I\'m Asian, light to medium skin tone depending on the season, with brown hair, naturally on the light & reddish side. I\'ve always been asked, even as a small child, if I dye & perm my hair \'cuz people assume Far East Asians cannot have naturally light brown, wavy hair. So, I was on the hunt for a "just right" shade to fill in my sparse eyebrows, & found it surprisingly challenging. In store, this shade seemed good, but when I saw it at home the next morning in natural light, it was subtly too red and dark. I stubbled upon Shu Uemura brow products, which offer better matches for me. I\'m using a combination of Seal Brown & Seal Grey.'], 'author': u'happyceci ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': u'Little Ferry, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u"It's alright.", 'text': [u'I think this is too expensive for the amount of the product you get. It is thinner than any other eyebrow pencil products, and more expensive as well. It has very good precision for outlining the eyebrow shape and relatively easy to apply, but not useful for filling in the eyebrow since the application point is so thin.'], 'author': u'Rinarian ', 'date': [u'2016-06-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Modernist Eyeshadow Palette
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have a fair share of eye palettes but this one is for sure a go to. The pigmentation is stunning and gives a flawless look and is my favorite for its ability to be easily taken on the go or packed in a suitcase AND amazing resulting looks'], 'author': u'binabeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Georgia', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'Olive color field', 'text': [u'Girl. I was drooling & debating this purchase for weeks. I finally take the plunge & not only is it tiny but the shadows aren\'t all that. I\'m ok with being price gouged as long as your product is worth it but literally it\'s almost travel size. The colors are cute, nothing mind blowing. Pigment & texture are just ok. When I\'m buying "higher end" cosmetics Idw some drug store palette.'], 'author': u'HarryLou3 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Unbeatable', 'text': [u'This is absolutely THE BEST eyeshadow palette I\'ve ever owned. I got the olive greens, and they are beyond gorgeous. There are matte shades and slightly shimmery shades that feel like mattes, which is nice, and they have a hint of coppery sparkle. So multi-dimensional. They\'re the easiest shadows to blend, too. The greens are the perfect shades because they\'re definitely distinguishable from the browns but not outrageous and costume-y. Very flattering. I wish they made these palettes in more colors!'], 'author': u'melissalld ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Dayton, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Beautiful', 'text': [u'I was introduced to this at a Sephora store. Just love the rich colors. You can wear it light or go darker, whatever you like. I bought the purple palette.'], 'author': u'Fritziie ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Flagstaff, Az', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'disappointed', 'text': [u'Love the colors and the packaging but it\'s so fragile. It literally fell apart when I dipped the brush on any if the colors. name: Eye Shadow Brush #40
reviews: {'title': u'!', 'text': [u'Love this brush !!!!!!!!'], 'author': u'texasgirl82 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Designer Brush', 'text': [u'I am learning to love this brush. Initially I was skeptical because of the size, it is much larger than I was expecting. But with some practice and use i\'m learning to love it. It was initially a bit stiffer, but after washing it the first time it got much softer and fluffed out a bit more. I like that it picks up a good amount of pigment, especially for really dark or intense colors. Just be warned it is larger than it looks. Good overall brush.'], 'author': u'am2785 ', 'date': [u'2015-06-21'], 'location': u'College Station, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'#40 is the all in one brush', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this brush. Granted it a on the large size but that is why it is such a multitasker. You can turn the brush on the side to use as a blending and crease brush. Works well to apply brow highlight and i\'ve I used it to apply powder under the eye and to apply color all over the lid in one swipe. It picks up the right amount of shadow and applies it like a dream.', u'This is a natural fiber brush that is super soft. A very silky brush.', u'If you\'re looking a flat shader brush, this may not be the brush for you. But if you\'re for a brush that can do multitask, then you should try this brush.'], 'author': u'lafemmetopaz ', 'date': [u'2014-10-03'], 'location': u'Milwaukee, WI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: 222 Sponge Applicator
reviews: {'title': u'nice quality', 'text': [u'I\'ve always preferred foam applicators over eyeshadow brushes, but hate the TINY little handles that most come with! This tool is easy to hold and makes application easy from any angle, and the foam seems very high quality (not as soft & squishy as some). The replaceable head, even though removable from the handle, sits very securely and doesn\'t feel like 2 separate pieces.'], 'author': u'melissarx ', 'date': [u'2015-11-15'], 'location': u'coastal NC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Flat Top Foundation Brush
reviews: {'title': u'great brush!!', 'text': [u'This brush is a must have! It applies the make up I use evenly, and the bristles are very soft to the touch! I\'ve been using the BAREMINERALSbareSkin Perfecting Face Brush to apply the bareSkin Pure Brightening Serum Foundation to my face and it sheds and leaves streaks. The brush is pretty pricey but well worth the quality! I definitely recommend this to my friends!!'], 'author': u'kdbilbao ', 'date': [u'2016-05-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love, love!', 'text': [u'This brush is perfection! No shedding at all, very even/airbrushed look and I honestly use LESS makeup with this brush. reviews: {'title': u'Love this brush', 'text': [u'this brush is def design for blush and highlighter! LOVE IT! Highly recommended!!!!!'], 'author': u'BCQueen ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'nice for blush', 'text': [u'I wasn\'t sure I\'d love this brush but I actually think it\'s pretty great. I think this brush lends itself to my face shape and size much better than one of those round blush brushes.', u'For those of you who feel like using a more traditional round brush just leaves you with too much blush on your face after blending (like, the space on your face it takes up is too much, not that the colour is too strong) I recommend something like this. You can place it more precisely and blend it out without worrying that you\'re taking up too much space on your cheeks.'], 'author': u'Jenn088 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-29'], 'location': u'British Columbia', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Perfect for dry patches!', 'text': [u'I have dry skin and was hoping to use this as a face cream. Since then, I\'ve used it on my lips, my elbows and other eczema flare-ups. It does feel oily and heavy when it is applied, but the results are great. {'title': u'Intensive Moisturizing Face Cream', 'text': [u'I have combination/dry skin. My skin was breaking out, I think, because the lotion I was using wasn\'t strong enough. I went through several different brands, all marketed for sensitive skin, before I decided to try this one. Although it does initially feel greasy going on, when I wake up in the morning after sleeping in it, my skin feels normal. I have no breakouts the way I used to from dry skin and I am able to use it under my tinted moisturizer during the day. If I use it solo during the day, my face gets a little oily because it needs an additional layer of protection, but it isn\'t from the argan cream. I also smooth this on my lips. My beauty routine is pretty simple--wash face, moisturize with this argan cream. That\'s it! My skin has stayed blemish free without costing me an arm and a leg.'], 'author': u'Chillyhawaiian ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'Colorado Springs, CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I\'ve tried multiple primers and methods to get this to work and it just won\'t prevent it from melting off or getting beyond shiny. I love a good glow but this looks like I\'m sweaty! Would be awesome if they reformualted!!!'], 'author': u'meggggannnnn ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great kit!', 'text': [u'I have dry acne prone skin and I gave this kit a try because of all the positive reviews.What can I say, it\'s just amazing. You only need a small amount of the serum and after that you apply the cream. The cream is amazing and absorbs very quickly so it doesn\'t leave your face greasy or sticky, yet it\'s very moisturizing.You know the feeling you have when you apply a good moisturizer before going to bed and wake up with a very smooth nourished skin? Well, the combination of these products make my skin feel like that 30 minutes after I applied it. I will definitely purchase the full sizes and would recommend these to anyone!'], 'author': u'ToxicAlien ', 'date': [u'2015-04-12'], 'location': u'Amsterdam, Netherlands', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'VERY Useful!', 'text': [u'Well, of course these products are useful, they\'re skin products, right? Yes, the liquid and cream duo do a good job as light facial moisturizers. They are probably best for normal to oily skin, or layered under another treatment.BUT, I\'ve discovered some handy uses for both of these products when applying makeup.The Ceramidin liquid/serum makes a lovely base or mixing medium for powders or pigments. I have two sample sizes of the Stila foil shadows; a drop or two of the liquid works perfectly.I find the cream is a perfect consistency to thin out a heavy foundation. And just a dab or either the liquid or cream will eliminate random dry skin flakes or patches that tend to crop up after my foundation is applied and buffed out.Lastly, a mix or the cream and liquid make a good lip primer for me. Just make sure it\'s all absorbed or wipe off any excess before applying your lip.The Ceramidin line has proved to be a real multi-tasker! I\'ll always keep a bottle on my vanity, and this set is the perfect size.'], 'author': u'leopardprint ', 'date': [u'2015-04-05'], 'location': u'SF Bay Area, NorCal', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Ceramidin™ Cream
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'It really improved my skin\'s moisture barrier and improve my skin overall. It\'s not super heavy either and I like the scent.', u'Excellent as a last step sealant over oils and other hydrating products because it doesn\'t really inject moisture into my skin, just adds a protective layer.'], 'author': u'nutterjelly ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'new favorite moisturizer', 'text': [u'I am now on my second of two of the Sephora 100 point perk deluxe samples of this face cream which were available a while ago. Once I started using the fist sample I knew I needed to get more, but after seeing the $48 price tag on the full size I decided to opt for a second sample. The samples have lasted me a very long time so I can\'t even imagine how long this big tube will last me when I eventually cave and buy it! I even cut open my first tube to make sure I got every last drop. You don\'t need a lot of this stuff, but it\'s worked wonders on my skin. I use it after I shower and before I go to bed and when I wake up I have moisturized, firm, even toned skin. I have combo skin, with both oily and dry patches between my eyebrows, on the sides of my nose, and on my chin but this stuff takes care of both issues. I\'m obsessed!! It has a slight citrusy-type smell but it goes away once the product is fully rubbed in. Love it!!!'], 'author': u'ejanebrigid ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'This stuff is saving my skin. For the first time in years my combination/extremely acne prone skin which is always flaking and dry as it heals, is soft and moisturized and wonderful. This stuff isn\'t greasy, you only need a tiny bit, and it lasts forever.'], 'author': u'ESM1312 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'light and smooth', 'text': [u'This is my favorite concealers so far. Lightweight, Smoothy and natural. Thanks Marc Jcobes.'], 'author': u'maaarryyaam ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Color Match', 'text': [u'This is one of the very few concealers that actually matches my skin tone. I don\'t look for a brightener that makes me look like a raccoon ghost. I always look for a concealer to match my skin so I can cover the shadow of my dark circles. I like the natural look so I use just a tiny bit.This concealer is light, easy to blend and looks imperceptible UNLESS you start to put layer over layer over layer, then it starts to crease and look cakey.So to me this is a fantastic discovery, on my top list next to Benefit Erase Paste.'], 'author': u'est18 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': u'Houston', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'not that great', 'text': [u'Well it\'s really lightweight and it gives you this soft soft look but the problem is that it doesn\'t stay for more than 2 hours or less and it\'s not for people that have a greasy skin. Probably I would buy it again but I will try to use it with an eye primer'], 'author': u'viri2021 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'Best concealer/concealer pen I have tried! It\'s lightweight; goes on very smoothly and brightens. I have the Bright Idea (more of a peachy/corrector color for me) and Rendezvous and they have lasted for a while. I love the metal tip - which has a nice cooling effect to the eye area. I\'ve tried the charlotte tilbury pen, Nars concealer, mac concealer, and this is by far my favorite. Pricey but I think it is worth it - and the packaging is nice and feels expensive.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-08-12'], 'location': u'Colorado', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not worth it', 'text': [u'Comes out very light but dries extremely cakey. Very bad creasing with or without powder. Tried it at the store and should have really taken a sample first to see how it wears. Very much regret getting this concealer :('], 'author': u'Valmantha ', 'date': [u'2016-07-16'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, Ca', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

Not too crazy about the smell though!'], 'author': u'Lovemakeups1977 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Riverside, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'It says at the top only good for normal or dry skin but I have combo with oily (not so much anymore) and this works great. It\'s actually helped my oil production to decrease so I\'m not shiny by midday. I normally just use one drop of this and then my moisturizer with the spf in it as well or just two drops of this if i\'m not going into the sun, and for night I mix it with my night moisturizer for an extra boost of hydration.'], 'author': u'oheyitsshey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Alexandria, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I think its too pricey for its efficiency'], 'author': u'beautyjunkieFVP ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: The Chocolate Bar Eye Palette
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'such a good palette if you use a lot of warm eyeshadow colors, smells amazing too. the eyeshadow in this palette called "champagne truffle" (i think that\'s what it\'s called) can also work well if you want to use it as a highlighter!! one of my fav palettes :)'], 'author': u'kaylo10 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Everything about the chocolate is amazing. The smell is to die for, and the texture/pigments are amazing. Best palettes I own!'], 'author': u'Nevaky121316 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Why didn't I buy this sooner?", 'text': [u'I\'ve heard the hype about this palette for a while, but as usual I prefer to wait for the hype to die down before I invest my hard-earn money into a beauty product- much less an eyeshadow palette that costs $49 dollars.', u'I should have bought it sooner.', u'This palette is gorgeous. It is stunning. The shades are absolutely beautiful, richly pigmented yet easily blendable and buildable. ', u'There isn\'t a single color in this eyeshadow palette that I don\'t love. Cherry Cordial and Black Forest are my favorite- two beautifully colored shimmer shades that create the perfect contrast for a sexy brown smokey eye. ', u'The colors are highly pigmented on brown skin, however on the deepest shades they may require a bit of building. The shimmer shades can be enhanced by gently misting your eyeshadow brush with a bit of setting spray, then gently pressing the pigment onto the lid and blending out if you want.', u'Overall, this is an extremely lush, sensual, sexy palette, a must have for all skin tones and my new go-to staple. I highly recommend this heavenly-scented palette to everyone- it is well worth the price.'], 'author': u'BewitchedBeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Dover,Delaware', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'worth the hype!', 'text': [u'I cannot believe it took me so long to buy this palette! The pigmentation is absolutely to die for and the colors blend BEAUTIFULLY! The colors are universally flattering and compliment each other so well. And of course there is the fact that it smells like freaking chocolate...stop wasting your time and just buy it already'], 'author': u'productlover022 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing!!', 'text': [u'I am a firm believer that if anyone needs just one eyeshadow palette, it\'s this one. It truly is universally flattering; the color range can truly suit all skin tones and eye colors. It\'s really easy to work with, and beginners won\'t find it too intimidating but experts can still find room for experimentation. The quality of the eyeshadows is also amazing; the color payoff is wonderful and they\'re so easy to blend. My favorite shades ar Amaretto, Marzipan, and Salted Caramel, but Candied Violet is also growing on me. Highly recommend, especially if you are buying your first high-end palette!'], 'author': u'KaiaS ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Buttercup Blow Dryer
reviews: {'title': u'obsessed w drybar', 'text': [u'I am a drybar devotee. With that said, I don\'t always love their tools. I do love this dryer! With it, I use prep rally, mr incredible, & money maker. A quick detox and style with this dryer refreshes hair nicely.'], 'author': u'mrssongbird ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great dryer', 'text': [u'Having only used cheaper blowdryers my whole life, I finally decided to invest in a good 1 this past year. The difference is night and day. I have minimal skills with drying techniques (aka not a hair pro) and this makes my hair look professionally done everytime I dry it. Time wise is about the same drying time as other less expensive ones but I ultimately wasnt trying to speed up the process. If you have the money to splurge this is a great dryer!'], 'author': u'chicacarina ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not great:(', 'text': [u'After doing so much research, I feel utterly disappointed:( The dryer did not dry my hair any faster than my cheap dryer. What was really a disappointment was that the top of my head never felt really dry after using it. It actually felt kinda greasy believe it or not. My hair usually looks clean for 2 days, but with this dryer, it actually looked greasy and dirty right after using it:( Also, the attachment was impossible to put on without a struggle:( So disappointing because it\'s so lightweight and pretty looking.'], 'author': u'anneleetoronto ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great investment', 'text': [u'I\'ve had this dryer for 3 years, and it has proven to be a great investment. Recently I bought the brand new overly hyped up $399 dollar dryer from another brand, and returned it as it wasn\'t as good as my Buttercup! Buttercup leaves my hair soft, and silky without over drying it.It dries my long hair in about 11 minutes or so give or take. I just bought another one to have as a backup. :) The only con is that it does feel heavy after a few minutes, but still worth it!!!'], 'author': u'Raylee83 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': u'Massachusetts', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this dryer', 'text': [u'This hair dryer is so easy to use it makes your hair style look like a professional did it!'], 'author': u'jmom48 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Delaware', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Only good for mattifying/color correcting', 'text': [u'I\'m a huge fan of Guerlain. I love their products, the packaging and the way they truly know how to make the Guerlain woman feel special. I randomly bought this, not knowing the ingredients and how it would look like on my skin. When I actually put it on after my foundation (I have extremely* oily and acne prone skin) I did notice that it mattified my skin but it just didn\'t look right. My skin was mattified, yes, and it did brighten my face but there was no glow. It didn\'t win me over. I really wish I could love this though.'], 'author': u'esteek ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'Manhattan, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

Careful with this one ladies and gents!!!'], 'author': u'evma ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': u'CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Pro Flat Liner Brush #25
reviews: {'title': u'Loved Once I Angled It!', 'text': [u'This brush, at $11, is a great price! I lost my long time, go-to, brow brush. So I purchased several brow brushes to compare. This one was the best!1. The bristles are strong, which keeps them in the exact spot I want on my eyebrows. I have thinner brows, so I didn\'t want bristles that were too fine.I even cut the bristles to make the brush an angled brush, which I was nervous about. But, since the bristles are so sturdy, cutting them didn\'t compromise the integrity of the bristles.2. I like that this brush is a bit wider than the Anastasia Beverly Hills brush # 15. The ABH brush had shorter bristles, and they tended to bend with the pressure of applying to the brow line. The Sephora # 25 brush didn\'t bend, and I can turn the brush sideways to fill in the thicker areas of my brows.'], 'author': u'valstar001 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': u'Salt Lake City, Utah', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I really like this brush, and I actually use it to contour my nose. It gives a very neat, precise line. I\'ve had it for quite a while now, and it\'s held up nicely.'], 'author': u'MissSarah03 ', 'date': [u'2015-05-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great brush for lashline', 'text': [u'I have to say - this brush works great for getting on the lash line. For whatever reason, I have issues with getting liners directly on the line, but this brush makes that so much easier. Done right, the liner makes my lashes look much fuller and this brush speeds up the application.'], 'author': u'IEDucksfan ', 'date': [u'2015-04-30'], 'location': u'IE California', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not as good as the other brushes', 'text': [u'for some reason i think this brush is slightly too sharp'], 'author': u'gurlilla ', 'date': [u'2015-02-02'], 'location': u'NY, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Bristles do NOT soften with use and washing', 'text': [u'I prefer not reviewing a product harshly since opinions are subjective. The bristles on this liner brush are as hard as a scrub or hair brush. That\'s a fact, not an opinion. I didn\'t return it because I\'ve been pleased with every other Sephora brush and thought a couple washings would do the trick. They didn\'t. I\'ve tried to use it over and over again, thinking maybe it was me...that I just didn\'t know how to use this type of liner brush...that\'s how much I wanted it to work. Please don\'t buy this with the expectation it will soften. If you like coarse, hard bristles for your eyelids, do buy this.'], 'author': u'arise ', 'date': [u'2015-01-06'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Smooth Finish Flawless Fluide
reviews: {'title': u'Not good for mature skin!', 'text': [u'This is not a bad foundation per se -- the coverage is sheer, the color true, it wears for a fairly long time -- but the watery texture means it doesn\'t blend well with just fingers, and the squeeze bottle is a little difficult to work with. I have fairly good skin for 52, but the finish on this is not just matte, it\'s flat. Might work on someone with dewier skin who wants a liquid power kind of thing, but that\'s not me.'], 'author': u'hazyd ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Lives up to its name', 'text': [u'I used to use LM\'s tinted moisturizer in my teens and then "graduated" to this foundation. I\'ve tried a few others, but this really is the best. It is matte and provides flawless coverage, and yet is totally light-weight. I\'d trust this stuff for my dressiest nights, but is still perfect for work or weekends as it is so natural looking and never comes across as overdone. I have dry, sensitive skin, and this gives me no trouble. It works great over any moisturizer I\'ve used, and works especially well with Murad\'s invisiblur. I\'ve been using this foundation for years and can\'t imagine switching any time soon.'], 'author': u'NYC23 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'UM YES!', 'text': [u'I have very oily skin & hate a flat mate foundation. This makes your skin literally flawless without looking like you have a lot of makeup on. The pigment is significantly higher than most without it being overly creamy.. this is one of my favs!'], 'author': u'krystenlynn12 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have been trying different foundations and I have found this one woohoo! very happy with this product.'], 'author': u'Miritan562 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Hawaiian Gardens, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Fair-skinned Asians, Look!', 'text': [u'My favorite foundation to date (and I\'ve tried probably too many). As a medium-fair skinned Asian, it is incredibly difficult for me to find a shade that truly matches my skin. Foundations are usually too pink, too light, too dark, etc. but Macadamia is so spot on for me. I also have combination skin (suuuuper oily in T-zone and really dry and patchy on the tops of my cheeks). This foundation does not provide moisture so you do need to stay on top of exfoliating/moisturizing/priming/etc. The finish is matte but does not give your skin a muted, dull look. The medium-full coverage of this is enough to cover my dark spots from acne and circles under my eyes without the use of any color corrector or concealer. One con as I saw stated in a different review is the bottle - product will randomly ooze or just *plop* out of the opening if you\'re not careful. Other than that, a perfect foundation. Please put this product back in retail stores!!'], 'author': u'charmaine424 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: 4-Pack Sponge
reviews: {'title': u'egg shaped sponges', 'text': [u'I love the egg shaped sponges. I have watched many tutorials with the make up artist using the beauty blender, and I like that too for around the eyes and corners of the nose. However for the smoothest finish I always go back to the egg shaped sponge. It gives me the over all finish I prefer.'], 'author': u'jmcleod ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': u'Malden, MO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Wonderful sponges!', 'text': [u'I have used sponges since I first noticed them, many eons ago and the LM ones are some of my very favorites of all time. You can use them dry to work with cream to powder foundation or powders, damp for liquid or, my favorite way, I rub a tiny bit of primer into the sponge before adding my BB/CC/Foundation and the sponge does not absorb the make-up much at all. They last a long time and wash well with gentle shampoo or antibacterial soap. I tried a BeautyBlender sponge and never did figure out how to use it to make my make-up look nice. I tried a foundation brush and was like "yuck"; I looked like a bad paint job! Too old for new tricks perhaps? These are worth having in your make-up kit.'], 'author': u'krazykollector ', 'date': [u'2016-03-24'], 'location': u'Sheffield LK OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'No No NO', 'text': [u'Do yourself a favor & go buy a beauty blender and use it damp. These do not work and are so awkward to hold!'], 'author': u'MaryjanePhilly ', 'date': [u'2016-01-20'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, Pennsylvania', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Creates thin, natural look', 'text': [u'ALWAYS use it with water and you\'ll find your makeup natural and smooth. It definitely enhances skin that does\'t have much flaw.', u'However if you are looking for high concealing makeup look, this is not going to be your best sponge.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-01-06'], 'location': u'Saskatchewan', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'the only thing I use for foundation', 'text': [u'I received one of these sponges in a Laura Mercier makeup kit, and it is my favorite applicator for any sort of base on my skin - foundation, bb cream, or tinted moisturizer. It\'s dense enough that it doesn\'t absorb product, and it leaves an airbrushed and effortless finish that\'s natural but does not diminish the coverage of a foundation. I use this everyday with the Missha Signature Real Complete BB Cream (#27 honey beige) and it really makes it look amazing - enough coverage but not cakey. For more coverage I use the Make Up Forever HD Foundation (Medium Beige) and it rocks using that also, creates a very smooth finish. I use this dry or the most part, but also damp to sheer our heavier foundation, and I\'ve thoroughly enjoyed this product.'], 'author': u'phoenixlament ', 'date': [u'2015-12-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

name: Laser FX Lift Serum
reviews: {'title': u'really great', 'text': [u'I love the instant feel of firming on my skin, I work at sephora and have tried many of the products and when I received this I found that it really does what it says! I have combination skin and this product feels wonderful and has not bothered my sensitive skin.'], 'author': u'JLomas0422 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this product!', 'text': [u'The only thing that has made a difference on my hands. I use this with a layer of extremely moisturizing lotion and my hands look great (for a while anyway:) Can\'t turn back the clock, but we can cheat a little!'], 'author': u'Kimatlanta ', 'date': [u'2016-04-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good product!', 'text': [u'I have been looking for a firming serum that works instantly. I am 25, so no real sagging yet, but I have chronic insomnia and I always need products that make me look more awake and lifted, with brighter, less-puffy skin. This a really great product for that. The instant results are noticeable but not dramatic. However, I have been using it for 3 weeks, and my face is definitely more contoured and defined, and I look, overall, more rested. I would recommend and will repurchase.'], 'author': u'Mayk47 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Useless', 'text': [u'What a disappointment! This was a waste of $80 and I am bummed about it. I have seen absolutely no change in my skin since using it.'], 'author': u'ChiMom78 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'still looking for Mr. Perfect', 'text': [u'I tried this after I ran out of Peter Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Serum (and at the time, Sephora was no longer carrying it). I got a sample of this, loved it, and bought the full size. While very similar to my beloved PTR, its not exactly the same. Sometimes my face feels tight after using it, sometimes slick, sometimes sticky. I dislike that the bottle is so tall and thin and that I cannot see how much product is left.', u'I still see the visible difference in my skin, and mostly this is for preventative treatment, not that I have lines and wrinkles yet. I feel my face looks smoother and feels more elastic after using, and it helps with fatigue around my eyes.', u'Results with this are similar to the PTR. If it is a matter of price, this is definitely a product that is worth the money. If money is no object, then go with the more expensive one.'], 'author': u'valgal86 ', 'date': [u'2015-04-27'], 'location': u'Houston, Tx', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'Nice product but...', 'text': [u'the crayon does not stay in the outer packaging so it just slides out. Needs a better application method or holder. {'title': u'Poorly made', 'text': [u'First the good: The color is perfect, it is a great cream contour option - especially for beginners. In a stick form it allows precise placement - even on the nose which can be a little tricky with a brush. It blends out beautifully, and I love that the formula is buildable so you can go from subtle to bold contour with ease. ', u'I like this product, however I cannot love it because of how poorly it is made/packaged. The contour cream does not fill the stick, it just rattles around in there and breaks off. This is my 2nd purchase of the Tarte Sculptor and I have experienced the same breakage both times.'], 'author': u'NikAndersonJams ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE IT', 'text': [u'I\'VE BEEN IN LOVE SINCE THE FIRST USE, IT HEAT UP SO FAST AND YOU CAN STYLE YOUR WAVES SO EASY AND QUICK'], 'author': u'PRISCILLAGAJI ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love love my T3', 'text': [u'Thought about this wand for a long time before I purchased, because it is so expensive. BUT it is worth every penny. ', u'Does exactly what it promises and more. 3 interchangeable size wands gives you several different looks. (ex: mermaid waves, Shirley Temple curls, beach waves, the "model off duty" look, soft and tight curls/ waves, casual or formal this can give you everything)Does take some practice though. I\'ve used it about 6x since I bought it (owned it for a month) and I\'m still perfecting my "off duty model casual look". ', u'Don\'t need to hold your hair long, because it can be really hot. Curls last all day. Most importantly your hair looks natural. My boss asked me if my hair was actually wavy, because he thought I may have straightened it every day!!!! NOPE it\'s my T3', u'I have straight dark asian hair and no curler has ever worked.....until my hair met T3. I don\'t use the glove because I can\'t feel anything. Box comes with protective mat for counter, heat protection glove, 3 different size adapters and curler. Plus the electric cord is longer than most so you don\'t have to stretch.', u'LOVE my T3!!!'], 'author': u'07dazy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Cambridge, ON, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'OBSESSED.', 'text': [u'It took me months to bite the bullet and actually purchase this set because I couldn\'t bring myself to spend so much money. But believe me when I say it is WORTH EVERY PENNY. Whenever I use this set, my hair stays curled for days. Three days, four days and the curls are still bouncy, defined, and softer than ever. I\'ve had various other curling wands and none of them have given me the results that these have. Not even the Nume sets come close to the quality that these wands deliver! I love that the wand heats up to the highest setting in less than 30 seconds - the entire process is truly effortless. This has got to be my favorite purchase of the year thus far.'], 'author': u'dinasmith ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sadly disappointed - poor results for long hair!', 'text': [u'I have long (inches past my bra strap) hair that is naturally curly but straightens and curls well. I had previously been using a $30 tapered curling wand and loved it, but lost it. I thought I would splurge this time and boy I was disappointed. It curled my hair, but by the time the curl cooled it had lost half of the curl. My hair want shiny or sleek, but still a little kinky and fuzzy. I tried the large barrel (which did give a really nice curl for my length of hair) and the tapered barrel (which was too small and gave me weird stringy curls). The curl didn\'t hold at all and I would have to re-do my hair after work if I was going out. The texture of my hair also looked unhealthy. I returned this and bought another cheap tapered curling wand with a bigger barrel and it works amazing. Big soft curls and shiny hair. Maybe I got a botched curling wand. I loved the idea of interchangeable wands, but the outcome of my hair was bad. I also didn\'t like the weight balance of the whole thing. Really end heavy instead of most of the weight being in your hand. I have been using a curling wand for years and this is not one I would recommend :('], 'author': u'pearlag ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: High Tops Self-Grip Rollers
reviews: {'title': u'volume for short hair is awesome', 'text': [u'I recently cut my hair shorter than expected and it\'s harder for me to get my straight no volume hair to do anything. These work so great for me cause even with my hair short it clings to the rollers. Love them'], 'author': u'comakeuplover ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'These give some volume for sure', 'text': [u'These were new to me and I haven\'t used these self-grip type rollers before (bit of a newbie) and I have really long hair. I followed the instructions however with such long hair I felt like I needed to use the Dry bar clips to hold the big curlers in place (might be just me). They definitely give volume and I will use them again but if you have really long hair like me you may want to clip them?'], 'author': u'neen ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'Doylestown, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'worst buy this far-long thick hair', 'text': [u'I have long hair, it\'s super straight and fine but really thick. I was hoping these would give me volume but they didn\'t and were hard to use. Waste of time to even use them. Maybe once I cut my hair they will work better, but for now I won\'t be wasting my time.'], 'author': u'amber939122 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for Volume!', 'text': [u'These are not meant to curl your hair but rather to add volume! I do a quick blow dry and then put these in while my hair is still warm while I finish dressing and make up. Result is great volume and movement in my hair that lasts till the end of the work day!'], 'author': u'Leighlink ', 'date': [u'2016-05-26'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great once you get the hang of it', 'text': [u'A bit difficult to use at first, you have to make sure your hair is the right degree of damp v. dry and it also has to be hot. Once you get the hang of it though, it gives great volume at the crown and for the pieces of hair framing your face. Not bad for this price, I would recommend it for people who aren\'t roller saavy and just looking for a simple way to boost volume occasionally.'], 'author': u'pandacn ', 'date': [u'2016-05-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'excellent value for the money', 'text': [u'I love the stippling and flat top brushes in this set. I use the flat top to apply foundation and it always makes it look perfect. Stippling is perfect for that light hand you need, my favorite use being to blend my color correcting stuff under my eyes. The angled brush doesn\'t pack enough product in the bristles to be useful for me, but I guess it would work for build-able coverage (if you are patient). For the other brushes in the set it is still worth buying though! There are guides I haven\'t used in here as well if you are new to contouring.'], 'author': u'geektastic ', 'date': [u'2016-06-12'], 'location': u'Fort Lauderdale, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Excellent stippling brush', 'text': [u'I bought this set looking for a stippling brush and the two other brushes were a nice bonus. I got this set after using the Sephora Collection Pro Stippling Brush #44 which shed like crazy. For a comparison between the two stippling brushes: Flatter Yourself is also dense yet lightweight, but it splays less (good for stippling!) and DOES NOT SHED unlike the #44. I enjoy using stippling brushes for liquid foundations and am settling for this set; I do not feel like I need anything else for now. I settled for the Flatter Yourself set after comparing it to MUFE sets, Urban Decay, other Sephora sets, and BareMinerals.', u'None of these brushes have shed, during use and wash. I\'ve had them for about 2 weeks so I might not have lived with them long enough.', u'The hairs are soft enough for their intended use. They don\'t feel scratchy.', u'They are a bit hard to thoroughly clean because they are so dense. Especially the stippling brush because its hairs tend to clump together. ', u'The set includes some stencils which I haven\'t bothered with. Mentioning in my review because the description doesn\'t seem to include them.', u'I like the flat top brush for applying powder to the T zone. For buffing it is too harsh and disrupts my underlying makeup. I like that it has clean, sharp edges so powdering the nose is easier, but still not fool proof because it is a large brush. Its short bristles and high density make it decently stiff. Its head is somewhat oval rather than perfectly round.', u'The most useless brush is the angled brush. Its hairs are too long for smooth powder application. It can apply your blush and contour but it won\'t blend it because there is little control over how much it splays. Its edges are rounded.', u'I won\'t take off a star for the angled brush because overall everything is pretty great quality and I figure that someone out there will like the angled brush for some reason.'], 'author': u'6ixGirl ', 'date': [u'2016-05-17'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'Multipurpose', 'text': [u'I was looking for a powder brush and this brush was suggested by a Sephora employee. reviews: {'title': u'perfect waves', 'text': [u'I am so impressed with how this wand yields the perfect waves. It heats up quickly and is very easy to use, plus, because of the heat, you can curl larger sections of your hair. Love!'], 'author': u'altasparling ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Broke within a week', 'text': [u'I recently bought this curler from the GHD site since it was on sale. I researched many curlers before purchasing this one. It heated up very quickly and was easy to use. I loved the curls it produced but within a week it short circuited. I have been using it as instructed. Unplugging it when not in use. Using the reset button on it before use. And I have been using this in my vanity area that is free from humidity and water. Maybe I received a bad curler... I am waiting on its replacement, but to spend that much money on a curler for it to break within one week of use is incredibly upsetting. Perhaps I\'ll change my review after more time of use with its replacement (if it does not break again). For now I will leave it with a one star review. I am very disappointed.'], 'author': u'Snufflepuffs ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'had high expectations', 'text': [u'I bought this curling iron to replace one that broke on vacation! I knew I wanted a curling iron to give me big curls and hold them all day (and maybe even be able to sleep on my hair and wake up with the curls still in tact). I knew it was possible because my iron that broke was that good! This one is pretty good, it does give me long lasting curls and I can sleep on them without doing much damage. My issues with the iron are: 1. The length of the barrel is really short. I have long hair and it is hard for me to fit the entire length on at one time. 2. The iron is flat-ish to give a more "natural" curl. But I don\'t want a natural curl, I want more of a body wave texture. Those are my only complaints, other than that it is a good iron. It makes cute little beeps when you turn it on and off and it heats up very quickly. And like I said, the curls last forever. I am on the fence about returning it based on the shape of the barrel. If it was a round wand, I would definitely be keeping it.'], 'author': u'ek126504 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This wand makes such natural curls. My hair is already curly and I use it to fill in where my curls have flattened. It heats up within seconds and the unique barrel shape makes curls that blend in and dont look like you used a wand.'], 'author': u'lpcooper ', 'date': [u'2016-05-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best curls!', 'text': [u'I have a ghd flat iron and i can\'t seem to get curls just right so I thought I would try the ghd creative curl wand. I\'m amazed! My hair is very fine and straight and this seems to hold up pretty well with some decent product.'], 'author': u'ErinMacdonald ', 'date': [u'2016-05-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Works for me', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using a MAC eyelash curler for years. I didn\'t really have any complaints, as it was the only one I\'ve ever used. Then I received a gift including a Lanc\xf4me eyelash curler. I have read mixed reviews about the item, and so I really wasn\'t expecting much. To my surprise, it worked better than the MAC eyelash curler I had! I followed the directions (even though I figured after using an eyelash curler for half of my life I would know how to use one), and I didn\'t have to press as hard to get a curl. The curl lasted all day until it was time to wash my face before bed. While I realize this eyelash curler may not work for everyone, all I can say is that it worked great for me. I decided to get rid of my old MAC eyelash curler and purchased another Lanc\xf4me eyelash curler.'], 'author': u'4lecoco ', 'date': [u'2016-02-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Stay All Day® Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner
reviews: {'title': u'Best eyeliner ever', 'text': [u'Love this eyeliner. It goes on easily and stays on all day, without any smudges. The brush tip is tapered so that application is goof-proof. I have to put this on without my glasses and even then I don\'t mess up. I\'ve tried many others and this one is the best.'], 'author': u'Scottysgirl103 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Mixed Feelings', 'text': [u'I have mixed feelings about this eyeliner. Like most people, I have tried many different eyeliners trying to find the one that is easy to apply, dries quickly, long lasting, and looks great.', u'As a bit of background, my eyes are somewhat hooded, more visibility on one eye. I often have difficulty finding an eyeliner that doesn\'t transfer to my eyelid, and this frequently happens with powder and pencil eyeliners.', u'The first time I bought this eyeliner I was impressed. I compare it to Kat Von D\'s Tattoo eyeliner, but with a shorter, better controlled tip. It was with this eyeliner that I perfected my cat eye/wings. As previous reviewers have mentioned, it did dry out somewhat quickly but I attributed this to using it almost everyday. I also found the tip broke apart/disintegrated after some time, making it harder to be as precise as I wanted. However, as I mentioned, this was after considerable use so I didn\'t mind too much. I probably would have given it a 4.5/5.', u'Because I liked this liner so much I repurchased. I had a different experience the second time around. Right at the beginning the applicator was much drier and I needed to shake it a lot before it would apply smoothly. Even with shaking, I had some difficulty and it always felt very dry on my eyelid, to the point where it felt tight. I needed to re-draw the line several times to achieve that dark, inky colour. I also find the cat eye/wings extremely difficult as the tip is so dry I need to redraw and it\'s never as sharp as I would like. I would rate the second purchase a 2.5-3/5 as yes, it dries quickly and lasts all day, but the applicator does not last very long.', u'I\'m not sure if my second purchase was just a bad or old batch, or if this is what it\'s normally like. I am hesitant to buy it again after my last experience. I am giving this a rating of 3 because of the lack of longevity of the applicator. I will perhaps buy it again to give it one more shot and compare it again to Kat Von D\'s Tattoo liner.'], 'author': u'JSKM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'awesome!', 'text': [u'Fav liner in the whole world!!! Stays on all day and i have very oily eye lids but this doesnt even move. name: Génifique Eye Youth Activating Eye Concentrate
reviews: {'title': u'Really loving so far', 'text': [u'I received this as a deluxe sample. I generally only use it in the evening. This is one product that hasn\'t caused me any irritation to my eyes, that is a plus for me. I\'d have to say this is the first one I\'ve tried without any burning or itching. I have noticed that my eyes do look a lot fresher. I have very few tiny lines around the corners of my eyes and this product has made a difference in them. I do plan to purchase the full size as long as it continues to work for me as it has been.'], 'author': u'huskergirl11 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'ok', 'text': [u'No real notable results. Maybe it\'s still too early to tell... 1 week in. I do work 3rd and I have a full schedule. So needless to say it would have to work miracles. But, I feel like otherwise it\'s a good product. I will continue to use it, but, I don\'t know if I will buy anymore at this point. A plus is that my eyes are sensitive and this product does not irritate them!'], 'author': u'MayhemMandy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Moisturizing, Exhilarating', 'text': [u'I got a deluxe sample of this with a liquid eye shimmer thing, so I thought it was a cream eye shadow primer. Didn\'t care for the eye shimmer so I used this alone. My eyes felt instantly awakened. It has a slight cooling effect that just wakes the eyes up. It\'s also very moisturizing, but light; so it absorbs well into the skin. I\'ve been on a dramatic skin care journey for the past 3 years and nothing works over night. This is a great cream. It gives you short term instant "pop", but it\'s so moisturizing that it works great over a period of time. It can be daunting using something everyday and not see instant results, but it took me 3 years to really see results from eye creams. I have combination/problem skin. I used some harsh products to treat my oily/ problem areas, but my dry areas (around my eyes) really suffered. I really like the way my eyes look with this, but since I\'ve been using eye creams in general for a few years, I thought I\'d also offer some advice on how they work on general. My eye areas were so dry and the dryness was causing a lot of lines and flakiness. It takes a while. It doesn\'t happen in sample or even on bottle. Depending on the damage it can take a while.'], 'author': u'sedonah11 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'meh', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using it religiously for the past two weeks and I\'m not noticing any changes in the fine lines around my eyes. I don\'t deal with puffiness, just extremely dark circles and fine lines. I\'m in my mid twenties and I\'m going to use it until my sample is done and update on here. What I like about it is how quickly my skin absorbs it and doesn\'t leave a sticky feeling. It also feels cool on contact which I love. Seems more like a luxury item to me.'], 'author': u'kakidee ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Younger Eyes', 'text': [u'I bought the Eye Youth Activating Cream and was hoping it would deliver on what it promises to do having spent a good amount of money on it. I have to say I wasn\'t disappointed. It definitely absorbs quickly, brightens the skin and helps to hydrated the under eye area for a more youthful appearance.'], 'author': u'TravelRN99 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-25'], 'location': u'Detroit,MI', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Best Mascara, Hands Down', 'text': [u'I\'ve repurchased this mascara on a regular basis for probably 3 or 4 years. This is the only makeup product that I haven\'t felt the need to venture out and try new things because when something really works, why change it?! I\'m constantly surprised that I don\'t hear more people talking about this mascara. name: Advanced Génifique Youth Activating Serum
ingredient: Water,Bifida Ferment Lysate,Glycerin,Alcohol Denat.,Dimethicone,Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid,Ascorbyl Glucoside,Sodium Hyaluronate,Sodium Hydroxide,Sodium Benzoate,Phenoxyethanol,Adenosine,Faex Extract/Yeast Extract/Extrait De Levure,Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate,Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil,Salicyloyl Phytosphingosine,Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide/Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate,Limonene,Xanthan Gum,Caprylyl Glycol,Disodium Edta,Octyldodecanol,Citronellol,Fragrance.
reviews: {'title': u'Slowly seeing changes', 'text': [u'Over the past two years, I have been going thru electrolysis on my chin and upper lip, due to PCOD. While, the hair is gone, the treatments left me with enlarged pores and redness that I was afraid would never go away. They clogged easily and started to leave a lot scarring. I have never had terrible acne. Just occational breakouts, and ingrown hairs from where I had waxed before the treatments. It never resulted in scarring. While having facial hair is embarrassing, the aftermath from electrolysis was just as demeaning. I started using this serum as a sample. Thought I didnt notice immediate results, I did notice that my skins felt great. I use it right after I wash my face in the morning, and put the Clinique gel moisturizer on after. I would just rub my cheek cause it was so soft and smooth. After 3 months, I have noticed a major difference in my scarring. The redness is almost completely gone. I think it has done a lot to help tighten my pores back up. I havent noticed a huge difference in pores elsewhere on my face though. In short, yes I will continue to use this. A little does go a long way, I can cover my entire face and neck with half the amount the dropper fills for you. It absorbes very quickly. It doesnt feel hydrating, but I feel the smoothing effects. FYI, the eye serum from this line is not worth it. Just go with the face serum.'], 'author': u'Ambercu5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wonderful so far!', 'text': [u'I purchased this after receiving a sample size... I love it. It has smoothed the texture of my skin, reduced fine lines, and makes my skin look more radiant. My skin type is combo oily and breakout prone. It seems to have reduced my acne and evened out my tone. 2 weeks in. Not disappointed so far! I will purchase again. A little goes a long way.'], 'author': u'MayhemMandy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Re-texturizes skin', 'text': [u'I did notice significant changes in expression lines (particularly between brows). This product really delivers as far as smoothing your skin, particularly in visible pore areas and under eyes. I would market this more as a "plumper" and "re-texturizer".', u'I really love the way that my skin looks and feels after using Laser FX Perfect Serum. That said, like all Dr. Brandt\'s products, the formulas used really is geared toward more mature skin. If you are under 35 and using any Dr. Brandt\'s products, the amount of moisture (in these products) may actually be too much and cause your skin to react with breakouts.', u'If you are "over" 35 and your skin is going through changes like loss in elasticity and overall volume, Dr. Brandt\'s products offer solutions that work and last.', u'I will re-purchase this product.'], 'author': u'typh22 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-05'], 'location': u'Detroit, MI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}
