{'title': u'Not for me, but still not a bad product', 'text': [u'I needed an eye cream that would treat the few fine lines that have cropped up in recent years, along with dryness around the eye. A sales associate recommended this, and as it came with the new Lancome gel moisturizer, it seemed like a no-brainer.', u'While I love the metal applicator (it cools any puffiness in the morning and is a soothing way to apply), the product just doesn\'t deliver the results I want. It is moisturizing and dries easily, which makes putting makeup on over the serum super easy. But it doesn\'t address any issues with fine lines, nor does my eye area appear brighter. I feel like I bought an expensive moisturizer for my eye with zero benefits.', u'A little does go a long way and even though I use this approximately twice daily, I still have plenty left in the bottle after 8 months of use. That being said, I probably would not purchase again. I would recommend for people who are looking to moisturizer but don\'t have any other concerns to address re: their eyes.'], 'author': u'axel23 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-20'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Crease Brush
reviews: {'title': u'fabulous', 'text': [u'I have had the all over eye brush from hourglass for over a year now and I absolutely love it so when I wanted to find a new crease brush , I decided to go with this one . I have mostly make up forever brushes and they are wonderful but I decided to go ahead and try this one since I love my one hourglass brush so much and I am very happy I did ! this brush works so well ! I\'m super impressed with it ! worth the price for sure !'], 'author': u'jenalisious ', 'date': [u'2016-07-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Truly the best! for my eyes' sake!", 'text': [u'My eyes easily get rashes, sensitive skin from eye brushes and I did not know until I read about how some brush hairs can cause some allergy to skin. So I researched and came across to this recommendation so I splurged just one to test, and this is my first choice to try, and I was so surprised how soft it felt on my eyes, and this crease brush does amazing job to soften the color. I plan to buy more brushes. This does not feel like poking at all like other brushes hair harshly poked my eye skin.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-04-22'], 'location': u'Portland, OR', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Perfect for a soft look', 'text': [u'I love this brush! I use it to build up product in my crease and my outer eye and I think it works amazing! The bristles are very soft but no so soft that you can\'t be precise with the application.'], 'author': u'gennna ', 'date': [u'2016-01-15'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Great', 'text': [u'This is my first "high end" brush and I am not disappointed. It is weighted, beautiful looking, so so soft, you can really feel and see the quality compared to my drugstore brushes. It blends very well and I find I can use this thing for either sweeping shadow all over, or just in the crease. It\'s a good size for being able to perfectly place the shadow on my eye. It is dense and a bit stiffer than my drugstore crease brushes, which means the bristles don\'t splay out when I am blending, this allows for better control. I would definitely not rule out future Hourglass brush purchases based on this one.'], 'author': u'greatbigG ', 'date': [u'2015-12-13'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Average', 'text': [u'I love hourglass products, so I didn\'t think twice about purchasing their brushes. This is an okay brush. I don\'t think it\'s worth the $30 though. It\'s very stiff, but some may be looking for that in a crease brush. It doesn\'t really blend well. It has a nice, sturdy feel to it, where it is heavy in the hand, but not too heavy. I\'m not taking it back, but I wouldn\'t recommend to a friend.'], 'author': u'DaniAdkins ', 'date': [u'2015-11-27'], 'location': u'Fredericktown, Ohio', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: 24K Gold Mask Pure Luxury Lift &  Firm Mask
reviews: {'title': u'Not worth the price', 'text': [u'This mask is okay. I have used it for a month 1-2 times per week without great results. It is goopy and doesn\'t dry before you wash it off.'], 'author': u'LDempsey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hmm', 'text': [u'Woke up with a million white heads. Never again. My dry skin folks, stick to peter thomas algae mask! the best!'], 'author': u'bcm321 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Goopy', 'text': [u'Saw no results- and I used the entire jar over a period of time. Gold is overrated and also known to cause premature wrinkling-it has no skin benefits. I learned this after I used all of this and it\'s true. It is difficult to remove and I learned taking it off with makeup remover wipes and then washing my face with a clarisonic to remove and remaining mask. I love PTR but this was a no go for me. I would recommend the rose stem cell one esp when you cool it in the fridge first!'], 'author': u'cschirner ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'I was not "wowed" by this mask as much as I was anticipating. I bought it in a sample pack along with the other 5 PTR face masks and was looking forward to this one the most. I\'ve used it a few times and although it does make my skin feel refreshed and soft, it did not firm or lift as it states it will. I had my friend try some and she was also disappointed by the mask. Personally, I think the PTR Rose Stem Cell mask is much better for firming and anti-aging, I\'ve seen real results with that mask!'], 'author': u'mykatmolly123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': u'Boston', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not Sephora exclusive', 'text': [u'This mask didn\'t really do anything for my skin but leave it sparkly. It\'s also not Sephora exclusive as the site states.'], 'author': u'sephoradude ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Konjac Cleansing Sponge
reviews: {'title': u'wow', 'text': [u'I love this sponge. I use it EVERY night with my purity cleanser after using the Boscia makeup breakup cleansing oil. My skin is combo dry/oily and let tell you... my skin glows on its own with this routine. I use the sponge which is hard at first and turns to a gel like puddy when wet. After use I clean it and hang it to dry where it becomes semi hard again. I only gave 4 starts because this is supposed to last 3 months and mine is 2 months old and it already looks as if it was dirty and has a tear but then again, I use every night. Will give it one more month and will repurchase.'], 'author': u'prspctvmua ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Never will be without it', 'text': [u'I started using this sponge a few months ago and have since bought a replacement and given it as a gift. I can\'t overstate how much I love this. I consider it a new essential to my morning and evening skin routine. I am a skin fanatic, and I love that it is soft yet exfoliating. Much easier to clean than a Clarisonic and better for the environment, and it feels incredible. Totally sold.'], 'author': u'hifalutin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Southern californis', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Are you over Buf-puf?', 'text': [u'Has your Buf-Puf been too rough? I switched to this sponge and my skin is thanking me for it. Non-irritating but really helps get my skin clean. Be sure to hang it up to dry after use. Beware of squeezing it too hard. It\'s a natural product & will wear out probably faster than most would like but it\'s been great for me. I\'ve gone through 2 in the past year. Sponges that you use everyday will not last forever.'], 'author': u'bbcaddict ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I bought this after reading good reviews. Unfortunately for me it made my cheeks so red after using. It was just too harsh for my skin type. I also didn\'t really feel great about using it, it seemed like it took forever to dry out and I was worried about bacteria build up'], 'author': u'missbee123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'In LOVE!', 'text': [u'Bestie gave me one of these last Christmas and I fell in love with it. I love my cleanser but never had something to apply it with and didn\'t feel my hands were doing the job well. This little sponge thing cleanses well, rinses out well, and lasts a long time! I use it daily and love it.'], 'author': u'ShabbyPoodle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'Wichita, KS', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'favorite concealer brush', 'text': [u'I don\'t necessarily use makeup brushes for what they\'re sold for. I use blush brushes for contour, buffing brushes for light powdering, etc. I use this shadow brush to conceal dark circles right underneath my eyes and it\'s soft bristles are great for smoothing out product. My concealer doesn\'t offer a lot of play time, so as soon as it\'s on, I need to move fast to conceal and blend. With this brush, I find that it can evenly move the product without absorbing it, or sheering it out. It\'s small enough so you can move quickly with your hand when it comes to placing product or blending.'], 'author': u'lcnars ', 'date': [u'2016-04-26'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'not all of them are great...', 'text': [u'Obviously bought this brush for the deal, which means it\'s cheaper than getting individual Sephora brushes of the same kind. DO NOT assume that the ones in their sets will be the same as the individual brushes, there\'s a reason these are cheaper. The worst is the angled liner brush, which won\'t work with any gel liner. The smudge is too messy, and the others are just okay. Literally the same quality as random brushes you can find at a dollar store, but they do the job. Point is, you can find better brushes'], 'author': u'MeeksLouise ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'My skin is not extremely sensitive or anything, but all of these brushes left my eyelid at least a little irritated. reviews: {'title': u'I hate this product', 'text': [u'I hate this product and wish I never bought it. It starts chipping off within 24 hours of applying it until it disappears from your nails. {'title': u'Surprising', 'text': [u'I am really amazed at how well this holds up. I am typing all day at work and taking care of a baby and toddler at night. I do not have to baby this nail polish. It has held up well this past week... seriously there is only minor chips and wear along the edges. What I did not like was how small the applicator handle was. It made it very difficult to apply with my non dominant hand. Also the polish itself was a bit gloopy to put on. At first I decided I was never going to buy it again, but it has held up so well that I already have more in my cart. The Iced Frappe color is not very flattering though with light colored skin. It makes it look like my nails are really cold and slightly bruised.'], 'author': u'AgentaEmme ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love Yummy Mummy', 'text': [u'I didn\'t think I would like this color or brand, but I\'ve had it on now for about 5 days and I love it. I typically think most nail polish is garabage because it doesn\'t wear well on me, but I have no complaints with Butter Yummy Mummy. I would for sure buy more from this brand.'], 'author': u'noyindebbie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'Wyoming, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Nice Coverage', 'text': [u'This polish glides on nicely. It doesn\'t dry quickly because I bought a matte color. I find the pearl polish dries faster for some reason. ', u'The chip factor is so-so. I\'d say it lasts about 5 days if you\'re not really using your hands intensely.'], 'author': u'shoppingdiva ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Virginia', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'amazing quality', 'text': [u'i tried one of these on a whim after finding the perfect shade and i\'m hooked, the quality is so good! can\'t wait to find more colors i like.'], 'author': u'theladyinred ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': u'Boise', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Enamored Hi-Shine Nail Polish
reviews: {'title': u'color not as appears', 'text': [u'Bought Nirvana bc i have been wanting to purchase an army green polish, definitely appears black with 3 coats. My dr at work asked me if it was black. Thank goodness Sephora accepts returns.'], 'author': u'Livelovefashion ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'nope', 'text': [u'The application is super streaky and it started chipping the second day. Tried it twice with and without a gel coat and still not good at all.'], 'author': u'gabzeeee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'the best!', 'text': [u'This is the best nail polish I have ever tried. I\'m a Chanel polish freak, so for me to buy a Marc Jacobs polish or any other brand is a huge "WHAT?" This polish applies beautifully and dries extremely quickly. The packaging is very pretty as well. I got the color Blanche 162 so I can\'t speak for other colors but this one is superb.'], 'author': u'erinnnn101 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not worth it', 'text': [u'I ordered three separate colors of this nail polish (Ultraviolet, Magenta Violet, and Red Sangria), and unfortunately I cannot recommend any of them. The coverage is terrible (it took three coats of the Ultraviolet to get some real color on my nails, and even then the coverage is uneven and/or sheer in spots), and the colors don\'t always match what you see online (the Red Sangria is very different). Save your money and get something else. :/'], 'author': u'jenjenc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Columbus, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'favorite polish', 'text': [u'Just added Lola to my collection of Marc Jacobs polishes and it is the perfect red for me. If only I could find a lipstick in this exact shade! Many reviewers have noted the poor longevity of MJ polishes, but that hasn\'t been a problem for me. I make sure my nails are clean and dry, and use Formula X base coat and top coat with the MJ polish. This gives me about a week of wear, which is the most I can expect since I\'m hard on my hands. Some colors go on a bit streaky but even themselves out before drying. Two coats usually does it, but sometimes three. With the Lola, two coats looks perfect. Soooo many gorgeous colors, so little time. \u2764\ufe0f'], 'author': u'jackiejr ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Choc Pot
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have the white chocolate pot and it takes my bright nail colors off easily & doesn\'t dry ur cuticles or nails out,if u do glitter on ur nails tho, it will be harder to remove. The chocolate scent kills the intensity of the classic Polish remover scent so ur nose will thank you for that! I Also like the small size u can take it anywhere. I do wish they made larger sizes or a refill bottle so I can reuse my pot.'], 'author': u'cammy33 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Product!', 'text': [u'I love this product. Is great on the go, because it removes everything efficiently and fast. I love the smell and it leaves your nails moisturized. Small enough to take in trips.'], 'author': u'minoe ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Works great and I love this scent of this white choc pot. Smells like vanilla.'], 'author': u'ashleighjensen ', 'date': [u'2016-08-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'smells really nice', 'text': [u'they need to make a full-size of this! The mini will give you about 4 - 5 uses before it runs out. But it doesn\'t dry out my nails like acetone, and the smell is important, since a member of my household gets migraines when I use normal polish remover.'], 'author': u'susiecue ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Wichita, KS', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Ombre Nudes Eye Palette
reviews: {'title': u'The perfect nudes palette', 'text': [u'I\'ve worn this eyeshadow almost everyday since I bought that palette. It\'s honestly the perfect for creating a natural smoky eye, and you can make it as dramatic as you like. These shadows are very blendable and look amazing together. You also get plenty of each shade, unlike some other palettes where there\'s a small amount of product. Don\'t know how I lived w/o this before.'], 'author': u'nicolemcf ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Washington, DC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'matte browns, subtle', 'text': [u'It\'s probably my own application of these shadows that\'s causing me to think they\'re subtle. I\'m sure they can be layered more heavily. But I like these for a day-office look. Not too crazy but I can achieve a subtle smokey eye. That\'s perfect for me, actually. I watched a YouTube vid & the woman doing her makeup used this pallette. It was very pretty on her, and I think it\'s pretty on me, as well.'], 'author': u'k10ma ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good', 'text': [u'I love the consistency and feel of these eye shadows (very easy to blend). Also, the case is very pretty. However, as many have already mentioned, the hues of this palette are a little on the cooler side (differs from the picture).'], 'author': u'klajay ', 'date': [u'2016-09-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'The best neutral palette ever. Blends beautifully, perfect range of shadow colors as well. It\'s my go to palette when I\'m traveling'], 'author': u'Amanda6113 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The perfect everyday palette', 'text': [u'I received this beautiful palette as part of a lovely gift from Becca. First, a HUGE thank you to Becca for your generosity and kindness. You\'re truly an amazing company and treat your customers better than any I know! For this and so many reasons I will always support and love Becca. On to the review! This palette is perfect for anyone who loves mattes, prefers neutral shades, who\'s on the go or in a hurry, artists and beginners, teens to glam\'mas(glam grandmas), most skin tones and skin types. It\'s perfect for almost EVERYONE. The rich pigment and velvety formula blends with ease. They\'re all around gorgeous and high quality. I love this palette and it will always hold sentimental meaning to me. I definitely plan to buy ombr\xe9 rouge now that I know how amazing these shadows are.'], 'author': u'stephaniedonna ', 'date': [u'2016-08-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Liner Couture Precision Felt-Tip Eyeliner
reviews: {'title': u'great at first...', 'text': [u'It worked wonderfully the first few times I used it. Very dark. Great line for cat eye. BUT after those first few times..did not work well...did not give a defined line...seemed murky...seemed like it was drying out. Bought last summer. VERY disappointed with such a pricey product. Will NOT buy again and would NOT recommend.'], 'author': u'kl88 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Calligraphic but dried out', 'text': [u'I chose this liner to AVOID the really dark-black glossy look that most liners give these days...I like a big cat eye, which feels too harsh with my pale skin and features in blackest-black. I swatched every liner in store and this was lightest and easy to work with--elegant and lovely, like watercolor Audrey Hepburn in pen form. However, it dried out super quickly (esp. compared to Stila Stay All Day, which I purchased at the same time and used more frequently)... I made it work by re-wetting the tip with water, but eventually a hard crust formed at the tip of the felt and it was like using a dried-out marker to do calligraphy. Not worth it for the price.'], 'author': u'tresj ', 'date': [u'2016-06-06'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'too transparent', 'text': [u'The felt tip is really awesome but it\'s too transparent and watery. I guess just because something is more expensive it doesn\'t mean it going to work for you.'], 'author': u'syd27 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'ehh', 'text': [u'ok so it was nice for a while when I first bought it. very black and lasted all day. but just a few weeks later, it started to take me like 5 coats to make it look black! the pigment totally wore off. pretty much went from jet black to pale grey. takes even longer to put on if I wear eyeshadow! not buying again. need good eyeliner recommendations bc this one is not worth the buy. can\'t believe I spent 35 bucks on this thing! waste!'], 'author': u'salazeri002 ', 'date': [u'2016-02-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Close to perfect', 'text': [u'Bought this eyeliner in brown. It is a true brown and stays put, which I like. The only downfall is the price per ounce. It is the same price as most of its competitors but offers only half as much product. (0,7 ml vs 1,4 ml) But I\'ll continue to buy it because of the color and staying power.'], 'author': u'szymskim ', 'date': [u'2016-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Water, Butylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Charcoal Powder, Beheneth-30, Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Citric Acid, Cellulose Gum, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).

name: LUNA™ mini
reviews: {'title': u'Life changing', 'text': [u'I received this as a gift from my BF. I was having super BAD, BAD break outs randomly and he went to Sephora and asked what they suggested. I was skeptical at first bc I had used a few face cleansing products like this but WOW. I used this and it helped SO fast, made my skin feel amazing, and after a year of using it now I really wonder how tf I ever washed my face before!!! It is worth every penny. I absolutely suggest this to anyone who wants to have a clean feeling face and anyone who is struggling with break outs! It is deep cleaning and really really helps skins. I even noticed a fade in the fine lines on my forehead. I\'m obsessed with this little guy and it stays charged FOR-EVER. Amaaaazing product, if you\'re on the fence just go for it <3.'], 'author': u'amzees ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u"the best thing i've ever used", 'text': [u'this thing is amazing! i had high hopes and i feel like they have finally been met. after a week of use my skin is literally glowing and is more soft than it\'s ever been. my acne is clearing up and my scars are fading. i think this paired with murad has done nothing but wonders for me. i recommend this be used with a good cleanser to really make a difference.'], 'author': u'XXCleoXX ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': u'new york, new york', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Easy to use, but may cause irritation bumps.', 'text': [u'I like using this product because it is not only easy to use, but it\'s much better than using my hands. It rarely ever needs to be charged and its waterproof making me feel at ease. However, due to the fact that I wash my face day and night I have started to get tiny irritation bumps by my chin. If I don\'t use this facial tool as much they start to disappear.'], 'author': u'Kishpeesh ', 'date': [u'2016-10-04'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'use it with creams and serums', 'text': [u'I use my Luna to apply my creams and serums. I use the highest setting to push the formulas deeper into my skin. It feels so nice as well. I noticed such a difference in my skin after switching to the Luna instead of using the tips of my fingers. With the Luna I feel like I\'m getting the most out of my skincare regimen and it feels like I\'m giving myself a professional treatment.'], 'author': u'emilyvangraaf ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'makes a difference', 'text': [u'In your skin! Been using 3 weeks and pores smaller.'], 'author': u'OliveKris ', 'date': [u'2016-09-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'My Favorite Contour', 'text': [u'This received really high praise from the folks at RealBeauty, so I bought it - and have used it down to nothing! I have several "contouring kits", but this, hands down, is my favorite to use for contouring cheeks, forehead, temple, down both sides of my nose and a dab under my bottom lip. I love it so much I\'m onto my second! The color is perfect, it blends in seamlessly. I\'m very fair so it can be really easy to overdue on the color, but I have never had that problem with Becca Lowlight Sculpting Perfector.'], 'author': u'lumplump ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Electric Pressed Pigment Palette
reviews: {'title': u'amazing!', 'text': [u'It\'s a shame they are discontinuing this beauty. So much pigment! I even used this to color my sons hair for crazy hair day. It all blends so well and it\'s just amazing in every way. P.S. this is a pressed pigment palette not an eyeshadow palette so they have to but that warning for a few of the shades. It\'s really only a US thing. Get this while you can!'], 'author': u'Cemeterychicc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bomb!!!', 'text': [u'I absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this palette!! The color payoff is great and the pigmentation is excellent!!'], 'author': u'sjq81 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'New favorite color palette!', 'text': [u'I got this after the markdown, and oh my god this is such a steal. The colors are so beautifully pigmented, they blend easily, and have a great selection. Not to mention the packaging is so pretty and sturdy. I can get a large range of looks with this palette just by using it on its own, not even including how many looks I could get by combining it with others. Some mention that certain colors stain the eyes, I haven\'t had this issue. It may be because I use eye primer and translucent powder before applying eyeshadow, or because I use micellar water to remove my makeup. Either way, I\'ve had no issues.'], 'author': u'Jayt04 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'Just right', 'text': [u'As an African-American woman, I\'m always on the look out for colors that will not only standout against my dark skin but not fade away as the day goes on. I recently bought Urban Decay\'s Naked 2 palette and loved it but found the colors too bland. I wanted something with more pizzazz and this is definitely more pizzazz! It\'s so vibrant and long lasting and really stands out against my skin without even wearing a primer. I\'m a basic girl who just wanted some color and this definitely gave me lots of color!'], 'author': u'CilliaK ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fun and bright', 'text': [u'This is a high quality palette by Urban Decay. On a light skinned girl I\'m afraid to use bright colors, but I\'ve learned to be more adventurous! I\'ve enjoyed everyone and I\'m learning how to blend and coordinate them.'], 'author': u'kmc1002 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Color Control Cushion Compact Broad Spectrum SPF 50+
reviews: {'title': u'Great for dry skin, buildable,', 'text': [u'Love this, have been using it for a couple of years. Dewy finish, buildable coverage, sunscreen actually works. I go between using a brush and my fingers to apply. Too much product gets wasted in the sponge. I also FLIP the cushion in the compact when it seems to be running dry and get several additonal weeks of use out of each compact.'], 'author': u'AnnmarieLawson ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hyrdating', 'text': [u'I love how extremely hydrating this foundation is. I have severely dry skin and was introduced to this foundation over a year ago and have continuously purchased it. The application is nice with the sponge applicator and is somewhat buildable - I would say light to medium coverage (my skin is not acne prone or oily at all). I definitely recommend this product for those with dry skin and looking for a great everyday look. The first ingredient is bamboo sap instead of water so the hydration factor is on point. I really enjoy this foundation.'], 'author': u'AdrienneMarieC ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this Brand', 'text': [u'This is the second product I\'ve purchased and I\'m in love with this makeup. The application feels silkie and soothing.'], 'author': u'JaneOxnaes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Sacramento, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Surprisingly Versatile', 'text': [u'1) YOU GET TWO so $60 isn\'t as bad once you realize you are getting a refill :)2) Smells just like the face wash, which I now use and love. The case is durable, leak proof, travel ready, and feels like it stays clean (by clean I mean sanitary..)3) it does not NEED to be set, however, if you run oily, this is not for you. It will likely run or separate.4) I use this product either as a sunscreen or light foundation in the AM. Sometimes I set it with a little bit of mineral veil or hourglass lighting powder. or I often use it at work after I have run and washed my face to help with my natural flush. It helps just even out my skin tone if I am using just a little. 5) the only reason I did not give it 5 starts is because some of the product seeps out of the cushion and gets wasted around the crevices in the case.'], 'author': u'amgra4 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: bareSkin® Pure Brightening Serum Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 20
reviews: {'title': u'IN LOVE', 'text': [u'Hi from the bareMinerals team! We\u2019re so excited about bareSkin Foundation, and want you to fall in love with it, and have the best experience possible. Maybe we\u2019re biased, but of course we gave it a 5 star rating! The amazing silky serum texture feels weightless on skin, but still covers everything. Vitamin C helps reveal brighter, more even-toned skin, plus there\u2019s Broad Spectrum SPF 20 protection. Shake, Drop, Buff application has become part of our daily makeup routine, and we see best results when we use ONE drop at a time. Oh, and we wanna let you in on a little secret \u2013 always remember to hydrate skin before applying, and sometimes we love a little Mineral Veil dusted on after to keep skin looking fresh even after the busiest of days! xoxo'], 'author': u'becorporate ', 'date': [u'2014-06-09'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love It!', 'text': [u'I love this foundation! It goes on light but the coverage is buildable (you don\'t need to use a lot of product either). I have dry skin, but as long as I moisturize adequately the night before/morning of - my skin loves this foundation! As someone with sensitive skin I love that this foundation has not caused breakouts or irritated my skin! I only give 4 stars because my skin\'s natural glow is dulled by the product - probably the way I am applying it though - and not the product itself (I would prefer a more dewy finish)'], 'author': u'amariemac ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Bowie, MD', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u"don't get it", 'text': [u'I was excited to try this since all the BB creams from Dr.Jart are amazing. But I just don\'t get this product, it is hard to blend, it is even harder to get the product out. I tried to use it with the sponge that comes with the product, tried with beauty blender and a brush. NOTHING works with this product. No coverage at all! I don\'t have so many imperfections to cover up, just a little veins in my cheeks. But it does not cover them at all. Anyway, I\'m going to return it tomorrow, don\'t get it. DONT BUY IT.'], 'author': u'PollyMolly ', 'date': [u'2016-04-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Wish it worked out for me!', 'text': [u'I love the mesh netting of the cushion and how much product it provided when you needed it. The coverage was great and evened my skin tone out nicely. However, this cushion made the pores around and on my nose 90% more visible. They weren\'t visible before and other cushions I\'ve used before did not have this issue. I assumed it was my skin being weird that day, but whenever I applied my BB cake on afterwards, my pores were gone. I would definitely give this 5 stars if I could use the cushion alone without depending on the BB cake.'], 'author': u'drooliiii ', 'date': [u'2016-04-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Lock-It Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'Top Pick!', 'text': [u'I have tried many many foundations. I have very oily skin and I work long 10 hour minimum days.This stuff has great coverage, I have blemishes and black heads and it covers them up nicely. It lasts me most of the day, it wears off in spots by the end of the day but I believe it is caused by my oily concealer. It creases slightly but not more then other foundations. ', u'I recently purchased Make Up Forevers HD foundation. Have to say, I like this one quite a bit more. Regret paying $52 for stinky foundation that doesn\'t have much coverage, when this one is $10 cheaper for a larger bottle and more coverage.'], 'author': u'Mackensweet ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nice- With One Caveat', 'text': [u'A little bit goes a long way. Start by applying the thinnest layer you possibly can because it can get cakey if you\'re not careful. I\'ve got terrible skin. It\'s acne-prone, sensitive, and some products make me break out with dermatitis. This hasn\'t made me break out so far (been using it for a week or so). It stays matte quite well, but I use oil blotting sheets as well to keep my skin matte. I was very impressed with the shades available. I\'ve got anemia-white skin, and this stuff actually matches it. Overall, I\'d buy it again. This container will last a long time, though, seeing as you don\'t need to use a lot of it.'], 'author': u'MizzzLizzzy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'MIlwaukee, WI', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'ok by itself, great when mixed', 'text': [u'This is ok by itself if you want light coverage. The product moves around A LOT. name: bareSkin™ PERFECTING VEIL
reviews: {'title': u"don't waste your money", 'text': [u'Their are sooooo many powders other powders you could choose from. This powder is not smooth it\'s very chalky, and you can see it on your face. Unneeded a powder after my foundation and a rep brought me over and told me to purchase it. Ive used it 10+ times trying all diff types of way. It oxidzies very orange and makes you look like someone through flour on it. Skip this product and do something else'], 'author': u'adrianamorales ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'Oh my god ! This keeps shine At bay for 14 hours. I\'ve had it a week and today, before bedtime, my face looks less shiny than ever. With other products, my face would shine up in one hour. I have very oily t zone, and in the dry prairie winter, I get flaky skin on my cheeks. I use concealer and this powder only during the day. I\'ve tried the Tarte white finishing powder, makeup forever, and clarins, and this is the best by far. Light coverage, awesome shine resistance. No primer. And bonus points, it\'s a compact (I don\'t like loose powders for travelling , they make a mess!). I\'m taking this on vacation to the beach next month to see how well it does with humidity :)'], 'author': u'Em3ly ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Don\'t know if the lighter shade will be too light cause I am latin-kind-of-white so I better stick to transluscent powder :('], 'author': u'alicr ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'no color', 'text': [u'I was neither the lighter color nor the darker color but in between so I returned it. So thankful for returns!!!'], 'author': u'elizas123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: BARESKIN® Complete Coverage Serum Concealer
reviews: {'title': u'Unbelievable!', 'text': [u'I have bought every kind of concealer out there and I have to say this is by far my favorite!!! It does not crease and stays all day after it is set. It also does not give me cake face like a few other concealers I have. I have terrible acne and redness problems, and this concealer covers it all!'], 'author': u'casash88 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bare Skin Concealer', 'text': [u'So I bought this serum concealer last fall and I have normal-oily skin and the only PRO for me was the illumination of the concealer which brightened my under eye area. With that being said, I found this to oxidize like crazy I use Fair and still its a bit orange after it sets. Also, by the end of the day I am so oily on my cheeks, chin and forehead. I am using it up so I can get others. So not my favorite'], 'author': u'chanellelynn ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'OR', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'surprisingly amazing', 'text': [u'Let me start off by saying that I haven\'t been a huge Bare Minerals fan. My best friend works there and gave me this concealer in Golden Medium and Tan and I LOVE them. I have hideous dark scars around my mouth that I use the Tan to cover and I use the Golden Medium to highlight. A little bit goes a long way. It brightens my under eye and has a beautiful finish. Set it with banana powder (or whatever else you use for highlight/setting) and you\'re all set! I highly recommend this. NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer used to be my all time favorite but this is definitely giving NARS a run for their money.'], 'author': u'CupcakePriPri ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'uh finally', 'text': [u'I\'m so faired skinned. And it\'s so hard to find a shade I can contour with for my highlight! Because my whole body is high lighted! Haha but this is a great concealer. A little goes a long way. AND sorry not sorry, you can\'t expect a concealer to not crease if you don\'t bake it. Just saying. It\'s obvious ANY concealer will crease without baking. Don\'t blame the product, blame the user.'], 'author': u'keezey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'So when I first bought this, I really wanted to love it, because I\'m a huge fan of bare minerals.. And when I was first using it I thought it was great, but I started to notice it creases really quickly and doesn\'t stay on long..'], 'author': u'katzy97 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Lock-It Hydrating Primer
reviews: {'title': u'Wonderful Hydrating Primer!', 'text': [u'This is a definite upgrade from her Featherweight Primer. It smells really nice but not strong at all. Kind of like a coconut water scent. It\'s great applied before foundation or even mixed with it before application. Today I mixed half a pump of the primer with a half pump of the Lock-It Tattoo foundation and I had great coverage with a skin like finish. This combo still looked nice when I checked a mirror after 7 hours. Also, it can be mixed with any of her liquid lipsticks to create a cream blush! How cool is that?! For $32 you get a versatile, and effective product that will last for a while. Very Hydrating and keeps full coverage foundations from looking cakey without turning greasy. If I could give this ten thumbs up I would!'], 'author': u'MarissaNewton88 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'My Ride or Die Primer', 'text': [u'This is by far the best primer I have EVER tried. Its hydrating but it WILL NOT leave your face "greasy" feeling or looking. I have combo - oily skin (oily T-Zone) & my face is amazing when I wear this. U only need a pump maybe a pump & half but not much. I have tried a lot of primers and always come back 2 KVD. It makes my face smoother & my foundation lasts all day. I use it with almost ALL my foundations & haven\'t found one yet that it hasn\'t worked well with.'], 'author': u'Picard83 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Super hydrating', 'text': [u'Such a great primer, it really is HYDRATING and it\'s so light. Works great with the KVD foundation (and even better mixed WITH it - watch the video fir tips/tricks).'], 'author': u'irolka ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Pretty Fab', 'text': [u'I really liked this! My foundation just sits so nicely with this primer. The primer is so light and doesn\'t feel sticky or gooey after it\'s been applied. I\'ve always liked the Smashbox Photo Finish primer, but the thick gel gets gooey - the Kat Von D topped it by giving the same hold but not all the goo and weight.'], 'author': u'LadyAlthea ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love love love', 'text': [u'Love this primer! Works great with more heavy fill coverage foundations.'], 'author': u'Amanda79701 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Lock-It Concealer Crème
reviews: {'title': u'Not bad but not the best', 'text': [u'I heard a lot of good things about this concealer, that\'s why I decided to try this one instead of continuing with my nars HG concealer. I like the texture but for some reason it doesn\'t do the job for me.'], 'author': u'Phyffs ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I live for concealer. lol. But really. I originally went in for just concealer because I usually wear concealer alone and no foundation and the coverage is a m a z i n g. I have super sensitive skin and this (nor any of her products) does not make me break out.'], 'author': u'majestichd ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Morganton, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Good but drying', 'text': [u'I really like this but it can get my uder eye skin to look a little dry. Super pigmented, great coverage. Will buy it again. But for the drying part, it get 4 stars.'], 'author': u'LevaM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Long-lasting, full coverage. It lasts even when the rest of my makeup falls victim to my oily face. I use it mostly to cover my acne marks, so I can not comment on creasing under the eye. I have very sensitive, oily skin and this product has not caused any irritation. I would highly recommend going into the store and getting matched for a color, as the way the product looks in the tube is not how it looks on your face. The only reason I didn\'t give 5 stars is because of the applicator. Because of my breakouts, I prefer a product that you can squeeze out as opposed to using an applicator that touches your skin and goes back into the product. I just feel it is less hygenic.'], 'author': u'noteasy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Ft. Lauderdale, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u"Didn't Love", 'text': [u'I was hoping I would love it, but I didn\'t. The coverage was O.K., but it creased on me and it didn\'t last all day. I won\'t be buying it again.'], 'author': u'conceal05 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Lock-It Edge Foundation Brush
reviews: {'title': u'Provides smooth application!', 'text': [u'This brush allows you to use very little of the Kat Von D Lock it Foundation. It provides you with smooth strokes while you notice that foundation evenly glides over your skin. You are able to use minimal foundation. ', u'You can use any foundation with this brush for perfect flawless application. I have mature skin so the foundation makeup glides on and gives a nice flawless filtered application.'], 'author': u'Plymouth1 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'New Hope, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u"Wonderful Brush, I Haven't Put It Down", 'text': [u'This brush is wonderful. It offers a beautiful finish and can get into areas that are hard to reach with a foundation brush. I use it with Kat Von D Foundation and I have used it with drugstore foundations also. It applies both flawlessly. The drugstore foundation didn\'t look as well but I think that has something to do with the formula of foundation, not the brush. I love how you can mix your foundations together with the end of the brush like a paintbrush. It does state to wash the brush after each use which I would recommend anyways with it being a foundation brush but I will say I used it without cleaning and it left my foundation streaky and spotty in places so I would definitely recommend cleaning after each use to get the best results. That\'s the only downside of this brush is cleaning daily but I do the same with my beauty blender so it\'s ok for me.'], 'author': u'Fashionlvr5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Richmond, IN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Great brush', 'text': [u'I love applying liquid foundation with this brush, blends the foundation easily, and not hard to use. I find myself only having to blend foundation in areas in a short amount of time, verses going over areas over again like with a beauty blender or other foundation brush shapes out there. My go to!'], 'author': u'munchknz83 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect', 'text': [u'This is the softness brush I have to put foundation on. I already use Real Techniques and Beauty Blender. Love those too put KVD did an outstanding job. No shedding. I have washed already so still in perfection condition'], 'author': u'TEpp ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Sandusky, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Love This Brush!!', 'text': [u'I don\'t like spending unnecessary money and usually I don\'t splurge on brushes. But THIS BRUSH RIGHT HERE? I don\'t regret buying it at all. It\'s my favorite foundation brush now.'], 'author': u'mssofargone ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Nirvana White Pure Perfume Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Doesnt Last', 'text': [u'Does not last only a few hours then you have to apply again. I dont like reapplying fragrance through out the day.'], 'author': u'terelisa ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Disappointed, but love the fragrance', 'text': [u'Not happy with this. As soon as you put it on, the fragrance is gone. Does not last at all! This is my favorite fragrance, but I won\'t buy this fragrance oil. I don\'t even like strong fragrances, but this is like wearing no fragrance at all! I\'ll have to stick with the rollerball or the full bottle of fragrance.'], 'author': u'clemmy12 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'Vineland, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'OK As A Fragranced Hair Treatment.', 'text': [u'I love the sent. I also own this in the EdP. I love scented oils.That said, this scent does not last on the body. It is not strongly scented, even out of the bottle. I feel that for the price, it should have a stronger scent. It fades on the skin within a couple hours. I decided to use it on the ends of my hair because my usual oil was in another room. I have long hair and used a couple drops to tame and smooth the ends. Worked like a charm and it left my hair softly scented for about 6 hours. I expect more than 6 hours for the price.I love the fragrance but am very disappointed in longevity.I see there are reviews claiming longevity so I wonder if some of us just got a bad batch.'], 'author': u'GanjaJane ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': u'Binghamton, New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Lovely', 'text': [u'I love this fragrance, it\'s a light, fresh floral, but not powdery. Every time I wear it I catch myself taking a deep breath in wanton, olfactory heaven. I use this in conjunction with the eau de parfum to prolong, and intensify the fragrance. It\'s also nice in the hair, without the alcohol found in sprays, which can dry out hair.'], 'author': u'aBluestocking ', 'date': [u'2016-06-20'], 'location': u'Ontario', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u"Nice smell but doesn't last", 'text': [u'I wanted to love this oil cause oils usually last on the skin, this only lasted about 4 hours. I was one sad panda.'], 'author': u'ssarah ', 'date': [u'2016-05-03'], 'location': u'BC Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Nirvana Black Pure Perfume Oil
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'This is the first fragrance I have been excited about in awhile! I normally get queasy at scent of vanilla infused fragrances but the blend of sandalwood and musk make this work. I really thought there was an essence of patchouli in it. It is a perfect balance between feminine and masculine. The scent lasted through my 5 mile run and leaves a soft musky layer as you wear it throughout the day.It is a warm fragrance with a bit of spice.I will definitely purchase this again when I run out.'], 'author': u'studioknyc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Smells like NOthing', 'text': [u'Don\'t normally write reviews, but I feel ripped off. I have the rollerball and the dry shampoo, and I love the scent. I wear sandalwood (one note, or with a lil\' patchouli). However, I paid $35 for this oil and it smells like nothing Maybe, if we right enough reviews they will improve the product. THIS IS NO WHERE NEAR "PURE" OIL!'], 'author': u'jbmb007 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': u'Merced, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Not long lasting', 'text': [u'I am in love with this scent, be it the oil or the perfume, but the fragrance is really short lived on my skin. I wish the company would do something to make this a long lasting fragrance, that is the only thing keeping me from naming this my signature scent!'], 'author': u'amethystrose ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Scent is non-existent', 'text': [u'The scent lasts for 20 minutes. If you\'re a fan of this perfume, which I definitely am, don\'t waste money on the oil. It lasts MUCH longer.'], 'author': u'kaylizmoore ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'smells great', 'text': [u'I\'m a guy and I love to wear this scent. Get tons of compliments.'], 'author': u'woof586 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: No Lipstick Lipstick SPF 15
reviews: {'title': u'drying on me', 'text': [u'Love the color and shine, but it\'s drying on my already very dry lips, even on top of balm, even with gloss on top.'], 'author': u'amb40 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Where are the other colors?', 'text': [u'Love, love, absolutely love No Lipstick Lipstick. I only wish there were more color options. Last year I bought The Gift of Perfection kit with two additional colors -- a berry and a nude -- and have been waiting for Perricone to make these available for purchase. Please, please consider adding to the No Lipstick Lipstick color palette!'], 'author': u'AlohaBee ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Unexpectedly Awesome', 'text': [u'So, I popped into Sephora to pick up a "natural" lip color, whether it be a balm, gloss, or lipstick. The guest service was friendly and agreeable, and then she suggested this! I was hesitant because I saw that it was a lipstick and was hoping for something lighter, I suppose. She had me try it on my hand and suggested walking around the store a bit. I was surprised with its light texture and how flattering the natural pink was! Bonus, super moisturizing and SPF 15. Perfect for every day natural or to do the dark eye, nude lip as well.'], 'author': u'Christine426 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Santa Ana, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'love this', 'text': [u'Yes, finally a lip balm with no chemical spf. Chemical spf irritates and dries my lips. This product looks and feels good. No drying or irritation.'], 'author': u'Nikkinik1 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Everything Fresh wishes their lipsticks were', 'text': [u'I found a holiday gift set of three of these for $59 in a store. They\'re everything Fresh\'s Sugar Lip Treatments want to be without the goopy fail. This set included nude, original rose, and berry. They\'re natural appearing lip balms. The smell and feel are great. Moisturizing and pretty long lasting for a balm.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Nirvana White
reviews: {'title': u'unique and musky without being old ladyish', 'text': [u'Bought this simply because I needed a new rollerball perfume. {'title': u'loud', 'text': [u'This is my least favorite out of the Nirvana scents. I was surprised as I really like musks. The opening is really loud and generic, but it does dry down into something very pretty. It reminds me of Barbie perfume or something nostalgic to childhood. It\'s not bad--just isn\'t quite right for me. (The rose and black are my favorite if that helps and I prefer skin scents so I use roller balls.)'], 'author': u'victoriarita ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I smell like a sophisticated flower', 'text': [u'honestly this scent kind of reminds me of Happy by Clinique, although they are not really similar. it\'s a bit dark but still has a hint of flower which i love! this is the first perfume that i\'ve gotten compliments on by passersby (which is usually great and not creepy at all)'], 'author': u'jezza47 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'It took me some time to decide on what perfume I wanted. This is definitely a good choice. I like it better than the black one. The scent stays on me pretty much all day.'], 'author': u'HEasley ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'clean scent', 'text': [u'I found that this perfume made me smell clean and fresh Vs. Floral despite of it being advertised as such. The scent did last on me about 6hrs before I had to reapply later in the afternoon to go out. I also got asked a lot by my fellow coworkers what scent I was wearing and if they could spritz some on when I brought it into work. I would say this scent was great purchase.'], 'author': u'tofuhippie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Nirvana White Rollerball
reviews: {'title': u'Smells Gooooodddd', 'text': [u'Okay, this stuff smells amazing. And is so easy to apply. And the container can live in my purse. I like that.There are those who claim it doesn\'t last long, and there is some truth there. It doesn\'t last all day. You will need to reapply once a day. But then again, you need to reapply nearly every good perfume at least once a day so there\'s nothing strange there. Note: just because you can\'t smell the perfume on yourself doesn\'t mean others can\'t... you get used to it.'], 'author': u'OlgiaLikesFood ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'BEST dry shampoo ever!', 'text': [u'I have tried them all at Sephora, while they are all good, this hands down is the best! I wash my hair Monday morning then I spray it in my hair before I go to bed so my hair doesn\'t have a chance to get oily overnight. Tuesday and Wednesday morning I just lightly blow dry my hair to restyle and it looks just as pretty as Monday\'s fresh wash, but better and more volume each day! Now I only wash my color treated, blond hair twice a week! I can\'t say enough great things about this dry shampoo! Get it! You won\'t regret it!!!!'], 'author': u'knoxrocks ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'So i bought this because a beauty vlogger i watch raved about this. I LOVE this!! I smelled the perfume first, and didn\'t love it but i enjoyed it so i though i\'d give this a try. (P.s. this is a dry shampoo of the perfume... don\'t be foolish and buy this thinking it won\'t smell like it. that\'s why this was made.. duh..) anyways, the smell can be little strong at first, but turns more subtle after a couple mins. but i love it because it did a really good job of taking away the oil in my hair and the scent lasted all day. not an in your face kind of scent but you would catch the scent when turning quickly or moving your hair, etc.. ', u'i have dark brown hair that was dyed lighter but my roots are growing in so you can definitely tell if dry shampoos didn\'t absorb all the oil out. the price tag was hefty but i save it for special occasions or when i want to smell extra good, head to toe!'], 'author': u'julie817 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'must have!', 'text': [u'This is the third time repurchasing this. I love it! Doesnt leave that buildup residue feeling ive had with other products. My roots are brunette and although it may look like white cast ar first once you shake your roots it blends in seamlessly leaving hair non greasy with extra body. Love the scent although maybe im used to it now but its barely noticeable for me. Lets me go 3-4 days without washing, which is great for my ombre/belayage blonde coloring.'], 'author': u'drlilmama ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Nirvana Black
reviews: {'title': u'THE Definition of a Sexy Perfume.', 'text': [u'I\'ve always been a vanilla kinda girl, but this.. I have nothing that even remotely smells like this or have I smelled anything that smells like this. When I first put the rollerball on.. I bought it because of my dedication to vanilla scents... but never really picked it up again.. but I gave it another shot and maybe it\'s the changing season (to Fall, my fave.. I\'m basic. Whatever). I LOVE IT. Purchased the 1.7 mL bottle ASAP. It\'s so intriguing and sexy and strong. This scent exudes sexiness and dries down to a comforting creamy vanilla. Literally.. it\'s like rolling around in the softest cashmere blanket in front of a fireplace with your man/woman with sweet nothings being whispered into your ear. It\'s heaven. Plus, the bottle is freaking CUTE. It stands out on my dresser of glass bottles.'], 'author': u'BrianaMae ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Staten Island, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Heavenly', 'text': [u'I smelled Nirvana Black for the first time from a magazine insert. As soon as I smelled it I knew I had to have it. Nirvana Black has got to be one of the most Heavenly fragrances I have ever had the pleasure of experiencing.. Since my purchase (which was 2 days after my first sniff from the insert) Nirvana Black has become one of my everyday fragrances.'], 'author': u'loverofperfumes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A little Disppointed in the lasting power', 'text': [u'Nirvana Black is a pretty, sexy and sensual scent all in one. HOWEVER, for the price, I was ver disappointed in it\'s lack of lasting power. It does not last long at all. After an hour the scent is nonexistent. I have to carry the bottle in my purse so that i can reapply throughout the day.'], 'author': u'CityBelle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'pretty and spicy', 'text': [u'I was surprised by how much I liked this. I never gravitate toward scents with vanilla in them. {'title': u'Tip For A Mess Free Spray', 'text': [u'I have purchased this product a number of times. I really like it as my hair is very fine. ', u'I used it right before going to work and my hair looked worst. It looked oiler, i didnt even see powder, my hair just felt wet. I had to quickly wash my hair and ran late to work because i couldnt leave my house with this product on. I immediately returned it. ', u'The only good thing about this product was the smell.'], 'author': u'lilimystique ', 'date': [u'2016-08-07'], 'location': u'NYC, New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'NOT transluscent!!', 'text': [u'I bought this because I like to use dry shampoo to add a little texture to my very flat hair. So it didn\'t bother me it was a little tacky. However, it made my black hair completely white with one spray! It wasn\'t buildup.. it was the first time I used it. I tried it on my daughters lighter brown hair holding it further away from her head and I could still see the white powdery residue. It doesn\'t brush out either. I also didn\'t like the smell either. I purchased the mango cocunut, which smelled nothing like mango or coconuts. Glad I just bought the travel size! I have a bunch of Alterna products that I LOVE, this just isn\'t one of them! Still on the hunt for a better dry shampoo...'], 'author': u'alwaysChic ', 'date': [u'2016-06-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Prêt-à-Powder
ingredient: -Montmorillonite: A natural clay that absorbs oil to dry cleanse.
reviews: {'title': u'Great Dry Shampoo', 'text': [u'I\'m pretty impressed. I\'ve used most drug-store brand dry shampoos and end up looking dandruffy and feeling very oily and stiff. Prior to trying this I was using Oscar Blandi pronto dry shampoo, and it was pretty good. Upon finishing the bottle and it being sold out I decided to try this B&B Pret-a-powder. ', u'I\'m kind of torn what I like better; straight powder or spray. Some benefits of the powder are you can put it exactly where you want it and rub it in. I wash my hair every other day (before bed) and I use this the days I don\'t wash. I find it most effective to use it before I go to bed on no-wash days and rub it in. When I wake up it\'s been really worked into my scalp with no residue left in my brown hair. I don\'t usually have to do any touch-ups. ', u'My hair is quite fine, limp and oily. Prior to using this I had to wash my hair every single day, so this truly has changed my hair care routine. ', u'This stuff IS expensive but boy does it last. I bought the travel size nearly 6 months ago and I still have a considerable amount left. You really don\'t need that much, I sprinkle some along my part, at the crown, and around my temples/ears. ', u'I recently bought the Living Proof perfect hair day dry shampoo to compare. I like the easiness of the spray of the the Living Proof, but it always makes me feel like I have product in my hair that\'s built up around the roots. Perhaps that\'s just the nature of spray dry shampoo. This B&B feels much more natural in my hair. ', u'I\'d recommend anyone with oily, fine hair to give this a shot. Try the travel size to see if it\'s for you, it definitely lasts!'], 'author': u'JSKM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great Product!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried a few (3+) different dry shampoos, and this is at the top of my list. I originally got a sample bottle in a Bumble and Bumble kit. I had to come back and buy the full size! I haven\'t run out of my sample yet, but I didn\'t want to risk being without it. I use this as a dry shampoo in between hair washes. Since I have (unnatural) blonge hair (ombre), I don\'t like washing my hair every day to prevent drying it out. This product combats my oily roots from 2-3 days of not washing my hair! Masks it perfectly and has a nice light scent.'], 'author': u'mnruiz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Brampton, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'very nice!', 'text': [u'I tried ouai and dry bar and other drug stores\' dry shampoo and this one is best so far. And since it\'s powder it looks like it\'s gonna last forever.'], 'author': u'Moonlightchild ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: No Bronzer Bronzer SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Must Have', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried so many different foundations, colors, formulations,etc. but could never get the right color or tone to match my natural color. It\'s always either too light, too yellow, too dark, but this little magic dropper is amazing. A little goes a long way, I just add a few drops to my foundation and mix it. It blends in perfectly. The only downside is that you have to shake the bottle before you use it for some reason the formulation tends to separate and also the bottle is small but like I said it all depends on how much you use. It really gives you control of your color for any skin tone. name: Passionflower & Argan Dry Oil Broad Spectrum SPF 50
reviews: {'title': u'Probably works but super-greasy', 'text': [u'Likes - SPF 50, seems hydrating, seems to provide sun protection, smells fineDidn\'t Like - super-greasy (I had a shiny face until well into the afternoon every day) but if you use make up over it, maybe it\'s okay; packaging was terrible (the pump bottle broke before using even 1/3 of it), also, so oily that it dissolved the lettering/graphics on the bottle (which is a little scary)Verdict - will not buy again'], 'author': u'uncspark ', 'date': [u'2016-07-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'great product...but its packaging sucks', 'text': [u'My skin LOVES this product & cannot live without it... I\'ve tried so many others SPF and this is the one that does it for me. What I really dislike about it is the packaging. The bottle is made of a really thin plastic that breaks easily. Buying again though.'], 'author': u'luisam ', 'date': [u'2016-07-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good and Improvements could be made', 'text': [u'The spray itself is quite versatile so I decided to make a full-on purchase after using all of the sample from 2015 edition of Sephora\'s Sun Safety kit. The sample version seemed more useful, however. In the full-size version, the sprayer itself is lacking in quality; as another viewer has noted. My bottle\'s plastic collar around the top is crooked; not allowing the twist on sprayer to be properly seated. The spray comes out messy. For $45 the container could be better designed. The contents are great-- it\'s a nice oil to be sprayed on before makeup application or after. It\'s a very effective sunscreen so I would still recommend it. Maybe transfer the oil to a better spray bottle...'], 'author': u'SassyKitty ', 'date': [u'2016-05-08'], 'location': u'Miami, Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Misleading', 'text': [u'I am incredibly disappointed in the omission of a key ingredient in this sunscreen in the description here on this page. I specifically bought this because I believed that it did not contain AVOBENZONE, seeing as how it is not on the ingredients list, but it is in fact in this sunscreen. I do not use avobenzone, and I refuse to put this on my skin. Do some research about this ingredient, and you won\'t want to use it either. Frustrated that I now have to go out of my way to return it. Ingredient lists are important and should be thorough so we can make an informed decision about what we purchase.'], 'author': u'deboratron ', 'date': [u'2016-04-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'The sprayer on the travel size bottles I received is horrible. This is great for dry to very dry skin as it appears to be somewhat oil based. {'title': u'Perfect Lipstick', 'text': [u'A perfect lipstick. This "pink in Paris" #13 shade is beautiful and so flattering on my light, yellow undertoned coloring. It goes on smooth with more color than I expected. The shine is pretty and my dry lips are so comfortable. It\'s even quite lasting. I don\'t have to put Carmex on first or add gloss after: it\'s perfect in itself alone.I am now done with liquid lipsticks - I went through that faze and all the rigmarole it entailed with lip balm and liner,etc. And the inescapable chapped lips from it. I may even have to get "nude in private" now I\'m so impressed. Costly, but no extra steps or products. I pop this in my purse and "c\'est ca"!'], 'author': u'JosetteDP ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Florida', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Great lipstick?', 'text': [u'It looks gorgeous and really natural. It is perfect for that naturally-pretty-and-healthy-lips look (if applied once, but you can make it "more" opaque if you layer it). It feels really smooth and it is not too oily or glossy or heavy. The formula is great and the color is great, it slightly tints your lips so that is another plus!But, I did not give it 5 stars because it does wear off quickly and it does transfer easily. Though it wears off nicely (not patchy or in any ugly way), it just constantly requires reapplication. And it is completely gone once you eat.. So you end up using quite a bit of product quickly. BUT IT IS SO PRETTY.'], 'author': u'hys051698 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Baby Doll Kiss & Blush Lips & Cheeks
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'When I first got this I thought it was going to be drying and disappear from my lips but to my surprise it doesn\'t dry my lips it stays on for so long and it feels wet and moisturizing every time I rub my lips together. It does smell like the saint Laureates signature mango perfume but I really enjoy it. It works so amazing on the cheeks too it blends gorgeously and easily even with the finger tips.'], 'author': u'lilgoddess ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'if i could give this more stars i would', 'text': [u'HOLY ***L. I don\'t write reviews, I read them, but I don\'t write them, unless I want everyone to know. THIS IS A GODSEND. I have had to stop using eyeliner as much, because I got diagnosed with autoimmune problems in my eye glands. They were my guilty pleasure, my go to beauty staple. So, I had to find something else, and changed to lipsticks as my go to. but this was like opening a whole can of worms- there was so much to learn, like eyeliners- certain shapes of eyes, or skin types are deciding factors in what works. I hate gel liner. I also learned I hate most matte liquid lipsticks. I LOVE the look of matte, but they are usually so drying. THIS, this is a stain that covers the lips like BUTTER, but isn\'t shiny- which is my dream. I will be buying any color that works with my olive complexion. I just bought the nude, and now the prune. THEY ARE AMAZINGGGG,'], 'author': u'treesaw84 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'washington, dc', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'perfect', 'text': [u'I have two different shades and they are perfect pairing with Urban Decay lip liner. I have not used the product for my cheeks but use almost daily on my lips. I pair them with different lip liner shades and they blend perfectly.'], 'author': u'ssirna ', 'date': [u'2016-09-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Beautiful Color & Silky Texture', 'text': [u'Nude Insolent is the most beautiful color I have ever used on my lips! It is an added bonus that I can use it as a blush especially when traveling. The texture is silky smooth and the semi matte formula looks beautiful on my aging lips. It does not seem to moisturize my lips but it does not dry them out which MOST lip products do. I just wish it would last longer (then it would be the ultimate lip product)!!! It is expensive especially if you are reapplying a lot on your lips like I do, but I will continue to purchase because I do not care if the product works well.'], 'author': u'lisarae68 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-02'], 'location': u'Anchorage, AK', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This product in shade 09 is my hands down favorite blush. I just swipe a bit onto a stippling brush and apply it for the most natural looking flush. It lasts all day, keeps me from looking like the walking dead, doesn\'t stick to dry patches, and is just the perfect rosy shade for my porcelain skin. It smells lovely as well, which is a bonus.I don\'t love it as a lip color, it\'s close to my natural lip color but just a smidge lighter. As with other lip/cheek products it feels a bit chalky on the lips, and this one can easily look cakey - might just be the color! However as I bought this to use as blush, this doesn\'t bother me.It\'s stupid expensive, but I\'ve had it for nearly 2 years, using it about 5x a week for the first year and 2-3x for the second, and I am still not out of product. I\'ll 100% repurchase it when the time comes. and probably buy a lifetime supply should it be discontinued.'], 'author': u'betwnthecheats ', 'date': [u'2016-08-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}
