reviews: {'title': u'This is my third', 'text': [u'I used to use L\'occitain\'s day cream with SPF 15, but it is no longer available in the US.I have tried many samples from various makers and I finally found this.It has higher SPF, the smell is not too strong and not too drying or oily. I will be using this cream till discontinued.'], 'author': u'umisoba ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Pittsburgh PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'love this', 'text': [u'Great scent, texture and longevity. It takes me back in years and protects my future face.'], 'author': u'Flowerfaery ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'I am in my early 40\'s and have very oily skin. This is the ONLY moisturizer I have ever used that prevents the terrible, embarrassing shine. If you use too much it will leave a white film but you\'ll quickly learn the proper amount and it\'s not a lot. If you touch your face you can feel it on there but as I said, I don\'t have that awful shine with this product and my skin gets proper hydration plus spf protection. I couldn\'t live won\'t out this.'], 'author': u'momstyle7 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'leaves white casting', 'text': [u'This moisturiser leaves a white cast on your face, and it doesn\'t disappear for a while. It\'s also very fragrant. I open it and smell it when I miss my grandmum. This has a matte moisturiser, with the smallest amount of slip to it. It\'s almost like it doesn\'t want to blend and soak into your skin. It doesn\'t adhere makeup well. I never have any problems with makeup coming off during the day until I used this. It makes my normal skin feel dry, but with a sheen of grease overtop. Hopefully you have better luck with it.'], 'author': u'LaurelKo ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'finally a non greasy SPF!', 'text': [u'I got a sample jar of this product and expected it to be greasy because of the pasty texture, but once I put it on it dries to a velvety finish, and my face wasn\'t greasy at all even after a few hours! I don\'t wear make up so this is the only product on my face during the day. Very convenient. Will purchase the full size as soon as I run out.'], 'author': u'riverm ', 'date': [u'2016-09-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Pro Full Coverage Airbrush #53
reviews: {'title': u'Magical', 'text': [u'You won\'t regret buying this brush. It really is magical, and so worth the money. I use it with Sephora\'s 10 HR Wear Perfection foundation, and it looks flawless.'], 'author': u'bluemoon23 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'Silver Spring, MD', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'The Best', 'text': [u'The best brush I\'ve ever used. Makes even the thickest full coverage foundations blend perfectly and FAST! I have very dry skin but this brush still blends beautifully!'], 'author': u'CCzero ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': u'Sacramento, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Best Brush Ever', 'text': [u'I asked a lady a Sephora for an easy, everyday foundation brush and I am so glad I purchased it. In my opinion it\'s easier and leaves a better finish than the beauty blender! I will say using water based formulas is best for maintaining the shape and quality. Very thick or tacky formulas tend to clump the hair more quickly.'], 'author': u'GigiSky316 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'better than beauty blender!', 'text': [u'I adore my beauty blender and keep 2 on hand. But I recently got the MUFE Water Blend foundation and the BB does NOT work for that at all. I went to my local store and the MUA showed me this brush- I\'ve used it twice and it\'s perfect for the foundation. I thought it was a little expensive, but it\'s worth it. And I know from previous experiences Sephora brushes last forever if you take care of them!'], 'author': u'lyndsey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'Colorado', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'FAVORITE', 'text': [u'This brush is everything. I used to hate wearing foundation because it was a pain to apply, and it seemed to take forever. This brush makes foundation so easy to apply, and it looks perfect. HIGHLY recommend this brush!'], 'author': u'hannahhabeeb ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'Champaign, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: CC Cream Daily Correct Broad Spectrum SPF 35+ Sunscreen
reviews: {'title': u'Good color, but thick', 'text': [u'The color is spot-on (I\'m fair skinned, and often have a difficult time finding a CC Cream that isn\'t too dark or too light). But it\'s much thicker than I expected, and provides nearly full coverage. It isn\'t oily, which was perfect for this past summer. But I was looking for something a bit more sheer and light.'], 'author': u'AudieG ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Baltimore, MD', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this coverage', 'text': [u'I\'ve had serious acne with pcos and this actually covers without looking cakes. Yes, it\'s thick, but unfortunately for some, it\'s required to get full coverage. My face feels moisturized and some days, I don\'t have to follow up with powder. My favorite!'], 'author': u'ClariSATX ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it..', 'text': [u'Have been using it for years. Found it covers but not heavily and looks natural. I still look out for other foundations & cc creams but have not found one better for my complexion and ease in application.'], 'author': u'tzz48 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Hopewell, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not great', 'text': [u'I wanted something I could put on quickly and easily before running a quick errand so I didn\'t scare small children. I don\'t always want to go through all the effort of my usual routine. This didn\'t work at all. I frightened a toddler and 2 babies while out. It\'s more like a tinted moisturizer. I saw very little difference.'], 'author': u'branje ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Goop is the word...', 'text': [u'With so many positive reviews I thought this could be a real solution. I felt like I was tugging at my skin to apply and the coverage wasn\'t great. Sent it back without thinking twice.'], 'author': u'newenglandgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'Feeding Hills, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Propanediol, Dimethicone, Iron Oxides, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Sodium Chloride, Mica, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Titanium Dioxide, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Silica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Tetrasodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Chondrus Crispus Extract, Methylisothiazolinone, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate.

name: Diorskin Airflash Spray Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'airbrush finish', 'text': [u'Not sure why some people have a tantrum over the price of this considering you get 2.3oz for $78 vs 1oz of many other foundations for over $40, sometimes over $50. Great deal for a great foundation! I love to play with makeup and have a few foundation types and this is one of my favorites if I want full coverage but less of a cakey finish like my hourglass vanish stick typically gives (which is ok for nighttime cause no one notices lol!). It is not good to use for oily skin but if I prime properly and use my mattifying serum it is good to go all day!'], 'author': u'sbstremb ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"break outs and doesn't last", 'text': [u'I wanted to LOVE this foundation since it has such a beautiful finish but it only last me a few hrs even my Dior nude BB cream lasted longer. On top of that, it is pricey and it broke me out like crazy.'], 'author': u'shanabura ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'I was on the fence about this product until I went into store and tested it out! It\'s easy to use and flawless and buildable. Never have I gotten so many compliments on my skin. I spray on a foundation brush and just apply that way also no mess! Buy it worth the money'], 'author': u'glebegal ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'absolutely love this', 'text': [u'I never write reviews but I had to for this. I had been wanting to purchase this for years but the price was just a bit high for me. Finally wanting to try something different I caved and bought this on sept 9, 2016. I use it 5 days of the week, when I work, and on the weekends if I\'m going out. So I would say in average I\'m using it at least 6 days a week. I still have soooo much left in the can. I don\'t need a lot of coverage. I\'m blessed with good skin and I don\'t like a lot of foundation. I like my skin t show through. This product is perfect for someone like me. My face looks airbrushed yet natural and luminous. It lasts all day!! Even through workouts and sweat. I am so in love with this that I will continue to buy. Now if you need more than sheer to light coverage, this won\'t last you long. Maybe a month or so, so it can be pricey. I take my foundation brush, and I spray one small spray for each side of my face and one for my forehead area. That\'s it. And it\'s been a month and a half and I still have so much left in the can. Either way, it\'s worth it.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'yaaasssss!!!', 'text': [u'I would give up eating for this foundation. I have 5 shades & wear one or two everyday. The compliments never stop coming.'], 'author': u'Glitterpantz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: -Ultra-Fine Diffusion Technology: Gives the texture an extraordinarily fine quality.-Mother of Pearl Pigments: Even skintone, diminish the appearance of skin irregularities, and diffuse light for a flawless complexion.

name: Camera Ready BB Cream SPF 35
reviews: {'title': u'Mehhh', 'text': [u'Sometimes it looks good but almost every single time it looks super cakey. Not a huge fan of this bb cream'], 'author': u'ardelozano ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my fav', 'text': [u'I have oily skin that tends to shine through everything. When I pair this with the Nars crystal powder my face stays the perfect amount between shiny and matte. I really like this over an actual foundation because it is so light on your skin but manages to give it an even tone as well. This product will always be a go-to for me!'], 'author': u'j3nners ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'BB Cream', 'text': [u'When I think of cream, I feel it should be thicker. Smashbox BB Cream is very thin almost like applying water and the coverage fades within an hour of application. I have use different BB creams and all have a thicker consistency and the coverage last for hours. I will not purchase this product again. Not only was this product way over price, it doesn\'t work the as advertised....'], 'author': u'DanaAshley ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Clermont, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I Like...', 'text': [u'For what it\'s intended for I love it. I don\'t like to wear lots of makeup daily so this product gives me exactly what I was looking for for daily use...I would suggest trying it ouy in the store to sre how you like it after a few hours...then making the purchase...it isnt for everyone especially if you ate use to wearing makeup daily.'], 'author': u'shan22 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'orange', 'text': [u'Makes me look extremly orange!!!!! absolutely no coverage and way to thick, not worth the money at all..'], 'author': u'lexisss ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Total Cover Cream Foundation
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'At first I felt that this foundation was so greasy for my dry skin. However, the key to making this foundation look nice is skin prep before the makeup (wash your face with cleanser/exfoliater, toner, then primer). Let your primer fully set into the skin, then apply the foundation with a brush or beauty blender. Also, after applying your make up, set with a good setting powder n setting spray.'], 'author': u'browngyal96 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Hated this at first, now it's a staple", 'text': [u'I adore this foundation. I\'ve been using it for the past few weeks and at first I hated it; it was thick and seemed to just slide around on my face. With a little experimentation I can now say that I love it. It is extremely pigmented so with my initial applications I was using far too much product. I can use it as a full face or just a concealer and I always seal with with some loose powder and setting spray. Since it is so creamy, if I don\'t really set it, it tends to want to move around through out the day. My skin is actually clearing up a lot and with my super sensitive skin, I\'m having no breakouts from this product. Highly recommended if you have troubled or sensitive skin, maybe not if you\'re prone to be very oily however.'], 'author': u'CBearCunningham ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Madison, Wi', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Awesome coverage and colour match!', 'text': [u'I have a very hard time finding a true neutral pale colour. This works so well for my skin and it doesn`t break me out and lasts a long time. Good wear, great colour match and awesome finish. Worth a try if you are hard to match, especially in the lighter tones and need to cover up any red/dark spots.'], 'author': u'RicksWalk ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect for covering up acne!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this foundation for years know and can\'t say enough good things about it. ', u'It\'s extremely heavy coverage, so if you\'re looking for something more lightweight, this is not the product for you. ', u'However, if you\'ve searched high and low to cover pimples, scars, discoloration, redness, etc. ... look NO further. ', u'This product is simply amazing and there are so many different shades to choose from. ', u'The secret is to buy a lighter tone that matches your complexion and a darker one that adds a bit of color. I happen to have more fair skin, but getting a shade or two darker helped make my bronzer look more natural. ', u'Do not use the sponge they provide at the bottom ... buy a foundation brush! It\'s truly the only way to apply this for maximum results. ', u'The only thing that bothers me is that my face tends to get oily half way through the day, but it\'s completely manageable and normally happens in the summer, which is to be expected.'], 'author': u'VIBeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, California', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Beautiful, But Be Warned...', 'text': [u'I have a very oily t-zone and normal skin around my face and this foundation did not get greasy and stays put unless you touch it. No matter what I did (and believe me, I tried everything) it always came off when I (gently) rested my chin on my hand or whenever I hugged someone. The result is GORGEOUS and makes your skin look really healthy, but it is definitely not transfer proof. It is buildable, lightweight, gives good coverage and doesn\'t oxidize. It also blends out really nice and has a nice range of tones (I\'m N10, pretty much the lightest one, where\'s my ghostie fam at?!). I would try to get a sample before buying just so you can see if it works for you!'], 'author': u'MONTANSTR ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Silica, Synthetic Beeswax, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba, Cire de carnauba), Squalane, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprate, Triacontanyl PVP, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Tocopherol, Tribehenin, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Bisabolol, Phytosphingosine, Ethyl Linoleate, Ethyl Linolenate, Ceramide NG, PEG-10 Phytosterol, Ethyl Oleate, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Triethoxycaprylylsilane (+/-) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288).

name: Immaculate® Liquid Powder Foundation Mattifying Oil Free
reviews: {'title': u'My go to foundation', 'text': [u'I love this foundation. I have combination skin so I always struggle with foundations. They are always too dry or too dewy. This one is PERFECT! I don\'t even have to set it. It is that good. Now people are always telling me about how amazing my skin looks. I love it!'], 'author': u'LevaM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Oxidized like crazy!', 'text': [u'I couldn\'t even use this. I bought the Ivory shade and when trying to apply with fingers or a brush, the foundation would immediately separate and leave behind a bright orange color on my fingers or brush and the remaining foundation would not blend at all on my face. I had high hopes as it performed well when sampled in store. Please make sure to check the quality of your bottle, not sure if this applies to all or if it was just the Ivory color, but I bought two bottles with no luck!'], 'author': u'jenna ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Go to Summer Foundation', 'text': [u'This is my go to summer foundation, when my skin is at it\'s oiliest and most tan. It\'s long wearing and I don\'t have to blot the oil spots on my T-zone as much during a night out. ', u'Have to put it on quick since it dries so fast. Would probably agree with other people that the pump could be improved (product often dries in the pump, so I end up squirting it all over when I try to hard to get it out). ', u'However, I can\'t use this product during the winter. It looks way to chalky on my skin and harder to blend.'], 'author': u'Ricola ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'good product', 'text': [u'This by far is the best matte foundation I have ever used. It stays on for hours, my T-zone still gets oily but not as much with this foundation! Cons: 1. Pricey2. Very hard to blend because it dries fast. 3. You will use lots of pumps on your face because it dries fast & hard to blend. 4. Not the best coverage. 5. Since the bottle isn\'t see through you can\'t see how much you have used. 6. After a few hrs the foundation dissolves around my nose.'], 'author': u'biancag7111 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best Yet, but pricey', 'text': [u'I have bad acne and like this product because it gives me good coverage for a decent amount of time. This product lasts longer than any other I\'ve tried, and doesn\'t exaggerate my dry skin. There is a problem with the pump, and it gets stuck, so that\'s very annoying. Nevertheless, great product, will continue to use!'], 'author': u'KennedyB ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: All Day Luminous Weightless Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'NARS foundation', 'text': [u'I really do not think this product is meant for dry skin. Feels like it made my skin drier. This is the thinnest foundation I have ever used in my life. It took 3 pumps to cover my entire face when other foundations usually only take 1. it\'s is very runny, the consistency feels like water. It is definitely not worth buying for the high price tag.'], 'author': u'koffi ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'in love', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this foundation for around 6 months and I\'m not even a little bit disappointed. I have oily skin and whenever I use it, I don\'t feel like it\'s too much for my skin. Plus, it covers pretty well any "imperfection" on my face... I think I\'ll never use another foundation ever.'], 'author': u'cocosofia ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Like it in general, but find it a bit cakey and its super liquidy. Great coverage but not too sure if I would buy it again. Turns a bit too oily at one point of wearing it.'], 'author': u'melicolombiana ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfection', 'text': [u'I purchased this product 2 weeks ago and I must say that it is perfect I have naturally oily/combination skin and this foundation works perfectly for me. A little goes a long way. My 3 year old broke the glass bottle though and it all poured out. It\'s so good that I\'m actully going to purchase another one today. I\'m very picky when it comes to foundation and before this I was a Lanc\xf4me only user. This foundation has made me fall in love all over again.'], 'author': u'tushaundrabeaut ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'On my 3rd bottle', 'text': [u'I really love this foundation I\'m on my 3rd bottle at the moment. I had difficulty opening my bottle and it spilled evrywhere which was unfortunate, anyways this foundation applies like butter, it\'s perfect.'], 'author': u'Sarahnity97 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Dimethicone, Water, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Glycerin, Boron Nitride, Propanediol, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol Crosspolymer, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Isostearic Acid, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Decyl Isostearate, Isododecane, Bis-Hydroxyethoxypropyl Dimethicone/Peg-2 Soyamine/Ipdi Copolymer, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates/Polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Isostearyl Isostearate, Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Polysilicone-2, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)].

name: 8 HR Mattifying Compact Foundation
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have to say I hate this power Foundation it\'s horrible it made my face look so ashy and the color that I\'m in is ebony.'], 'author': u'rehana50 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'skeptical but ADORE!', 'text': [u'when i told the girl at sephora that i wanted something that i could build coverage with and she handed me this, i was beyond skeptical about it, especially for the price.After having her match me and apply it, i was sold!This has become my go to and my all time favorite compact!Cannot go on with my day without this baby!Really recommend!'], 'author': u'LostBeautyGuru ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'salinas, ca', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'my new favorite!!', 'text': [u'This is by far my favorite powder foundation out right now. After my last favorite was discontinued, it took me FOREVER to find something with the right amount of coverage for me, and this is totally it! I don\'t find it cakey at all. The only thing I can say if that I don\'t like the shape of the sponge. I prefer a rectangle, but I still love it!!'], 'author': u'dandj0923 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'cakey', 'text': [u'I only bought it because it was on sale, it was a shade to dark, but it was also very cakey'], 'author': u'vshantell ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my first Sephora review lol', 'text': [u'I got the porcelain shade about a month ago and it\'s the perfect shade for me - I\'ve tried the lightest shade power compact from Benefit, Lanc\xf4me, Armani etc. and this is the best one so far. So I bought another three for backup in case it\'s discontinued. And it\'s way cheaper than many other brands. The shade is perfect, not too yellow or pink whatsoever and it\'s very fine milled. However I never use the sponge that comes with it and I always use a flat bottom kakubi brush instead. You can barely see the powder after applying- it only leaves your skin look flawless and it lasts all day. It looks even better towards the end of the day as it mixes better with the skin. You do need to have your skin well moisturized before using though as with other powders.'], 'author': u'chemisgood ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Full Coverage Foundation SPF 15
reviews: {'title': u'Nice!', 'text': [u'I love that this foundation actually matches my pale skin perfectly. (Thank you to the lady who matched me!) This foundation is nice and matte, I have to make sure my face is well moisturized before hand and it lasts for a log time (I use primer too). The only thing I don\'t like is that I have a hard time getting really full coverage on some of my red spots and if I don\'t set it really well my pores come through on my nose. I attribute these things to not having the right color correcting concealer, applying too much product on my nose, and using a buffing brush to apply instead of a flat foundation brush or sponge. Really great foundation overall though!'], 'author': u'ellenthemermaid ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The best foundation ever!!!', 'text': [u'I just love it with no reason, oh actually yes with thousands of reason, good coverage with light wearing, I bought my 1st Tarte foundation a month ago and I cant help myself in buying my second one today, im combination with t zone oily and this foundation keep whole day matt without any crakey, I used to use Estee L & YSL but Im happy to have tarte with me now, first time to buy the same foundation in a month and without any discount, if u are thinking have it or not have it I will definately reconmended you to buy 1 to try, you will love it :)'], 'author': u'Vandee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Favorite!', 'text': [u'I got this foundation 2 weeks ago and I have been using it everyday. I love the way it feels on my skin and it is a dream to apply.'], 'author': u'Audililla ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m not sure why this got such good reviews. It is thick and pasty which makes it hard to blend. It feels exactly what you would imagine clay on your face feels like. Despite being thick it does not give good coverage. Even after a few layers I could see redness showing through. I have oily combination skin and at the end of the day my t zone was very oily and my cheeks were flaky. It also gathered in my fine lines. Basically everything you don\'t want a foundation to do.'], 'author': u'Webz512 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good But Not Great', 'text': [u'The color of this foundation matched my skin perfectly, but the formula was very thick and a lot like a paste. I also have oily skin and this foundation did not help at all. name: Silk Crème Moisturizing Photo Edition Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'Pretty not Amazing', 'text': [u'I wear the shade pecan and I have found that this is a very pretty color but the formula it\'s self has a really nice natural finish. I have dry skin but sometimes I feel that the formula can transfer very easily. I have tried to set this with the Laura Mercier powder which helps but this is never going to be a transfer proof formula. This is better if it\'s used in cooler less humid weather.'], 'author': u'misst1028 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Beautiful finish', 'text': [u'I have dehydrated skin that tends to get shiny during the day. I also have a fairly strict skincare regime which, when coupled with this foundation, lasts all day and keeps my skin balanced and healthy. This melts into the skin and allows enough time between application and setting to blend in cream blush and concealer with my fingers. You don\'t need much - the coverage is brilliant. Works beautifully with the hourglass powders. More moisturizing and creamy than the LM Candleglow foundation, but both are absolutely stunning and give you that "I\'ve slept for 12 hours, drank 2L of water and now having a good skin day" look. I can see how normal and drier/dehydrated skin types (or girls who just want a flawless complexion) would absolutely relish this :)Also, the tube may feel empty but it seems to become heavier after shaking it well, which they recommend you do before application.'], 'author': u'BrokeUniStudent ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'Alberta', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'best foundation ever', 'text': [u'So I bought this foundation 2 weeks ago and I feel like I\'ve been wasting my life not using this product. Last year I switched from Bare Minerals to the Laura Mercier powder foundation and loved it. But I\'m getting older and I need more moisture in my foundation so I figured it was time to switch back to liquid. Oh my god this stuff is amazing. I have combination skin so oil free tend to be to dry and regular tends to be to oily. This is just right. It wears beautifully all day long. Even after a hardcore sweat session at the gym. I\'ve been experimenting with which primer works best, thus far I\'ve like UD beauty Balm (not really a primer) but they go really well together. Anyways amazing product, moisturizing, amazing surface tension, doesn\'t crack or bead, just flawless.'], 'author': u'bear423 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'pretty foundation', 'text': [u'I used this foundation for about a week and I do like it but the color range is weird and I feel like I am not wearing my perfect shade and there really isn\'t one that is best for me. I warm it up with bronzer, so not too bad. This is a medium to full coverage foundation but I can see how this can look cakey if too much product is applied or you don\'t prep well. I have dry skin. This also looks better after its on a few hours. Lasts about 6-7 hrs before I start getting a little shiny in my t zone. Not sure I would repurchase.'], 'author': u'sammy1019 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: AcaiFusion Lip Balm Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Not tinted, left white residue', 'text': [u'I liked this stuff at first because it\'s moisturizing and it\'s nice to have something that has SPF protection without a weird aftertaste or feel. But mine isn\'t tinted at all, even in the tube it\'s completely clear. Also, I took it on a trip to Puerto Rico and reapplied a few times one day and then saw in the restroom that I had thick gooey white stuff stuck to my lips! It was really gross looking and I had no idea! So it\'s probably fine if you wipe away everything and then reapply, but it\'s not good for obsessive SPF reappliers like me.'], 'author': u'sbucha004 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': u'NY, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Great for the pool! Squeeze tube doesn\'t allow it to melt all over your bag. {'title': u'I love this!', 'text': [u'This works great at protecting and healing my lips! I love that it has sunscreen in it. I think this may have a scent but its light so I barely notice that part of it. It does add a very light sheen to the lips so is not a matte effect. However, it is not super shiny at all. Its great for everyday use. I felt it hydrated my lips quite well. I like the packaging also.'], 'author': u'wickedlollipop ', 'date': [u'2016-09-13'], 'location': u'USA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

It looks tinted in the tube, but it doesn\'t show up as tinted on your lips, which I like and the SPF is great.'], 'author': u'DaniMia ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Sunnyvale, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'great spf lip product', 'text': [u'I have had a hard time finding a sunscreen for my lips. Most have a noticeable flavor or leave a nasty after taste in my mouth. name: Naked Skin Weightless Ultra Definition Liquid Makeup
reviews: {'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'I love this foundation because it is very light on the skin but hides all the imperfections very well. {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have difficult skin - it\'s sensitive yet oily. But smells like foundation (nothing terrible) but if you have a sensitive nose you will notice it. I wish they did the exact same formula without any smell. Also, I have to set it with my Laura Mercier setting powder or if does transfer to things like the screen of my phone when I make a call, and it\'s hard to clean from the screen, I\'m sure it would transfer on clothes too so set it. I hope this was useful!'], 'author': u'LuciaMusic ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Teint Infusion Ethereal Natural Finish Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'Great long lasting foundation', 'text': [u'I bought this foundation on sale and online to qualify for free shipping and boy am I ever happy that I bought this. I have been struggling with foundation for a while. I have skin that doesn\'t require heavy coverage but found the lighter coverage wasn\'t doing it anymore for me as I am getting older. I tried this foundation and found it had good coverage and lasted a really long time, I even went to hot yoga and found my foundation perfectly in place at the end of the class.'], 'author': u'Anchors8199 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Edmonton, Alberta', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

Cover FX really does the job, it\'s a great concealer: it covers dark areas, it brightens and it stays put for about 8 hours. The only thing is make sure you moisturize your skin well before applying it, it makes a huge difference.'], 'author': u'Yukiyumi ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Montreal', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'best spot concealer', 'text': [u'First, people need to do a little more research when looking for new products. Concealers can be multi-functional. You need to ask yourself what you want your concealer to do for you. You can spot correct, highlight (going a shade or two lighter), contour (going a shade or two deeper), use as a base your foundation, color correct, and the list goes on. This product is the best spot concealer I\'ve used, and that is what this formula is meant to do. It\'s not meant to conceal dark circles or highlight and contour. A lot of reviews, for those who did not like it, said it looked really cakey and creased on them. That\'s because this product wasn\'t intended to be used that way. I feel people often complain about cosmetic or beauty products not living up to its claims, when in reality, they\'re just not using it in the way the company formulated it.'], 'author': u'jcakbeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Best I've Tried So Far!", 'text': [u'I require sunscreen in just about everything as it\'s the least expensive and most effective way of preventing aging. I have very dry hands and put lotion on constantly. This takes just a minute to soak in and then it truly feels like nothing is on my skin - I just have soft hands. The scent is wonderful, but not overpowering, and it fades in a couple of minutes anyway. The only way this could be better is if it was infused with some sort of Vitamin C or other anti-aging product for an extra kick. I did a little research on the skin benefits of Sea Buckthorn, and one of the benefits is that it helps with acne. I\'m the type of person who is constantly touching my face, so it\'s good to know this hand cream will not cause any breakouts. I\'ve been using it for a few weeks now while at work and am noticing a huge difference. Definitely a repurchase!'], 'author': u'megnh ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing Brush', 'text': [u'I keep trying to upgrade my go to make up brush, a Sonia Kashuk one that I got a Target **SIX** YEARS AGO. I suppose "don\'t fix it if it ain\'t broke," but I was always convinced there was a brush out there that could do better than my already good SK one. I\'ve tried maybe 5 brushes, and while they all still stick around in my makeup bag, I rarely use them. None of them were particularly bad, but didn\'t improve my my makeup routine well enough to eliminate my tried and true SK brush. Along came Dior...this brush is pretty incredible. Aside from being beautifully made, this brush is study and I don\'t feel like I\'ll find any of the bristles on my face after my makeup application. It\'s supple and not too firm, allowing for great blending and stippling action. The bristles are very soft and full, and glide effortlessly on my face. Great to use for foundation and also works well with concealer, it\'s a great brush that makes up for price in durability and versatility. While I haven\'t banished my SK completely, I definitely look forward to using this one.'], 'author': u'cheyneromero ', 'date': [u'2016-02-27'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'Awful Quality', 'text': [u'I bought this brush about 6 months ago and loved how soft it was and the finish it gave. One little problem was that a few bristles would fall out every time I used it. I didn\'t think anything of it at the time. However, it slowly started shedding more and more hair as I used it. Eventually the bristles started falling out in huge chunks, and I couldn\'t do my makeup without being covered in hair. It is now horribly misshaped, and unusable. If I pay $38 for a brush, I expect it to not completely fall apart after such a short time of usage. {'title': None, 'text': [u'First off, anyone using these for full-face foundation missed the point - these are MINI sponges for MINI jobs! Concealer, color correction, under eye correctors or creams, serums you may only apply in a couple spots, etc... that being said, when used for their actual purpose, they\'re awesome. ', u'I was a little hesitant because 90% of beautyblender "dupes" never expand with water, and they\'re hard against skin and difficult to work with. However, these little sponges DO expand, and they are very soft - honestly, probably the closest I\'ve ever come to feeling a true competitor for the micro bb. I don\'t know how Sephora\'s big makeup sponges compare to these little guys, but if they performed the same way, I\'d honestly, probably, replace my bb. ', u'I use these for blending under eye concealer, blending out streaks in my foundation from the brush, color correction, and packing on some extra foundation over the really stubbornly red areas on my cheeks. Started carrying one around in my makeup bag to help touch up makeup during the day. I\'m very impressed by the quality, and once they\'re wet, they expand a bit and become much easier to work with. Would repurchase, do recommend, will probably be giving as stocking stuffers this year.'], 'author': u'sjamgoc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Rehoboth Beach, DE', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: All Nighter Liquid Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'Pleasantly Surprised', 'text': [u'I\'m honestly shocked by the amount of negativity this foundation is getting. I got color matched at my local Sephora and got a sample of shade 6 and I was told by the worker that this foundation oxidizes which is why I got .5 shades lighter, and I was also told by her to use a brush rather than a beauty blender. I fell in love with the product after using it for about a week and a half. It smoothed my skin down so well, helped so much with my oiliness and covered up all my blemishes and didn\'t crease as much as my Tarte foundation did. I purchased it after I used up my sample and even though the foundation oxidized, it wasn\'t a huge difference in tone or color. I think this foundation would be really great for people with very oily skin like me.'], 'author': u'lowtus ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'My favorite foundation at the moment, great coverage lasts all day!'], 'author': u'prettybabe ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Meh...', 'text': [u'I wanted to love this foundation but it\'s just .. okay. I find that it builds up around my nose and breaks down where I get oily (even with a primer and setting spray / powder). It stays on flawlessly where I\'m not oily but I have used this for a month now and find the same result no matter what I do. It does oxidize but that\'s okay. It goes on smoothly and applies really well. I wish it didn\'t break down so easily though. If I touch my face even a little bit you can tell. So disappointed. I love full coverage and this is FULL COVERAGE .. I just don\'t feel like it wears very well.'], 'author': u'JayceeMarie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Long-Lasting Full Coverage', 'text': [u'There are a lot of negative reviews on this foundation, and being a semi-sensitive, mostly dry with oily T-zone, prone to hormonal breakouts skin type I want to clear a few things up about this product. I personally really enjoy this foundation, and only have it 4 stars because I don\'t need a full coverage look for daily wear. However, if you buy this product there are KEY things you need to be aware of and steps you need to take in order to get the best use out of it, especially if this will be your go-to daily foundation. It IS possible to get a flawless look with this and it looks amazing when you do!', u'The first thing to note is this is a FULL COVERAGE foundation - if you like to see more of your own skin coming through, you\'re better off going with a CC/BB or other medium to light coverage products. However, if you like a full coverage look that mimics the look of your natural skin, or if you\'re like me and don\'t like using a ton of products to achieve a flawless face (foundation + concealer + powder, etc.) then give this a try. A Sephora consultant adivised me NOT to use a powder on top, not even to set, but rather use a setting a spray. I agree with her advice - DO NOT use a powder on top of this product, or if you do, do so very sparingly and only on your nose/T-Zone. Putting a powder on top of this foundation will give you that caked-on look we\'re all trying to avoid. I personally use a beauty blender to blend this product, in SMALL amounts as you really will only need about 1 pump for the whole face. I then set it with the UD setting spray. No issues with cakieness for me and lasts all day! ', u'Because this is a full coverage LONG LASTING makeup, in order to avoid breakouts you absolutely need to be sure you keep up with exfoliating and THOROUGHLY cleanse you skin! I know this is not true for all past reviewers, but I have a feeling some only use their hands and a gentle cleanser to clean their skin. This will not remove this product alone, and therefore will cause breakouts due to clogged pores. To remove this, I use a cleansing water with cotton pads first, then go in with a gentle exfoliating cleanser (I use Kate Somerville\'s ExfoliKate daily cleanser), with a Clarisonic. I\'m not saying you need to have these products to use this foundation, but if you\'re going to go for a full coverage products, especially one that claims to literally last all night, you best be sure to fully remove it before bed! Also be sure to moisturize like crazy - this will prevent dryness and the product settling into fine lines. I don\'t personally use a primer with this, but a hydrating one may help! ', u'This product DOES oxidize like most reviewers have said. I am typically a light-to medium shade with warm undertones, but in this foundation and after oxidizing the shade that was perfect for me actually had light pink undertones, which never happens for me. Because of this I definitely recommend having a Sephora consultant color match you, or purchase a half shade lighter than you might normally. Other than that, this foundation really does last all day, and with proper steps before and after application I really do get the most flawless and natural-looking airbrushed skin! I know this review was really really long but I hope it helps some of you using and/or considering buying this product - I definitely recommend it for full-coverage lovers and those wanting it for events/nights out!'], 'author': u'courtneyleeh ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Clogging', 'text': [u'This was an extremely heavy foundation. Made pores look bigger and it caked up. Also created A LOT of blackheads on my nose, my chin has one HUGE pimple and 5 smaller ones and my forehead as tons of little bumps. I will be returning it. Immediate creasing as well.'], 'author': u'amber8175 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Birmingham, AL', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'A new must-have', 'text': [u'This super dense, super soft brush does what my fingers can\'t do: apply concealer to the inner corners of my eye so seamlessly that it should be called The Eraser Brush. I dip the bristles into my Lancome concealer and very gently buff it into my inner eye. Dark circles (lack of sleep, not hereditary) vanish. The concealer doesn\'t cake, slip, or smear; it just buffs into the skin like magic. I also feel that because the brush offers such great control, it\'s more gentle on the delicate eye skin than my finger. This brush not only works like a dream, but it feels very luxurious in hand. By far, my best purchase in a long time.'], 'author': u'DJMama ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'Western MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

Maybe a different type of eye shadow brush, applying spot treatments on acne spots/beauty marks.'], 'author': u'megpar ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': u'Portland, OR', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'amazing, at first', 'text': [u'I REALLY loved this brush. It was good for maybe the first few uses. Unfortunately, because of its density it catches dust and other things between the bristles that are hard to remove. Worst of all, product gets stuck underneath the surface of the bristles, clumping it up. I guess it\'s fine if you want to shampoo after every use, but personally I like the ability to dry clean my brushes which you cannot do with this one. Furthermore, it\'s really awkward to use as a concealer brush.', u'Keep in mind that I found this brush to be amazing and never wanted to leave a negative review, but after less than a month of having it I can\'t bring myself to continue loving it.'], 'author': u'merrylinkle ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'First thought it was dumb but totally wrong!', 'text': [u'I thought the sound of it and the look online looked like any domed brush. Well, I was so freakin\' wrong. I bought it on a whim just to see if this was stupid but honestly this really does work. I apply my Algenist color correcting fluid for my under eyes with this and I like it a lot! Real precision and it actually didn\'t really absorb much of the product. I know it\'s pricey but I seriously went in thinking this sounded like a stupid product. Worth it.'], 'author': u'NasumeMaya ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Bright Future Gel Serum Concealer
reviews: {'title': u'DRIES OUT YOUR SKIN! Be careful', 'text': [u'This was recommended by one of the experts in the stores as no-crease, easy coverage. However, while the brightness is great, it creases instantly and continues to for the rest of the day. It also takes a couple coat. I have never had dry skin or any problems with skin, but after using this for several weeks (note: i never used concealer prior) I have noticed under both my eyes in the same spot and same size these VERY dry flakey patches of skin. I am going to stop using it immediately and see if it improves. I use a good moisturizer but even that doesn\'t help. Be careful if you use this it might dry you out.'], 'author': u'myfavissephora ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Illusion® Hyaluronic Skin Tint
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing Foundation', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this foundation with a purchase and when I tried it I noticed how thick and luminous it was and how my skin looked younger afterward. This wasn\'t the right shade for me so I hit Sephora at Tysons and was helped by a sales associate there to find my correct shade. It looked fantastic! I also bought the primer and the powder. This is a brand I never heard of before I received the sample. It is now my new best friend. You will love how it covers flaws and illuminates your skin. I am over 60 and this gives me my dewy younger complexion - the way it used to be in my 20s. It is so worth the price.'], 'author': u'mostgirlicious ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Arlington, VA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Love, love, love this foundation!', 'text': [u'I tried this foundation in a sample first and fell in love! I had to buy the full size. I can\'t believe how great the coverage is for a skin "tint". I have combination/oily skin so it\'s a bit dewy for me at times, but with a translucent powder I can keep that in check. The color is great for my odd skin tone (fair but not too pink, not too yellow, a little tan without orange) and it makes my skin feel great. It may just be my imagination, but it also seems to help my acne-prone, scarred complexion.'], 'author': u'KinaT ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Freeport, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: 24/7 Concealer Pencil
reviews: {'title': u'My go-to!', 'text': [u'I simply love this concealer! I\'ve been using it for about two years now and I can\'t find a concealer that competes. It\'s got a creamy formula and goes well with Urban Decay\'s lightweight liquid foundation or just by itself. It has moderate coverage but is buildable if need be. I normally set it with loose translucent powder but it\'s not necessary. Blends well and is good for a natural look.'], 'author': u'Mercy816 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Best blemish concealer I've ever used", 'text': [u'I have tried a half dozen concealers this last year and this is by far the best I\'ve found for covering blemishes. I purchased the NSA color, which oddly is marked as being for medium to deep skin, which I am not. I have light skin that tans easily. It matches my skin tone perfectly, regardless.', u'I used this today to cover a blemish. I set it with a light dusting of powder and it lasted until I took it off 13 hours later. It truly erased all signs of the red spot which was incredible to me. I used it sparingly around my eyes as well and I didn\'t notice any creasing at all.I\'m not too happy that it\'s a pencil I\'ll have to sharpen because that will waste product, but based on what I\'ve seen so far I\'ll continue to buy this so I can confidently erase my hormonal blemishes.'], 'author': u'in1268 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Indianapolis, IN', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Advanced Anti-Aging Eye Cream Broad Spectrum Sunscreen SPF 37
reviews: {'title': u'36 With No Crows Feet - Thanks, Supergoop!', 'text': [u'I like to put two layers of eye cream on because my skin is so dry, so I will put a retinol eye cream as layer 1 and the Supergoop a couple of minutes later as layer 2. I think SPF is the best thing you can do for your skin in terms of preventing aging, so I really love this cream. I don\'t use the applicator; I just tap it in with my ring finger, and I go all around they eye all the way up to the eyebrow down to the top of my cheekbones from the bridge of my nose out to my temples. It blends well with the other serums, creams, and makeup I wear on a daily basis (I\'m a ten step Korean skincare junkie, so there is a lot of stuff going on my skin every day). It doesn\'t have a weird residue and it doesn\'t ball up or pill when I layer items over it. I highly recommend an SPF eye cream to everyone, and this one is great!'], 'author': u'megnh ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great eye cream', 'text': [u'My eyes really look better with this. The fine lines are improved and my eyes do look brighter. It\'s not a miracle worker, but that\'s not why I bought it. ', u'I knocked off one star because the applicator is a bit tricky to learn to use, but otherwise I\'m really happy with this stuff!'], 'author': u'modernclio ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Bright Future Color Correctors
reviews: {'title': u'Bad Dark Circles', 'text': [u'I LOVE THIS SO MUCH. For the past year, I\'ve been searching for a color corrector that\'ll help me with my bad hereditary dark circles. Tried orange and yellow by LA girl and they did nothing. I have oily under eyes so I knew using a cream product would be a creasy mess. This product corrects my dark circles so nicely, and if I really wanted to, I could wear it alone and just set it with powder. I found that using the right shade of concealer definitely helps with canceling out my dark circles. I\'m a very tanned brown girl and this corrector is good enough for my skin tone. If you are darker, I recommend a darker peach, orange or red. It took me a while to figure out what works so I hope the best for you!'], 'author': u'myasn ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Naked Skin One & Done Hybrid Complexion Perfector
reviews: {'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'I\'ve bought this a few times now and really like how it feels on my skin and how it looks!'], 'author': u'Alycatt312 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not impressed', 'text': [u'I wanted to love this product sooo much because I loooove UD and I looooove their Naked skin foundation (seriously, I\'ve used 3 bottles since discovering it). I really wanted it because it\'s supposed to be like a tinted moisturizer for normal/combo/oily skin, and the majority of tinted moisturizers have a dewy finish that I don\'t like. This product has a thick texture and feels very difficult to blend out. It\'s streaky with a flat top kabuki brush and my fingers, and patchy when using a beauty blender. As it\'s setting, it gets kind of tacky and that\'s when it starts getting more and more streaky/patchy. I\'ve tried it with and without primer, but my pores are accentuated without a pore filling primer. I had to use a TON of product to get it to look even. The finish is a nice demi/satin matte and coverage is pretty light. It lasted prob 5-6 hours on my skin before it crept into my fine smile lines if I didn\'t bake translucent on my smile lines. This is a common problem for me, so I\'m not too disappointed in that aspect. Shade range is kind of odd... I\'m an NC40-42 and a 6 in the Naked foundation (a little light but oxidizes to match me perfectly) and I got the shade medium. Some of the lighter colors look orange-ish. Overall, this product is really difficult to work with and I say you should try a sample first. I already returned this product. Sad.'], 'author': u'nh0028 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: City Sunscreen Serum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Better on no makeup days', 'text': [u'I really like this serum. Good SPF And very light texture. No white cast. I don\'t like runny SPFs and this has a nice creamy texture. Great if you\'re looking for something with hydration which SPFs don\'t usually have. ', u'I do feel like my makeup pilled a bit when this is underneath. ', u'I tend to return products unless I\'m really happy with them and this is a keeper.'], 'author': u'gotarheels ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Washington DC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'not for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'like most sunscreens, I found this to be too harsh for my skin.'], 'author': u'hallesmom ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Grand Junction', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'light weight = works', 'text': [u'I was amazed, totally exceeded my expectations, best is to just stop by the store and try it out to actually feel the difference or order it if u don\'t totally love it you can always return it ', u'I BET YOU WONT RETURN IT'], 'author': u'Sylvia0828 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'HOLY GRAIL', 'text': [u'I have rosacea, sensitive skin, AND just happen to be extremely allergic to zinc oxide, so sunscreen is not only a must but is also very tricky for me. I\'ve tried so many different sunscreens that have either triggered allergic reactions and caused swelling, caused me to break out, made me beet red, and/or turned my face into an irritated oil slick, and I really was of the opinion that I would never find the perfect sunscreen. I decided on a whim to try something new last month, and I am astonished that this sunscreen not only causes zero irritation, but it has improved my skin so much over the past month that my face is looking better than it has in YEARS. My skin texture is smoother, my complexion is calm, clearer, and dare I say healthy looking. I am so so happy to finally find a sunscreen that works for and improves my skin, doesn\'t cause break outs or irritation, is fragrance and oxybenzone-free, non-greasy, AND cruelty-free! Now if I can only convince Supergoop to create a nighttime version!'], 'author': u'sheilahm ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'horrible texture', 'text': [u'This doesn\'t sit well under makeup no matter how long you let is dry down. It peels up into little balls under anything even just a light layer of powder tapped on. Even without makeup on top of it it doesn\'t leave a pleasant texture on the skin. ', u'Strong sunblock smell initially but it disapates quickly. Not worth wasting time or money.'], 'author': u'nnikki347 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Fun blushes in great shades for every day!', 'text': [u'I have several of the shades now, I love them!', u'They go on shear and you build the coverage you want, which is great for a newb like me because it prevent me from accidently giving myself clown-face. The colors are so flattering (I have fair skin) and blend into the skin well so that they are \'sitting on the skin\'', u'The only downside to these is that they are baked into the package, so you can\'t depot into a z-palette, and the size is a little small where your brush will go over the edges and make the package a little dirty-looking. reviews: {'title': u'Works for my hooded eyes', 'text': [u'I have naturally hooded eyes...not drooping lids, just my eye shape. I can visibly see after I apply how this lifts my lid and depuffs my under eye after a long night. 4 out of 5 because the results are from application each day not becoming permanent due to use - if I want more permanent I\'ll be calling a plastic surgeon. On my second bottle and will continue to buy.'], 'author': u'jbear1337 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Algensit', 'text': [u'Hi this is probably a great product, however, it does not work for me. I still have visible lines and product does not smooth the crepey look around my eyes.'], 'author': u'BLC2016 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Cypress, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Definitely hits fine lines', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for a couple of years. Originally I got it as part of a sample set of the Algenist line. I used it alone (I\'m allergic to everything, so I only try one new product at a time when I get something new), morning and night, and then about three weeks in I suddenly noticed that the fine lines around my eyes were almost totally reduced. Couldn\'t believe it. I\'ve never seen an eye product actually work. Needless to say, I\'m still using it. If you try this, give it some time to show its magic. I only use a little, so the bottle will last 5-6 months for me. But I\'m stingy.'], 'author': u'Pentiumm ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': u'Washington, DC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Good for morning eyes...', 'text': [u'I initially ordered this product because I tend to get puffy eyes which cause the look of bags, and although no real wrinkles, I do have a bit of crepey skin in that area. I like the product because it dries down quickly and is non greasy. The fact that it contains caffeine probably helps somewhat with puffiness in the morning. I don\'t think that it can really lift and firm anything, but because of the formula, it does temporarily firm looser skin. Although I have used this for the long term, I don\'t really think it has changed my skin. Either way, this is a very well formulated product, and it\'s the best I have found for use in the morning on puffy sags. I should say also that this is not a very hydrating product...... it is a gel, which is what I was looking for, but if you need something more moisturizing, this would not be it. In any case, it works well for my morning routine and doesn\'t interfere with makeup, so I will continue to keep using it!'], 'author': u'loveit2363 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': u'MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Surprised', 'text': [u'The women in my family have a drooping eye on the left side. I\'m 24, and it was starting to drop a little. To be clear, it\'s the upper lid. My grandmother had to get surgery just so she could see. It gets pretty drastic. But it was starting to happen to me. I mostly use moisturizing eye creams, nothing too heavy. I have dry skin, so I still use a moisturizing cream as well as this. But I only use it once a day, sometimes twice. My left eye looks 100% better. I am blown away that it could actually affect my skin so much. This will remain in my routine for sure. I\'ve been using it for about 4 months now. I am actually going to recommend it to my mom for her eyes.'], 'author': u'adsmith531 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Complete Eye Renewal Balm
reviews: {'title': u'watch out if youre younger.', 'text': [u'Im 20 and i decided i wanted to up my skin care routine by adding an eyecream. I received a sample of this in a my sephora play box and at first i loved it. But as time has gone by ive noticed more lines forming under my eyes. At first i started with 1 but after using this product i now have 2 prominent lines and a third one starting to form. After realizing this i stopped using it. Bottom line if you\'re young dont mess with eye creams or at least this one unless you want to create a bigger problem.'], 'author': u'kittykatxo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Eye Cream
reviews: {'title': u'hydrating', 'text': [u'I have many eye creams from all brands , price ranges from high to low . I got this in a kit 5mls and it has lasted me a long time , I am trying to use up other creams first but I keep on coming back to this one , I don\'t like the other cream Algenist has in the white jar . But this one I really like . Its thick and hydrates the eye , a small amount goes a long way . I use this before bed and at night .  I\'m in my 30\'s but eye wrinkles run in my family , both my parents and grandparents have , so I have been trying to address the issue and find something that works immediately and gives everlasting results . This may be it !!!!'], 'author': u'Tarahkatherine ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Ultimate Lift Eye Crème
reviews: {'title': u'Wonderfully Surprised!', 'text': [u'But shocked by this product since I\'ve tried a few other products from this brand with less than lackluster results. But I received it as a gift from a friend and decided to give it a go. I love it! It keeps my under eye area moisturized and firm. I notice the skin around my eyes is less puffy even though my allergies have been acting up lately with the change of season. I see a a difference when I use it. Best part is that it doesn\'t cause any adverse reactions like some other eye creams I\'ve tried and it doesn\'t leave behind any unwanted texture. I use this both day and night.'], 'author': u'xnobzx ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I tried this based on a recommendation from a Sephora employee. It has a nice consistency and scent, and feels nice and soothing to apply. However, I didn\'t find that it provided enough moisture, and it wore terribly under makeup. This was really surprising to me as it is supposedly a day cream (and is expensive!). It made the makeup around my eyes look super patchy, I have never had this problem with an eye cream before. Super annoying when you notice it at work mid-morning and then have to rub off all your makeup. I finished the jar using it as a night cream and will not repurchase. For the price I expect a better performing cream than this.'], 'author': u'taddymason ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very Moisturizing', 'text': [u'I have mature crepey dry under-eyes and this product is wonderful. I\'ve really noticed a difference in the past two months and use it twice a day. My under-eye area is much more supple since using it and I have fewer fine lines and wrinkles. I did not notice any difference in my dark circles, however, so I use a different product for that.'], 'author': u'TrainerDi ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good all-around eye cream, great company', 'text': [u'Firms, moisturizes, tightens, and has a light cucumber fragrance that is refreshing, not overpowering. I have normal skin,and very few fine lines, so it may not be enough for aging or very dry/dehydrated skin types.', u'I also like to use it around the lip line, and see visible results in the fine lines that were starting to crop up there.', u'Good all-in-one eye product for AM and PM, for those who don\'t want to fuss around. And Ole doesn\'t test on animals, which is a #1 selling point for me!'], 'author': u'merelamer ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'nice and lightweight', 'text': [u'Thankfully I don\'t have any deep crowsfeet or eye wrinkles so I can\'t vouch for how it would work on those, but this is quite effective on the tiny wrinkles that surrounded my undereye area. Absorbs nice and quick and wears very well under my concealer. I\'m definitely pleased with this purchase.'], 'author': u'Carmbar ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'Miami Beach, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Ultimate Lift Eye Gel™
reviews: {'title': u'Wow factor', 'text': [u'This stuff is like miracle in a jar. At 45 years old I have begun to become really self-conscious about my wrinkles and puffiness that have developed. Play this one time after receiving a small size and the Blockbuster set and OMG! This works instantly as soon as it dry I noticed the puffiness was completely gone therefore making a lot of the wrinkles gone too. Its not really a moisturizing product so if you have dryness you\'ll need to layer on a eye cream. I have really dry skin and I haven\'t noticed any issues with not layering anything on top of this It\'s a little sticky for the first 15 minutes but that\'s the small price I will definitely pay. The stickiness wears off and it just feels smooth. I suppose if it really bothers you you can apply your regular moisturizer or night cream on your brow bone. I\'ve been using this to both day and night even though it says to use it at night. I love it. Just try this once on one eye and then look at the difference. Definitely a WOW product for me.'], 'author': u'DiDiBlueEyes71 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': u'Pomona, Ca.', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'sticky', 'text': [u'I don\'t know if I can say I love this gel, but it feels cool and soothing. It seems to make my eye area feel tight after it dries. I guess that would be a plus if my under eyes looked different, but they don\'t.'], 'author': u'aj17 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This works for me...', 'text': [u'I don\'t use this every night but save it for when I need to de-puff under my eyes or I go to bed very, very late. It works! reviews: {'title': u'Great Mascara for Lifting and Layering', 'text': [u'I would give this mascara a 5 star rating as the wand is one of the best I\'ve tried recently for lifting, separating, and lengthening the lashes, but, it seems to dry out in like 2 weeks. ingredient: Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria), Flower Extract, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Glycosyl Trehalose, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Carbomer, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance.
reviews: {'title': u'Does exactly what it says it will do', 'text': [u'I really think this is a great face mask. I am so happy that Sephora carries this brand because the ingredients are proven anti-oxidants and leave my sensitive skin soft to touch. For its price, I would definitely recommend to others.'], 'author': u'Simplog ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bad Reaction', 'text': [u'I don\'t have sensitive skin which is the reason I\'m shocked at the way my skin reacted. I have very oily skin. I wore this mask for 30 mins, the package says 10-20 mins but recommends to leave on longer for better treatment. I took it off and applied the rest of the serum to my neck and face. It does not say to rinse off so I didn\'t and went to bed, woke up, rushed to work. 1 coworker said I look a little red but I didn\'t pay much mind until I was eating and one said "What happened to you?" looking at my skin with concern. I ran to the bathroom to discover my entire face and neck were red and skin was hot to the touch. Will not be using this again.'], 'author': u'teresamurillo ', 'date': [u'2016-07-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A weekend must!', 'text': [u'While I\'m not sure how much good this actually does my skin, I use them once a weekend to hydrate, and pamper myself. {'title': u'Green Tea mask', 'text': [u'I used this by the directions and didn\'t wipe it off after a good while, but did later on in the day use a cleansing wipe as I normally would. reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Sheet masks are a staple in my life and this one is my favorite- a frequent flyer. My skin is dry but most of my skin care routine involves hydration along with retinoids, AHAs, anti-Aging serums and treatments. So, my treatment dries my skin even further. Using these sheet masks solves the problem and I\'ve been able to maintain hydration and younger looking skin!! What more could I ask for? Thank u Dr. Jart!!'], 'author': u'Jodi5868 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great!', 'text': [u'I have used this mask a couple of times and it\'s my all time favorite. I put the mask in the fridge for couple of days to ensure the mask is really cold when I use it. After I am done with the mask, I get none stop compliments on my skin, looks flawless! I have sensitive, red, oily skin so the coolness really calms everything down for me.'], 'author': u'britto13 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Water-full? More like Dry-full!', 'text': [u'I was so surprised by how dry this mask was when I peeled off the backing that at first, I wondered if I\'d gotten a defective item that had dried out! Surprisingly dry and sticky, and comes in two pieces (don\'t be fooled into thinking that\'s a second mask \u2014 the lower face/mouth mask is an entirely separate piece), I would have been very forgiving of this mask if it had worked as promised; it did not. Most masks have some kind of gel or liquid that you end up massaging into your face afterward, and which you\'re cautioned not to rinse off. No worries with this mask; your face will be desert-dry when you remove it. Surprising and disappointing item from Dr. Jart+.'], 'author': u'msfjordstone ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Malvern, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'works very well for short term hydration', 'text': [u'I\'ve used this mask only twice, once about a year ago and once tonight, but I think this is a great mask. I bought them in last year\'s customizable skin care set. I liked it last year, but I was swayed by the mixed reviews and threw the other in a box. After a long day at the beach my face was feeling extremely tight and dry. I remembered that last year after a trip to Vegas with extremely high, dry temps and a long flight that this mask did help bring my skin back to normal. Tonight, immediately after using the mask my skin is much less tight, more hydrated and calmer (less red, I have rosacea). I don\'t remember very long lasting effects from the last time I used it, but I really like this mask for an extra boost of hydration when I\'ve put my skin through harsher than normal conditions. I have several other masks to try out, but this is one Id definitely repurchase at this point. Based on how the others go, I\'ll probably keep 1 of these on hand in the fridge. ', u'In terms of the mask itself, it is a big large for my face so there is some overlap, but it\'s NBD to me. The gel is very sticky, which I saw some people didn\'t like, but that doesn\'t bother me either. The mask stays in place very well.'], 'author': u'KMart919 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'holy grail', 'text': [u'You can never go wrong with a Dr. Jart mask!
