{'title': u'Fresh and clean', 'text': [u'I bought this some time ago on a whim, and rarely ever buy fragrance without first wearing it for a few days. I love the clean, almost soapy fragrance. It is light, but with warmth and woodsiness. Neither too feminine or too masculine, but a good balance of both. The travel size with the leather sleeve is great for both the vanity and the carry on bag, and the leather sleeve protects the glass bottle nicely from damage. My only complaint is the longevity of this scent. It is very noticeable at first, then dries down to a soft whisper, and within a few hours, is pretty much gone. In the summer, its a nice option however to heady, heavy fragrances.'], 'author': u'Blondeinabmw ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Ehhh...', 'text': [u'This is one of a few scents I fell in love with when I purchased the sampler set for my birthday last year but I have to say for the price I\'m disappointed that it doesn\'t last longer. I love it so I hope some day they can master the art of longevity.'], 'author': u'XtinaMcGrath ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'Most amazing product, HG. If you want your face to look naturally flush or bronze with no cake face and lots of controlled color pay off than this is for you. Long staying power, luminous but not glittery. Very natural. A little goes a long ways also. Lightly swore your brush in product and lighting my buff to add face add more if needed but so pigmented I bet you won\'t. Also makes the perfect highlight. Ethereal glow is spot on. Natural skin finish. Not dewy, not Cakey, not dry, great color pay off, long lasting, so natural you\'ll keep um all guessing what your secret is. I have fine lines, adult acne, combo skin, I\'m 30 and fair/light complected. Buy it and play with it and fall in love!'], 'author': u'Sarbear2822 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'You get what you pay for', 'text': [u'I bought this thinking that I could get away with saving some money.. unfortunately, you get what you pay for. {'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'I have the pink one. Both colours matched my skin tone, but I thought the pink looked a bit nicer. However, this one gives more the look of actual glitter on your face, and im always down for glitter. I love that it doesnt make me look oily, and i actually look shimmery. Plus the price is cheaper than many drug store brand highlighters so that was awesome. I find it blends well. {'title': u'What a disappointing waste of time', 'text': [u'I was so excited when I received my Cosmocube and couldn\'t wait to use it. Well, all I got was a big disappointment. For the price, I expected a Sephora-standard, high quality product. Instead, what I received was flimsy, cheap, and didn\'t even work properly.', u'The top of the box is made of a flimsy, thin piece of plastic that sagged so much it blocked the edge of the top draw from closing completely after you opened it. Well, at least that drawer opened in the first place. The next two drawers were stuck and never even opened for me. The only drawer that functioned properly was the bottom one. Woohoo, one out of four!', u'Returned it to Sephora and purchased another organizer from somewhere else. {'title': None, 'text': [u'Love this stuff. I have fine, slightly wavy hair that is easily straightened by blow drying. I use this almost everyday that blow dry my hair. I love that it offers heat protection and is not heavy on my fine hair. I don\'t curl or "style" my hair per se, but this keeps my hair set the way I dried it, instead of creasing or falling limp over the course of the day. I received a sample of this initially, and then immediately went out and bought the full size product. I also like that my hair still stays soft, not sticky or crispy like a lot of products for fine hair.'], 'author': u'sjwtexas ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'texas', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Hairstyle lasts alllll night long. Lasts for days!!!My hair can\'t hold a curl to save its life, so I opted for this to see if it could hold all my curls in place all night long.It didn\'t. Only because of gravity + my hair texture and lack of hairspray combined. {'title': u'helps enhance curls', 'text': [u'This mousse defiantly does what it says. I have processed my hair so much that my curly hair is sad and barely there, with this I\'m able to get my hair looking much more curly and with tons of volume if I use a diffuser. Works great if you air dry too. You just have to break the casing after it dries and you will have more defined curls. It does feel quite dry to the touch so I like to put a soft cream before I use this so my hair won\'t feel too dry. Don\'t really like the scent though.'], 'author': u'fvega ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best for getting a wavy beachy look', 'text': [u'I have a shoulder length wavy bob that I like to style in loose beachy waves, and I actually like this product for that purpose. It\'s lightweight but still helps lock in the wave pattern. I will say it is VERY EASY to use too much of this product and it takes a bit of experimenting to figure out how much to use to avoid getting a case of the crunchies. But I found the "golf ball" sized lump they recommended actually is pretty spot on in terms of balancing curl hold with not being too crunchy. However, I could see that this not working as well on longer hair or hair where you\'re going for a tighter curl pattern. It\'s more appropriate for that wavy look! Usage tips: Make sure your hair is damp from root to tip, apply golf ball sized amount, and comb through with a wide tooth comb to evenly distribute. I then flip my head upside down, crunch hair to set the waves, then flip head back upright and take small sections & twirl from the roots to get some nice texture and volume at the roots, then air dry.'], 'author': u'missmaura ', 'date': [u'2016-09-02'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'LOVE!', 'text': [u'I personally don\'t understand why this is only rated 4 stars.. I love this product! I will admit that when I first purchased this awhile ago, I actually did return it, because I didn\'t know how to properly use it. Well, I re-purchased it a few months ago and I am so glad I did! It will work differently for everyone. I am normal/combo skin type for the most part. I use it to set my under eye concealer, and sometimes to set my primer on my eyes before eye-shadow application. (with a small fluffy eye shadow brush from tarte) I also use it to set my T zone which works very well- It isn\'t too matte, but looks very natural. I also love the light scent of vanilla- it is very therapeutic when I apply it. I have not tried any loose setting powder other than this one- so I cant compare it to any other brand. I will most likely re-purchase when I run out. I am also big into anything retro-vintage and I love the background and story of Besame Cosmetics! Please keep making this product!'], 'author': u'Jesuslover14 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Cleansing Tin
reviews: {'title': u'Bonus dual use!', 'text': [u'I know some people have squawked about the price of this versus what you get (*just* a tin for $X?! I could have saved that and just used a mug to wash brushes in!) but let me tell you how wrong they are!', u'This is extremely handy to hold cleanser and wash my makeup brushes and Beauty Blenders in, and is the right size to do so without wasting any expensive brush cleaner in the process. It has even stood up to filling with a more heavy duty solvent and washing the brushes my son and I use for painting in and has never shown even the slightest bit of scratching, wear, or even any discoloration from the strongest solvents as some other similar products have in the past. ', u'It is also the perfect size to use the lid as a mini palette for makeup application. I use the lid daily for this purpose and even when I traveled recently and I discovered that in my sleep deprived haze I had forgotten the bottom half of the tin on my bathroom counter when I was packing the night before we left but was extremely relieved to find that the lid itself made it after all because it was inadvertently set down in my makeup bag instead of where it should have been with the bottom half of the tin. ', u'I actually use the lid more than I use the bottom of the tin itself. I found it to be more easily cleaned after application of makeup and is easier to remove any residual makeup between steps from it than I could just using the back of my hand. This also means no residual is left to grow bacteria and all sorts of other nasties, and being metal, is much more easily and fully sanitized between uses than skin could ever be. Cleaner brushes/cleaner sponges/cleaner "palette"/cleaner makeup = cleaner face = less breakouts so yay! ', u'It also doesn\'t give makeup anywhere to soak into the way the makeup would eventually start to soak in/blend into the skin on the back of my hand or allow more liquids makeups to run the way they would on a hand. Less waste = another yay! ', u'The only con I could possibly find if I was actually searching for one (and this is an incredibly not picky one since I like everything else about this handy little tin) is the design on the lid eventually started to wear off. Not a deal breaker by any means though and does not effect functionality in the least so whatever. I\'m sure it would also have lasted much longer if I didn\'t periodically toss this tin in my makeup bag where it gets rattled around amongst everything else in there during travel so that may just be user fault on my part. ', u'All in all, a great little tool to have and I plan on ordering another one soon just to have a backup.'], 'author': u'WaterlilyKari ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fine', 'text': [u'I bought this to store my Beauty Blender when traveling and it\'s perfect! Tho it won\'t allow the BB sponge to dry out (which it should) if lid is on. Washes easily. {'title': u'Perfect Radiance with Ample Coverage', 'text': [u'PROS- Provides a beautiful "foundationless" skin finish- Relatively long-wearing- Reapplies without looking cakey- Buildable coverage- Shades for a decent range of skin tones, including ~NC15', u'CONS- Expensive- Slightly pore-clogging (must be thorough when removing)- Weird shade configuration at the light end of the range (3 is lighter than 2)', u'OVERALL IMPRESSION:This foundation is incredibly luxurious in the look that it produces. It offers great coverage from medium-sheer to medium-full, and a single layer can be built upon without a cakey or unnatural finish. When wearing it, it\'s undetectable and produces the look of radiant skin free of imperfections. While there is a reasonable volume of foundation in a single bottle, the Luminous Silk foundation still has a high price point. I find that while it doesn\'t aggravate any skin issues, it doesn\'t improve the underlying quality of my skin per se. Still on the fence as to whether or not I wish to use this on a daily basis, given this fact and the price point. However, if you want a quality foundation, this product certainly lives up to the acclaim behind the Armani Beauty name.', u'Compared to the Maestro foundation, I would 9/10 times recommend one goes with this formulation. While initially considering Maestro, I found that this product offers a buildable coverage that the Maestro line lacks (i.e. is more versatile). Unless you are specifically looking for a tinted moisturizer effect and nothing more, Luminous Silk is the best option in the Armani foundation range.', u'Note that, for porcelain/fair skin tones, the \'3\' shade is in fact lighter than \'2.\' 2 has a bit of an unfortunate orange cast, and for the fairest of skin, I would recommend that you purchase the 3 instead.'], 'author': u'rebonjour ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Edmonton, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'My go-to for everyday wear', 'text': [u'This is a perfect little eyeshadow trio for everyday wear. name: Maestro Fusion Makeup Octinoxate Sunscreen SPF 15
reviews: {'title': u'Beautiful', 'text': [u'I fell in love with this on my last trip to Sephora. It is simultaneously sheer and provides coverage. I love that it is buildable if I need it. I have been wearing it on the weekends when I want to look put together, but not made up. I get so many compliments on my skin everytime I wear it. My SKIN, not my makeup. That\'s a winner in my book.'], 'author': u'emmadiane ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Orange County, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Love this product', 'text': [u'I seldom buy foundations more than once because I want to try the latest and greatest, but THIS is a repeat purchase. It\'s long wearing, looks very natural and doesn\'t separate on on my sometimes oily skin. It\'s worth every penny!'], 'author': u'jeannastyle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Hattiesburg, MS', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Flawless Skin for an Everday Look', 'text': [u'I was looking for a lightweight foundation I could wear every day and could slow down my makeup routine when i\'m in a rush. This works so so so well. I got shade 6 and it looks beautiful on my skin, I use 2 pumps (2 squeezes) on my hand and rub it into my face, no beauty blender, no brush, no nothing. I find that this way, my skin looks airbrushed, natural, and even. I\'m so in love with this foundation, and topped off with the luminous silk powder, it\'s a dream!'], 'author': u'cyberhunty ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The Best EVER', 'text': [u'I can say I\'ve tried almost all of GA foundations and this one rocks this glammy grammy\'s skin. The formula is light, but for once when they say buildable, they mean it. 2 layers and I look great, but it doesn\'t look like I\'m caked with makeup. Soft. pretty, coverage. feels light. stays put. Lasts ALLL day, and I sweat like a horse (thanks meno). I\'m telling you, over 45 ladies, you will not regret this. Designer lift is nice but SUPER heavy. Lasting Silk is great too. Luminous Silk is beautiful, but may better serve the 30 yr old mu wearer. This one is skin perfecting, light and luminous coverage. But it covers all my discoloration, blemishes, age spots. I mean, amazing! Don\'t hesitate. But hey, make sure you get the right color. And you may not be able to know that without buying and returning. The ladies at Nord counter mean well, but I am NOT a 5, which is the sample packet norm and what they try to pigeon hole everyone. Yes, I\'m a white woman, green eyes, but I didn\'t find my match until I got to 7. So keep trying. The darker colors may be better than you think on your skin. I\'m about to try the bi-phase fusion to see how that does. I\'ll keep you posted. They are all amazing, but we are all different. Find what works for you and sure, use these reviews as a guide, but you are unique. Love yourself and the make-up will only enhance!'], 'author': u'Nyegallaty ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': u'Portland, OR', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'wonderful!', 'text': [u'I am new to the whole makeup thing. I am of a certain age where I think I need to start wearing something to even my skin out and look alive at work. I was looking for sheer coverage and something that didn\'t look overdone. I love this foundation. It goes on so soft and smooth, blends well, and has just enough coverage for my redness. It doesn\'t cover my dark circles but it definitely makes them less dark. And man, does it stay all day. I actually am now looking for a face wash that will take it all off without having to wash twice.'], 'author': u'meganegibson20 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not Hydrating', 'text': [u'I bought this eye cream to replace Clinique\'s \'All About Eyes\' eye cream I\'ve been using for years. I always put All About Eyes on before my concealer. I figured that switching to one with SPF couldn\'t hurt... but unfortunately it\'s not even close to being the same. Nothing about it hydrates and I now need to reorder All About Eyes. I\'ll use this when going to the beach or being outdoors for extended amounts of time, but not for daily use.'], 'author': u'LEM513 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So far, so good', 'text': [u'I am in my late 20s and trying to stay on the anti-aging train for skincare, which I believe mostly revolves around moisturizing and protecting to prevent wrinkles-- Hence I landed on this eyecream which is what I use as part of my AM skin care routine. So far, so good-- I don\'t see any significant immediate results, but I don\'t really expect to as I bought this for protection/prevention. It is a nice medium consistency eye cream, I like that it absorbs well, is hydrating enough without being oily/greasy, does NOT irritate my eyes, and has SPF 20, so there\'s that little added protection. A little goes a long way so I expect it to last quite awhile.'], 'author': u'Tree413 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'year round HG!', 'text': [u'I love that this has SPF 20. I\'m so strict about applying sunscreen since I was 25 and gave up tanning. I really believe it\'s helped me avoid wrinkles at 30. This does come out white but blends in very well. I do couple this cream with the new prep start eyecream (orange tube). First I apply prep start from inner corner up my orbital bone and lid. While that it still slick I apply this cream over the same areas. I also drag it down to almost my cheek bone. It doesn\'t mess with my concealer or melt in the Texas sun and heat. I\'m very happy with this product and a little goes a very long way. I think it will last me the rest of the year easily. Making it affordable as well.'], 'author': u'Kickashfitness ', 'date': [u'2016-07-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'facial peel', 'text': [u'I have used this in the past and I love it and am using it again. It tingles when you use it so expect a little discomfort. You must use sunscreen during the day. My face is smoother and my other products work so much better once I\'ve used this once a week. Am looking for something for under eyes that works as well.'], 'author': u'lamroe ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Product', 'text': [u'I have used this product only a couple of times. Seems to do well (I have used other products in the past). It gives you a cotton pad to rub it into your face. I DONT recommend that. When I did that - more soaked into the pad and less was for my face!! There are fan brushes you can use that work better for this purpose.'], 'author': u'JustPatti123 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Orlando, Fl', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'I have a little bit of adult acne , I been using diferent kinds of medications prescribed by my doctor as Ziana and Tretinoin , but I can tell you after using this for just two times my face is completely clean, it is amazing , I live it for around two hours on my face and then I wash it , for me works better that way ,it leaves my face so smooth and soft and so white and clean , I recomend 100 %'], 'author': u'aliecita ', 'date': [u'2016-08-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Disappointing', 'text': [u'I had high expectations for this product, I expected it to be more exfoliating than my PTR Firm X Peeling Gel and my Boscia Peeling Gel, however it was not. The product says to wear for only 2 min and you may feel some tingling. With the first ampule I followed the directions to a T - there was no change in my skin. The second ampule I wore for an hour and half - my skin was a smoother, but no different from my regular exfoliants. Third ampule was worn overnight - there was no difference between the second and third attempts. And not once during any of the 3 attempts did my face "tingle."', u'I did read a lot of positive reviews on this product so maybe it is only effective for a certain skin type. My skin is pretty heavy duty, it can handle a lot of different products without irritation. So maybe if you have more sensitive skin, thinner skin, you will have better luck. But for me it was an absolute disappointment.'], 'author': u'LovelyLaila ', 'date': [u'2016-07-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I swear by it', 'text': [u'People who keep saying this doesn\'t work aren\'t using it right. I\'ve been using this faithfully for 6 months and this peel (in combination with other good skin care practices) has changed my skin. I have been doing professional peels with my dermatologist for over 10 years and I began to think that an effective peel means peeling inflamed skin afterwards. Not true. This peel delivers results without recovery or downtime afterwards. ', u'To be fair, I don\'t follow the instructions given. I leave it on for at least one hour (though I am now up to 1.5 hours). I also apply with my fingers - the pad is useless for application, but great for applying toner or removing nail polish. I also apply to a portion of my skin and that has changed the texture of my skin. ', u'Overall my skin is brighter, softer, smoother, more even in tone, hyperpigmentation is reduced and significantly better. I just wish they brought back the 2 dose packs.'], 'author': u'Sweetpchic ', 'date': [u'2016-06-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Extra Smooth Sun Protection Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 38 PA++
reviews: {'title': u'LIght feel and worked well', 'text': [u'I liked how it didn\'t feel thick and heavy on my skin, yet protected it against burning.'], 'author': u'Sharrun ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Massachusetts', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Is it actually still there?', 'text': [u'I ran into sephora in a panic when I realized that my current daily face moisturizer, concealer, and translucent powder have ZERO SPF. Not okay for my fair and easily burnt skin in the height of summer. ', u'The sales associate highly recommended this lotion. So far I haven\'t been burnt, but when I put it on, especially when it\'s hot out, I can\'t tell if it actually stays on my skin. It\'s far too liquidy, making application difficult and if I\'m sweaty it feels like it\'s melted off before it can even set in. ', u'I was hoping for more of a general moisturizer consistency that also gave me sun coverage, but this is more like a straight up sunscreen. It doesn\'t seem to mix well with my makeup routine, but I\'ll probably keep it for the beach.'], 'author': u'ashmash93 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'ALL HAIL SHISEIDO', 'text': [u'This will be the single reason if I never get melanoma. Yeah it\'s pricey but it beats #1 getting burned #2 ruining your clothes/swimsuit by rubbing off on it and #3 breaking out in a rash with Clinique\'s body cream with sunscreen (ask me how I know). Great sun resistance, a joy to apply and rub in, SO FAST, non offensive smell, and you don\'t use much so a bottle lasts me over a year. The price is a great investment in mental and physical health. The SPF 50 is not as sheer as the 38, never been burnt with either.'], 'author': u'CasualCowgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-08-11'], 'location': u'Colorado', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u"Amazing - best sunscreen I've found", 'text': [u'I have extremely fair skin and have tried many different sunscreens, from drugstore to high end brands. This is by far my favorite. It is lightweight, easy to apply and blends/absorbs well. It never runs into my eyes no matter how much I sweat. And it never gives that heavy feeling where you\'re beading sweat "through" the lotion like some do. It really just absorbs into the skin and I don\'t even notice I\'m wearing it. I have combination skin and this is one of the only sunscreens I\'ve found that doesn\'t clog pores (regardless of what other brands claim).'], 'author': u'LindsayH ', 'date': [u'2016-07-19'], 'location': u'Iowa', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great Stuff!', 'text': [u'I usually don\'t buy sun tan lotion. I usually buy spray because it\'s fast and easy. However, I bought this last year and I\'m buying some more for this summer. I love this sun screen for a number of reasons. It is more watery then most, but I like that because it goes on easily. I feel this makes it easier to spread around. I burn easily, but not with this on my skin. It does not have a heavy scent. I am sensitive to smell and this is pleasant and not strong. The bottle is small, however don\'t let that stop you. It really lasts. I do use this on my face. It does not make me break out. I would not normally spend this much money on something like this. However, for me it is worth it for this product.'], 'author': u'Imsmilen1 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': u'Michigan', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Rosacea-Prone skin LOVES this in humid weather', 'text': [u'The people who are getting a white cast are not rubbing this in enough. This is a physical sunscreen, (opposed to a chemical one) and it creates a barrier on your skin with zinc and other ingredients as it sits on top of the skin. As someone with rosacea, I appreciate this sunblock and as a Floridian where I sweat a lot and it\'s extremely humid, i appreciate it even more. ', u'My dry skin loves this product when I go to Disney World. For some reason, it even evens out my skin tone (I don\'t wear makeup to theme parks in the summer, so this is amazing for me) and it feels pretty hydrating to me, even in heavy, humid air. ', u'It layers beautifully with itself (remember to reapply every few hours!) and it has never irritated my skin. This is the only sunscreen I\'ll put on my face anymore while on vacation, and I\'ve tried so, so, so many.'], 'author': u'badgerpaws ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Pinellas Park, Fl', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Colorful Shadow & Liner
reviews: {'title': u'Silver Glitter', 'text': [u'I have only tried the Silver Glitter shade in these pencils. Purchased for costume makeup and was surprised at how opaque the colour payoff was. The silver glitter shade was super glossy and reflective which was exactly what I was looking for (again, costume makeup). Definitely lives up to the long-wearing claim- you need makeup remover to get it off, and I had silver sparkle on my face for the next day or two. Because of this, I\'m not sure how the more natural or everyday shades would work. Hopefully not so chunky glittery. So I am interested to try some other shades.'], 'author': u'jontario ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Ontario, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'ok', 'text': [u'The colour is lovely but too much glitter that makes my lids heavy.'], 'author': u'ellojello ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Surprised', 'text': [u'I bought a few of these recently, hoping to save some time in my weekly beauty routine with their boasted quick-application. I did this (as expected), but I was pleasantly shocked of how bold and opaque these apply, and how rich the colors are. One swipe with these will do the trick! I was also surprised with the wear of these shadow sticks. It stayed put even better than my usual pressed eyeshadows, and I haven\'t had any of the creasing that I read some other people experienced. I\'m not sure if this is because I use a good primer with it (UD primer potion), but regardless, I\'m stoked with the results!', u'I now use it almost every day - typically apply a pop of color (or sparkle) to the lid, some darker matte-finishes along the crease and use a blending brush to smooth it all out. I also add a tiny bit of their shimmery white to the inside corners of my eyes and a little bit blended underneath by brow-line as a highlighter. I\'m definitely going to collect more colors!'], 'author': u'JessEqualsFun ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: They’re Real! Push-Up Liner
reviews: {'title': u'New favorite eyeliner', 'text': [u'I have been using liquid eyeliner since forever and have not had much success with gel liners. I tried this because I like Benefit\'s other products. I find this very easy to apply. There is an insert in the box with good directions - read it! It really does hug the lash line without getting your lashes goopy. Very innovative applicator. I will definitely be buying this again and highly recommend this eyeliner.'], 'author': u'twistytie ', 'date': [u'2014-06-26'], 'location': u'Orlando, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Hard to Use', 'text': [u'The instructional video by Benefit says turn the dial one click and go. I have to turn the dial 2-3 times for each eye and work and work to get it in place. It works better for me when I also use a small brush to smooth the line out. I have opened the tube up at times and found a dry glob of gel from where it has worked out while sitting. I can only assume it\'s because of having to twist the dial so much to try to get something out during use. The triangular applicator is plastic and the gel is distributed through a channel inside. The sharp plastic point has jabbed me in the eye more times than I can count and it HURTS! I do LOVE the wear, but I don\'t like the trouble.'], 'author': u'LadySouth ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Knoxville, TN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u"Nice but doesn't do anything", 'text': [u'I wanted to love this product, or more importantly I wanted to believe it did something for me; but I\'m ready to admit my skincare routine does not need this. I was drawn in by the fact that this product can help your other products work better, so I used it religiously for 10 months (2 bottles) under my serums and moisturizer. However, I haven\'t noticed any difference - still breakout, still have uneven skin tone, still have large pores, oily skin, and redness, and this product didn\'t do anything, didn\'t moisturize or make my skin soft. Don\'t waste your money, if you buy quality serums, there is no need for this at all. Serums by their nature absorb quickly and effectively into your skin, so you don\'t need anything to help that process out.'], 'author': u'Skincare4Ash ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Dallas, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is one truly transforming product. I have relatively sensitive skin and was slightly doubtful prior to using this in terms of my skin tolerance and the effects. You don\'t have to use exactly 1 teaspoon of product for your entire face, I find that too much for my face and I see more results by leaving less product on and longer duration. After that 30 min, my skin feels incredibly soft and renewed. I will continue using this product for 1-2 times/week to give my skin a lift periodically. Great product!'], 'author': u'pooch7586 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It just doesn\'t have the look I want so I think I\'ll have to return it.'], 'author': u'meredithm ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great color and metallic look', 'text': [u'I\'m reviewing this specifically to tell "older" women to try this out. All the blogs say go natural as you age, avoid sparkles in shadow. Probably good advice except this stick of brilliant color is different. Great colors, vivid and eye popping. A real surprise. Don\'t go mild with this, slather it on the lid and under. One its on it stays put so don\'t plan on blending unless you put it on the brush to apply which is great for a more subtle look. Won\'t move all day. It also has an odd cooling feel on application. Very pleasant to work with. I have two colors, the three shakes and pewter. Three shakes is my favorite.'], 'author': u'petersgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Rimrock, AZ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Audacious Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'Long wearing and creamy'], 'author': u'NR0788 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Better Than Ever', 'text': [u'I\'ve always loved Nars lipstick and have used it for years. But this "audacious" formula is by far the best ever. Even the case is better; it has a satisfying magnetic snap. Wonderful texture, not to dry or mat, but also not sticky or too shiny. Perfect. Lasts well. And the color selections are wonderful. Do choose carefully. The first shade I bought was SO wrong for me -- they don\'t always look like they do online. Can\'t think of a solution for that, unless it were possible to order tiny samples. I would do that, it would be worth it to get the perfect shades. This is definitely a lipstick to have on hand, a shade for everyday, and several for going out. Love all the choices of reds, so you can find the one which is right for you, with the right undertone. Most of all I love how it feels on my lips -- luxurious.'], 'author': u'skypillar ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Gorgeous!', 'text': [u'This is such a gorgeous illuminator! I got the shade "Copacabana" and it\'s a beautiful baby pink pearl shade. It only takes 1-2 small drops, and then easily blends with a Beauty Blender. It\'s sooo pretty! Like, way prettier than my other highlighters. What I like about this too, is that it\'s so easy to build it up and make it as dramatic, or as subtle as you want! And also, because it\'s a liquid and not a powder, it works great if you have dry skin! It doesn\'t cling to dry patches or extenuate lines, nor is it chalky. I love this so so so much! As noted in some other reviews, this did not come completely full... about 3/4 full actually. Which is a bit of a drag since it is in clear packaging, but when I went to exchange it they were all like this, so I guess that\'\'s just how they come. Still a bit disappointing, but oh well, I\'ll live.'], 'author': u'samkeaysxo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Moncton, NB, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: NAILKALE Nail Polish
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'The funny thing is, I don\'t know the name of this color. It is not printed on the bottle. It is an opaque nude color that goes on really smoothly-the brush is shaped well for application. I usually wear sheers because I can\'t get a good non streaky application with creampy opaque light colors but this one is it. On the other hand, it does not wear well. IT chips faster than the Essie sheers that I usually wear.'], 'author': u'meemurs ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Colorado', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Victoria', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried the color Victoria and I am in love. This is the only nail polish that I\'ve used THE ENTIRE BOTTLE and had to repurchase! With one coat, it goes on like a wine red color. Add a second coat and it looks black with a hint of burgundy. I love to do one coat for that wine color and add a matte top coat to it, or I love doubling up the coats in the fall and having that dark nail color. Honestly, it\'s my favorite color of all time.'], 'author': u'kaylarrrg ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'good polish!', 'text': [u'I love the York mews color. Great formula and not expensive.'], 'author': u'Mich04 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fantastic Formula', 'text': [u'I absolutely love the Nailkale formula. It\'s probably my all time favorite nail polish formula. All three of the colors I\'ve tried (Montpellier Walk, Duchess Walk, and York Mews) go on opaque in 2 coats and dry fairly quick. I\'ve also found that my nails seem much less prone to peeling since I\'ve been wearing this polish regularly.', u'Montpellier Walk is my holy grail perfect nude and I\'ve been wearing it almost non-stop since I got it. It\'s so elegant and understated.', u'Duchess Walk is an almost neon coral. Again, phenomenal formula but the color was a bit too bright for my conservative work place so I ended up returning it (to get another bottle of Montpellier Walk).', u'York Mews is a very pretty slightly muted pink. On my screen, the website shows York Mews as more of a mauve and in person, it\'s really not. Definitely nice but not what I was expecting.', u'I would absolutely recommend this line to anyone who wants long lasting creamy polish that\'s actually good for your nails!'], 'author': u'alexkay ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'brush design is phenomenal color match is terrible', 'text': [u'I purchased York Mews, and loved the dusty-pink look of the color online. However the color in the bottle is a light opaque bubblegum pink, and I was terribly disappointed.However, the design of the brush is my favorite of all the brands I\'ve tried, there really is nothing better for application.'], 'author': u'Ezzoda ', 'date': [u'2016-09-01'], 'location': u'Ann Arbor, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Age Defying / temp alternative to botox', 'text': [u'I\'m in my late 20s and it\'s about that time to start getting botox. I have forehead wrinkes that look worse when I put makeup on. I\'m aware of all the extra products I can put on my face to hide the wrinkes, but I prefer to get rid of the problem than hide it. I got this product as a sample and find it a great alternative to botox (for the time being). I use several face masks during the week, clarasonic every night, and use this once a week. Immediately after, my skin looks young again and the forehead lines are reduced by a lot. Its gentle, great for sensitive skin, and age defying.'], 'author': u'blonderdancer ', 'date': [u'2016-06-03'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'dry sensitive skin', 'text': [u'These work great on my dry and sensitive skin. {'title': u'Bye, bye Dr. Dennis Gross!!', 'text': [u'I am in my 20\'s and I have blemish-prone combo skin. When I discovered Dr. Dennis Gross\' peel pads, I thought they were amazing. BUT THESE!!! My issue with the Dr. Dennis Gross ones (I have tried all of the different strengths) was that while they were super effective, they did tend to irritate my skin and leave it a bit dry and taut. I went on the hunt for a new daily peel about 3 months ago and it was very difficult to find a peel that was very effective AND soothing. After many purchases and subsequent returns, I found these. THEY ARE AMAZING!! (I don\'t know why I\'m surprised, PTR never lets me down) After I apply the pad, it leaves this kind of moisturizing film on my face until I rinse off. These are so gentle, I use them twice a day. But they are also just as exfoliating as the Dr. Dennis Gross ones. The price point is a lot better too!!! ', u'I have gotten SOOO many compliments on my skin since I started using these about 2 months ago. They\'re amazing!!'], 'author': u'rachh94 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'New Orleans, LA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Two.BB.Clean
reviews: {'title': u'cast member', 'text': [u'What an amazing deal! Could not pass up!'], 'author': u'Alexeia ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love!!', 'text': [u'I did not read the reviews until I had already ordered this set. I was so mad that I didn\'t read them first but in this case I\'m glad I didn\'t because I wouldn\'t have ordered this. I don\'t know what everyone\'s deal is but this worked out great for me. In the past I have always ordered the black beauty blender pro. So I know what a real beauty blender looks and feels like and when I first opened this set I did think it felt different but I went ahead and damped it and I could tell no difference it felt the same and applied my makeup the same. Only difference I could maybe see is that it may be a tad bit smaller but the difference is so small that I don\'t even know if it really is. The cleanser which I had never used before is amazing! This stuff gets everything out!! I get why ppl don\'t like the pump but I just push the pump down with my fingers and then once I get some of it in the top part I dip my beauty blender in it, so yeah a regular pump would\'ve worked better but it\'s no big deal. I\'m personally glad I made this purchase. I\'ve only had it for a few days so I don\'t know if it will fall apart sooner like others have said we will see...'], 'author': u'JillianMarie22 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'just OK.', 'text': [u'Every time I use this cleanser, the pink dye on the sponges come off. {'title': u"it's fine", 'text': [u'I was nearly scared off by the reviews saying that these are not the original beautyblenders, but that\'s bogus. They\'re totally fine. But hey, it was technically free. And if for some reason you\'ve never purchased a beautyblender, just do it. They really are worth the hype.'], 'author': u'ultraspackle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

reviews: {'title': u'#1 Product sold on Sephora.com', 'text': [u'It is everything you could want it to be as a top coat. However I am not sure if it\'s the formula or is it the brush (probably formula as I have nail polish from them as well and didn\'t leave brush marks), I can see the brush marks as I apply the top coat. This definitely shortens my nail-do time dramatically so overall I would recommend if you are looking for a good top coat. PS: the clear coating does have a little coral to it which may change the initial nail color you chose. It\'s quite sheer, but the coral is there.'], 'author': u'Wen314 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Everlasting Liquid Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'A must have! One of my go to\'s! I love them! Suuuuupeeeeer comfortable! Seriously just amazing quality and pretty colors!'], 'author': u'akaren ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love Kat Von D', 'text': [u'I love this matte lipstick. I find it really does last a long time. I also like to layer it with other Kat Von D colours. One thing, if I forget to use my lip scrub on a regular basis, then the lipstick does dry my lips out.'], 'author': u'koalalove ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Brandon, MB', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not consistent coverage in one swipe', 'text': [u'Let\'s start with the pros: amazing color selection, large bottle for the price, great matte finish and ALL night coverage even after eating and drinking (minimal touch-up needed after a full meal w/ drinks). Now the cons: while I love this lipstick in the color "Damned" I do need to spend a considerable amount of time for the application. The coverage is not consistent in one swipe which requires you to do two to three layers before you get even color. I have not tried any of the lighter shades yet as this may be only an issue with a deeper color. However, once it has dried and goes matte it does last the entire day and has become my go-to color. So if you don\'t mind spending time on a perfect lip once a day than it\'s not a big deal. This is NOT your no mirror needed lip color - you\'ll look like a fool without a mirror and proper application.'], 'author': u'nymakeupnovice ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fave liquid lipstick', 'text': [u'I have 4 of the Kat Von D liquid lipsticks now and absolutely love them. They apply beautifully, dry down completely matte, don\'t transfer and are incredibly long wearing. I\'m very happy wearing a very matte and dry feeling liquid lipstick as it will stay all night and that\'s what I want. I do prep my lips with a scrub and the jack black lip balm before I start applying my make up and then wipe the excess balm from my lip before applying this liquid lip and I have absolutely no difficulty applying and wearing it. Highly recommend if you can handle a matte lip!I own the following colors:LolitaLolita II (SO GOOD!)Outlaw (favourite red liquid lip)Project Chimps.'], 'author': u'ilovelippies ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u"Didn't Meet My Expectations", 'text': [u'I got the color Noble which looked really pretty when I swatched it. However, when I got home and put it on, I found that it was slightly patch making it impossible to layer it in order to make it more opaque. I expected it to be much better than it was. Don\'t get me wrong, I like it and I feel that it is good, but it isn\'t as good as I expected. It was matte and did stay on pretty well even without lip liner though so I\'m going to give it 4 stars.'], 'author': u'Sav938 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Tulsa, Oklahoma', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best Concealer Ever', 'text': [u'I am 27 years old, and have pretty much been wearing concealer since I was 13. I have NEVER repurchased a concealer, because I have pretty much never been totally happy with one. Well after 14 years, I have found my concealer soul mate. Seriously, this is the BEST CONCEALER EVER. It\'s worth the $40. It is lightweigt and feels like nothing is on, yet has such good coverage I can pretty much blend it out into a foundation. I have incredibly dry skin and this is the first concealer I have found in my life that I feel like actually moisturizes my skin. I am also very fair, and the "Awake" shade is the first shade I have ever found that doesn\'t make me look orange. I could rave about this product for days. BUY!!'], 'author': u'rutabagagirl ', 'date': [u'2016-07-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'bam bam concealer obsession', 'text': [u'I just bought this and have used it 3 or so times. And i am very happy. Going forward I really love creamy emolient type concealers like this one vs. concealers such as nars or urban decay. I wear the genius gel foundation in ivory medium and i purchased the first shade of the concealer in awake. I think the second shade would have been better to conceal my undereye circles. But i was waiting in sephora for over 20 mins while i kept being promised that i would be helped. I gave up and just picked that shade. A little goes along way with this concealer. It will take me a loooooong time to hit pan. I think I prefer the nars creamy concealer in custard to better conceal active breakouts. But this is great for a clear skin-mostly natural kind of day. I love the glass packaging. Overall happy!'], 'author': u'LavenderWilde ', 'date': [u'2016-07-16'], 'location': u'New York, New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}
ingredient: -Mineral Oil Free.

name: Peony Brightening Night Treatment Mask
reviews: {'title': u'So pricey but so worth it', 'text': [u'Like the review before me I didn\'t want to like this cream. I was offered a sample of this and thought "eh, why not." I wasn\'t looking for a night cream since I already had a decent one. After about 2 weeks of using the samples they gave me I was hooked! My skin tone gradually evened out (dark spots and redness was reduced) and I love the feeling of my face when I woke up. The non-sticky formula made my skin feel soft and supple in the morning. When I ran out of the sample--I was desperate for that night cream in my skincare routine.'], 'author': u'kristinejeanne ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Providence, RI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth the $$', 'text': [u'I really did not want this to work. The price tag seemed too high, but I love Fresh products and I\'ve been having issues with my skin. THIS STUFF WORKS. It is very expensive, but my skin has never looked better in my life. Even tone, smooth, and clear. Minimized pores a bit, but nothing dramatic. My pores weren\'t that big to begin with. The biggest difference I\'ve noticed is redness reduction and even skin tone. I will keep buying this product.'], 'author': u'holycowcubbies ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazinggggg!', 'text': [u'I tried this sample and didn\'t really have any expectations but the next morning I was impressed. My skin looked so radiant and felt soft and supple without being oily. I\'m now addicted to this stuff-it\'s a life changer!'], 'author': u'NYCX3 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Agave Lip Mask
reviews: {'title': u'champagne', 'text': [u'I love my champagne lip mask. I love to use this under lipstick or whenever my lips are dry. It\'s sticky at first then melts and just makes you feel moisturized. Plumps lips by hydrating and removing fine lines temporarily'], 'author': u'musikjunki ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Pricey but worth it', 'text': [u'Excellent mask for chapped lips. My lips were so dry they were on the verge of cracking. One use over night and they were better. On the second night, it was as if they had never been chapped.', u'It\'s really thick, so wear your hair back on a windy day! Also, doesn\'t wear well with lipstick, but that\'s OK. Perfect for overnight or going outside on frigid days. Also no weird taste/smell'], 'author': u'coffeedrinker ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'boston', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'The best lip balm ever! It lasts long and even after having meal you still feel it. Minimum color which is a good thing as for me, I try to go natural.'], 'author': u'honeymelon ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Fantastic, but a Bit Too Pricey!', 'text': [u'I had the opportunity to try deluxe samples of the Agave Lip Mask in all three finishes. The formula is unlike any other lip products I have tried before. These can be worn as a nighttime treatment or during the day. When I used it overnight, my lips felt incredible the next morning no matter what shape they were in the night before. It smoothed, plumped, hydrated, moisturized, and softened the lip surface for me. I detected a subtle exfoliation (chemically, perhaps?) because the rough bits on my lips seemed to be gone the next day and dead skin was easy to swipe off. It is very thick and heavy feeling (hence a "mask"), and but the supreme moisturization is worth the slight discomfort.', u'As far as the color selection goes, each shade looked different on the lips, and the colors were flattering on me (fair, yellow undertones, cool/pink overtones, but fairly pigmented lips). ', u'The reason I gave this 4/5 stars is that I think the price tag is too steep. Yes, this is an effective product with many benefits that surpasses all of the other lip moisturizers I have tried, but for what is essentially a balm, I won\'t spend this much. If it is in our budget, I\'d go for it. If not, get it through sample kits or with Sephora points!'], 'author': u'jaymeshore ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Hydrating + non-tacky', 'text': [u'I love the way this makes my lips feel, hydrated and smooth. It doesn\'t get messy, it honestly is the best. {'title': u'New Blush Fetish', 'text': [u'I was a devoted fan of the Buxom True Hue blush in Tryst. For some reason, it was discontinued in Sephora stores :( I was advised by a store clerk to try this one as a replacement. I was super skeptical at first, I have very sensitive and greasy skin and anything I change in my routine makes it go crazy. This was such a perfect color, nice long-lasting color and pigmentation though not as pigmented as Buxom but may be for the best. The color "Fetish" goes with anything, you can build up the color if you are tan or lightly sweep it on when you\'re back to your pale winter skin. This doesn\'t make skin greasy, clogged, or shiny and the color doesn\'t fade, even when you\'re sweating it out at the gym. I\'m on my 2nd container, the first one lasted me almost 7 months! This is my new go-to blush. I don\'t even miss my Buxom anymore... 5 stars!'], 'author': u'MsAnonymous28 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Incredible brush', 'text': [u'Like all of the Marc Jacobs brushes, the bristles are super soft, the handle smooth and yummy to hold, and there\'s no shedding. {'title': u"it's great.", 'text': [u'So I hate lipstick, lip gloss, lip sheen, Etc. I\'m that type of person who licks their lips and bites too much to keep any color or gloss on them adequately. When I tried this on in the store, I noticed how it felt almost like a Chapstick. It was very moisturizing which I feel I don\'t get from a lot of lip glosses. It also didn\'t feel heavy like a gloss. It gave me a pop of color without being too vibrant (I was aiming for something natural). I liked it enough to splurge on the price and I\'m glad I did. It keeps your lips soft and glossy without being heavy. I have a habit of licking my lips too much but I feel with this, I can develop a habit of not doing so. I know I won\'t have to worry about my lips feeling moisturizer with this on. Def worth it and can\'t wait to try more color with this brand.'], 'author': u'theRougeClient7 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'hole is to big and glue is to liquidy . I am careful not to push too fast and hard because I know how liquidy it is but NOPE ! The smell is not good just like every other eyelash glue I have tried . I ordered this online , when I opened the DUO box .... It was empty NO TUBE inside . Only the instructions . Had to drive an hour to the store to go exchange it for one that did have the product . name: Rapid Tan Mousse
reviews: {'title': u'Holy Grail Color', 'text': [u'You want to know how many self tanners I have tried? Between 15-20 and NOTHING looks as good as this one. It goes on like a luxurious froth and its easier to blend out on those tough spots like hands,feet,elbows, and knees. This lasted on me 6 days and i went to the pool twice over 4th of July weekend. I also am crazy about their tanning face serum, I noticed it had the IDEAL texture for a primer so i switched it out from my Smashbox for a few days and wow, I needed so much less foundation because my skin was one even color! I guess I\'ll do a review on it as well. Its too good for the beauty junkie not to own.'], 'author': u'jennifromdabloc ', 'date': [u'2016-07-08'], 'location': u'New Orleans, LA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not worth the money OR the time', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using the St Tropez Express Bronzing Mousse and I love it. The only reason I wanted to give this a try is because I like the colour of the Vita Liberata formula a little better (for my skin tone anyway - it has more of a red undertone). I applied for 2 hours, washed off, and saw absolutely no result. So I tried the next day and applied for 3 hours. Again, if there was any change, it was barely noticeable. What a waste of money and time. This is NOT a cheap product and its direct competitor, mentioned above, has a far superior product. Don\'t waste your time on this! Get the St Tropez Express Tan Mousse instead!', u'Oh, and the mitt that comes with this mousse is too small to use on anything but the face. So pointless.'], 'author': u'3emmy3 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-23'], 'location': u'Toronto ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Does not work:/', 'text': [u'I have have tried a lot of brands, but not the rapid tanners and nothing from Vida Liberata. However, I heard good things about the regular mousse so I figured I\'d try this out as it\'s too hot to use my other tanner during my sleep in the summer. Honestly, I had a lot of positives to say but they are pointless because it honestly did nothing..I left it on the full 3 hrs and I got no colour off of it. Just disappointed. Will be returning.'], 'author': u'AlyssaBenzo ', 'date': [u'2016-06-03'], 'location': u'Kitchener, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Color washes off avec a shower', 'text': [u'When I applied it I was so excited because ot was so easy to apply and the colors was perfect... Bu as soon as you get wet it washes right off even if you wait 24h !!! there\'s nothing left! Its more like a wahs off bronzer. Very disapointed.'], 'author': u'Elicorb ', 'date': [u'2016-05-27'], 'location': u'Montral', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'More like a wash-off bronzer', 'text': [u'I have tried the Vita Liberata pH tanning mousse and loved it so much I thought I would try their Rapid Tan. This formula isn\'t as easy to apply, as it dries very quickly, before you have time to rub it in. The other formula also dries quickly, which I love, but the other formula gives you time to at least rub it in. I lett this on for several hours (looking like I had been playing in dirt) and when I washed it off, ALL of the color washed down the drain. I used nothing to scrub, just water. Absolutely zero tan was left on my skin. I am a redhead and very fair so I would be able to see if I had any tan left. I will be returning this and going back to using their original mousse formula.'], 'author': u'MsStaciNicole ', 'date': [u'2016-05-02'], 'location': u'Tyler, Texas', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'love it!', 'text': [u'I decided to try Sephora airbrush foundation and I absolutely love this product. Please, do not discontinue and do not run out anymore :). {'title': u'life changing', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this product. I wear the shade "fawn". Air brush formula is like nothing else. It\'s watery. Doesn\'t feel like you\'re wearing foundation. You can go as light or as full coverage as you want. ', u'I am fair skinned but still have a lot of yellow in my skin. I\'m also quite oily. I have never been able to find a foundation that doesn\'t make me ghost white (nothing else on the market seems to understand light can still be yellow) or orange (being super oily means my foundation ends up oxidizing and turning me some weird dirty orange colour ). ', u'My BF doesn\'t like the sound of the metal balls inside rattling first thing in the morning. Oh well ! ', u'People literally stop me on street to ask what I use. <3'], 'author': u'DodoElectro ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'BEST - CHANGE YOUR LIPS', 'text': [u'This formula is AMAZING! I have VERY flaky lips and have developed the horrible habit of constantly picking the flaky skin from them. I put this on every night (I received it as a sample and that sample lasted about 3 months) and in the morning, lips have NO flakes! It makes lips supple, hydrated, and helps with lines!!! Definitely makes a plumper and more youthful pout! NOT STICKY AT ALL! Very pleasant feel and no harsh smells whatsoever (I don\'t think there IS a scent, actually). HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!! I am buying the full sized product now and will never again live without it. It has given me the softest lips I\'ve ever had and I am now purchasing their primer and scrub with this item!'], 'author': u'NeuroGirl1515 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Kent, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Returned', 'text': [u'I was looking for a good winter lip balm, that would keep my lips hydrated during the dry months. However this one did not work for me (maybe it works better for others). In my experience, I returned it after 3 days of use, because my lips had become even dryer after using it. Which was odd, because my lips weren\'t that chapped to begin with. I noticed after i put on a generous amount on my lips - approximately 40 minuets later my lips were dry and flaking from just sitting at my desk. I\'ve never had a lip-balm do that to my lips before - so i returned it. ', u'There were some pros about it though: It isn\'t highly scented, it doesn\'t leave a greasy or sticky feeling on your lips, which was nice. However for the price - i expected it to at least hydrate my lips for a few hours.'], 'author': u'Ravah ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Velour Puff
reviews: {'title': u'Got this just to try the Easy Bake method', 'text': [u'This is perfect for setting concealer and foundation in place. 1. Place the puff in loose powder or pressed powder. Rub product into the puff and press-roll product into the skin.'], 'author': u'Sarahnity97 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A must have', 'text': [u'It\'s wonderful to be able to purchase a high-quality puff that works with every powder I\'ve ever had. it doesn\'t take long before your Powderpuff is more yuck then puff... And that yuck is teeming with bacteria. So not good for your complexion or your make up. They were great with all kinds of products. so even if you\'re not using LM products you can definitely still use several LM powder puffs. Think if there is something related to your beauty blenders you have keep them clean and well cared for and replace them when it\'s time period I\'m so glad that and I am offers as the opportunity to purchase this hi quality puffs separately. I use them in and for okay and is of stuff. In a pinch they work great for a quick swipe of blush. I always keep several on hand. These are a no-brainer. Every beauty diva deserves a clean high quality puff:)'], 'author': u'cinderchella ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Must have, soft, luxerious', 'text': [u'This puff is a must have for using the Laura Mercier loose powders. I use this with the translucent powder over my foundation and it allows me to place the perfect amount on my face. The size is great, and easy to use to get under your eyes or in the corners of your face.'], 'author': u'SarahL1017 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': u'Rochester, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'YES!', 'text': [u'I\'ve set my foundation with Laura Mercier\'s loose Translucent Setting powder since 2003 and I have used Laura\'s puff for all of that time due to its superb performance. I\'ve collected many over the years and they\'ve taken a beating! Simply throw it in the washing machine and it\'s revived and ready to do its job!'], 'author': u'pickyartist ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': u'Dover, DE', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'EH', 'text': [u'I purchased it twice. The first time- I returned it. i was more turned off that it couldn\u2019t fit in the laura mercier setting powder container. I also struggled with applying the setting powder- I literally looked like I layer my face pin flour, so yeah i returned it the first time. i just felt that my angled brush made it easier to apply the setting powder. i later realized that i was using my angle brush for too many makeup applications. Since everyone (well at least most of my friends) about how great of a product this is, i decided to purchase it again. After binge watching youtube videos demonstrating how to use the Puff, a frikkin light bulb went off. Its great\u2026seriously the easy bake oven aint got nothing on the baking i do with this Puff (lol).'], 'author': u'Phillythetyrant ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Diorskin Nude BB Creme
reviews: {'title': u'love!', 'text': [u'I love this bb foundation! It is not full coverage and I would say not even medium coverage-- it does even out imperfectione and gives the face a true "natural" appearance (freckles show through). If you have scars, acne or other imperfections that you desire to cover with one layer- this isn\'t for you. But it really is a beautiful, radiant light glowy look. Perfect for summer coverage!'], 'author': u'GaBeautyGirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Mismatched', 'text': [u'I think the overall product is good, but the lady at Sephora matched the product to my needs/wants and not my skin type. I have an oily T-zone and semi-oily cheeks and chin. This product is more suited for dry skin, but could be used for normal skin types. Though it has all the qualities I wanted: coverage, moisturizer and high SPF sunscreen, it just isn\'t correct for my skin.'], 'author': u'8souffle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Product, Awful Packaging', 'text': [u'I am in LOVE with this product! I went into the store only to find that my tried and true tinted moisturizer from another company was "reformulated" and now too yellow for my complexion. The gal tried this product on me, and I was immediately impressed. I love the lightweight feeling, and the coverage is amazing. As a fair-skinned redhead, I am always thankful when I find a product that works with my complexion! HOWEVER, I have had issues with getting the product out of the container since I took it out of the box. I wish the tube weren\'t hard or the pump had a tube that went down into the package or something...small price to pay, though. And I will likely purchase again. :)'], 'author': u'Mle0406 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'North Augusta, SC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Translucent Loose Setting Powder
reviews: {'title': u'I like...', 'text': [u'I like this as a setting powder. I only use it for setting my under eye concealer. I bought the travel size since I could not part ways with my $38 for the full size. I like the outcome and then I always spray with a finishing mist so I don\'t look dry and the final look is perfect! I\'ve used Shiseido, MUFE and Ben Nye (several shades for WOC); I realize that the the white powders are just too stark for me and the Ben NYE is nice but looks ghostly in flash pics which is not good. name: Perversion Mascara
reviews: {'title': u'\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f', 'text': [u'After receiving a sample of this from another purchase, I continued to get sample after sample. I\'ve fallen in love with this mascara and although Better Than Sex seems to be the favorite, I much prefer Perversion over the latter. It does not clump, it layers beautifully, and will give you full looking lashes. The formula is so creamy too. You\'ll feel like you\'re putting a luxury mascara on, so I would say it\'s worth the money. It does not take a lot to achieve the full look, so I buy the smaller size. That way I have a fresh tube that lasts longer without expiring rather than buying the big tube.'], 'author': u'Dappanite ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: PRO Flat Concealer #76
reviews: {'title': u'Works well', 'text': [u'You can make a tiny bit of concealer go a long, long way with this brush. The bristles are soft. What I like best is the cover that comes with it. Whether you are storing it at home in a stand up container like I have, or if you are going to carry it in your purse, you won\'t have to worry about anything happening to the brush. Protects it from dust at home, and from makeup transfer in your purse or makeup bag on the go. The only complaint I have is the metal right next to the bristles, since it is a flat brush it doesn\'t always feel too great.'], 'author': u'Lutzgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Lutz, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'LOVE!', 'text': [u'When I opened my Sephora box right before I headed out of town to L.A. I thought I would throw it in my makeup bag before leaving to give it a shot! Totally forgetting this was a concealer brush I used it as a blending brush for my eyelids in the crease and loooooveeed it. Made the product go on like buttahhh. I\'ve used it every day this week since getting it on Wednesday and can\'t get enough! So now I guess I need to try it with concealer. But this brush is definitely a multitasker if it works great on the lids as well! Would purchase again!!'], 'author': u'ChrissyFitzy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-17'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: All About Eyes
reviews: {'title': u'Good moisturizer', 'text': [u'It\'s a good moisturizer, but does not do much more than that. The texture is very thin and light, does not feel heavy or oily under the eye, but it also absorbs (or dries out?) quickly so the effect is not very long lasting. If you just want a not too pricey eye cream that does basic moisturizing, this is a good choice. But if you want to reduce wrinkle and dark circle, try something else.'], 'author': u'doublenong ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Actually Works', 'text': [u'I am not a skin care person, aside from a face wash and moisturizer, this is one area where I am low maintenance when it comes to beauty. This is mostly because I usually can\'t tell a difference from product to product no matter the price tag, I feel that most are over hyped. ', u'However, this stuff is magical. I have horrible dark circles that I had always thought were genetic and wouldn\'t budge. After trying this product for five days my eyes look healthier and brighter, no longer need concealer and actually look like I have makeup on without any. I am only 21 so i can\'t say how this works with wrinkles, and I don\'t have any puffiness. However if you want something for dark circles that actually works, I would say this is it.'], 'author': u'ceking2017 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Washington D.C', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love this formula for day and night. Lightweight and moisturizing. Non scented and non irritating. Helped with my minor dark circles. Will repurchase. I would recommend this for people in their 20s.'], 'author': u'aangelaa ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'All About Moisture', 'text': [u'I love this product. I\'m cheap, so spending $32 on a small tub of eye cream is a big deal for me, but this product is so worth it. Certain products cause redness and flaking around my eyes, but not All About Eyes. I use it for its hydrating properties. It saves my eyes after much eye primer and shadow use. Disclaimer: I enjoy MOST Clinique products and they work well with my skin.'], 'author': u'TheMeganHess ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Siler City, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great, but..', 'text': [u'This is an incredible moisturizer. It smells amazing and does a great job at hydrating the skin. However, I have oily skin type and I cannot use this in the morning or I will be a grease ball all day long. It also seems like it has some sort of purple/pink iridescence to it that makes my skin look even more oily. I wanted to make sure that I reviewed this product and added my two cents about the oil thing, cause it was recommended to me by Sephora specifically for my oily skin. Over all, a great moisturizer, but stay away from using this in the morning if you have oily skin.'], 'author': u'Erika97 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Santa Cruz, Ca', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This product is like a sorbet, it smells really fruity. It\'s pretty hydrating, however my skin started to have some sort of breakout after using this for a week. I stopped using it. This was weird as I have used many other products from Caudalie and never had any issue with their gentle formulas. Not sure what is wrong with this product in particular.'], 'author': u'Wen314 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Great Daily Mosturizer', 'text': [u'This was one of the first Caudalie products I tried in a sample package I received. I love this moisturizer and use it over the thirst quenching serum. Recommend this product if you\'re on the fence.'], 'author': u'abaileygirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'McKinney, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I really liked this moisturizer, definitely the best I\'ve used so far. It has the signature, refreshing scent of Caudalie\'s products. As someone who is very sensitive to fragrance I had no issue with this moisturizer. It absorbs into the skin quickly. This moisturizer made my skin feel soft and hydrated. The redness of my cheeks calmed down after using this. Sadly, this lasted me only just over a month (even though I have my nights where I.. *ahem* don\'t wash up before bed). For the price, I can\'t see myself repurchasing this moisturizer every month. If you can afford it I would highly recommend this moisturizer to you.'], 'author': u'NicBB ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'Northwest Territories, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}
