name: Luminous Crème Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u'Easy to wear shade', 'text': [u'I really like Bite lipsticks and own several colors in each of their formulations. They apply creamy and smooth. Cava is exactly as I expected. Although the color is unusual, it is such a great nude shade that it can easily be swiped on without a mirror. Perfect shade to wear in the office or anytime I want just a little color on my lips. Comfortable and moisturizing on my lips. Took off one star after reading dozens of reviews about getting three packs of this color for the price of one. Sephora you\'ve been sending me daily emails for years, and also texts from time to time, but didn\'t send any info about the special.'], 'author': u'desertgirl501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'AMAZING!!!', 'text': [u'Bite beauty makes my favorite lipsticks ever!!! I owned a lot of the luminous creme lipsticks... but never tried Cava until a month ago! It is the most beautiful neutral shade! Took me a minute to get used to... having the lilac undertone... borderline grayish. It is a super easily tone to wear at work for me without getting looks from co-workers or patients. It\'s a no fuss throw on without a mirror shade! I love this formula but I also adore the Amuse Bouche formula... I would not be upset if they reformulated this color into the Amuse Bouche line. I have several backups already ... I even purchased a couple of the matte creme lip crayon in Cava as well!! You can\'t go wrong with this color especially if you have a lighter skin tone.'], 'author': u'xLadyChanelx ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE IT', 'text': [u'So, first of all, this is a really unusual shade. It\'s a mauvey, grey-tinged nude. I positively adore it, but it does look a little corpse-y on me sometimes, and I get the feeling that it might look strange on some undertones. I would look up some swatches before purchasing, especially since it\'s an online exclusive now. Also, mine melted in my purse, but I got a refund and think I just had a dud. ', u'This formula is great!!! It might be the creamiest lipstick I have ever applied, and for all that it wears decently. No scent, which is also pretty nice. If you\'re thinking about buying Cava... do it.'], 'author': u'lcwlcw ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It gets stuck all the time which makes it hard to do up. Maybe it just needs a spray of WD-40 or something but the zipper seems cheap. Perhaps I got a dud but for $60 it would have been nice to have a bag that does up a bit better than mine.'], 'author': u'mynicknameisJes ', 'date': [u'2016-08-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'holds so much!', 'text': [u'I was interested in buying this makeup bag after watching KathleenLight\'s video on it. It really does hold a ton of makeup and keeps everything so organized. I love the cover for my brushes and the middle divider pouch for my pencils. The little lipstick elastic holders are great too. It also has a small pocket inside that I like to keep my eye primer and other small items in. It\'s very sturdy and I like the nylon material compared to the pleather option. I used to take a few makeup bags with me for travel and now everything I need fits in here. I\'m so happy it came back in stock. It\'s a little pricey but I can see having this bag for a very long time since it holds and organizes everything perfectly.'], 'author': u'Nani1515 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Cityswept Finish
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Adds the perfect amount of grit to my thick hair. I use it as a finishing spray after blowouts to add a bit of texture. I flip my hair upside down and spray a little on the ends while shaking my head. It looks silly but the result is tousled volume with hold.'], 'author': u'MeghanaP ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'for frizzy hair w/ texture', 'text': [u'I have fine hair that is neither curly nor straight... Just kind of of weird, frizzy and kind of wavy unless I blow dry it to look decent. I let my hair air dry, put up in a bun once dry to \'help\' the wave a little bit and then I shake this stuff and spray as directed. It helps the frizz, creates shine where there was none, enhances the wave and creates a nice separation. B/c of this product, I can actually have air dried hair and not heat style so much. I love it!'], 'author': u'fancynoodles ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love using this as a finishing product. I pair it with the thickening mousse and thickening spray. I spray city swept in my hands and rub together and scrunch thoughout hair to add messy texture and volume.'], 'author': u'cucymuffinz ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Texture and body', 'text': [u'Great spray for texture, hold and body with grit. Very light mist, but don\'t use too much. Wouldn\'t use on roots.'], 'author': u'AMcKinney ', 'date': [u'2016-08-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Lip Brush
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect brush, poor glue', 'text': [u'This is a great lip brush. Application of lipstick is smooth and perfect every time. The problem, as others have mentioned, is that the brush part tends to come off the handle--it\'s not glued on very well. The solution to this is to get a hot glue gun and put it back together OR to just use tape. The brush is worth it imo even with the glue issues.'], 'author': u'santanaray ', 'date': [u'2016-04-02'], 'location': u'East Lansing, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Tory Burch Shower Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Luxury shower experience!', 'text': [u'A little of this gel goes a long way (on a poof). I find the scent lingers all day long, softly, and when I layer the body lotion on it, I get the perfect length and depth of scent all day long (I don\'t want to overwhelm others with my scents, d/t allergies and migraines, etc). It is pricey, but it is worth it. If you like Tory\'s perfume, get this.'], 'author': u'doctormomma ', 'date': [u'2015-05-15'], 'location': u'Victoria, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Great but needs to be stronger', 'text': [u'I love the Tory Burch Fragrance so I\'m working on getting the whole package set of shower gel, fragrance and body cream/lotion because I just love it.', u'The shower gel doesn\'t sting, burn or leave you skin dry like a lot of fragrance shower gels do. it does leave you skin feeling silky smooth. I was hoping that the smell of the shower gel would be stronger and linger like a men\'s body wash would, but it doesn\'t which leads me to giving a 3 star rating. Otherwise that the shower gel is great'], 'author': u'bzuubeck ', 'date': [u'2015-04-09'], 'location': u'Rego Park, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: LUNA™ For Men
reviews: {'title': u'My skin looks great!', 'text': [u'Skeptical at first, but bought from the tons of great reviews. Skin was immediately softer and exfoliated. Tone has evened out, lines were somewhat diminished and some minor acne issues have been resolved. NO MORE BLACKHEADS. Didn\'t irritate my somewhat sensitive skin either. Wish it was slightly cheaper, but great product'], 'author': u'JasonfromTX ', 'date': [u'2016-04-29'], 'location': u'Richmond, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I really wanted to like this, but...', 'text': [u'I love my Clarisonic, but I hate that I have to spend money on brush head replacements a few times a year. I had heard great things about the Luna so I figured I would give it a go. I really wanted to like it, but after a couple weeks of using it I ended up bringing it back. ', u'It feels nicer in your hand then the Clarisonic, which is a bit big and awkward sometimes. Other than that though, the Clarisonic wins out in every other way. The Luna just never felt like it was doing that much. My skin didn\'t look or feel fresh and clean afterwards like it does with the Clarisonic, and after a few days I noticed blackheads on my nose becoming more pronounced (After a few days back on the Clarisonic the were minimized again). As for the \'anti-aging\' setting, that 100% felt like a gimmick they just threw on there at the end. It did not feel like it did anything at all, and I never saw even the slightest difference.', u'The only thing I can think is that maybe this would be good for someone with sensitive skin that can\'t use a Clarisonic but still wants something more then just a washcloth, which this is (but just barely).'], 'author': u'miphall ', 'date': [u'2016-02-28'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not just for men', 'text': [u'Love it since I have skin that gets nasty after not exfoliating for 2 days and the ClarisOnic is too harsh for everyday I bought this with high hopes and I\'m absolutely in love! Does remove dead skin and leave skin feeling soft without irritating it.'], 'author': u'Babyqueen ', 'date': [u'2016-01-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE my foreo', 'text': [u'It has been four weeks since using my new foreo! I love it so much better than other cleansing devices. I love how rich of a lather it helps to create, and a single charge lasts FOREVER! I haven\'t explored the anti-aging mode yet, but that will be my next experiment.'], 'author': u'SMae90 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-20'], 'location': u'New York City', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Foreo for men: the best cleansing tool ever!', 'text': [u'I have to admit that I am a totally beauty addict and whoever knows me is aware that I have in my collection products from the best high end brands in the market ( La Prairie, Sisley, La Mer, Dior, Chanel, Guerlain...) and ALL of them they work much better since I start using this elegant, effective and intelligent beauty device. My skin has never looked so smooth, clean and neat and it\'s not because I have change my beauty routine just because I have changed my Clarisonic for Foreo for men as the most wonderful beauty tool I have tried.My skin feels so smooth, radiant and glowing!'], 'author': u'CarlosD77 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-14'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: LUNA™ For Ultra-Sensitive Skin
reviews: {'title': u'A Skin Saver!', 'text': [u'I have been looking for a cleansing tool that will work with my extremely sensitive skin - while still doing a better job than just cleansing my face with my hands. This has been a great addition to my skincare routine! ', u'After using this device during my 2nd cleanse, my skin looks plumper and glowing. It definitely helps my cleanser get deeper into my skin. Super effective!'], 'author': u'Curvelles ', 'date': [u'2016-03-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this!', 'text': [u'I really enjoy this cleaning product and it always leaves my skin feeling super soft! Also a bonus that it doesn\'t need to be charged until after 5 months :)'], 'author': u'Wendy9999 ', 'date': [u'2015-08-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wonderful!', 'text': [u'I purchased this product because I like to give myself a really good facial massage with my cleanser but I often have long nails that can get in the way. This was just the ticket: nice and gentle yet thorough. I will mention though that I did exchange this one for the normal/sensitive skin version so that I could essentially have 2 foreos I one. I use the ribbed "anti aging"side most of the time and the silicone brush side a couple times per week.'], 'author': u'thatshortchicky ', 'date': [u'2015-05-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not a complete fix for acne', 'text': [u'I suffer from hormonal acne, specifically clogged pores and cystic acne on my chin and around my mouth. I\'ve been using this for a few weeks and have noticed a decrease in clogged pores. I sometimes get breakouts on my chin and those have decreased as well. It\'s not a total fix for me - my problem is an oil increase that no amount of topical care can prevent - but it\'s a good way to exfoliate without aggregating my sensitive skin. I\'ve noticed my skin is softer and has a healthy glow now.'], 'author': u'psarahdactylx0x ', 'date': [u'2015-05-25'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'sooooooo gentle', 'text': [u'the white LUNA is definitely for ultra sensitive skin. It is very very very gentle so it cannot make my skin irritable. But the result of using it is as same as using my hands to wash my face. Thus, please choose the pink one unless you have a very sensitive skin.'], 'author': u'Linaaaaaa ', 'date': [u'2015-03-02'], 'location': u'Trumbull, CT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: LUNA™ For Combination Skin
reviews: {'title': u'skin-so-soft', 'text': [u'I just received my Foreo Luna for combination skin and I have to say my skin has never felt softer.', u'It\'s only been a couple of days, but I\'m starting to notice a difference.Like all the other reviews I\'ve read on here I\'m as well, going to have to bid a farewell to my clarisonic.Not only is this a lot light than my clarisonic,but it only takes an hour to charge.I highly recommend this brand foreo to everyone!!!!'], 'author': u'Deborah34 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing, best for pores and tone', 'text': [u'I found it helped my pores, size and intensity. I also didn\'t realize how well my tone improved until I compared a photo to my before. After 5 months, my skin tone completely changed from red and splotchy to creamy. ', u'That was a pleasant surprise. ', u'I also love that I have never had to recharge it in those five months and it\'s completely water proof.'], 'author': u'eyehopefan ', 'date': [u'2016-08-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Softer than rose petals', 'text': [u'I was extremely hesitant to buy such an expensive product but did so based on the reviews. I\'m so excited about this product after its maiden voyage in my life. After a good charge I incorporated it into my evening cleansing and my face is literally softer than rose petals.', u'I expected no difference. I expected to be horribly disappointed. I expected my combination skin to be exactly the same. Wow was I ever WRONG. I felt and literally looked younger. I\'ve only had similar results from professional spa treatments which cost the same as my LUNA.', u'Well now I can save my money and have gorgeous skin at home.'], 'author': u'KittynFace ', 'date': [u'2016-06-20'], 'location': u'Stafford, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A must have', 'text': [u'I went on a 3-week business trip recently and didn\'t take my new Luna with me. That was a mistake.', u'I\'ve had it for a couple of months now and began using it morning and night just because I wanted to make sure I was getting use out of it for the price. It became part of my routine but I was also trying out a bunch of other skincare products (moisturizers, serums, masks) at the same time, so while my skin was looking and feeling great, it was hard to tell what was making the difference.', u'Then I went on this business trip and had all my favorite skincare in mini form with me, but didn\'t bring the Luna, and all the little bumps I used to have on my face came right back. My skin never really felt totally clean unless I exfoliated or kept a mask on my face for 30 minutes, and my makeup didn\'t go on as smoothly.', u'Long story short, in under 5 minutes a day this little thing made a HUGE difference in my skin. It\'s the kind of thing that you don\'t realize how much it does for you until you don\'t have it anymore, and I never want to leave mine behind again!'], 'author': u'sophiasophia ', 'date': [u'2016-04-27'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best skin care investment', 'text': [u'I finally gave in and bought the Luna for myself after months of debating whether or not to buy one. So glad I just went and did it. This is the best skin care investment I have ever made. I\'ve only been using it for a week now and my skin has already changed dramatically. I always have small pimples and blackheads all over my chin, and no matter what I did, I couldn\'t get them to go away. You could see all the bumps through every kind of foundation. After just 3 days of using the Luna my chin has cleared up. Nothing has every made my chin so smooth. My larger pores on my cheeks are gone. The blackheads on my nose are almost completely gone. This little tool is amazing. You can feel how clean and smooth is makes your skin just after the first use. I highly suggest giving it a try before spending 100\'s on face products. This is the only expensive face care product you need.'], 'author': u'jellybee ', 'date': [u'2016-03-13'], 'location': u'toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Santal Carmin Pure Perfume
reviews: {'title': u'Heaven complementary 30ml', 'text': [u'This is my favourite signature scent! For the past 5 months I was walking in and out of Sephora smelling Santal continuously spraying myself then walking around the mall. Numerous times I had people walk up to me asking me what I was wearing. Although yes it is 245 dollers I can tell you it\'s worth every penny! At Sephora stores when every you buy a 100 ml atelier cologne u get a complementary 30ml of your choice! On top of that if the location has the engraving machine they engrave what ever you would like on the leather pouch that comes with the 30ml fragrance also complementary! With an offer like that how could you say no!'], 'author': u'YasminaC ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Santal Carmin Pure Perfume Review', 'text': [u'I absolutely agree with how gorgeous the scent is... However, it does NOT stay on for hours and hours. If you\'re looking for a scent that you want everyone to smell while you walk past them, then this fragrance is not for you. It is a sophisticated fragrance that needs to be reapplied (4-stars) at least once; especially, if you are looking for compliments vs. just enjoying the scent for yourself. Atelier has a sweet love story attached to it, too... ask your Sephora Fragrance rep, they should know it.'], 'author': u'SummerOf75 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-12'], 'location': u'Lake Oswego, Oregon', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Simply amazing', 'text': [u'This is just a perfectly heavenly woody scent. I\'m female and I love it on my skin. I don\'t find it to be overtly masculine at all.'], 'author': u'cattlexbruiser ', 'date': [u'2016-03-01'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'signature scent', 'text': [u'I\'m a perfume junkie and have the hardest time finding scents that I really love. I stay away from the super sweet/reminds me of a teenager scents and go for the more woodsy/flowery ones. A lot of scents get super spicy on me though which I both love and hate since spicy makes me think masculine and I don\'t want to smell like I\'m wearing a mans cologne. After seeing this on IG recommended by a beauty blogger i decided to order it based on the description since it sounded perfect. Anxiously waited the 3 days since it wasn\'t available in stores around me and put it on the second I got the package. So far, I love it. I\'m getting more of the dulce de leche smell right now with some woods, definitely warm and captivating. Hoping the die down will be more woodsy. It\'s definitely a winner. I ordered some samples via atelier\'s site to try a few more out. The bottle is beautiful, and I love that you can unscrew the spray top if you want to splash it on or refill it. This is marketed for a man but I don\'t get that AT all. Maybe it\'s my chemistry but it smells too feminine for a man. Hopefully it will last a good portion of the day. I tried a sample of the mandarin one that came with a previous order yesterday and it lasted all day on my skin and definitely still lingered there when I smelled my wrist in the morning. Super impressed with this company so far! I also like the price point since I feel like not everyone will be wearing this. I can\'t stand being in a store and smelling something I own on another person.'], 'author': u'perbear ', 'date': [u'2016-02-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Such a warm lovely scent!', 'text': [u'So I tried both the Atelier Santal Carmin and the Blanche Immortell samples and while I absolutely love both the latter smells more feminine. I plan on getting the Santal Carmin for my boyfriend because I love it so much and would to smell it everyday! Lol!'], 'author': u'JessicaInspired ', 'date': [u'2016-02-03'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

I use a lip balm underneath since it can be a bit drying on its own but the color payoff is beautiful and the lipstick lasted through eating and drinking with only minor fading where my lips come together. Very happy with my purchase and will likely buy a couple other colors.'], 'author': u'GwynJones ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Got lucky on my birthday - found this scent', 'text': [u'We always go to Sephora for my birthday and this time the Atelier Rep was there helping people choose perfumes. I am very sensitive and had purchased one of the samplers but found them too citrusy. When I asked for a floral he suggested this and I love it. It\'s a little heavier scent than I usually wear.'], 'author': u'casz ', 'date': [u'2016-02-28'], 'location': u'Lloydminster, Alberta', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u"It's a SIGNATURE Scent", 'text': [u'Reviewing a fragrance is very subjective, as a scent can smell entirely different depending on the body chemistry of the wearer. All I can say about this rich, warm, palette-engulfing scent is that when you smell it, you either fall in love or get instantly turned off...there is NO in-between! This is the scent that I have been searching for. It\'s woody, spicy, warm, earthy and velvety. It\'s quite powerful to the point where there\'s almost a masculine element to it. And at the same time the floral hint softens the fragrance and really rounds it out so as not to be too overpowering. I guarantee there won\'t be a swarm of reviews for this fragrance because it\'s quite special. It\'s not something every woman can wear. It\'s not a typical airy, powdery, fading scent. It takes a bit of confidence and conviction to wear this. As the fragrance consultant at Sephora told me, "Blanche Immortelle chooses it\'s wearer...not the other way around." Best of luck if you find yourself chosen by this one-of-a-kind scent!'], 'author': u'HoneyBrownBunny ', 'date': [u'2015-02-12'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'The Answer for a Long Lasting Fragrance', 'text': [u'This fragrance is beautiful. It\'s sophisticated, sexy, and demure all at once. Better yet you only need one or two sprays of Blanche Immortelle to last you all day, all night, and into the next morning. I highly recommend testing this out!!'], 'author': u'roses47 ', 'date': [u'2014-11-29'], 'location': u'Ontario, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Exquisite', 'text': [u'Not usually fond of florals, I am smitten by this scent - it is geometrically perfect, profound, and fresh all at once... Like the ancient ruin of a temple surrounded by greenery, it evokes time-worn rituals, purity of form, and the breath of nature. This is the work of master perfumers.'], 'author': u'DansLaLune ', 'date': [u'2014-09-15'], 'location': u'Toronto', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: The Original Creamy Khôl Me Kajal Eyeliner
reviews: {'title': u'smudge a lot!!', 'text': [u'I have mixed feelings regarding this product, I do like the package and the wand, it\'s easy to blend but it smudge a lot!! You need apply an eye primer underneath, I bought this originally to create the smoke messy sexy eye look, but if you don\'t use a primer it goes everywhere. It\'s very creamy, it\'s not long lasting because no high pigmentation, but I like it, with a primer I can make it work, I\'m not looking for a straight line...'], 'author': u'isastern ', 'date': [u'2016-05-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Best Sunscreen Ever', 'text': [u'I don\'t have sensitive skin but it is acne prone. After the last two sunscreens I bought broke me out, I went back to a trusted one. It felt like returning to an old friend. It\'s thicker in viscosity than I remembered but the scent is much weaker, which I like. I\'ve been using it for the past two weeks and no new breakouts in sight. It\'s more expensive than I\'d like but it works.'], 'author': u'CiBach ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Smells nice!', 'text': [u'I have oily skin that is very acne prone and this works like a charm. I am also very pale and I never get burned when I am wearing this. I will say I do look like a grease ball immediately after application, but I usually do my makeup right after and the powder tones it down. It sits well underneath my foundation, does\'t ball up like some of the other sunscreens I have tried. The price point is not that insane either so overall I am very pleased with this product and will repurchase once I run out.'], 'author': u'Evelynn21 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'I wanted it to work', 'text': [u'As a pale woman with very sensitive skin I have to have sunscreen. I was looking for the easiest, least fragrant, and lightweight product available. This would probably be my winner had it not broken my skin out everywhere I put it. Sadly, it went back to the store. Still searching for a good solution.'], 'author': u'WinningAtLife ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'BEST sunscreen', 'text': [u'Only taking a star off because the spray mechanism sometimes sucks. I don\'t really care though since I always decant the 5oz into my own little 1oz spray bottle to carry through the day. I wish I could buy it in a larger size. I go through a little less then 1oz per month using it on my face and arms daily. I use other unscreens labeled for "sport" if I\'m going good swimming or to the beach though, I agree that the oil might rub off with intense activity. But for going to class or running errands I will repurchase again and again.', u'If product texture has been a barrier to you wearing sunscreen in the past, try this one. It\'s so smooth. No white cast. My arms are both fully protected in 20 seconds so I have no excuse not to do it before class. I do use it on my face daily with or without makeup but if you\'re really self conscious of a shiny face you may want to keep this on your arms (I put it on, moisturize, liquid foundation, then blot once before setting powder. Makes for a dewy finish.)'], 'author': u'teacup5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great product, bad dispenser', 'text': [u'The fragrance is pleasant. If you don\'t like oil based products, you\'ll hate this. It runs on just like an oil and worked great as a sunscreen. Wish this part was redesigned.'], 'author': u'soxrox ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good product, bad spray', 'text': [u'I love this product! It was so nice to have an oil when I went on vacation and was reapplying like crazy. However, the spray part almost never works. {'title': u'very soft', 'text': [u'I have most of MJ\'s brushes and LOVE THEM! This one picks up product well, offers good control (to avoid looking like a blushing clown) and blends well. Nice soft brush. As other reviewers noted, there is a lot of dye to rinse off, but a good wash takes care of that. I am disappointed in the amount of shedding, but not enough to return it because applying blush has always been a challenge and this brush did a great job. Hopefully this brush will be improved, but in the interim I\'m hoping for an eye brush collection because all of the other MJ brushes are excellent!'], 'author': u'NYCSis ', 'date': [u'2016-08-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Soft, but not perfect', 'text': [u'I want to start that I am a huge MJ brush fan and own 5 different MJ brushes and wish there were also eye make-up brushes.', u'This is the only MJ brush that I can say I was disappointed with. I admit it was so very soft and luxurious that I began using it before cleaning it. This brush was perfect in feel and flawless application in every way and I just loved using it.', u'Then I cleaned it.... and everything changed :(', u'First, I was surprised by all the black dye that came from the brush. So unnecessary. Secondly, this is my only MJ brush that lost its shape after cleaning. It did dry to its original softness, but it never went back to the original perfect shape.', u'For the price (and compared to the quality of my other MJ brushes) I am very disappointed.', u'I am only too thankful that I had my other MJ brushes first, or I may not have bought them after this one.'], 'author': u'LisaN17 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-24'], 'location': u'Middletown Oh', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Olivia Palermo x Ciaté London Nail Collection
reviews: {'title': u'Love', 'text': [u'This nail polish was unlike any I\'ve ever used. I normally use drug store brands and OPI, and have tried Morgan Taylor a couple of times, which I think is a salon polish. Anyway, I used this polish straight away when it came and absolutely love it. The bottle and packaging were beautiful and the shade of red is lovely! I bought Hutch. It\'s a bright, classic red, very pretty. I just put it on again to give it another try before finishing this post. I love how it goes on, you really only need one coat, but I\'m not sure about the other colours as I\'ve only tried this one. It goes on very smooth and one coat covers everything. I\'m a person who is rather bad at painting nails and I usually have to clean up around my nail bed a lot afterwards but with this my mess is very minimal due to the awesome brush. It feels so nice when you\'re applying it and the long handle on the bottle is good for getting a good grip when applying (also looks really nice). I\'d say this went on easier than any other polish I\'ve tried. Also I remember it didn\'t seem to last very long before wearing off but I was in such a hurry that I didn\'t put a top coat over it so I can\'t say how durable it is. I\'m hard on my nails and most polish only looks nice for about three days on me. The only downfall is this colour does seem to stain the skin a bit so it\'s harder to touch up after I make a mess, but as I said, the mess is minimal. And the other minus is the price but I will be buying another colour anyway because this one is so great! I have included two picutres, keep in mind, my laptop camera is terrible and my cuticles are very dry and disgusting right now so it may look a bit jagged, but that\'s nothing to do with the polish. Also, this is what I was talking about with making a mess, this is "unfixed" nails for me, not wiped around the cuticle yet and no top coat, so it\'s pretty great compared to most other results I usually get.'], 'author': u'supermandy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': u'Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Liquid Silk', 'text': [u'I love this nail polish! It goes on beautifully opaque on the nail, no streaks! Minus one star because it will clump a little bit so you need to shake every so often. But otherwise I absolutely love the formula and the product!'], 'author': u'LovelyInsideOut ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': u'San Francisco', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Not Nantucket!', 'text': [u'This polish is Napa Valley was very nice. Two coats lasted for almost two weeks on my toes. It was opaque after two coats, and went on smoothly. Nantucket on the other hand too three coats to become opaque and started wearing off after three days. I will be returning that color. It was also streaky. I have $3.00 polish that performs better. The white/pinkish color in this collection is the same way. It costs too much to perform this poorly. I can recommend Napa Valley...it\'s beautiful! But I would be wary of any of the other colors.'], 'author': u'makeupmary1 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Olivia Palermo x Ciaté London Smoked Out Gel Kohl Liner
reviews: {'title': u'awesome liner', 'text': [u'I have purchased this liner in black and now the purple. It is by far the best liner I have used. name: Perfect Hair Day® Night Cap Overnight Perfector
reviews: {'title': u'amazing product', 'text': [u'I got this as a sample in my Play! Box and went out and purchased the full size. I have dry, wavy, somewhat frizzy hair that I only wash twice a week (Sunday and Friday nights) This makes my hair smooth and shiny and manageable for pretty much the entire work week. When I wake up on Monday mornings, I can pretty much just leave the house now where I used to have to use a flat iron to achieve my desired results. Amazing product and will look into the rest of the PHD products now too'], 'author': u'CorinneWalsh26 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'pleasantly surprised & impressed', 'text': [u'I was hesitant when I tried this... but I was extremely surprised and pleased with the results! My hair is color treated, dry, and damaged ever since I went blonde. Lately, my hair has been getting so tangled up and hard to brush. I decided to give this sample a try. Unfortunately, I had to use the entire 1 oz. sample but I love the results. The product smelled SO good, even though it was a little string. It absorbed into my hair instantly. I left it in for a few hours, rather than overnight. I then washed it out with a clarifying shampoo and when I brushed my hair, it brushed out easier than it has in a very long time. I wish this product was cheaper, as I would have to use a lot of it on my hair for each use.'], 'author': u'alinaNYC ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great results and great value', 'text': [u'Received this in September\'s Play box. I\'m not a person that spends $75 for a hair treatment, even if it works, but the price point for this product plus the legitimately beautiful results that last for a full 5 days have turned me into a full-size purchaser. Smells wonderful, and after using my blowdried hair has no frizzies or flyaways - just soft and smooth. The results are equivalent to the October box\'s sample of $75 hair treatment, but Living Proof\'s value and results can\'t be beat.'], 'author': u'BD9E ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Did nothing', 'text': [u'I have dry, frizzy damaged hair and this did nothing for it. The smell of it is nice and i was excited, but didn\'t noticed anything. name: All-In-One Cleanser With Toner
reviews: {'title': u'Great Morning Toner', 'text': [u'I found this product bc the sales rep for Dr. Dennis Gross was in Sephora that day and gave me a week long sample to try. After a week of use I went back to buy the product. I use it each morning as the first thing I put on my face and it\'s been great! It is a gentle start to my morning skincare routine that does not require harsh soapy cleansing on my already clean face. It\'s an all-in-one toner/cleanser so it saves time and makes my skin feel clean. I use a more soapy cleanser at night to get all my make up but this is perfect for the morning. I have been using it for two years now.'], 'author': u'rainar213 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'great alone or as part of a routine', 'text': [u'I have combo skin tending towards dry in spots. This is strong enough to clean without irritating my dry spots. At the end of an average day it is enough to wash with this followed by moisturizer. I also use clarasonic Mia. If I am wearing heavier makeup or waterproof eye makeup I do need to use a cleansing wipe first to get my face really clean.'], 'author': u'dtyler71 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'horrible cleanser', 'text': [u'I\'m a skincare junkie and I\'ve own so many cleansers. This cleanser is the worst it didn\'t take off my foundation at all and made my face feels dirty n gross that I had to go in with another cleanser. Do not buy!!'], 'author': u'Sexycd4u ', 'date': [u'2016-06-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The cleanser of my dreams', 'text': [u'I admit, I\'m lazy when it comes to always washing my face. I received a sample of this cleanser and ended up buying it after a couple days. A cleanser where I don\'t have to get soapy water on my shirt, hair and dripping down my neck, perfect! Plus this cleanser gets all my makeup off, foundation, blush, eye makeup, buhbye! I do, sometimes need a little extra to get stubborn mascara off, but this has become my HG cleanser, and it lasts a long time, one bottle takes me about 4 months to go through.'], 'author': u'FairytaleDee ', 'date': [u'2016-04-10'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

I also thought I would be able to get used to the fact that it didn\'t leave my skin feeling squeaky clean, but I just couldn\'t. It will be going back, but I still love Dr. DG :)'], 'author': u'courtneyleeh ', 'date': [u'2016-03-17'], 'location': u'McHenry, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'love love love this eyeliner but...', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this eyeliner! I have ver oily skin and the smudging is minimal with this eyeliner. I have been using this eyeliner for two years. The only reason why it\'s not five stars is because once the tip breaks off which happens fairly often, there isnt a way to get the eyeliner back up to use. Seems like a lot of people have this issue. It\'s a shame the issue hasn\'t been corrected.'], 'author': u'AWebb1986 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my everyday eyeliner!', 'text': [u'I love this eyeliner! It is my go to everyday liner. I\'ve used this for about a year now and my only complaint is that I\'ve had to repurchase it twice, because if the tip breaks lower than the top of the plastic tube, the sharpener does not work. So it\'s basically a bust if the tip breaks, but it\'s such a good liner I always go back to get another! It\'s the only pencil type of liner I can use to make a wing (wings are not just for gel and liquid!) I have the brown color that makes a nice natural look, I also have black which works well too.'], 'author': u'mandynoons ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: GELTOX® TOP COAT
reviews: {'title': u'Finally!', 'text': [u'I\'m so grateful for those that took the time to leave a review, that\'s the reason I decided to give this a try. I\'ve been doing my own gel manis for over a year now, but also have LOADS of gorgeous RNPs. Unfortunately no matter what base/top coat I\'ve used, I always experience chipping within 24-48 hours, which I find unacceptable (and why I was so happy when gel polish came out). I\'ve tried the "gelly" method described on Manictalons\' and Chickettes\' blogs with some success, but Geltox top coat is the TRUTH! I experienced chipping on one nail of my "Cindy" hand within a couple of days which I think may have been "operator error" because the others still looked great. After fixing up that chip and after a week has gone by, I have some minor tip wear on cindy, but my left hand looks really great! I purchased this with a gift card, but will gladly come out of my own pocket to purchase when it runs out. If you understand the do\'s and don\'t\'s of working with gel polish, you should be a happy camper. Anything that keeps my RNP on for at least 1 week without having to go back and continuously repair chipping is a thumbs-up winner to me. I hope Ciate will continue to make this amazing project!'], 'author': u'Gemlady521 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-16'], 'location': u'Matthews, NC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"THIS IS IT!!! A Nail Lover's Dream!", 'text': [u'I am obsessed with gel nails and have been doing them at home since the first at-home kit came out. However, I also have a Massive collection of nail polishes and lacquers like most ladies do. In any case, when I purchased this, it was after I found it online and basically thought if it worked it would be the holy grail. And baby it is :-) Some poor reviews/experiences I\'ve read I feel are caused by just a *few* little things:Prep nails like you would for any nail polish. ESPECIALLY use a pink soft block file to rough up your nails.BE SURE to use a decent regular (not gel) basecoat! I can\'t emphasize this part enough, as chipping and peeling is caused by the lack of adhesion to the nail itself! You have to give the polish and subsequent gel top coat something to hang on to. I assure you will have at least 10-12 days of wear with any of your nail polishes, and it has a gel finish, wear and durability. It really is the holy grail. Good luck :-)'], 'author': u'nerdynurse22 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not even close to gel/shellac nails--chips & peals', 'text': [u'I have been doing my own shellac nails at home for 2 years. They last me 2-3 weeks. So i know how to properly apply these types of polishes.', u'Unfortunately, I tried several ways to make this work (one coat, two coats, longer dry time under lamp, applying at tip to seal nail, etc)....but nothing worked. Nails looked great on first day, but chipped on second day. Unfortunately, this gel top coat is not as sturdy as real shellac/gel nails.', u'I was really hopeful this would work, as I have a lot of regular nail polish colours I wanted to use and turn into gel polishes with this top coat.', u'If you want gel/shellac nails that last, stick to the real deal, not this product. I had to return.'], 'author': u'DashaVee ', 'date': [u'2015-12-11'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great alternative for traditional gel system.', 'text': [u'I have been using Sephora by OPI gel system for more than 2 year. As they discontinued it I felt I had to try something else. So I found Ciate GET TOP COAT. I used it for the first tie 4 days ago. I read the instruction and follow thru, I mean I wait until my nails are really really dry like 30 to 40 minutes. And applied the coat, 2 coats. I used my own lamp not the one that comes in the kit. So far my nails looks like true gel nails. I will see how it goes when days goes by and also how will i take this off\u2026 but so far I\xb4m happy with the results and with Ciate products in general.'], 'author': u'AndyBertoli ', 'date': [u'2015-08-25'], 'location': u'Buenos Aires, Argentina', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Just doesn't cut it", 'text': [u'Was so excited when I read about this product as I have many beautiful polishes that I would love to wear on my nails instead of just my toes. After following the directions it just doesn\'t cut it. I have spent more time trying to make it work than if I had just used my gel polish and it doesn\'t protect my nails as well either. Will be returning.'], 'author': u'jmh4 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-13'], 'location': u'Birmingham, ALK', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Makeup Melter Murumuru Makeup Remover Balm

I have oily skin and it\'s so gentle on my face and moisturizing at the same time, which I love most about this product. It removes all the foundation, eyeshowow and mascara perfectly.'], 'author': u'Biancamntn ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Triple Shot Mascara™
reviews: {'title': u'Holy Grail', 'text': [u'I have really sensitive eyes, and before going to this mascara, I was using Too Faced - Better Than Sex. BTS used to me my go-to, and I never had a problem with it back when I used it a few years ago. I don\'t know if they had recently changed their formula, BUT when I used BTS this year, it was dry, flaky, and it would get in my eyes and irritate my contacts. It was BAD. So, I went looking for a new mascara with a wetter formula. I saw the sample size of Ciate and read that it had a glossy finish. I LOVE THIS MASCARA. The Starfish wand is EVERYTHING -- it basically coats every lash of yours. If you have long but no-so-thick lashes - Triple Shot will thicken and darken with one coat. The best part about it is that it stays true to the "glossy finish". I have never had it flake on me, and it\'s never irritated my eyes. I always have to buy a new tube every month because I can\'t really go a day without applying this to my lashes. Y\'all. This is my stuff right here. People constantly ask me if I\'m wearing lash extensions because Triple Shot does all of the following - lengthens, adds volume, and thickens! I USED to have lash extensions, but like I said before, I have sensitive eyes, so my reaction to the lash glue wasn\'t all that great. If you\'re looking for a new trust-worthy mascara, I highly recommend this one. I believe the still sell the sample size, also!'], 'author': u'LyssaPanini ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lush, Sexy, and Femme', 'text': [u'I purchased this lipstick in the color \'Icon\' and it\'s a red that I reach for a lot. Just to give you context, 98% of my lipstick stash are reds. I always receive compliments on it but more important than that, I just love the way I look in it. It has become my personal, signature red, beating out the Too Faced Melted Ruby, Lancome\'s Red Stiletto, and Urban Decay\'s F-Bomb, which are my other favorite reds. The Hourglass lipstick is also very comfortable to wear. {'title': u'Really disappointed', 'text': [u'I have been wearing Flower Bomb for years and have been wanting this cream for ages. I finally got it during the VIB sale and despite the gorgeous packaging, I had to take it back. This smells nothing like the perfume. The second I put this on I noticed and it ended up giving me a headache. When I went in the store to return it I tried the body lotion and that doesn\'t smell like Flower Bomb to me either. Very disappointing! :('], 'author': u'Danielleisms ', 'date': [u'2014-12-30'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Flowerbomb Body Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'Smells amazing and pairs well w/perfume', 'text': [u'I love Flowerbomb, it\'s my go-to scent. I got the lotion to pair with my perfume and help it last longer. I love the smell and the bottle is a good size, since it\'s pretty expensive. Only problem is its texture. I would like something a little thicker. It\'s very watery, almost hard to control coming out of the top. Other than that. I\'d give it five stars.'], 'author': u'SaraOR88 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Shimmery Goodness', 'text': [u'I received this for Christmas with the perfume and was so excited to try it! I love the consistency of the lotion and it does last quite a bit. I have noticed that Flowerbomb doesn\'t last as long as Chanel perfumes/lotions so that\'s kind of a bummer but the smell is SO GOOD. This lotion does has a shimmer to it but I actually enjoy it. Given the hefty price tag I probably will not repurchase because it is a rather small bottle.'], 'author': u'ShivaAsadi ', 'date': [u'2016-07-06'], 'location': u'Irvine, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"There's a shimmer...", 'text': [u'It would be nice if the description had warned/told of the shimmer or glitter this has. I didn\'t realize until I finished applying and noticed gold shimmer all over my hands. It\'s not that noticeable at all on the skin, but boy it loves the palms of your hands. Like another reviewer also mentioned, I don\'t care for the thin consistency; it seems more of a step to reinforce the perfume than a lotion. I didn\'t notice an increase in softness at all. I absolutely LOVE their cream, but it\'s more of a treat/special occasion deal due to the price than an everyday thing. Overall, not impressed with this product, especially at $53'], 'author': u'mscrks ', 'date': [u'2016-06-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Clinical Concentrate Boosters™
reviews: {'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'I am almost done with all three bottles and I can\'t say I will repurchase. I loved the concept of the boosters but I found results mixed. The hydration booster felt good on the skin, but it did nothing other than that. I still had dry patches. I have had other vitamin c serums that made more difference than the radiance booster. I did like the purification booster - I used it during the day under my makeup if I had a breakout. But overall, I just didn\'t notice much of a difference by adding these to my routine.'], 'author': u'omghi1 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-07'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Do Not Purchase!!!!', 'text': [u'I love Dr. Dennis Gross products! The peels are amazing but these boosters did not do anything for me. Not even one of them did anything. You are better off spraying bottled water on your face and you will save some money. My co-worker purchased the boosters and she returned them due to the lack effectiveness. I did stick with it and used the entire trio. My advice is: if you purchase the boosters you are better off lighting your money on fire; at least the flames will be visually pleasing.'], 'author': u'LaurenMOK ', 'date': [u'2015-11-04'], 'location': u'Wallingford, CT', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Worth a try, but not a re-purchase.', 'text': [u'I bought the trio of concentrates recently. Here\'s my review of each:', u'1) Loved the radiance booster, but hated the packaging/dispensing. The dropper basically didn\'t work, so I just poured it into the palm of my hand. Not the best method. I also went through it in about 2 weeks. Perhaps that was the intended quantity, but it seemed quick. I would consider buying just this in the larger size again if they could get the dispenser/dropper working properly.2) I used the purifying booster on my oily areas; nose, chin and forehead. Really noticed no difference and wouldn\'t purchase this again3) The hydration booster was a nice add-in to my nightly moisturizer, but again, didn\'t notice a big difference and couldn\'t really tell if it had much of an effect. I must mention that I didn\'t use this nightly; only about 3 nights a week, so perhaps more of a nightly, long term effort would be needed to see results.', u'Overall, I\'m glad I gave the set a try, and the radiance booster is a good product, but the dispenser needs improvement. I wouldn\'t purchase the trio again.'], 'author': u'ShannyBee ', 'date': [u'2015-06-28'], 'location': u'Vancouver, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Enjoying these', 'text': [u'I use the purifying one everyday on my t zone. Sometimes use the hydrating on my cheeks unless it is humid out. Not using the radiant one as much-most on my deccloute(spl). I think the purifying is helping so I\'d like to repurchase that if I ever get thru the bottle.'], 'author': u'beautyhobby ', 'date': [u'2015-06-07'], 'location': u'Milwaukee, WI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I love the concept of using different boosters to target different areas of concern. All three have been really useful and great so far. The only problem is I wish the pore minimizing one was thicker in texture. It\'s very very watery and hard to control 1. how much to use and 2. where it goes because most of the time it just seeps into the crevasse between my fingers! The brightening and hydrating ones both have classic serum texture.'], 'author': u'GinAndGivenchy ', 'date': [u'2015-05-07'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray
ingredient: Water, SD-Alcohol 39-C, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Isononyl Isononanoate Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Sodium Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate PVP, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Dimethicone PEG-7 Phosphate, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Glycereth-5 Lactate, Methyl Methacrylate Cross Polymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Fragrance.
reviews: {'title': u'My Favourite Setting Spray!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried tons of setting sprays. This is by far my favourite. Makeup stays put all day!'], 'author': u'ksdrew ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Halifax, NS', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Amazing!!', 'text': [u'I have been using this setting spray for several weeks and it has made my makeup last through almost everything! My makeup has lasted over 12 hours with this it\'s amazing! The thing that really makes me give this product five stars is the fact that I applied my makeup before 8am, spent the day in D.C. where it was windy and my eyes were watering and dripping down my cheeks at times, 6pm I cried for two hours watching P.S. I love you, I got home at 9:30pm and my makeup still looked decent! I didn\'t have tear marks on my cheeks, my highlight and blush were still intact! A+ product for sure.'], 'author': u'ellenthemermaid ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'makeup must have!', 'text': [u'This is the mostImportant part of my makeup routine and has made a huge difference in how myMakeup looks at the end of the day. My makeup used to crack and sink into my lines and sit on top of my pores and my pink tone would begin to show through my foundation. Since using this, my makeup stays all day!! It is amazing. Also gives it a nice finish. One time they were sold out in store so I bought UD de-slick setting spray and that was a mistake. It dried my skin out and made my makeup cakey. This is by far the best one! And does not have a strong smell like some others do.'], 'author': u'sugarheart ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Oily...', 'text': [u'I have a combination skin and it does get decently shiny throughout the day no matter what. However, it is late fall and it\'s starting to get really cold in Toronto. My skin has turned a tad more normal with the correct moisturizers and sunscreen. I wanted to buy this spray to set my makeup since I work long hours. I am also going on vacation soon, so I thought this would be a good addition to my travel kit.I was WRONG! This product, for some reason, makes my skin even more oily than it usually is, even without powdering. I will be returning this product, as it\'s just not for me.'], 'author': u'cdlskin07 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'my friend for a dewy finish makeup on winter', 'text': [u'I LOVE IT!!!!! this stuff is amazing. I was disappointed by the Smashbox one so I was a bit sceptical to get the Urban decay, but oh boy it does the job. it makes my powder foundation look dewy and natural without the powdery look. also, makes it last longer for sure. I have combo skin that\'s more on the dry side but this adds moisture to my face. please note I believe if you\'re oily this might add too much oil on your face since it has a dewy finish.'], 'author': u'awa05 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Hair Removal Laser 4X
reviews: {'title': u'Disappointing', 'text': [u'I can see no reduction in hair after 4 months use. I\'ve had professional laser treatments that worked well. I am the perfect light skin dark hair user. I used it on the highest setting and can see no difference at all. Don\'t waste your time and money on this. Huge disappointment.'], 'author': u'canuka ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Use #1', 'text': [u'I bought this and waited months until I tried it because I was terrified of the pain. I put this on the highest setting (5) and the pain was next to nothing. The only spots I experienced any discomfort were my armpits and even then it was like a small pinch. I feel so silly for waiting so long because I have a really low pain tolerance. I have fair skin with dark hair. This is only my first use so I cannot say if it minimized any hair growth. After about 100 pulses it died and had to be charged. I will be updated when I do this again next week.'], 'author': u'Lambrrrgeenie ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'Washington DC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'first time using it', 'text': [u'This is my first time using tria, hopeful of results, I have had professional laser hair removal and I have to say even with the co2 shots this pain is nothing compared to it. I started with level 4 and did my entire body. The only spot that hurt at all was my underarms,but I would say it was a 3 pain(completely tolerable) I could have easily used 5 but figured I\'d save it for later treatments incase it stops responding. The major negative is that I have to charge it 3 times. To cover my body. And I haven\'t done the top part of my legs...that would be another 2 charges at 2 hours each. So very time consuming for only a 30min treatment per charge. Wish you could use it while it was plugged in'], 'author': u'kellyncupcake ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This laser works!', 'text': [u'This at home laser is pretty effective and easy to use. To see results you must use it as a high setting like 4 or 5 and this laser treatment, unlike professional salon lasers, needs to be done in 2 week cycles. After 2 treatments I saw my hair was thinning. I have very course black hair and a level 4 setting works for me. There is some pain involved but as you get used to the laser you barely notice it.'], 'author': u'hppydlphn ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'AZ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'eh.', 'text': [u'this is a tricky thing to use. it\'s nowhere near as powerful as having professional laser hair removal. i have tried that and have seen the major difference. your hair grows in cycles, which is why often when you get it done professionally they space out the sessions 4-8 weeks apart and you generally need to have it done 6-8 times to see a major difference. the true test of this product is how it holds up once you stop using it and give it a break for about 6-12 months. almost always the hair comes back and not just on me, but this seems to be the case for a lot of people. ', u'i wouldn\'t recommend using this as a stand alone product. it\'s great if you want to use it for light touch ups after having done a professional treatment. (as you\'re never fully going to rid of hair using a laser and it can come back sparse and thin) as our body changes and new hairs sprout out.', u'for someone like me who suffers from hirsutism and has excessively thick, dark, long annoying hair? this product is just a glorified epilator. and the fact that it does have a limit as to how much you can use ... the price isn\'t worth it for you to use on major areas. if you\'re just trying to cover a few facial hairs and underarms and MAYBE bikini line it\'ll probably do a decent job especially if you\'re not covered in full forest like hair.', u'it\'s also a bit confusing to read about it working after just one or two months...... that\'s literally only ONE cycle of hair growth so the results aren\'t very telling for the long term hair reduction. anyways, for the super hairy girl this product is just a lot of hope and not much else. just doing one section on your leg takes HOURS and having to recharge and worry about how many pulses you\'re at is not worth it.'], 'author': u'NaraO ', 'date': [u'2016-07-20'], 'location': u'WA, Seattle', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Close to my favorite discontinued liner', 'text': [u'I used to wear the Urban Decay 24/7 liquid waterproof in Demolition (dark brown) every day until it was discontinued and I couldn\'t find any more remaining stock. I\'ve tried DOZENS of options to replace it. The closest I can is this liner. It has the same deep pigment, long-lasting formula that doesn\'t flake and is truly waterproof. (It\'s amazing how many "waterproof" liners washed right off my watery eyes in a matter of minutes!). I don\'t like the tip as much as I like the UD 24/7 liner, as it\'s much stiffer and doesn\'t give the same control over the wing shape. But, I\'ll be sticking with this as my daily go-to and pray they don\'t discontinue it!'], 'author': u'falkowsk ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Hoboken, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Master Cleanse: Daily Brush Cleaner
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I was surprised that this product had the consistency of a dry oil, but I was pleased by how quickly the brushes dried. It is not a substitute for washing your brushes with soap and water, but it is great for maintaining their cleanliness between those washes. ', u'I usually spray the product onto a kleenex or toilet paper, and just by gently brushing you tools against it, pigment and product is thoroughly removed. {'title': u'Quick fix', 'text': [u'I use this cleaner on one brush specifically, my eyebrow brush (#18, i believe). I use my Anastasia dipbrow and brow brush everyday, sometimes twice a day. {'title': u'wanted to love', 'text': [u'I had super high expectations from this foundation based on all of the reviews and love it\'s got in the YouTube community. I do not understand because I do not suffer from that dry of a nose area. I\'ve never had a foundation from the drugstore or highend ever do this. I have the Est\xe9e Lauder, even Marc Jacobs (closest thing to a pigment in a foundation) and these don\'t cake up and dry like this does. name: Step 1 Skin Equalizer Primer
reviews: {'title': u'Mattifying primer is a disappointment', 'text': [u'Maybe it\'s just me because I have tried so many mattifying primers but this one is another disappointment. First of all, my makeup (I use a cushion foundation with a brush applicator) looked so weird over this like it settled specifically into the pores but didn\'t actually stay on my nose where I put the primer. Then a couple of hours later I already had oil all over my nose and the sides of my nose. Going to return it and go back to using mattifying balm over makeup, which for me works much better. Still testing the smoothing primer out but the mattifying one is not a good fit for me'], 'author': u'dasharks ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Livermore, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Invisiblur™ Perfecting Shield Broad Spectrum SPF 30 PA+++
ingredient: *Murad Invisiblur Perfecting Shield SPF 30 is a gluten-free formula. Although the product does contain a barley oil derivative, gluten is not an oil-soluble protein. That insolubility means that the barley oil used in this formula is a naturally gluten-free substance, which gives Murad a high level of confidence that any of the barley oil derivative used in this formula is also gluten-free. In addition, the manufacturer of the derivative has tested it for gluten and provided Murad with explicit assurances that it is 100 percent free of gluten.
reviews: {'title': u'complexion and texture greatly improved', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this product for over a year, and I absolutely love it. Some pro tips for making it last and maintaining the same consistency as when you first use it: keep it in a cool, dry, dark place. I use three or four pumps after every washing, on top of the Complete Reform serum. This acts as a fantastic primer that will improve your complexion and the texture of your skin. The consistency will begin to dry out a bit as you get to the end of the bottle, so: if you notice that rubbing it in lightly is resulting in pilling, or when you notice that the product is now above the bottom of \'Murad\' on the bottle, it\'s time to order a new one so you don\'t run out before you have the new bottle. Also: order online instead of buying off the shelf. Even though it\'s in packaging that blocks the light, you don\'t know how long it\'s been sitting and I find that the consistency doesn\'t last nearly as long in a bottle from the shelf. I will be using this as long as they are selling it!'], 'author': u'Bluesybird ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love the product, hate the bottle', 'text': [u'I started using this in a travel size from the suncare Sephora Beauty bag this summer. I fell in love and decided to purchase the full size. I was surprised at how expensive it is but was assured by the store staff that the bottle would last a long time. I also am not a fan of the packaging. It\'s hard to dispense onto my hand due to the way the pump works. The product is amazing though. It is weightless, works fabulously, doesn\'t cause breakouts and has 30 SPF...bonus for me. I can\'t go a day without this now.'], 'author': u'ktnovy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Lip Velvet Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u'Love these lipsticks!', 'text': [u'If you are unsure between the Burberry Kisses lipstick and the Lip Velvet one, I recommend the Lip Velvet. The formula is way more long wearing, doesn\'t budge, and the pigmentation is alot better. They are matte but not the kind of matte that feels dry on the lips. These lipsticks are expensive and I\'m sure you could find dupes in other brands. However, I must say that for me, there is something special about these lipsticks: the packaging, the colour selection... If you are looking to splurge on a lipstick, definetely recommend the ones in Oxblood and Rosewood! The Rosewood colour is gorgeous, it could pass as my natural lip colour, but better. Perfect fall and winter muted colours!'], 'author': u'Aleksya ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Rosewood 421', 'text': [u'I am in love with this shade. I bought the small beauty box and got to try a deluxe sample size of this lipstick. It applies smooth and creamy. It feels comfortable on my lips and doesn\'t dry them out. The color is very wearable for daytime at work or for going out in the evenings. I couldn\'t wait to buy the full size in this shade.'], 'author': u'desertgirl501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'literally the best', 'text': [u'I purchase the mini set of 4 only because its burberry and the cute packaging (never tried any of their makeup before) i normally am the "nude rose" type of gal but i actually fell in love with oxblood! Its non drying and light yet very pigmented and long lasting .Will definitely purchase the fullsize'], 'author': u'ayumii ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best long wear lipstick EVER', 'text': [u'Awesome color pigment, creamy, smooth, AND non-drying on the lips after 6-8 hours...in LOVE! My go to lipstick for everyday wear since i hate reapplying and it also doesn\'t leave my lips cracked or cakey! Oxblood is literally the. best. color'], 'author': u'jacobsmommy05 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best matte lipstick', 'text': [u'This is completely different from every other matte lip I\'ve tried. I prefer actual lipstick bullets to liquids and have tried a ton of both. (Most liquids tend to feel very caked-on and dry to me, and the minute you eat anything they slide right off leaving the "ring of death" around your mouth with no color in the middle which is gross, and then the other kinds of liquid mattes, the ones that don\'t dry down but apply matte, e.g. Armani\'s, tend to feel too slippery and you need a thick, gloss-type layer to get any color and then it\'s so soft that it doesn\'t stay where it\'s supposed to be, and it goes all over the place, which also looks gross). As far as non-liquid mattes go, this is the best in its class. It doesn\'t dry out your lips, doesn\'t highlight lines and imperfections, feels weightless on, and lasts so beautifully. When it does fade, it tends to fade uniformly, leaving behind a natural looking stain. It is just the best matte lipstick out there.'], 'author': u'emmalovessephora ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Cashmere - Soft Matte Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'This foundation is amazing', 'text': [u'I\'m in love with this foundation it\'s very smooth and weightless. Worth the price\u2763\ufe0f'], 'author': u'Rmportillo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': u'Chicago, Illinois', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Amazing coverage!', 'text': [u'I\'m on my second bottle and I am in love with the coverage & longevity of this foundation. I\'ve received countless compliments for my skin (and people can\'t even tell I have foundation on)! I use this product with a beauty blender, & the first bottle lasted around 6 months with daily use. If I need a little glow, I like to mix this with the base. A little on the pricey side, but it doesn\'t irritate my sensitive skin.'], 'author': u'Sempiternal ', 'date': [u'2016-08-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfect foundation', 'text': [u'This foundation is so soft and weightless. It can be used as a concealer if dabbed onto little spots, a foundation, or even a tinted moisturizer when combined with moisturizer or sunscreen. The only thing it is missing is a bit of spf protection... Makes pores disappear and blends very very well. Stays on all day and with a tiny bit of primer underneath you stay matte all day. Also, I have very sensitive skin and this has never made me break out.'], 'author': u'anberkeley ', 'date': [u'2016-08-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I love this foundation. The coverage is medium, which is what I prefer, and it stays put for most of the day. I don\'t have to touch up for 6-8 hours. I have oily, sensitive skin, and it doesn\'t clog my pores or cause irritation or blemishes.'], 'author': u'kozey ', 'date': [u'2016-08-14'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Lovely Soft Focus Effect', 'text': [u'Absolutely love this foundation. Gives my skin a soft focused effect. I\'m oily to combination and find the coverage and finish to be a soft focus effect. Not matte yet not exactly radiant. More radiant than most foundations I have tried that claim to be radiant! Absolutely lovely. I seriously look younger when I wear this foundation. No fine lines visible and no creasing. I do have to blot once or twice during the day yet find i have to blot with every foundation I have ever tried. Foundation is so very personal. On me-this foundation is absolutely lovely. I alternate between this and a new discovery that is sadly not sold at Sephora...Gerda Spillmann. Definitely recommend this foundation.'], 'author': u'LAH1111 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-10'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Fresh Glow B.B. Cream Broad Spectrum 20
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'When I first initially used this product, I had to pump out the cream a couple times because at first, it came out the pump very liquidy, almost water-like, but after that it\'s wonderful! I love this B.B. Cream since it really suits my skin type (normal) although after 3 hours, I noticed it starts to "oil off"/separate on my skin if I don\'t set it - which is why I\'m giving it 4 stars instead of 5. I prefer to not set my B.B. creams with powders because it defeats the purpose of my "on the go" quick no-makeup make-up days (brows and b.b. cream). This product does delivery it\'s healthy-looking dewy glow promise but I would not recommend this to anyone who has oily skin. Also, I apply using a damp nude Beauty Blender and it gives me good results. I don\'t expect any coverage off of this but it did even out my skin tone.'], 'author': u'antoninalyssa ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'california', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'favorite BB', 'text': [u'This is by far my favorite BB cream. I have combo-to dry skin. This doesn\'t stick to the dry spots and doesn\'t make the t zone shiny. It is super easy to apply and great for a quick fix.'], 'author': u'hemp69 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'New favorite!', 'text': [u'Now that the YSL foundation formula has changed I was looking for something new for my go-to. This has a dewy, natural look. Where does my skin start and the makeup begin? good luck figuring it out! It is a BB Cream so don\'t expect a lot of coverage. I seal with the Laura Mercier transluscent setting powder and it lasts all day for a beautiful, effortless look.'], 'author': u'meglesleyx ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Albuquerque, NM', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Hands down the best BB cream out there! It isn\'t thick like some. It allows your skin to breathe with still covering your problem areas. My skin is dry, 43yo, it leaves it fresh & dewy looking. A must have!'], 'author': u'K123072 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfect sheer coverage', 'text': [u'Perfect for sheer coverage. Leaves an amazing dewy glow that I haven\'t found anywhere else-- Also makes a good starting base to layer under a foundation with more coverage.'], 'author': u'Jules01141991 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Even on dry skin, I imagine that this color (I bought "medium" in #1 and have light skin) isn\'t dramatic enough to even make a difference in any nose contour. I would rebuy this in #2, but the formula also doesn\'t impress me enough.'], 'author': u'Jennetta ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': u'Arlington, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}
