name: Fresh Glow - Luminous Fluid Base
reviews: {'title': u'Life Changing', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this from Sephora and I must say this is the single best highlighter I have ever used. It\'s dewy, not glittery; liquidy, not sticky; everything I want in a highlighter. You can even use it as a primer, but due to the price I wouldn\'t recommend it. The only downside side is even with setting spray this only lasts 3-5 hours or so. It\'s also very easily muted with powder, so be sure you go light in it.'], 'author': u'CharlotteF ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'awesome!', 'text': [u'this product is amazing. it gives a gorgeous healthy glow under my make up, or when i just conceal a couple of spots. it is a bit pricey, but you get a lot of product for the price. i will be repurchasing this product for years to come. it\'s awesome.'], 'author': u'nerraf ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Yes Yess Yessssss', 'text': [u'I\'d never heard of this, but the lady who was color matching me for a foundation put this on as a primer on half of my face so I could see the difference, and yes. This things gives the most beautiful healthy glow, and acts great as a primer. I\'m definitely going to keep repurchasing it.'], 'author': u'aventura10 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'AMAZING!!', 'text': [u'I got this as a sample a few orders back and fell in love with it so much I bought the full size. I have the color 01 it looks like a pinkish hue but it doesn\'t translate pink at all on he skin. Which I also like since I\'m warm toned. It gives the most natural glow. Not a glittery or metallic shine. But a real noticeable glow. I use it under foundation where I would highlight and it still shines threw the foundation and my set powder. You can use for a primer which is beautiful especially when wearing a more matte foundation. It really brings the life back into ur face. I have normal-dry skin. The texture is beautiful a lil goes a long way so it will last a very long time!! Which helps me justify the price point. It\'s not greasy at all. It will dry down. If you put a lot on it will intensify the glow! I don\'t find i have to do this to achieve beautiful results. I love this product I\'d deff recommend and I\'ll deff re purchase after I\'m finished. It\'s so pretty!!!'], 'author': u'MandyJoyz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So Fresh', 'text': [u'I love glowing fresh skin. I am oily so many products that are geared towards that glowing look don\'t work out for me, I end up looking like an oil slick. This product is very natural looking and doesn\'t add shine. I use it mixed with foundation or under foundation. Honestly this is one of my favorite products.'], 'author': u'AirArtAirHeart ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Flowerbomb Precious Oil
reviews: {'title': u'In love', 'text': [u'This oil Is the same as the perfume. The only thing is that the oil lasted more long because is an oil. I love it I mix it with a no Fragrance body lotion and I put it on my body or on my hair. Which it gives it a nice shine or I use a pea size amount of my foundation since I have dry skin. It works wonders and it smell so freakin good omg!'], 'author': u'Benjiifranky ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Beautiful smelling', 'text': [u'I hate perfumes because I find them to be very heavy. This is one of the first fragrances I\'m very pleased with, it is just beautiful smelling and it connects with your body\'s natural chemistry, as in it blends very well instead of smelling artificial or strong. There are notes of vanilla too. This oil just makes me feel a little nostalgic because it smells like a fragrance that reminds me of my mom when I was little'], 'author': u'sazz1994 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Naked Illuminated Shimmering Powder for Face and Body
reviews: {'title': u'Affordable and Buildable', 'text': [u'I swatched the three of these in Sephora a couple weeks ago, and mostly fell in love with Aura and Lit. The colours are just perfect, and definitely displays a lot of shimmer and illumination, both self-entitled. Although it is sheer as some would say, it\'s definitely buildable, and with the right setting spray it will last all day. It\'s also really buildable with other illuminators and considering it\'s under $30, it\'s definitely worth the price considering other high end highlighters are usually over $40. But it\'s a great every day shimmer overall, very satisfied!'], 'author': u'lovealwaysmb ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Mississauga', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Good', 'text': [u'I really like this for a subtle look (which I usually go for). It gives just a bit of sparkle. But if you are looking for more of a dramatic highlight, this isn\'t for you.'], 'author': u'Haley98 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m disappointed in this product, There is not much pigment and its very grainy. Looks like sparkles on the face.'], 'author': u'Michellew48 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Long Island, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Beautiful, soft shine', 'text': [u'I just purchased this and have been using since! The makeup technician noticed I wasn\'t pleased with the other UD highlighters she was swatching on me, one even matched my skin tone exactly, so I opted out of it. Then she grabbed the Illuminous Illuminated Shimmering Powder and applied it to my face and I immediately fell in love! There isn\'t much pigment which is perfect for me. I don\'t wear blush normally because my skin is usually red anyway, so this is perfect for me. It is sheer enough where I don\'t feel like I am wearing too much makeup and it catches the sun very well. Not to mention that between my fair skin with red undertones and freckles, it is just the perfect match. Would totally recommend to other redheads!'], 'author': u'ichise ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Brentwood, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Pep-Start Quick Cleansing Swipes
reviews: {'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'They work good but when I use them to remove my lip product it leaves the chemical taste in my mouth.'], 'author': u'ThatSoAmber ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"I'm in love", 'text': [u'I absolutely love these wipes! They are my new favorite wipes. Although I just discovered they aren\'t "makeup remover wipes" that\'s what I use them for and they get the job done for me. I love that they don\'t leave that oily film after use like some other wipes. The best part is you get 50 wipes for $14.'], 'author': u'AshSim ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Wipes!', 'text': [u'Be aware: these are not labelled or marketed as make-up removing wipes! They are clearly marked as Quick Cleansing Wipes to be used as a quick refresher for your face. That said, I do use them to remove make-up and it works great for me. I like to have something remove the bulk of my make-up before I go in with cleanser. I do have to use an additional cotton ball with remover for my eye make-up but that\'s a given with any wipe. I\'ve been lazy and just used this to clean my face and gone to bed (a big no-no) and have not woken up with any blemishes ever. There is not a scent to them that I can detect. They don\'t feel harsh on my skin either. 50 wipes for 14 bucks, these are a great deal.'], 'author': u'fldancer00 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gentle cleansing wipes', 'text': [u'Was recently rec\'d these as a non-irritating alternative to makeup removing wipes for a camping trip in the desert. These are very refreshing and gentle on sensitive skin. I\'m sure they\'re great for after the gym, etc but I thought the package was a bit on the big side for being packable and I wouldn\'t use these instead of actually cleansing at home. Wish they came in a travel pack.'], 'author': u'belletrist9 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'alright', 'text': [u'They help remove makeup, but definitely don\'t remove it all. This can\'t be your only cleansing step. name: Pep-Start 2-in-1 Exfoliating Cleanser
reviews: {'title': u'Effective', 'text': [u'I have dry skin that gets flaky so I like to exfoliate my skin regularly. I found that this cleanser effectively removed any traces of face makeup. (I don\'t use exfoliating products on my eyes.). Just washed my face using the same light pressure as I would with regular cleanser. Let the scrubber beads do their job. My skin felt clean, balanced and ready for next steps in my skin care routine. Like that it didn\'t dry out my already dry skin. Clinique Pep-Start line is also reasonably priced which is another plus. Great for younger girls or for any age that is blessed with good skin and wants streamlined skincare routine.'], 'author': u'desertgirl501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
{'title': None, 'text': [u'Best exfoliate ever love it'], 'author': u'jajairamm ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Pep-Start HydroBlur Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'Blurrrrrr', 'text': [u'I have an oily t-zone and this moisturizer glides on smoothly, has the texture of a primer so it erases my pores, but still leaves my skin feeling moisturized although pretty matte. May not be for everyone as some have reported pilling and dry spots, but if you have oily skin this stuff is great.'], 'author': u'KittyLinka ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Illuminating BB Brush Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Weightless, SPF 30 Glow', 'text': [u'I love this product. It\'s been added to my daily makeup routine and it fits in so well! I decided to try out the Glam Glow Illuminating Moisturizer.It was recommended to me by one of the Sephora employees. I don\'t know if its just mine but I find that the shadows are decent, but they don\'t blend perfectly (sometimes I have to sit there forever with my blending brush and I still can\'t get what I want) and they kick up A LOT of dust with the brush. That said, it\'s a lovely all-matte palette great for everyday looks.'], 'author': u'boose17 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u"Doesn't stay on at all", 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this palette. I absolutely love the colors - it\'s exactly what I\'ve been looking for in an all neutral palette. I gave it a week of use but had to return it. It creases and doesn\'t stay on at all, even with use of my urban decay eyeshadow base and a finishing setting spray. By lunch time it would crease and raccoon down my eyelids. When I returned it, the lady at the register did mention that they recently reformulated their makeup. I was just surprised how terrible it was considering the high rating of the product.'], 'author': u'ssykim ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Beam Team Hydrate + Glow
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'ve tried out a handful of the Estee Edit products and this is the only one I love. It is great for those days when you don\'t feel like wearing makeup but still want to add a swipe of mascara and a little "spark" to your face. If your skin runs dry, you will still probably want to apply your usual moisturizer underneath, otherwise I think it is fine on its own (assuming you aren\'t using it as your daily moisturizer). I don\'t always use the bronze stuff in the cap, but it is an easy way to add a little something extra to your face on those no makeup days. I docked a star (well, a star and a half if I could) because, like all of the other estee edit products I\'ve tried, it is insanely over priced and I\'m not a fan of the texture.'], 'author': u'Chloesilverado ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE it', 'text': [u'Very pretty golden/sheer and shimmery moisturizer. I like to wear it alone or mixed together with my bb or cc cream. Can be used over make up too. Under the cap is a solid cream shimmery highlighter which is nice as well.'], 'author': u'ijetski247 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great as a primer!', 'text': [u'I received this as a gift and didn\'t think anything of it (I usually don\'t use bronzing products) but I wanted a more glowy primer/base for my makeup, not that I don\'t love my too faced hangover but I wanted a little something more as I\'ve been limiting the amount of foundation I wear on a day to day basis. This really does an amazing job! The smell is a little iffy but dissipates quickly and it honestly isn\'t that bronze-y which works for me (I use the lighter shade of the two)Probably wouldn\'t purchase again, just because of the $50 price and I get no use out of the highlighter built into the cap. It\'s far to greasy for my liking. The flash illuminators have a much better texture as a cream highlight than whatever was thrown into the cap of this.'], 'author': u'FrodoBaggins ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Super hydrating!', 'text': [u'I reviewed this product in my estee edit voxbox. I used the sheer golden bronze color. I applied this cream as a substitute for my usual moisturizer to see how it worked and was very impressed. My skin is typically dry so I need a lot of moisturizer. I did not have to use much of this and it made my face look so hydrated. The glow was an added benefit. Definitely would use this product again in the future. Side note: I received this product for free to review and this is my personal opinion.'], 'author': u'hannaherin ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: 24/7 Waterproof  Liquid Eyeliner
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Absolute fave eyeliner. Easy to apply and remove. Great look it gives'], 'author': u'BieberLover ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Eh...no', 'text': [u'This product gave me such high hopes. When I tried it in the store by drawing on my hand, the brush seemed perfect for making nice thin lines. The fact that it\'s waterproof was also a factor in me purchasing this. Recently, I tried it on my eyes, and gosh, does it take a while for this product to dry on your eyes. I\'m Asian and have hooded eyes, so when I looked in the mirror after applying, it smudged everywhere. SO, I cleared it all off and started again, only this time, I kept both my eyelids stretched as far open as possible and even had a fan blowing in my face to help the drying process for at least 1.5 minutes. I blinked a few times and it looked ok, so I went off for my dinner date. 2 hours later, I looked in the mirror again, and lo and behold, it smudged to my upper eyelid and the smudged portion was flaking off. It looked like a hot mess. Good thing my glasses rims kind of covered up my eyelid area, because it did not turn out pretty. Sad to say, this is not a good product at all; it flakes unbelievably (especially when you\'re trying to wash it off- there will be black flakes all over your face because this liner will not go quietly. I\'m using oil-based makeup remover, cloth makeup remover, eye makeup remover and it somehow overpowers this stuff unless you really rub your eyes raw). It takes forever to dry on, and it just feels more runny than other ones that I\'ve tried. The only plus side to this product is the brush.'], 'author': u'teenz03 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': u'CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'dissapointed ;(', 'text': [u'I\'ve been hunting for a very long time for a good black waterproof long lasting eye liner, decided to get this one & when it arrived today it came without the pigment, at all, literally looked like dirty water :( shake/ no shake didn\'t help'], 'author': u'vegaslove1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': u'las vegas NV', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'New UD Eyeliner??', 'text': [u'I have been buying this eyeliner for years! It has always been my favorite. It never smeared or smudged and even when my other makeup would rub off, it would stay on. This time when I bought it it was packaged different. It has a metalic bottom with the usual applicator. I\'ve been using it for 2 weeks and it smudges every day!!! I use the primer and a base UD eyeshadow and still it smudges all over my eyes!!! Whats going on with this :('], 'author': u'brittanybunny ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': u'Fresno, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'My Fav', 'text': [u'This is my favourite waterproof eyeliner!!!! I am Asian and I do have monolids so a waterproof eyeliner is so important to me. Unfortunately, Sephora has stopped carrying this in stores and I am so choked. I will be stocking up on this via the website before it\'s discontinued </3', u'When you apply this liner, make sure you really shake it. I would say for about 5 seconds or more.'], 'author': u'irlbitchface ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: La Petite Robe Noire Velvet Body Milk
reviews: {'title': u'This smells so good!', 'text': [u'I love this product if you like layering scents, which is a huge trend right now. This lotion has a spicy and sweet scent that is classic and could be used in the summer or winter.', u'As far as the moisturizer goes, it\'s not very good and it seems as though it might be a bit drying. I put this on top of a moisturizer just to add the scent.', u'It\'s light enough that I can spray my regular perfume on myself, and just adds another layer of amazing smells. Use it if you want people to ask "who smells so good" when you\'re in the same room :).'], 'author': u'brookebatt ', 'date': [u'2016-01-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: 'REPLICA' Promenade in the Gardens
reviews: {'title': u'Dang!', 'text': [u'None of the notes I wanted to come through, came through when I sprayed this on my wrist. I am a huge fan of Maison Martin Margiela! Love, Love!! Lipstick On and Beach Walk....wanted to love Promenade in the Gardens too....not so much...All I got was lily of the valley unfortunately....I was hoping for the freesia ( I love JM\'s English Pear and Freesia for example) rose and peony w the sandalwood to take the flowers down a notch.But! Not on my skin unfortunately....all I got was the crisp green accord, aka: lily of the valley and the vetiver... This is not to say this is a difficult product...it just didn\'t work w my personal chemistry.'], 'author': u'fabulous44 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-28'], 'location': u'Ontario, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'clean, warm, sexy scent', 'text': [u'A pleasant, floral meets spicy, not overbearing fragrance. It\'s good for daytime, like wearing a well-tailored white cotton shirt.'], 'author': u'greenpickle ', 'date': [u'2016-01-02'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Colonia
reviews: {'title': u'classic', 'text': [u'this makes me feel like i just visited my uncle gino\'s barber shop and came out feeling like a million bucks ..lots of lemons up front and cools down to a classic flowery powdery ...so great'], 'author': u'Peterama ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'OMG', 'text': [u'So I took this sample with me when I went on vacation,and I found a fragrance for life. It\'s so incredibly fresh that it truly does out you in a better mood. I can occupy myself for a considerable amount of time just trying to smell all the different notes that this fragrance offers. This is the one fragrance that I will not tell anyone what it is. Call me selfish but it is really that good.'], 'author': u'natska240 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Unisex, smells like Italy.'], 'author': u'YukonJeff ', 'date': [u'2016-01-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Top Notes Are Powerful', 'text': [u'Definitely an overpowering smell right at first. It requires some time before the first notes die down. Only after that will I find the fresh scent to be quite lovely. The citrus notes are barely detectable at first, but will linger in a really gentle blend with the other notes. Not something I\'ll wear, but it is a scent I would enjoy sniffing as I walk into a bathroom or something. Didn\'t enjoy this product as much as I had hoped. Nonetheless, scent is great (after top notes fade).'], 'author': u'SCNerd ', 'date': [u'2015-07-27'], 'location': u'CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Great unisex scent for summer', 'text': [u'Class. Sophistication. Elegance.', u'Colonia is a beautiful trip of nostalgia. Although the citrus, floral and warm basenotes definitely compliment me as a woman, they bring to mind the crisp citrus and spice splash the barber used on my father and grandfather after a cut and shave on Saturday mornings. There is also a light soapiness that smells like clean skin after a shower.', u'My husband and I both enjoy this classic scent. The longevity is only a few hours, hence the four stars. However, this lovely scent is well worth the price and the extra application later in the day.'], 'author': u'pearlygirl ', 'date': [u'2015-07-20'], 'location': u'Texas', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: HD Microfinish Powder
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this product but it just didn\'t work out that way. While it did a pretty good job at keeping the shine away but it essentially erased any signs of makeup in pictures. I was already cautious when looking for a powder because I\'ve had similar issues with foundations that look great but made me look pasty white in photos. I was careful to apply the least amount of powder possible and it actually took me quite awhile before I even realized it was the powder that was making me look washed out in pictures and like I hadn\'t applied any makeup at all.'], 'author': u'LaughingNinja ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Must Have!', 'text': [u'this is a daily product for me! i have combination skin - throughout the day my tzone gets so oily that if i touch it you can see my smeared foundation! gross! but this powder is a life saver! i use a little, goes a long way, every morning as my last step. and my make up stays in place all day! i like to use it under my eyes and on my lids as well, it helps not to get oily and my winged eyeliner doesn\'t come off bc of so much oil. if you\'re one to retouch through out the day - i\'d recommend this too! when i wan\'t to retouch my face a bit i just use my brush with a little product and swipe on my tzone and around eyes.'], 'author': u'hernamee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'MY MUST HAVE PRODUCT', 'text': [u'This makes the finish on your skin FLAWLESS. I have oily skin and enlarged pores.. and no matter what I makeup products I choose to use, this one is always the final touch and it really does make my pore size diminish. I can\'t tell if this helps with oiliness, because my skin gets oily no matter what I try, but I can say that it does not add to the oiliness, it does not irritate my skin or cause blemishes, and it will give you a smooth finish. Definitely will always be a staple of mine.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Dallas, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE THIS STUFF', 'text': [u'It sets my makeup (foundation & concealer) and makes my face feel like skin again. It doesn\'t feel like I\'m wearing makeup after putting it on. It is also oil-absorbing. I will put it on over my self-tanner lotion so it\'s not sticky any longer. I\'ve purchased it 3 times over the years. It lasts a long time too. I\'ve had my current container for 10 months!'], 'author': u'theonlyfoxyroxy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Tampa, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'softens skin', 'text': [u'I struggle with keratosis pilaris (chicken skin) on my face so I\'m constantly looking for better ways to exfoliate and Moisturize. I\'ll be honest, the gorgeous packaging is what drew me to purchase this product. However, I\'ve been using it for over three months now and I\'ll never stop! I use it before my serum and moisturizer and it really does an excellent job of softening my terribly dry skin and prepping it for my heavier duty moisturizer. I notice a big difference in the texture of my skin and how it plumps up after each use. If the age of the product doesn\'t sway you to its usefulness, then I hope this review does!'], 'author': u'Rhov ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'oh how I love this', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried every toner/softener around and this is the best! Makes my skin soft and clear looking. Took away the dullness and left my skin incredibly soft.'], 'author': u'Cj858 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'buy buy buy', 'text': [u'I m absolutely loving it! It s my 3rd bottle already. It saved my face.'], 'author': u'mozzzerula ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

That said, the gift set for $65 with 3 fragrances would be a good option.'], 'author': u'Babs2014 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'east coast beach - not tropical beach', 'text': [u'I love this - it totally reminds me of that salty, sandy, kind of sweaty scent you have after being on the beach and in the ocean - but it reminds me of the east coast, like Prince Edward Island or Maine, not the Caribbean. It does last on me but in a lightly lingering way which is good because I don\'t like strong perfume. I love it - will def get the full size version.'], 'author': u'SAinTO ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m not sure what to think of this scent. reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'excellent men fragrance!!1'], 'author': u'CADmonkey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Jazz Club, I love you', 'text': [u'Well...I wanted to hate it but I can\'t put this away! I love love love it! I can\'t stop smelling it. Hints of vanilla and tobacco leaves. It will be beautiful in the fall/winter time too! It is average lasting but I find myself re-spraying just to obsess all over again!This is totally unisex, men and women can wear easily. Just beautiful.'], 'author': u'Des1993 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Ahhhh amazing', 'text': [u'This scent is so fantastic! It is different than any scent I\'ve worn before. I am a perfume connoisseur, of sorts! I buy 3-4 bottles a year just because I like to change it up and love collecting them. The first of replicas that I bought was Beach Club. It\'s incredible also. Very typical of what I\'d normally buy, but Jazz Club is bold, sexy, and daring. I put it to the test and wore it to an event and got asked what I was wearing quite a few times. + my boyfriend loved it, which is usually my selling point. Try it out! It\'s so different and will make you feel bold and adventurous and sexy !'], 'author': u'Scubameg ', 'date': [u'2016-09-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Gel Effect Nail Polish
reviews: {'title': u'Good Formula', 'text': [u'I really like the formula in this. I tried on a couple in the store and then purchased the color online as the one I wanted was sold out. The polish is really easy to apply evenly and dries relatively fast. I used their top coat with it and wore the nails while doing the normal daily activities for 5 days without any signs of wear. Recommend.'], 'author': u'Wen314 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not worth the money', 'text': [u'I love the color but It didn\'t work out so well, the second day I wore it It was already cracked and its really easy to peel, It looks really shiny but for the same or even better results there are many other brands cheaper'], 'author': u'Ani9119 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'awesome color', 'text': [u'I not only love the color but it actually last me longer than my other nail polish brands I used. The price it\'s high but well worth it for me since it last me about six days and keep in mind I was on vacation and in the pool everyday. :)'], 'author': u'Gleni ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'long lasting and gel-like', 'text': [u'It\'s the 5th since I painted my nails, they still look the way they were 5 days ago! Super gel like nail polish, my friend thought I got my nails done at a nail spa! The brush is incredible, easy to paint once for all. 5 star!'], 'author': u'MsShao ', 'date': [u'2016-10-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it!', 'text': [u'Awesome nail polish! Painted my nails a week ago and still not a single chip, even thou I do everything at home and wash dishes regularly without gloves. I do use a base coat and top coat by Seche Vite, and to make it last even longer apply a second layer of top coat a few days after painting your nails. I haven\'t done it yet and it\'s been 7 days, but I will do it today and I\'m pretty sure I will get another few days or a week before I see a chip. Also before you start painting your nails clean them with cotton ball and pure acetone, wait a few minutes in between coats and you\'ll be golden :)'], 'author': u'AvaW ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Colonia Deodorant
reviews: {'title': u'Smells good initially...', 'text': [u'When you first put this on...it smells good, but it has no lasting power. The fragrance almost immediately goes away and it doesn\'t work as a deodorant either. Would not recommend. Will not buy again.'], 'author': u'kpsimon ', 'date': [u'2015-01-04'], 'location': u'Boston MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good product, great for travel', 'text': [u'Nice product, works for women or men. Works well.'], 'author': u'StyleMavenFla ', 'date': [u'2013-10-23'], 'location': u'Tallahassee, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Super product alone or with the cologne', 'text': [u'Great citrusy scent keeps you fresh all day. Wonderful for the guy in your life.'], 'author': u'StyleMavenFla ', 'date': [u'2013-08-01'], 'location': u'Tallahassee, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Colonia Talcum Powder
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing quality powder', 'text': [u'This is an incredibly silky body powder. I live in the south, so I do enjoy using a body powder on humid days. I have used the cologne for years, but have recently added the body cream and this powder. When I first received it, though, it had exploded in the box. I live near a Sephora, so I returned it to them for a full refund. I then re-ordered it, and it showed up perfectly (unexploded!) I LOVE this powder. It is light, fresh and - when I run out - I will definitely re-order this.'], 'author': u'discerningone ', 'date': [u'2014-08-26'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: 'REPLICA' Filter: Blur
reviews: {'title': u'soft lovely scent', 'text': [u'I am totally enamored of Beach Walk and Lipstick On, and when I tries this with my Lipstick On it could not believe how much the scent improved. Love it. My next purchase is going to be Jazz Club.'], 'author': u'cherrylee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love!!!', 'text': [u'I am a total perfume junkie, and I\'m forever looking for new ways to make my scents last longer or make them more personal. This perfume oil does both. I have both "glow" and "blur" and I\'ve been able to create endless combinations of personal fragrances. The oil feels amazing on my skin, and the scents on their own are absolutely heavenly.'], 'author': u'Kingfish ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'okay', 'text': [u'It\'s okay, very similar to Philosophy\'s Grace.line. The oil is moisturizing so that\'s a plus. The scent didn\'t WOW me.'], 'author': u'kisby ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love the layering idea!', 'text': [u'First of all, I LOVE the whole Replica line. Such a cool idea to pull those memories from a scent. I also love that they are so unique and not something everyone will be wearing. Then when you layer them with the new Filters, they let you turn your favourite scents into something new. I love Tea Escape with Blur. Warms it up even more and gives it extra depth. Plus being an oil based product, it makes you scent last for so much longer! Love.'], 'author': u'EleanorVanessa ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'soft and comforting!', 'text': [u'I am a HUGE fan of lazy sunday morning, and this Blur oil is essentially a wonderfully softened version of lazy sunday. I use it by itself when I am not in the mood to really "put on" a fragrance, and I have actually started using this oil more and more as the base before I put Lazy Sunday on. Oil-base perfumes definitely help lock in the scent long-term, which is great for me (since the collection is eau de toilette so a bit lighter). I\'m going to try Glow next, and can\'t wait to smell it!!'], 'author': u'fragrancegirl3 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': u'Richmond, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Colonia Bath and Shower Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Such a fantastic scent', 'text': [u'I am so glad they made this classic fragrance into a body wash. I\'ll stick with Laura merrier, thank you!'], 'author': u'ilovemyfreckles ', 'date': [u'2014-04-08'], 'location': u'Virginia', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This is great..for men', 'text': [u'I think the earlier reviewers think this is for women...it is for men and it smells great on them.'], 'author': u'FendiHeyward ', 'date': [u'2014-02-03'], 'location': u'Orlando, Fl', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Smells awful', 'text': [u'If you want to smell like old lady this body wash is for you! name: Colonia Body Cream
reviews: {'title': u'LOVE... Signature Scent', 'text': [u'Amazing scent. Light, fresh, slight floral and woodsy. Colognes/Perfumes give me a slight headache often, so I opted for a lotion with my favorite fragrance. I am not disappointed. I couple pea sizes on the arms is PERFECT. I can smell the scent throughout the day. Perfect for an office setting. Smells like a vacation in Italy. Plus, since it\'s handcrafted in Italy, and worn by Cary Grant, this has a feeling of luxury.'], 'author': u'YukonJeff ', 'date': [u'2016-01-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love the scent', 'text': [u'I really adore the scent of the dusting powder in this collection and have purchased it several times through Sephora. I thought I\'d branch out and try the perfume - it was so expensive, I couldn\'t justify purchasing it. So I rationalized that the body cream might be okay to carry the scent longer. I was disappointed - the scent is not true to the powder, it has a kind of plastic overtone to it. But the lotion is very, very nice feeling on the skin and seems to moisturize okay. I guess I\'m just too disappointed in the scent that I probably will not order again. For the price, it just doesn\'t do it for me.'], 'author': u'gmr10 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-01'], 'location': u'Bellingham, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this body cream!', 'text': [u'I have been a fan of this fragrance for years. Finally decided to expand in terms of lotion. This body cream is very hydrating without being sticky. It carries the fragrance very well without being too heavy. Love it! Will definitely re-order when I run out!'], 'author': u'discerningone ', 'date': [u'2014-08-26'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: 'REPLICA' Filter: Glow
reviews: {'title': u'meh', 'text': [u'I like the texture of blur and glow, but it did not seem to add anything to my fragrances (I do own quite of lot of MAISON MARGIELA fragrances).', u'I also tried it on it\'s own and it dried down to a real "plastic" aroma. MEH'], 'author': u'nemo757 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'obsessed', 'text': [u'I am a total perfume junkie, and I\'m forever looking for new ways to make my scents last longer or make them more personal. This perfume oil does both. I have both "glow" and "blur" and I\'ve been able to create endless combinations of personal fragrances. The oil feels amazing on my skin, and the scents on their own are absolutely heavenly'], 'author': u'Kingfish ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been obsessed with the Glow Filter for a few months now. The way it transforms any fragrance and makes them last longer on my skin is amazing. I love to pair it with Tom Ford Neroli Portofino - amplifies the amazing scent and makes it last all day instead of just a little while!!'], 'author': u'mackeenzieee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'Windsor, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best purchase ever', 'text': [u'I bought this after reading reviews. Its true what others have said: it brings Lipstick on to a whole new level. Better. ', u'But what I love about this the most, is that it can be used as a base for other perfumes.', u'If, like me, you have a more acidic skin, this booster will prevent that sour dry down effect you get with some perfumes. It has made me rediscover some of my old favorites.'], 'author': u'fiorellina ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing for long wear!', 'text': [u'I love how the primers are oil based and therefore help with both long wear of my fragrance as well as hydrating my skin at the same time! Glow is my favourite since it has that zesty, citrusy base to it which I love. When paired with Beach Walk it adds a burst of uplifting citrus that always boosts my mood. Beach Walk on its own is lovely and adding this booster just makes it that much better!'], 'author': u'downitcomes ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: 'REPLICA' Funfair Evening
reviews: {'title': u'This is my Soul Mate', 'text': [u'I initially sprayed this scent on the paper tester and I did not really like it. It was an overpowering floral scent. I then sprayed it on my wrist and proceeded to walk around Sephora. Still not impressed. As I left Sephora and was walking back to work, I caught a whiff of it again, only this time it had reacted with my body chemistry and OMG! It smells AMAZING. Sweet and sensuous... I can\'t get enough! Please make a rollerball otherwise I will keep bothering Sephora for samples to keep in my purse. lol.'], 'author': u'KhannieRemix ', 'date': [u'2016-08-10'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Grr you Sephora', 'text': [u'Why must you slyly put samples in my bag when I purchase things? Your marketing works on this girl!!! I love how Fun Fair smells, one star off bc the scent lacks staying power.'], 'author': u'GG84 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Like it, don't love it", 'text': [u'I love sweet/gourmand scents, so this wasn\'t quite as sweet as I\'d hoped. I enjoy it, but most likely won\'t repurchase. Packaging is gorgeous, though!'], 'author': u'Macieee ', 'date': [u'2016-06-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'no fun fair evening', 'text': [u'Based on the good reviews I\'m highly Disappointed. Hoped for more of a cotton candy gourmand yummy scent but on me it smelled like something and older woman would wear-maybe somewhat oriental floral Redkens new hairspray fragrance. Ick! Not for me & not at all what I was expecting. When I think of a fair/boardwalk I think of BBW summer/American Boardwalk. Warm yummy & enticing. *staying power -terrible; waste of $125 in my opinion.'], 'author': u'tabarnard ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Discontinued?', 'text': [u'This fragrance seems to have disappeared! ', u'I hope it returns.', u'It\'s the cotton candy-esque fragrance I can find nowhere else.'], 'author': u'jintana ', 'date': [u'2016-04-16'], 'location': u'San Jose, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: 'REPLICA' Flower Market
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!!!', 'text': [u'I have honestly know that this is an amazing and worth every penny. The fragrance lasts all day (I do apply 4 sprays). It is fresh and flowery. I have also recently tried the Beach Walk and fell in love with that as well even though it is not as flowery. It is definitely of quality.'], 'author': u'deegee28 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'Santa Ana, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u"I'm obsessed now!", 'text': [u'I love flowery perfumes. I always disliked woodsy or fruity scents. The more realistically flowery and rosey the scent, the better. Anyway since I love things that smell nice, I\'ve been casually searching for something I\'d wear on my wedding day in a few months. They say certain smells bring back memories so I want something special. As I was bored during lunch I searched through. I saw this and thought it was an interesting concept, it\'s basically the same thing I\'m trying to do.I tried this on my wrist and I could not stop sniffing it all day. I still smelled it in the morning. It really felt like I was surrounded by sweet smelling flowers, it wasn\'t overpowering, it smelled relaxing and natural. I know perfumes react differently per person, and other reviews say it didn\'t last as long, so I recommend to try it on first, but definitely try it. I\'ll be coming back soon to actually buy it!'], 'author': u'mcmeow ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Smells Amazing!!', 'text': [u'I got this as a sample & fell in love!! the smell is so fresh. Only downside is that its\'s a little on the expensive side.'], 'author': u'mkvictor19 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-17'], 'location': u'Chicago, Il', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I love this scent but it hardly lasted. It\'s soft and floral but gives me headaches and makes me lightheaded. If it were created with better quality I would be 1000% on board.', u'I have also bought the Fireplace one that I loved that unfortunately did the same thing!!'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-09-09'], 'location': u'LA, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Heavenly Florals', 'text': [u'I am writing this review right after smelling a whiff of this wonderful perfume out of a sample I received. I hardly write reviews, leave alone one for a sample! I am from India and this reminded me of flower markets, of Jasmines and roses and everything feminine...when you are have reached your peak of life...and have resigned yourself to life\'s mundaneness and its stresses a whiff of something exotic and vibrant just brings you memories of long forgotten smells...and even sounds; just tells you....go get a little happiness. I doubt I would ever get this just because of the price point but spraying this on a getting a whiff of it just made my day! :)'], 'author': u'sweetum ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': u'Sammamish, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: 'REPLICA' Lazy Sunday Morning
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect scent', 'text': [u'Lazy Sunday Morning has become my go-to scent. It is rich enough for me and subtle enough for my husband, who doesn\'t care for perfume on me. It works for day and into the evening... for work or all day at home.'], 'author': u'JenniferWood ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Weimar, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Perfect for a casual scent and the fragrance lingers for a long time. The scent can be a little overbearing at first, but mellows out to a much more pleasant scent in about an hour.'], 'author': u'KellyBu ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'The Perfect Perfume', 'text': [u'I love this scent - I\'ve shopped around and tried perfumes on both sides of this price point and not found a single one I love more than this. I have a sensitive nose and a few allergies, but this scent doesn\'t set off any of them, only pleasantly reminds me of fresh laundry, spring flowers, and sweater weather. I first bought the rollerball to test it but will be buying the full-size bottle as soon as I\'m done writing this review. Love it!!!'], 'author': u'MeghanOKelley ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I heart this scent', 'text': [u'I put this scent on and instantly hated it! Hated it so bad that I threw the vial away. I am not a fan of clean, laundry scents, and this was what it put off the moment I swiped my wrists and elbow creases, but after a couple of seconds it instantly turned into pure heaven! I received so many compliments on this particular scent I went back to my wastebasket and pulled that little vial of heaven out. I am in love with this scent!'], 'author': u'c1t2n3 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Every day can be Lazy Sunday\u2764\ufe0f', 'text': [u'I\'m in love ~ this is my new favorite scent!! The first few notes are floral, sunshine & clean laundry. As it dries down you get the warm sunshine & woods. It has fairly good staying power, but I personally have to reapply in the afternoon. This is a good perfume for the woman who wants to smell young, sophisticated & fresh.'], 'author': u'swanfish1981 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: La Petite Robe Noire
reviews: {'title': u'Not sexy', 'text': [u'I\'ll start by saying that, with any perfume, whether you\'ll like it or not, it is subjective. Personally, this is not my kind of scent.I don\'t understand how people say this is a sexy fragrance. With most guerlain scents I get a more mature feel from them.The notes I can detect are definitely rose and jasmine as the heart of the fragrance, with a warm touch of amber in the background and some muskiness. But mainly what throws me off from this, is the heavy powdery note, that mixed with the heavy floral blend makes this a mature "old-lady" kind of scent.For an EDT it is long-lasting and has good projection.'], 'author': u'PaulaMakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'nothing new', 'text': [u'Love the initial scent, but it dries to an unoriginal rose and amber finish. Wish the cherry and patchouli were stronger. Good for day and evening.'], 'author': u'saritasmile ', 'date': [u'2016-02-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my fav', 'text': [u'Super feminine but kind of musky and sexy.It\'s suitable for daytime and nighttime.'], 'author': u'JennaSb ', 'date': [u'2016-01-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'unique, flirty with a retro touch', 'text': [u'Many expensive fragrances smell like bath and body works mists or glade air freshners. This perfume smells like French perfume should - unique, feminine with a very subtle touch of retro, that adds mystery. I absolutely love it. I still mourn My Insolence and want it back, Guerlain.'], 'author': u'brighterbetter ', 'date': [u'2015-12-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love', 'text': [u'Doesn\'t last that long but it is my go to. Good everyday but also sensual and the notes are deep enough for evening.'], 'author': u'alexajoyxox ', 'date': [u'2015-12-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Black Label Detox BB Beauty Balm
reviews: {'title': u'not what i expected', 'text': [u'i purchased this product looking for an easy-application, skin-benefiting product to replace foundation for casual, daily use. the first issue i have with this product is lack of tint, which is crazy, as i have pale skin (burn in the sun, freckles everywhere type of pale). after application, my face had a very washed-out, lifeless look. when i tried to build the product to cover blemishes, it turned a strange green-grey colorthe product was much thicker than i any BB cream i\'ve tried before, making the application a little uneven and the resulting texture on my face seeming tacky or goopy. which turned out to be more than a feeling- i was walking to work, the wind kicked up dirt, and all the little specks of dirt that had flown at me stuck to the BB cream. it also seemed that the creamy density caused the product to highlight any flaws in my skin- larger pores, dry bits, protruding blackheads. this product was also very difficult remove at the end of the day. i use make-up removing oils to cleanse, and had to wash at least twice to get all the BB cream off my face.i tried the product for a full week to see if my experience would change, but knew that it would be a return after two days of use.'], 'author': u'bunnyhug ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'chicago, il', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A MUST HAVE', 'text': [u'I have been using this for years and I absolutely love it. I have dry and oily skin and this works well with both of them!'], 'author': u'rachelw8119 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this BB', 'text': [u'I have been wearing this brand of BB Cream for a few years. Full coverage. Not dry looking.'], 'author': u'bethpetez1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Simi Valley, CA.', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dr. Jart+ Black Label Detox BB -simple perfection', 'text': [u'I was amazed at how quickly this became my "go-to" everyday BB. This stuff certainly lives up to its claims. However strange it may appear when first applied, the results are nearly flawless after a couple of moments to rest on the skin. This BB evens skin tone, adds enough of a glow without being oily, doesn\'t settle in fine lines and lasts all day with a little Guerlain Meteorites to set. I am back for more of this little gem. If it appears gray, give it a couple of moments and it calms down to look beautifully natural. I put this on first so it has time to set while I finish my look of the day, giving it just the time it needs to transform into a simply perfect complexion.'], 'author': u'jlibbyb ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Charleston, SC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This stuff is heavy duty. With the intense SPF, it definitely feels like a full coverage foundation and not so much a beauty balm, that said I absolutely adore the color and the coverage and the SPF. I find it goes on best with a moisturizing primer underneath and using a Beauty Blender to apply. Applying with the fingers just doesn\'t work for me. A little goes a long way.'], 'author': u'catiecake ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'san jose, ca', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: 'REPLICA' By The Fireplace
reviews: {'title': u'Love it, but not for everyday.', 'text': [u'This scent is special. It\'s strong, sweet and I can\'t stop smelling it. But, if you spray too much it can be way too strong. A guy I know said it\'s something he\'d expect to smell on a really confident person. We both agreed it\'s something that can\'t be worn lightly. Even though I love it, I personally don\'t think it\'s an everyday perfume, but that\'s just my preference. Perfect scent for fall and winter!'], 'author': u'kierrasface ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Smoky Sweet', 'text': [u'I bought this scent, without ever smelling it in the store, on the recommendation of one of the Sephora salespeople. She described it to me, when I told her I was looking for something long-lasting, sweet, with a little edge to it. I have received so many compliments while wearing this. I know I rolled the dice a bit, scent unsmelled, but I\'m so glad I did. This does not disappoint. I put it on in the morning and still can smell it in the late afternoon. ', u'It is a terrific fall/winter scent- a little sweet, a little spicy, a little smoky. ', u'If you\'re on the fence, remember Sephora\'s return policy... but my guess is you\'ll love it.'], 'author': u'BertBert ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Albany, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'looooove this', 'text': [u'This is perfect for fall, love love love!!'], 'author': u'kdind ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect for fall!', 'text': [u'I\'m obsessed with this spicy, androgynous fragrance. The scent lingers on both the skin and the clothes all day long. Whether you\'re looking for something to wear during the day or night, this beaut fits the bill.'], 'author': u'biancaadrienne ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u"maybe it's me?", 'text': [u'I had high expectations especially from the other reviews, but to me this smelled like the man who sits at the end of the bar, and people internally give a 3ft perimeter to save their noses. However, thanks to Sephora\'s policy, swapping was a breeze!'], 'author': u'madison34 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'not that easy to use', 'text': [u'I think the product is effective -- even though it seems to be darker in shade than my skin tone. But mine are tough, allergy dark circles'], 'author': u'amb40 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'Easiest, most invisible, and easy to remove concealer ever!'], 'author': u'Wynnettie ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'Portland, Or', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'disappointed', 'text': [u'The guy that sold this to me, sold it as a good product that not only covers well, but had good anti-aging properties. I mentioned to him that I was oily and he said it wasn\'t an oily product. Personally, I didn\'t think it covered very well. I also agree that it looks muddy, not bright and fresh. In addition, I feel like I have to apply more powder to the eye area (which no one wants to do) after a few hours--- seems like it looks greasy.'], 'author': u'aswindle ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'eye coverage', 'text': [u'It blends well with the right Sephora brush. Covers well and I put it on after applying moisturizer and base so my skin is already hydrated.'], 'author': u'bme2 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: 'REPLICA' At The Barber's
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing unisex scent', 'text': [u'Though marketed as a men\'s cologne, I am a woman and LOVE this scent. Wear it all the time and receive compliments always. Very fresh and clean smelling.'], 'author': u'Wubba1 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great for men and women', 'text': [u'I got this in a "scents for him" pack a few months ago and loved it. It smells like a really good herbal soap. I knew right then I had to buy the big bottle. :)'], 'author': u'rhom ', 'date': [u'2016-07-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'Such a great, fresh, long lasting scent. Well worth the money.'], 'author': u'cmhguy25 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SO Good', 'text': [u'This is one sexy scent. It\'s definitely a new favorite for me. Love.'], 'author': u'lucas538 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

This scent is very strong and overpowering and smells strikingly similar to axe body spray- one spritz and it smells like a teenage boy sprayed too much axe.'], 'author': u'NickyNOLA ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': u'New Orleans, LA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: 'REPLICA' Lipstick On
reviews: {'title': u'Love this perfume!', 'text': [u'The first time I smelt this perfume I was instantly taken back to when my grandma would put on her lipstick & then let me wear it. I\'ve always loved that scent & it has brought back such great memories! The only, and I mean only, issue is that it does wear away quickly off the skin but it stays put if I get it on my sleeves. But it\'s still worth it!'], 'author': u'SBreckenridge ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}
{'title': None, 'text': [u'Sex in a bottle. I am obsessed.'], 'author': u'glazedonut ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Boston', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Great scent, but doesn't last", 'text': [u'I love this scent, true to its name at first spritz. However, this scent fades fast! I\'m talking 5 to 10 minutes fast. I understand it\'s an EDT, but I\'d expect at least an hour or 2 of decent wear. Furthermore, the lipstick note is the fastest to fade and what\'s left thereafter is a faint sugary violet note. If this was stronger or came in EDP form I\'d buy it again in a heartbeat, but for now I just can\'t justify its price tag in relation to its longevity.'], 'author': u'Angelina1985 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'ew', 'text': [u'One of the grossest perfumes I\'ve ever smelled (I\'m sorry I know that\'s harsh). It smells exactly like lipstick, but not a scented lipstick, just like straight cosmetics. Even the guy at sephora hated the smell.'], 'author': u'mykatmolly123 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-17'], 'location': u'Boston', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect', 'text': [u'If you love the classic scent of lipstick with a slightly warm violet note this is PERFECT!!! Something I have been looking for FOR YEARS! I can\'t wait to save up to buy this!! Amazing. I hope they don\'t discontinue this! It\'s something that others have tried to accomplish and failed (Guerlain) !!! <3 <3 <3'], 'author': u'am210 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: No Foundation Foundation SPF 30
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'This product was great for my acne, and actually helped improve it. However, I could not stand how sticky it was or the smell. I tried it for about a week and ended up having to return it because of the sticky texture. I had tried powder and setting spray, but I felt like I should absolutely love the product for that price.'], 'author': u'BECR1872 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Travel vs. Full Size: confusing inconsistencies', 'text': [u'I bought the small, travel size container of this to try out without the full commitment, and absolutely LOVED it. Although it was a little orangey for my complexion, it went on smooth, kept my skin hydrated without feeling heavy, and added just the right amount of coverage and color correction. When I went through the entire travel size, I went and bought the full size one and, like other reviewers, thought there had to be a fluke. The full size one is THICK (the travel size one is very light liquid, like milk) and this one can\'t even be used with the provided dropper because it\'s so thick. It smells weird, makes my skin feel oily by the end of the day (I shouldn\'t have to powder my face so much with something that claims to be lightweight!) and seems to even have less coverage than before. I am still using it, but in combination with other products and would not purchase the full size (or the travel size, if there has been an ingredient change) again'], 'author': u'Katierobot ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Portland, OR', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'horrible', 'text': [u'After reading great reviews and my best friend raving about this product I decided to give it a try. I have sensitive skin, but it is pretty normal. Obviously everyone\'s skin is different and this foundation just did not work with mine. It left my skin extremely sticky. Even hours after putting it on it still felt sticky and gross like it had not dried. Also, I know the name is no foundation foundation but it literally gave me zero coverage. I literally applied it and it looked like I put on nothing, and NOT in a good way. I really wished this product worked for me but it didn\'t. Safe to say the worst foundation I have ever tried.'], 'author': u'eadri59 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love/hate relationship', 'text': [u'I love the fact that this is a foundation that is anti aging. It isn\'t a heavy coverage at all, but when I pair it with my mineral powder my skin looks great. The downfall is the smell. It doesn\'t smell right when I put it on, but later in the day my face has an odor. My husband tells me I smell like a mango pickle. (For those that don\'t know what mango pickle is, it has a very pungent smell). Although, he also tells me that he loves how my face looks when I wear this product because it looks like me. So it\'s a win and fail all at the same time! Too bad they can\'t get rid of the funky smell..... Then this would be a 5 star review.'], 'author': u'ambrosia7 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really with this stuff????', 'text': [u'It is such a good concept and I had high hopes for this but honestly...it was so sticky and tacky on my skin that I had to return it. I was completely disappointed in this purchase because I was looking forward to the benefits that are inside it. Plus, it\'s called no foundation foundation so the name was deceptive. This definitely makes you feel like you have foundation on in a VERY bad way...'], 'author': u'Libbyluv311 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Super Eye Serum
reviews: {'title': u'So far so good', 'text': [u'I like the retinol based formula. I use am and pm under the eye and on the lid. It has a slight tingling sensation when applying. I\'ve only used a month, but have only seen slight improvement in wrinkling. No improvement in under eye circles, but that may take some time.'], 'author': u'amalitta ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Detroit, MI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'It actually works!', 'text': [u'This eye cream has significantly helped with the appearance of the fine lines under my eyes. However, the first week of using it the skin under my eyes slightly peeled (nothing too bad) and was pretty dry. Im guessing it was my skin getting used to the retinol. After that it has been completely fine and I keep seeing improvements every day!'], 'author': u'mwake ', 'date': [u'2016-06-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'it works! DONT TOSS IT', 'text': [u'First of all - DONT THROW IT OUT WHEN IT STOPS PUMPING OUT! ', u'I\'ve had my bottle for a little over six months and it just \'ran out\'. I had my boyfriend crack it open and there is SO MUCH inside!!! That I don\'t have to reorder for maybe two more months!!', u'This product, I paired with Benefit it\'s Potent, works amazingly. I am 29 and it seriously diminished fine line/crows feet that we\'re starting to pop up & reduced my dark circles significantly. I recommend it everyone. ', u'Sometimes, if I have a little extra on my finger (btw you definitely don\'t need a full pump to cover both eyes, so that saves you a bunch!) I put it on a wrinkle I have on my forehead and I swear it\'s helped. ', u'Love Verso! It\'s expensive, but you truly get your money\'s worth.'], 'author': u'Anniehox ', 'date': [u'2016-06-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gets rid of dark circles fast', 'text': [u'when I started using this serum, my dark circles were bad. My eyes looked and felt tired ALL the time. But after only a few days of using this serum, I started noticing a marked change in my under eye area. It appears brighter and more plump every day. It\'s not a miracle treatment, I still have dark circles, but they are much more subtle and my eyes rarely feel as tired as they used to. I also think I noticed an improvement in the fine lines around my eyes as well. One caveat is that this is not a moisturizer, so you will need one of those two if you have dryness around your eyes. Also, for the first two weeks or so of use, this stuff burned a bit when I put it on, so those with sensitive skin may want to start slow with this product.'], 'author': u'melebrity ', 'date': [u'2016-06-12'], 'location': u'Seattle,WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'happy', 'text': [u'Found my perfect eyecream! Been using it for a month now. Yes it is pricey but worth every penny. I had major issues with wrinkles, crows feet, eye bags, etc I seen a big difference in all of the above. All I need is a small pump and is enough coverage.I don\'t usually write reviews but this eyecream deserves it! Presentation of bottle is perfect. Haven\'t had any issues with the pump at all.'], 'author': u'Bayesse ', 'date': [u'2016-03-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Cleanser
ingredient: Paraffinum Liquidum, PEG-30 Lanolin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Aluminum Stearate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Peg-75 Lanolin, Phenoxyethanol, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Leaf Oil, Humulus Lupulus (Hop) Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, BHT.
reviews: {'title': u'Best Cleansing Balm, Will Repurchase!', 'text': [u'I adore this stuff. I\'ve tired the cleansing balms from Sunday Riley (shoutout to HG Good Genes!) and Clinique, and Eve Lom\'s is still my favorite. Sunday Riley\'s cleansing balm is really quite lovely - the smell and texture are really luxurious, but I found that it didn\'t do that good a job at taking my waterproof mascara off. I appreciated that Clinique\'s was unscented, but I found it\'s texture too oily and didn\'t think it cleansed my face all that well. While I\'m not exactly crazy about Eve Lom\'s smell, I don\'t find it offensive and, more importantly, it does a fantastic job at melting away my makeup, especially my waterproof mascara. Since I wear makeup about 4-5 times a week, my 1.6 oz jar has lasted me almost a full four months (and I\'ve decanted a good bit into a small jar for travel). I don\'t always do every single step that Eve Lom recommends (using the muslin cloth that\'s provided to steam my face, etc), but I find that massaging the balm into my skin and them gently washing it off with warm water does the job. Like many people, I use this cleansing balm as a first cleanse and follow up with another cleanser, usually Drunk Elephant\'s Peeke Bar. Though this cleansing balm is not cheap, my sensitive skin reacts really well to it and it takes off my makeup exceptionally well.'], 'author': u'missymissydee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'Mississippi', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'This product is absolutely wonderful, it feels like a spa treatment and truly leaves your skin feeling soft and cleansed. It is one of the most luxurious balm cleansers I have used. Leaves a clean even surfaced finish!'], 'author': u'k3721 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'So Good!', 'text': [u'After using two samples of this stuff, I bought it and although expensive, I\'m sticking with it. It took me a few try to get used to the cleanser\'s consistency, and figure out how best to apply it on my face and what the right amount is. It is super compatible with my skin bc after use, my toner pad shows no traces of makeup or dirt. My pores are clear, acne and white heads have greatly reduced and my skin absorbs any essence/serum/moisturizer that I put on afterwards better than ever before. Absolutely worth the money and it even smells heavenly.'], 'author': u'cc1029 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'overrated', 'text': [u'I don\'t feel like this cleaned my skin at all. Barely took off makeup. Extremely expensive cleanser for no real cleansing.'], 'author': u'resr1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'What is this even supposed to do?', 'text': [u'I\'m really glad I received this as a free sample because it\'s not worth the money at all.', u'I don\'t see how this product is special, in fact, it\'s one of the worst cleansers I\'ve tried.', u'The smell is okay and consistency is thick. It does NOT lather at all and turns into a milky liquid when you apply it to wet skin and is terrible at removing makeup.', u'After washing it off, my skin felt tacky and thick, almost like this product left a layer of residue.', u'It\'s gross and doesn\'t feel clean at all.', u'There are many better & cheaper alternatives that do an effective job at removing makeup and daily impurities.', u'Do not recommend.'], 'author': u'Awai ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'worth it?', 'text': [u'i\'ve had this flat iron for about 18 months. i love it. i will say though, that both of my cartridges were broken by the first year, which kind of defeats the point of buying this if you\'re looking for extra heat protection with the agave oil. since it doesn\'t seem to be stocked anywhere and the cartridges aren\'t replaceable, i\'d think twice about investing.'], 'author': u'cbush12 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-07'], 'location': u'Fairfax, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Broke in a month', 'text': [u'Bought one of these despite being warned about the cartridge breaking and leaking. Broke within a month even after i took exceptional care of it. i had not dropped it and handled it gently. Was great up until the cartridge broke and i lost a lot of oil.'], 'author': u'CandyWhale ', 'date': [u'2016-02-02'], 'location': u'Tullahoma, TN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Awful', 'text': [u'I received this flat iron as a birthday gift. When I first opened it, one of the oils had broken open in the box and half of it was spilled out. Then, when I proceeded to use the flat iron, it took forever to straighten my curly hair. The morning after I straightened my hair, I washed it and realized that my hair looked more straight than it usually did. It had gone from curly, bouncy, and moisturized to frizzy, thin, and dead-looking. After weeks of not knowing why my hair had lost its curl, I figured out that this straightener had somehow ruined my hair. It went from spiral curls to dull and lifeless in one use. I went to a salon where my stylist told me that my hair had mid-strand breakage and she had to cut my hair that was mid-back length, to shoulder length and event hen she said she could have cut off more. I had to buy so many products to help get my hair back to its original state. It took me seven months to get my hair back to what it was before I used this flat iron. Needless to say, it was a waste of $160.'], 'author': u'panther22 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Excellent straightener, but missing a bottle', 'text': [u'I have very long, very curly hair that tends to look dry when straightened. I had a 2" CHI straightener before this that my sister forcibly adopted.', u'I first tried straightening with this on the medium setting and the results were so underwhelming, probably because it wasn\'t hot enough to deal with my hair texture.', u'Once I got it on the higher heat, the results were fabulous. Typically my hair frizzes out a couple of days after straightening (I try not to do it often, and keep it straight for as long as I can), but with this it stayed gorgeous until it got oily enough to need a wash. So far I\'ve been wiping down the plates with a soft towel between uses so no buildup.', u'I like the smell of the serum too. I\'m not sure if that\'s what makes my hair stay magical for so long, but I\'m totally down for infusing good things into it with this much heat attacking it.', u'I ordered online and only got one of the bottles of serum with it though, not sure if anyone else had this problem. Emailed support and they haven\'t really helped, possibly because of how busy this time of year is.'], 'author': u'nooriebasta ', 'date': [u'2015-12-14'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}
