reviews: {'title': u'it has its place in my st ash', 'text': [u'My experience with this shampoo is as follows, it\'s thick. Like honey. I consider it like a shampoo concentrate. I drizzle a little on my hand, & rub it on my scalp. At this point it FEELS like it won\'t move around and you need to use so much product, but I splash more water on my head and begin to later. If your hair is wet wet wet, it will spread and lather very well. I try to mainly shampoo my scalp area, as I have dry ends of my hair. I figure some gets down there without me deliberately working it root to tip, so I only work the roots. I follow with the companion conditioner. ', u'I have blow dried my hair after, and had it dry naturally over night and straightened my hair in the morning. Both times my hair felt so light and clean, very nice. ', u'I def recommend if your hair is feeling gunked up. It\'s great for oily roots like myself. I wouldn\'t use this daily, but I don\'t wash my hair daily anyways (dry ends! Trying to be gentle on them).'], 'author': u'dingo ', 'date': [u'2016-07-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have very thin hair that I have to wash daily. Most shampoos leave my hair feeling nice for a few hours but it always is greasy by the end of the day. I\'m able to stretch out washes (esp when I use Drybar\'s Detox Dry Shampoo) to 2 days. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with fine hair. I think it\'s worth every penny because it leaves my hair feeling clean without feeling stripped or over-dry.'], 'author': u'AshleyM929 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Smells Terrible!', 'text': [u'I have super-fine hair, and this product works very well. It gave my hair volume, without static-cling, or fly-aways.', u'Unfortunately, I have a sensitivity to heavily perfumed products. It smells very chemically, and over-perfumed. The scent eventually goes away, after the hair is styled.', u'I gave this product 2 stars, because of the scent. It works, but I\'ll never buy it again.'], 'author': u'KeturahYael ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': u'Vancouver, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'BEST blow out ever!!!', 'text': [u'I just gave myself the best blow out I\'ve ever gotten- my salon doesn\'t even do it this well. My hairs incredibly thick, fine and oily, so I get build up at my roots fairly quickly. I\'m on day two, and my hair still feels like day one. It\'s honestly never looked more clean, more bouncy, or more voluminous. I love that this doesn\'t have sulfates or silicones in it; I think that really helped with the build up at my roots from other silicone-based products that I was using before, and the lack of sulfates means that it cleaned without over stripping. However, this is NOT intended for daily use and should only be used 1-2x a week, as directed, or it might dry you out. I only wash my hair 2-3x a week anyways, so I think this will keep working for me. I wouldn\'t use this product if you have dry hair. It really is going to work best on people who are already over-oily and just need some balance to their hair to get it clean. People with thicker hair will have particularly good results, because it really does take the work out of the cleaning process.'], 'author': u'jwest07 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-24'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Back to Normal', 'text': [u'I was using a different shampoo to help with my dandruff, it was working and I was almost done the bottle when my hair starting to have a gross texture at the roots. After washing, it would feel like I had a bunch of product build up. After researching different shampoos, I got a sample of this one and after one use, my hair went back to normal. So I picked up an entire bottle! It keeps my hair clean, soft, shiny and build up free.'], 'author': u'lexabianca ', 'date': [u'2016-03-15'], 'location': u'Montreal, Quebec', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'great for fine, thick hair', 'text': [u'My hair is fine, but really thick. {'title': u"I don't usually buy expensive hair care products..", 'text': [u'So when I bought this set, I continued to wash my hair on a daily basis because that\'s what I\'d always done with other cheaper shampoos and conditioners. My hair\'s pretty average as far as oiliness/dryness, and washing it every day with this stuff was a major no-go. My hair got super greasy and straw-like... not a cute look at all. However, once I finally realized that the issue was how often I was using it, I stopped having any of these issues. Now I\'m only washing my hair once every 2-3 days and my hair has never been this soft/healthy. 100% would recommend this product - it\'s been a total game changer for my hair.'], 'author': u'tmkay997 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Athens, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: All About Eyes Serum De-Puffing Eye Massage
reviews: {'title': u'Miraculous', 'text': [u'I work strictly night shift and as a result have developed puffy/baggy eyes that no amount of extra sleep seems to be able to cure.This Clinique All About Eyes Serum De-Puffing Massage works like a charm! I don\'t use it all the time, but when I want to look refreshed for a special occasion this serum does the trick. My skin is super sensitive and I\'ve been having problems even with Clinique products in recent years, but I get no reaction from this very light weight serum. It doesn\'t appear to leave a film causing issues with foundation or powder. I\'d highly recommend this product to anyone needing a good de-puffing.'], 'author': u'RosieKat ', 'date': [u'2016-10-04'], 'location': u'Vancouver, B.C.', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: GLO Brilliant™ Teeth Whitening Device
reviews: {'title': u'LOVE!!', 'text': [u'This set works. I got it in pink and love it. Works great and the results are amazing. 1 vial= 4 uses! Enjoy! :)'], 'author': u'WhitneyNicole7 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u"It REALLY does work...but don't expect Zoom result", 'text': [u'The system does work as it claims. My teeth were whiten by at least 4-5 shades. However, as others have mentioned it needs to be charged often which is not a deal breaker for me. However, I will say that the vials are poorly designed. You are suppose to get four uses out of one vial. I never could! However, I made sure to get all my teeth and not just focus on the front teeth. So, I really use about a vial and a half each session. I did it for 5 days straight and the pic below is the before and after. I had yellow stains from my tea drinking. ', u'The system did cause gum sensitivity the first two days and then went away. I did not get any teeth sensitivity and for this reason alone I will keep and continue to use the system. I know someone who did Zoom and was in real pain for days from the extreme teeth sensitivity. Took one star off due to the design of the vials.'], 'author': u'boriquaforever ', 'date': [u'2016-08-01'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Poor design', 'text': [u'The unit did not stay charged, the mouthpiece was way to big for my mouth, and the vials are difficult to use. After trying to use 3 times, I am sending it back. Not worth the money or hassle.'], 'author': u'ozzydog7 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-27'], 'location': u'Madison, WI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'After reading a lot of reviews I decided to take the plunge and try this product. I was really excited for it to arrive and ready to use it, however, it does not come charged so you have to wait several hours before you can give it a try.After the first treatment, I did see a difference but that was the only difference I saw throughout the sessions. The gels are very hard to uncap and to squeeze, and getting 4 treatments out of one is impossible. I did have some teeth sensitivity and felt like my gums and inside of my lips were burnt by the lighting. The device seemed a lot cheaper and low quality than I was expecting.When I attempted a second 5 day round, the device just stopped charging and functioning. I will be exchanging this one for another to see if I just received a defective one.'], 'author': u'LoganLiz ', 'date': [u'2016-06-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Definitely works', 'text': [u'This works so much better than any drug store whitening strips - with no sensitivity! It is kind of a pain to charge the device and find a half hour to do it but it is worth it. I have had it over a year and have gone through 2 sets of whitening gels and will be purchasing a third set soon. I do this when I think of it about once a month, and my teeth continue to be much whiter than they ever were before.'], 'author': u'MandyMay25 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-09'], 'location': u'East Granby, CT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Trinity + Eye and Lip Enhancer Attachment Bundle
reviews: {'title': u'Good when it works', 'text': [u'I ordered this product, charged it the recommended time and it lasted 1 month. The charging cradle is poorly designed but, even with making sure it was on there correctly, the device would make a noise to turn on and then immediately make another noise to turnoff. I returned it and bought another one and the same thing happened. It was never able to last 5 days with one charge like the booklet states.'], 'author': u'AgingConsumer ', 'date': [u'2016-08-08'], 'location': u'Minneapolis, MN', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Very Disappointing!', 'text': [u'Quick Take: somewhat easy to useWell, sorry to be a downer, but I found this device to do absolutely nothing for me. I even took pics of myself to compare! My sister in law had the same disappointing experience. I find it so funny to read reviews from anyone under the age of 30 but I guess perhaps they are more likely to see change since their skin hasn\'t really experienced true aging yet! Im a young 61 and I bought the NuFace a year ago and used it religiously as the instructions suggested. I was even emailing back and forth with a NuFace representative to make sure I was doing it all correctly. My main concern was to address the sagging skin in the jowl area and one brow is slightly lower than the other. Not even the slightest of improvement resulted in either of these areas. By the end of having the device for a little over a year and still using it as the instructions suggested the NuFace died! Really sorry to report that it was an epic fail as I really wanted it to work :-('], 'author': u'tudaisey ', 'date': [u'2016-08-07'], 'location': u'NY NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'I agree with some comments below - it is annoying that you have to wash off the sticky primer after you use the device. Although the procedure is not too long, maybe 10 min max it still feels like forever when you tired and sleepy. I wish they came our with a better primer that would have some benefits for your skin and also you wouldn\'t have to wash it off. It doesn\'t feel good to wet your face again after the massage.I also haven\'t noticed too much of my skin improvement after using it for a month. Now I became lazy and barely use this thing.'], 'author': u'mikkeladjeo ', 'date': [u'2016-06-18'], 'location': u'CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Love!!', 'text': [u'This was exactly what I was looking for...saw results within a week. Really happy I didn\'t wait any longer to purchase this. Essential!'], 'author': u'admrlgrl2085 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing but process could be improved', 'text': [u'I love this device, but I don\'t use it that often because the manufacturer has not come up with a better alternative to the conductive primer. My biggest issue is that you have to wash your face, apply the gunky primer, use the NuFace device, and then wash your face again to remove the gunky primer. Not to mention that the primer is gunky and could easily get in your freshly washed or styled hair.! If they could come up with an innovation to remote the last step of having to wash your face again, this device would get 5 stars as I would use it more and I\'m sure the benefits would be more obvious. The ideal primer would be like a serum that doesn\'t dry too quickly, can be reapplied as needed and can be left on the skin like regular serums.'], 'author': u'San4Tahoe ', 'date': [u'2016-04-13'], 'location': u'Roseville, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'life changing.', 'text': [u'I had no idea how poorly regular cleansers were working for me until I switched to this. Leaves my skin squeaky clean, soft, moisturized. {'title': None, 'text': [u'I love this cleanser, does a great job getting makeup off, cleaning my face (no break outs!), my eyebrows are conditioned and look great, but sometimes it really stings my eyes- I\'m totally willing to put up with that though because I love this cleanser so much.'], 'author': u'SafiGirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hydrating, softening, all around Amazing', 'text': [u'First, I have mature, sensitive, yet oily, break out prone skin. I DID NOT want to even consider this cleanser when I first saw it. It looked like a vat of petrolatum. Of course REN doesn\'t put Petrolatum in any products (a list of the no, no\'s is on every package). It is made of a great blend of fabulous cleanly sourced, botanicals. So ,eventually I gave it a try. So thankful I did. You use so very little of this product for great results. Apply it to your skin and it starts melting any and all makeup. Then wet your fingertips or even your Clarisonic brush head. You will adore the rich milky texture that develops. As you wipe it off with the included cloth you will see soft, hydrated skin appear.'], 'author': u'dgdb ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Argan Cleansing Oil
ingredient: Hellanthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed oil, Polysorbate-80, Polysorbate-20, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Arganla Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Citrus Grandis (Pomelo Grapefruit) Seed Oil,  Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Tocopherol (Antioxident), Sucralose.
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I received this as one of my three free samples about 3 months ago and then ended up purchasing the travel size. I just recently purchased this full size. Needless to say, this is now my main cleanser. I\'m 38 and have dry, sensitive combination skin. I have also used it with my Clarisonic and it works well. I notice that with this cleanser I only use my Clarisonic 1-2 times weekly now; whereas before I would use it daily. This works great with my dry skin and I no longer need to use a toner. I do notice, like other reviewers, it doesn\'t remove heavy eye make-up well. In this case, I just let the cleanser sit longer on my skin/eyes to soften and use a gentle, wet wash cloth for removal and it comes off easily. I also shake the bottle before use because you can see separation of the oils. Overall, great product. I used to be a die hard 3-step Clinique user, but this has won me over. I still use Clinique with my Clarisonic maybe once every two weeks just to get a good deep clean. Overall, I am very satisfied and my skin is softer and better moisturized without increasing redness, sensitivity or causing a breakout.'], 'author': u'OrganicGigi ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good but...', 'text': [u'This cleanser is gentle and Definetely doesn\'t dry the skin out (great for sensitive reactive skin!) On the unfortunate side, if you wear a good amount of makeup this doesn\'t do a great job of fully removing it. Quite a bit will often be left behind ok the face sometimes, so go over with a toner! Also, don\'t get in your eyes or it will make your vision quite blurry.'], 'author': u'livydel ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'2 years of no blemishes', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using Josie Maran Cleansing Oil for 2 years. I\'m in my late 40\'s and use this 3-4x a week for a gentle cleanser. I had mid life acne & tried many products with no luck. Cleaning oil which sounds crazy in helping rid acne got rid of it ALL. I never break out like I used to and my face feels super soft.'], 'author': u'christibro ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for Combination Skin', 'text': [u'This is amazing. Cleans face very well and moisturizes too! Doesn\'t clog my pores or anything. {'title': u"doesn't remove my make up effectively", 'text': [u'i was looking for a natural cleanser that could remove my tinted moisturizer and blush without stripping my skin; being a huge boscia fan, i decided to try this product. {'title': u'not bad!', 'text': [u'I should start off saying that I\'m a newbie as far as cleansers and face oils go. I just turned 30 and I\'m allergic to most things under the sun. I just went from never washing my face with anything except warm water ( because EVERYTHING makes me dry and itchy and breaks my skin out! Not by choice. lol ) bought the sample size and the first few days it did nothing for me. I have two dry patches on my cheeks that drive me nuts. I used a creamy cleanser and an over night face mask followed by this in the am and holy moly- it worked! I\'ve kept up this ritual of cleaner, light face mask either a 10 min one or an over night, and then the oil or just the oil sometimes after washing and I have zero dry patches. ZERO. I do add a few dabs to my body lotions now as well! The smell isn\'t great but it isn\'t bad either. It smells like oil. Lol there is no fragrance in it which I\'m sure is actually why it worked for me. I do feel a tiny bit greasy in the AM but I also use a little more than instructed! All in all, I would purchase again. Why mess with a good thing?'], 'author': u'JessicaGuelker ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'It works! You don\'t have to comb it in, either, which is great for fragile hair.'], 'author': u'jodief ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have a mix of thin 2B-3A hair so it needs a boost to look pulled together usually, especially the further from washing it is. DevaCurl\'s curl cream and BB Curl defining creme stretch my pattern into sad limp stretched waves.', u'When I spray this I work it in by doing lots of scrunching and its working so far. It doesn\'t make my hair curlier than on wash day, but the curls that are more stretched start to get pattern and definition back.', u'-.5 Star: I\'ve only used this a couple times and feel like I\'m going to use it up within a month (maybe I wasn\'t looking and my bottle was open already?) but a lot of product is gone', u'-.5 Star: Smell is weird, /but/ it goes away after a minute.'], 'author': u'mes89 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Better than Bumble and Bumble (AND CHEAPER TOO)', 'text': [u'SO, I don\'t usually write reviews but I had too for this one. One of my friends works at Sephora so I decided to visit him on one of my trips to buy some more curl creme and hairspray. I usually buy the bumble and bumble brand of curl creme along with the primer spray which always does its job on holding my curls moisture and never getting frizzy. One thing Ive always HATED though was the bumble and bumble packaging. Once I get down to the end of the bottle it always seems to be "empty" but once I cut into it to see how much product I was throwing out and I WAS THROWING AWAY BASICALLY 1/4 OF THE BOTTLE. Not to mention the primer spray is in the same packaging which doesn\'t help since you always run out of the spray before the creme. (They should really think about making a larger bottle for the primer spray). After explaining this to my friend he directed me to Devacurl. Ive always heard great things about this brand but since Ive been a bumble and bumble fan since the dawn of ages, I was hesitant to buy this. BUT since it was my best friend who works at Sephora, I believed in him and bought the mist-er right spray with the coconut curl creme. I must say I dont like the curl creme whatsoever and did go back to the bumble and bumble brand BUT THE MIST-ER RIGHT SPRAY IS A WINNER. It lasted FOREVER compared to the bumble spray, and it smells FRIGGEN AMAZING!!! I will always buy this for my curls since it smells great and always revitalizes my curls even if its frizzy. BEST SPRAY FOR CURLS!!!!!'], 'author': u'Benababy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing for me', 'text': [u'For me this product worked amazingly. I got this while on vacation. I had been using another curl activator called dream curls. That works well for me but Mist-er Right works even better. It gives me more compact, pretty curls. I like the light lavender scent. I highly recommend this.'], 'author': u'Angepetite ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this Stuff', 'text': [u'I hardly ever write reviews, but this product is worth it! I needed to give my wallet and my nails a break from the salon. I saw this on Sephora\'s app while looking for a good polish I could do myself. It\'s pricey for polish but about the same as one manicure at the salon. The shape of the brush makes it easy toApply. With this easy to apply brush I will be looking to try some of Dior polish colors.'], 'author': u'HaHD ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Dior Addict Lip Glow
reviews: {'title': u'Pretty glow, feels nice on the lips', 'text': [u'I purchased this in the color lilac. I\'m pretty fair skinned with dark hair and was looking for something that just enhanced my natural lip color. The color pink for me turned too bright but lilac was much softer. These are hydrating and feel really nice on. I\'ve tried a lot of lip products which claim to have hydrating properties then leave my lips feeling dry and unhappy. That\'s not the case with these Dior balms, they definitely hydrate and keep my lips feeling soft and nourished for quite a while after applying! Taking one star off because I feel they\'re a bit overpriced for a tinted balm. The Fresh "sugar" lip balms are just as nice and almost $10 less.'], 'author': u'jess4444 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Visionnaire Eye Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Worst packaging ever', 'text': [u'I really like this line so I thought I would be equally happy with the eye cream. Which is probably great. But the packaging is so badly designed, I want to throw it in the trash every time I use it. First of all, you have to pull off the cap. Not twist. So it takes some force. Once you open it, it has a cool little applicator for your eye. The kind where you squeeze a little out and use the attached applicator to put on your eyes. It twists to leave open or closed. The bad things are, if you leave the eye cream "open" and cap it, the next time you pull it open, you cant help but squeeze out all this eye cream that is then wasted. So you need to lock it closed after each use. Also, if you use it after you shower and have put your lotion on etc, your hands are slick There is no way I can open that without washing my hands cleaned or using a shirt or something to open it. Third. If you do use the applicator to put it on, even if you have a little tiny bit of eye makeup on your face, it gets all in the applicator and then you just realize how much dirt must collect in that thing that you then put on your eye. If I could return it, I would. I\'ll use it to the end because its a little expensive but I will hate every moment of it.'], 'author': u'raterrater ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Wait for It, Wait for It...', 'text': [u'I have been using this for 3 years now and it has kept me from having any procedure for that long; it rocks in my Book!!!'], 'author': u'carrat1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-09'], 'location': u'Myrtle Beach, South Carolina', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Not worth it!', 'text': [u'It was like applying nothing, it did not do nothing for me'], 'author': u'micky05 ', 'date': [u'2015-08-29'], 'location': u'Goldsboro, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'WOW', 'text': [u'I\'m so sad that this product hasn\'t worked well for some women. I LOVE this eye cream. I am Mexican-American and have increasingly dark circles as I age. I also have crow\'s feet developing around my eyes. I have been using this cream for one week. After trying hundreds of eye products, I can honestly say that this is perfect for me. It\'s easy to apply, INSTANTLY removes my dark circles (I look like a teen again), and takes care of moisture. I\'ll be able to tell you more, after more time passes.'], 'author': u'Aag77 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-03'], 'location': u'Hershey, PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Surprised by how little this actually works', 'text': [u'I did not buy this product at Sephora - I purchased it at a duty free in France. I doubt they are any different, but I thought I would disclose. I\'ve only used it for a few days, but, honestly, I\'ve never had much of an issue with dark circles as I have with trying to find an eye cream to prevent wrinkles - after using this cream, I HAVE DARK CIRCLES. I\'m pretty certain the cream has enhanced or initiated negative discolouration. Not cool, Lancome. Also, I see no other results, aside from a feeling of immediate hydration that doesn\'t last as the cream dries up and flakes a couple of hours later.'], 'author': u'honeychka ', 'date': [u'2015-01-08'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Works well for 1-2 years', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this product for almost 3 years, but recently stopped because I no longer see a difference in my skin. Within the first month of using it and throughout the first year my pores were smaller, my freckles seemed to fade, my skin was soft and and my skin generally looked better and healthier. However, within the past year (year 3) I stopped noticing any benefit from the product. (I have not moved cities or significantly changed my daily activities). I am not sure if my skin became used to the product or if it\'s just done all it can do. It\'s hard to tell if there are any long-term results/benefits from using it.'], 'author': u'098765 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

Generally I find that the texture is exceedingly thick and a little hard to apply so it helps to add in just the tiniest amount of water to thin it slightly. but in terms of brightening and clarifying the skin for really sensitive and dry skins this is a great go to.'], 'author': u'Delano ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'My skin: oily, acne-prone, combo / med light tone', u'First I\'ll say that I\'m a mask junkie, so I\'m a total snob about what kind of masking experience I like... and this is one of my new favourites.', u'This is a very thick, dense and gritty formula - though not rough in texture or abrasive at all. I\'m someone who likes to stretch product and do thinner applications of some masks but this is definitely one of those masks you have to do a generous application of to get the full effect. The mask is already quite dry to begin with so you\'ll have to apply it quickly in order to not smudge off the already-dried areas. Once applied, there\'s a mild cooling sensation, it\'s sea-monster green and smells exactly how you would assume an algae mask would smell (but in like a therapeutic, spa kind of way). After my first application my skin was a little pink from all the active ingredients going on but by my second application my skin took to it nicely.', u'I\'ve noticed in just 3 uses that my skin feels slightly less oily, but the biggest change for me is the help fading my acne scars and dark spots. I have previously used Ole Henriksen Sheer Transformation for fading scars, which worked for me but also made me break out so it was a bit counter productive... so using this mask in lieu seems to be a more successful alternative for me.', u'Overall very much enjoy this mask, I\'ve only gotten one of those tiny little sample pots from Sephora and 3 use in, I still have another 1-2 applications. So I\'d say a little product goes a long way, once you take into consideration how much you actually need to use to get the full effect. Pretty sure I will be buying the full size, though not loving the price tag. But hey, we all know that you get what you pay for!'], 'author': u'jquiii ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bad Packaging, Decent Product', 'text': [u'I would have given the actual concealer 4 stars, it provides a natural medium coverage, and is a really good match for my skin. It also did not look cakey on my very dry skin. I used this mostly to cover some imperfections on my skin, rather than highlighting (doesn\'t anyone use concealer to actually conceal anymore?), and it worked well, but I would have liked a little better coverage. Also, since its a stick, its hard to use it for spot concealing. I took off another 2 stars though because after less than a week, the turn mechanism broke, and the concealer wouldn\'t come up anymore. I can still use it by sticking a concealer brush into the tube, or I can depot it, but seriously? For $34 I expect the packaging not to fail after less than a week. I would exchange this, but hate to waste the product. For a luxury bland like Hourglass, I expect much better.'], 'author': u'pinkypenguin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

Totally forgettable.'], 'author': u'malibu4208 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I like it', 'text': [u'I like it and think its helping my makeup to stay on better overall. Kind of feeling some type of way about the price but natural beauty is worth it'], 'author': u'Abimbola ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Give this a chance!', 'text': [u'So I received this as part of Bite\'s spring fling set and I threw it in a drawer because I didn\'t understand what it was for. Found it and decided to look up its purpose and actually use it and I\'m so happy I did! I own about six lip liners because I don\'t have issues with bleeding or feathering and I can get a precise application just fine without them, so the concept of this product was perfect for me. Now, I do agree with people that this does not hydrate or even really condition the lips. It does also require a bit of work to apply because of the formula but nothing crazy like people have said. Feels like a drier version of a Chapstick. The reason I love this now is because it serves as the PERFECT lip base for me. I am of a medium/deep skin tone and have issues with MANY lip colors not showing up true to color because of my skin tone or not translating the same way on me as they do on fair to light complexions. This solves that problem perfectly!! Now I can actually use all those lip products and get my money\'s worth. Also I find that this does in fact make my lip products last A LOT longer and make them wear even better. This has been amazing with my very creamy, almost balmy lipstick formulations but especially for liquid lipsticks!! Im not a big fan of liquid lipsticks in general, but when I wear this primer underneath, my lips don\'t feel as dried out and the liquid lipsticks lay SOO much better on my lips. It prevents the liquid lip from sinking into my lip lines too much and looking gross and old which has been awesome so I\'m now able to wear them. This lip primer also helps with the way my liquid lipsticks wear as well. They last even longer without fading and when they do start to go, it\'s very subtle and they fade very evenly. I\'ve tested this with many lip products and formulations and all in all I\'m super happy with it and will definitely repurchase once I run out!!'], 'author': u'AngeliqueL ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'nope', 'text': [u'Not a fan of this product at all! I don\'t feel it was hydrating at all and it honestly felt like a dried up glue stick trying to rub it in my lips .. didn\'t notice any different applying lipstick on top. Won\'t purchase again.'], 'author': u'epati ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'The smell', 'text': [u'This is better for combo, mostly dry skin than argan oil. I find it absorbs very well and doesn\'t feel greasy later in the day. Thankfully, it dissipates after about 5 minutes or so.'], 'author': u'SunkneeG ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Life changer!', 'text': [u'After just one week of use, I have noticed a dramatic difference in my skin\'s appearance. I have dry, sensitive skin that was covered in small red bumps from an allergic reaction. Within a few days of using Juno, the redness and bumps disappeared! My skin also looks amazing under my makeup. I apply four drops to my face between cleansing and moisturizing, morning and evening. Highly recommend!'], 'author': u'pippaluc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': u'Kansas City, MO', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

The scent is weird for me (like oregano or italian herbs with natural oil scent, so much different if compared to Luna or UFO) but after 20 to 30 minutes the scent is gone.'], 'author': u'omy96 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'it works!', 'text': [u'So I took one star off for the alcohol smell but this stuff works. name: Nourishing Hand Cream with Almond Oil and Shea Butter
reviews: {'title': u'meh', 'text': [u'This is definitely fast absorbing but I wouldn\'t call it nourishing. It feels like a very light moisturizer that I could buy at a drugstore. Will not be purchasing this again.'], 'author': u'beautyjunkie1011 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nice, Quick Absorbing Hand Cream', 'text': [u'I purchased this hand cream because I was looking for a good hand cream that absorbed quickly.', u'This hand cream comes with an easy to use flip top lid. The cream is easy to dispense and has a nice feel. A little goes a long way and as promised, this hand cream does absorb quickly. It leaves no oily or greasy feel behind.', u'The cream does a very good job of bringing moisture to the hands. The moisture added does last through a few light hand washings.', u'I rated this hand cream 4 out of 5 stars because of the scent. I expected it to smell of either almond or shea or both. It doesn\'t. The scent is closest to a floral shea smell. It\'s not offensive but it\'s the kind of smell you either like or dislike. As the scent lingers, it can clash with a fragrance you may be wearing (as it does with my scent of choice: My Burberry or Black Opium).'], 'author': u'mmrkt ', 'date': [u'2015-04-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Triple C Peptide Firming Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'Background: 35 yrs old, combination skin (dry cheeks, oily t-zone), acne prone, no wrinkles, but started seeing dullness in my face. I\'m a big fan of Dr. Dennis Gross products and this one didn\'t disappoint. I use it at night after cleansing my face with the All In One cleanser from this same brand (only one that stopped my breakouts although it makes my skin a tad dry). A few drops go a long way, the first time I massaged the oil on my face and I went to bed. The next morning I couldn\'t believe me eyes! My face was so plumped, bright, youthful again. This stuff really works.'], 'author': u'VanessaSd ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A great oil!', 'text': [u'I had a makeover and the skin care associate used this. I loved it so much I spent more than I usually do on this type of product. It has stayed on the counter rather than join the "meh" products in a drawer. Recently bought my second bottle to be sure I don\'t run ou! I use about 6 drops AM &PM, so this goes a long way. Absorbs well.'], 'author': u'petiesmom ', 'date': [u'2016-03-12'], 'location': u'little rock, AR', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Truly outstanding!', 'text': [u'This oil has changed my skin! It\'s a lovely formulation that really makes skin glowy and bright. Highly recommend!'], 'author': u'tinydancer1485 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

My skin - usually irritated red, visibly dry and sensitive to many products I tried - transformed in a matter of days. My skin has never been this smooth, healthy and radiant looking. The oil serum is easy to absorb - a huge plus when compared to other overnight products I tried. I highly recommend!'], 'author': u'Ivik ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Abeille Royale Face Treatment Oil
reviews: {'title': u'practice makes perfect.', 'text': [u'I bought this because I have been switching my routine towards anti aging. I have very oily skin & only the Becca primer keeps my oil in control. So when I first used this I hated it, the tacky feel never went away & my skin was a disco ball by hour two. However, trust me, I just use this now at night before bed. Right after I cleanse with my Smart Profile & I wake up with plumped skin. It doesn\'t break me out or cause overproduction of oil, during the day, either from nighttime wear. So if you\'re looking for a face oil, serum, cream, etc for wrinkles than this is amazing. No it won\'t dramatically improve your wrinkles but it will plump you skin for a good 12 hours after washing it off in the morning. 4 drops is all it takes, so the price tag isn\'t that steep considering it\'ll last at least a year+'], 'author': u'BrentMaxey ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Breakout City', 'text': [u'Not only did this feel tacky on my face but it made me break out terribly. I stopped using it and tried again with the same results. Glad I only had a sample.'], 'author': u'belle67 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Luxurious oil', 'text': [u'What I noticed first about this was a wonderful light smell. I had never tried an oil before, and really liked that it didn\'t feel greasy. It is tacky, but I don\'t consider that a bad feature at all, especially given it doesn\'t last long. Used at night and in the morning my skin felt smooth and soft and clear.'], 'author': u'JenRachel ', 'date': [u'2016-07-22'], 'location': u'Rural NC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'very nice, worth it for oily skin', 'text': [u'I first tried this after rinsing off a clay mask. I was expecting a moisture surge, but I was surprised how light it was. I had better results with its daytime use, as it was light enough to not mess with my BB cream. Smells nice. I do agree with the other reviews that the tackiest is weird. It goes away after a few hours. I would recommend this oil to those who are super oily and don\'t like the weight of other oils and serums.'], 'author': u'suckrfish ', 'date': [u'2016-07-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Tacky feel', 'text': [u'I couldn\'t get past the tacky quality of this oil on my face. I\'ve used face oils for 30 years so I\'m used to their application & benefits - this one just isn\'t that great (nor are the ingredients).'], 'author': u'MRSmitty ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'rose? nope', 'text': [u'Nothing special about this one. Bought for the rose scent- absolutely none, I\'m not a fan of the non-floral scent. {'title': u'The morning skincare step I was missing', 'text': [u'I\'d been eyeing this for a while, but it took me a while to risk $80 on a "day time" face oil. I\'m so glad I did! This non-greasy oil sinks right in and preps my skin beautifully for my tinted moisturizer. The lovely rose scent disappears shortly. After a few weeks of consistent morning use, my skin looks brighter and more even.'], 'author': u'emmorris ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'After returning Josie Maran Argan Oil, I purchased this product and saw results after one night. I awoke to a plump radiant complexion, free of dry patches. A miracle for my dry skin! I also like that it contains spf15 considering I often forget the sunscreen step. I put this on after cleansing my face, and at night I pair it with the Peter Thomas Roth Cucumber gel mask. The price is ridiculous, however, a little bit goes a long way and it is definitely worth the money.'], 'author': u'Mushello ', 'date': [u'2016-04-13'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

You may as well put on ANY sunscreen oil.I gave it 2 stars because of its other ingredients, and because it is lightweight. Otherwise for THIS PRICE I expect it to smell delicious...and it doesn\'t. Unless you can get it on sale, PASS on this one.'], 'author': u'CC25 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-10'], 'location': u'Bay Area, Ca', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Under(cover) Perfecting Coconut Face Primer
reviews: {'title': u'I liked it', 'text': [u'So, I bought this after buying a mattifying primer & mattifying moisturizer (both bought to minimize pores.) They both work great, but I felt like my skin looked super dry!', u'Bought this primer & it makes my skin look so much more alive & natural! My makeup lasts through my 12 hour hospital shifts (with masks on & off my face repeatedly) and it gives a nice dewey base without being "illuminating" or shiny. ', u'That being said, if I add any extra moisture into my routine...it\'s way too shiny for me. ', u'...it\'s a fine balance.'], 'author': u'suze ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Mascara is great, but it's basically a $24 sample", 'text': [u'This mascara is great for multiplying and lengthening lashes--it also is super light so it helps keep your curled lashes stay longer without weighing them down. While I love this mascara, it doesn\'t seem worth it to spend $24 on it when I can get much more for my money with other MJ formulas and other brands.'], 'author': u'esheehan423 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'one word. AMAZING.', 'text': [u'bought this after reading reviews about it giving a natural lengthening effect. This mascara does that and more. it\'s AMAZING.'], 'author': u'lindsayvdw ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': u'Minnesota', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'THIS IS LITERALLY SO AMAZING I WISH I KNEW SOONER', 'text': [u'I was at Sephora shopping for a new foundation and then I saw this worker there with absolutely gorgeous eyelashes. I asked him if he got extensions and he told me he\'s wearing this mascara. Even though I wasn\'t planning to get a mascara, I just ABSOLUTELY loved the way the product looked on him so I bought it. I\'ve been using this for a month now and it\'s still my absolute favorite out of 20 mascaras that I have.', u'Although this says it\'s for lower lashes, you can really use this for both upper and lower. I think this is a good product if you are looking for an everyday mascara that could look naturally and actually look different than your initial eyelashes without mascara on. It\'s doesn\'t volumize much but it separates and lengthens your lashes, leaving them look so healthy, long, gorgeous, and natural. I told you, I really thought that Sephora worker had extensions.I absolutely recommend this.It\'s not waterproof but this doesn\'t smudge unless you rub it when it\'s wet.'], 'author': u'EstuahBunny ', 'date': [u'2016-08-19'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Ceramidin™ Liquid
reviews: {'title': u'Absolutely Perfect!', 'text': [u'This liquid lotion / serum is great. I was suffering from very dry skin with flaky patches and I tried everything to get my skin to the point that I could wear my tinted foundation without having to put more lotion on to quench the dry patches. This product has done amazing things for my skin. No more dry skin or flaky patches of skin. I did read all of the reviews other purchasers wrote so I thought I would give it a try since Sephora is so great about taking back products you are not happy with. If you are suffering from the same kind of problem I was, don\'t hesitate to purchase this product ~ it has been a god send for me!'], 'author': u'ftwtex ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Fort Worth, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Finally!!!', 'text': [u'I\'m 52 and have been using serums for over 30 years. Have used high end, mid priced and nothing ever, ever gave me the hydration Ceramidin does. I made the purchase after reading several reviews, not only on Sephora, but other sites as well. From the first application, I felt the difference, and after about 3 days, I started seeing plumping and glowing, hydrated skin. I use along with Ceramidin Cream, or Gel Cream.'], 'author': u'amenas ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Champions Gate, Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Non-irritating', 'text': [u'I love this moisturizer! I have mild rosacea and while it doesn\'t reduce redness it definitely doesn\'t make things worse. I was using other "gentle" moisturizers and even those were stinging after washing my face. This didn\'t have that effect at all. I got a sample of the Cermadin cream which I use over the liquid on places where my face is really dry and it works great, I will be ordering a full size!'], 'author': u'cm124101 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great light lotion', 'text': [u'This is a great light lotion for the summer. It is very liquid, so be careful when you squeeze it out. I also found that the product worked best if I shook the bottle before. The lotion works great for humid, hot climates, but now that the weather in New England is cooling down, I need a more moisturizing product.'], 'author': u'lemmetellyou ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Did not help with dry skin', 'text': [u'I have extremely dry skin, not flaky, but face feels tight immediately after washing and need mid-day replenishment. {'title': u'THE BEST!', 'text': [u'I am 25 I\'ve had acne since for 12 years and I have tried intense cleaners proactive, benzagel and even the glamglow cleanser. {'title': u'Amazing for Oily/Combination Oily Skin!', 'text': [u'This is an AMAZING cleanser for oily skin! It removes makeup, yes, but you really should be using a makeup remover first before cleansing (to ensure thoroughly cleansed skin).Since using this in my routine, my skin has cleared up immensely. It\'s very cleansing, has a pleasant scent, and has ingredients that are good for the skin. It cleanses the oil very thoroughly, which makes the skin feel dry and tight after using it. You definitely need a moisturizer after using this, but I absolutely love it!I wouldn\'t recommend this for dry skin--it will dry you out more, when you really need water instead of the Sahara desert.'], 'author': u'thatonegalsteph ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Black Tea Age-Delay Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I live in an extremely dry climate with very dry sensitive, eczema prone skin. Even after masks, toners, and serums this soaks in beautifully to my skin making it baby soft. This is a little heavy for me in the summer and feels a bit greasy but during the transition to winter it\'s beautiful. For anti-aging I can\'t really tell, I\'ve been using this since I was 23 (I\'m 27 now) and people still think I\'m 23 but that could just be genetics. For people that don\'t like the smell, it\'s made with kombucha which is fermented tea; if you don\'t like the smell of fermented food (ie. pickles, sour kraut, kim chi...etc..) you probably won\'t like the smell of this, though it\'s not a strong scent.'], 'author': u'bendybee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'FANTASTIC NIGHT CREAM FOR DRY/COMBO SKIN!', 'text': [u'I typically use night creams like La Mer, La Prairie and Aveda. I tried this in a travel set and I liked the feel of it. I purchased the full size and was quite pleased with the results! Compared to some other very high end moisturizers, I feel like this really comes close to comparison. Having dry skin in the fall/winter, this quenches the dryness and takes away the flakiness. Not for oily skin, as this really is quite rich. Overall, this is fantastic! Highly recommend.'], 'author': u'vocalvixen ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Okay, but Heavy', 'text': [u'I got this product in a 500pt perk. It actually isn\'t bad, but it is a little heavy for me. It is kind of greasy, but it does not break me out. I have trouble finding anti ageing products that don\'t break me out. This one didn\'t, but my face was left shiny. I wouldn\'t use it in the daytime. It was also thick, so I feel like I couldn\'t cover my whole face easily. I think I went through the product fairly quickly. It didn\'t irritate my skin, but I didn\'t notice any major differences either. I think if you are super dry, this would be very nice.'], 'author': u'beckalynn ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Everyday GLO™ Teeth Whitening Maintenance
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'This review may be a bit premature because I just received this product in the mail yesterday and have only used it twice, but I have seen INSTANT results both times. I do not have the full system, but this device alone is definitely enough to whiten my teeth. I obviously can\'t speak for its longterm effects just yet, but I can definitely say I am impressed. My teeth are visibly whiter and brighter already. I am an avid coffee drinker, and I also have two fake teeth. It has even removed stains from the fake teeth to make them more closely match the color of my real teeth. I am getting married soon and will definitely be repurchasing and relying on this product to whiten my smile for engagement pictures and the wedding. I know there is no product that works for absolutely everyone, but this one is definitely worth giving a shot!'], 'author': u'kenzie7117 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'overpriced for meh results', 'text': [u'This is far too expensive of a product to have done absolutely nothing for my skin. There is a definite scent to the product, which didn\'t bother me, and (as others have described) a tacky finish (which does). I found it produced an itchy, "tight" sensation, without visibly reducing fine lines. Not that it dried me out. I suppose this is the "corset" effect promised by the brand.', u'It didn\'t cause me to break out and the packaging is brilliant, so two starts for that. Honestly, though, after using it nightly for weeks, I\'d stare at myself in the mirror and wonder "is it doing anything?" Eh, maybe, or maybe it\'s my imagination hoping I didn\'t waste $75 on a useless serum. I expect dramatically better for that kind of money.', u'That said, it seems to work for others, so perhaps request a sample before jumping in head first as I did.'], 'author': u'ElleAMA ', 'date': [u'2016-07-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Okay', 'text': [u'My friend actually used this and it really worked well for her she felt she saw a difference in her fine lines. Because it worked well for her I purchased it and have to say that I can\'t really notice any change. I\'ve been using this for about 3 weeks already. I use it in the AM and PM. It leaves a tacky finish to the skin which you would think would work well for putting foundation over but it doesn\'t. It didn\'t break me out as other folks have experienced based on the reviews but I have dry dehydrated skin so that may be the difference.', u'My sense is that it works for some and not for others. It\'s a hit or miss product. I suggest trying it at the store prior to purchasing just to make sure it will work well for you.'], 'author': u'jennaleedee ', 'date': [u'2016-06-20'], 'location': u'Old Bridge, NJ', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Use with discretion', 'text': [u'I absolutely love UD! I have pallets that are old, older than some girls on here (all but tucked away in some museum). Nonetheless, this does contain heavy holographic glitter, which comes with some fallout, but nothing like I expected. Since I\'m 30, with a very strict dress code, I usually only wear this on nights out. Even then I tend to do make up without heavy glitter. After I do my shadow and liner I choose what shade compliments the colors used and use a dome brush to pat it in. Using this technique I\'ve dealt with minimal fallout, and adds a little pop. Definitely not for everyday use, but top quality when I want some glitter!'], 'author': u'SarahJS ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Indianapolis, IN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Sparkles for Days', 'text': [u'Urban Decay products are always a wonderful buy, but this palette really takes the cake. The colors individually are absolutely stunning, go on smoothly, and are very highly pigmented. But the real magic happens when you blend the colors. Each color blends and layers very well with the others in the palette as well as with other eyeshadows. I will say there is a lot of fallout with this eyeshadow if you don\'t use primer, but it just makes you look like a sparkly fairy so I don\'t complain. Definitely worth the price tag and I use these constantly. Vega in particular gets a lot of use where I use it with more neutral palettes as a pseudo eyeliner. I highly recommend this palette to anyone. Any makeup lover would be amiss to not buy it!'], 'author': u'Figish ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'St. Louis, MO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'low value', 'text': [u'i am a perfumista, i own hundreds of bottles of perfumes, from celebrity cheapies to mainstream designer to high end to niche to vintage. in my opnion gucci doesn\'t make good perfumes, gucci guilty intense is their best and i own and have once owned all of the gucci flora line, including flora edp, and this flora 1966. flora 1966 is the best out of all the floras, but still for this price it\'s a very low value perfume, the scent do not stand out enough, sillage and longevity are both medium to poor. love the bottle and packaging tho, i would save the money and spend on lots of other nice perfumes, with $200 there\'s A LOT of options!'], 'author': u'corix ', 'date': [u'2014-12-28'], 'location': u'houston, tx', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Argan Matchmaker Serum Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'Supple, but not firm', 'text': [u'Argan oil products are best for younger skin, in my opinion. This foundation was Ok, felt nice on, but after awhile my skin looked a bit slack (and I\'m not that aged in appearance). Any initial dewiness was gone - a bit of a firming element/glow enhancer would be best. There are other BB creams/oils that do a better job for my age category.'], 'author': u'MRSmitty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Not fullest coverage but very kind', 'text': [u'I\'m very pale, and I have dry skin (with some redness) which is allergic to a lot of things (including sunscreen). Age is catching up with me, and I am trying out new foundations, looking for something that won\'t highlight wrinkles or cake up. I doubt I would have picked this one on my own, but a Sephora employee suggested it and I\'m grateful. ', u'Do shake before using. I find it easiest to pump some out onto the back of my hand and let it warm up and begin to change colors, then applying with fingers or a brush (both work well, I\'m just lazy about brushes sometimes). The coverage is sheer and natural; it\'s enough to even out my redness, but doesn\'t really cover up scars or red spots. Since I have to apply under-eye concealer anyway, I don\'t mind having to hit the spots as well (and remembering to apply foundation first means I need less concealer). The sheerness would be great for someone with freckles who wants to show them off. It has a natural to slightly dewy finish. It doesn\'t have any luminizing qualities or shimmer, which I prefer. (I\'ll add that separately if I want it.) It achieves a pretty good match for my base skin tone.', u'I try to always apply over (set) moisturizer, but the one tine I didn\'t, I didn\'t have any problems with the formula settling into dry lines or flakes. The oil of the formula seems to help my skin stay moisturized as well - as if it\'s helping provide a moisture barrier. Despite the oil, it doesn\'t feel very heavy or pore-clogging. There\'s a barely noticeable scent of argan oil which fades quickly, and it\'s never bothered my face or my asthma. It wears well; it didn\'t settle into lines much at all and the color stayed true. ', u'This formula really shone on a recent set of travels. It held up well in hot sweaty conditions, although some powder would have helped my sweaty nose and forehead. And since it adjusts to your coloring, it didn\'t matter at all that I got some sun during the trip, which was great. It handled a mild sunburn and the next two days\' mild tan just fine. ', u'I will probably get a heavier-coverage foundation for evening and occasional wear, because my redness is getting worse. I\'ll use this for daytime, and definitely for travel, and possibly for when I want to cover up a redness flare, since it\'s so gentle my skin doesn\'t seem to mind it at all. If anything I think the argan oil in the formula helps a lot.'], 'author': u'wheelchairgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Bay Area', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Not for everyone', 'text': [u'I\'m obsessed with Josie Maran skincare products, so I was excited to try this foundation. I usually use a tinted moisturizer so I was expecting similar coverage. This gives slight coverage, and it does seem to be moisturizing. My issue with this product is the lack of any color pigment! I\'m between fair/light and I got the light/medium shade because my face tends to be lighter than my body due to using sunscreen. This foundation stayed completely white on my face. I kept waiting for it to change color and at least adapt a little bit to my face, but nothing happened each time I wore it. I tried it with primer and without and it was just bad either way. Sorry Josie, I\'ll just stick to your skincare!'], 'author': u'melis11 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fantastic', 'text': [u'I cannot say enough good things about this product. It\'s moisturizing, leaves a dewy finish, matches my skin PERFECTLY and I love the fact it uses fair trade argan oil. To get good coverage you have to layer, and if you are VERY pale it may look slightly orange. For me though, it\'s perfect.'], 'author': u'Kateastrophic ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Money Maker Flexible Hold Hairspray
reviews: {'title': u'Great Product, Awful Bottle', 'text': [u'I love love love this hairspray. It gives you flexible hold without any residue or weird shiny effects. However, they have recently changed the bottle/spray and unlike the original, this is a disaster. It stops spraying/clogs every single time I use it, and usually won\'t work again unless I run hot water over the nozzle. Ive also found it works much better if held upside down -which is odd to do with a full size bottle. I do not use much, as its main purpose for me is to control crazy baby hair around my part, but I have used it when doing something fancier and it holds great -if you can manage to get it out!'], 'author': u'LexiMD ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Baltimore, MD', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: The 3-Day Bender 1" Barrel Digital Curling Iron
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'ve never been able to learn how to properly curl my hair without looking like a poodle. I\'ve always wanted to be one of those gorgeous chicks going out with beautiful curled hair with out dropping $$$$ for a blowout. This curling iron really changed my life. It\'s so easy to use and the drybar staff have been the most helpful in teaching me how to use this tool. The trick I use (that I was taught by drybar staff) is to use your opposite hand to curl hair on a specific side. So for the hair left of your part, you use your right hair to hold the iron and clip the hair. Then you use your thumb to turn the barrel away from your hair for these beautiful amazing curls. I haven\'t even used any product for my hair and my curls are still holding well (not to mention that I have super straight asian hair).'], 'author': u'itsOlivier ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'hair gets caught, no finish to ends', 'text': [u'my cut is blunt shoulder length; I have loads of fine hair with some frizz/wave. I prefer a curling iron for styling, and use it like a flat-iron to gently smooth my ends. I had no problems with the drybar\'s rotating function, it heats quickly, and curls seem to hold well. ', u'Unfortunately, my hair continually got caught in the groove at the base of the rod. It also didn\'t have enough tension to smooth my ends. It seems limited to one type of styling option; beachy waves with unfinished ends.'], 'author': u'jcmom2danny ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Milwaukee, WI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Super hot so be careful, but loved how quick it works, curls both my hair and my extensions perfectly.'], 'author': u'EffiA ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gets hot very quickly', 'text': [u'The iron heats up quickly but hair slips right out of it.'], 'author': u'csmith22 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Howell, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not bad not bad', 'text': [u'I have very straight very thick bleached hair(the iron does not damage my hair) that\'s about shoulder length and this iron was very good for my bangs but I found it harder to curl the rest of my hair. It takes a lot of getting used to and my hair used to get caught at the end and I even had to cut the few strands out... But after getting the hang of it, it is fairly simple and as someone who burns them selves a lot I do find the design very helpful. With the bonus of heating up very quickly I find it perfect for my morning routine. (ps the bright yellow and grey looks really nice)'], 'author': u'coughdrops ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: The Chaser Shine Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Surprisingly good!', 'text': [u'I have what I refer to as crazy hair. It is thick, dry, coarse texture, enough wave to be frizzy, color treated shoulder length reddish brown hair. If there is any ounce of humidity in the air, my hair will frizz and get pouffy. I put a dime size amount of this product in my towel dried hair from mid-shaft to ends and then combed it through. I let my hair air dry since I had errands to run. When I got home and let my hair down from its bun, I was amazed at how soft and smooth my hair looks. I didn\'t notice any special shine to my hair but then again I have coarse hair that never looks glossy/shiny. But smooth and frizz-free hair makes me very happy. As far as scent goes, when I emulsified the product in my hands and before running it through my hair, I detected the same smell as Detox dry shampoo which I do not like the smell. However once I ran the product through my hair, I could no longer smell it. After my hair was dry, I didn\'t detect any scent in my hair whatsoever. Will definitely repurchase when my deluxe sample is gone.'], 'author': u'desertgirl501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'works well, but use very little', 'text': [u'This cream is extremely moisturizing and will weigh hair down somewhat. I have very thick, wavy hair that is difficult to weigh down and I have to be careful with the amount I use of this product. If used in a very small amount throughout wet hair (dime-sized), and only applied on ends and midshaft, this product works great. It leaves my hair silky and moisturized at the ends. Do not put this anywhere near your roots and I cannot stress enough to use VERY little or this will make your hair greasy. Products rarely are ever too much for my hair to handle, but this one you must be careful with. I will buy again.'], 'author': u'Italiana800 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'WOW! PERFECT HAIR IS POSSIBLE', 'text': [u'I wish I would have discovered this product sooner because my platinum blonde locks have been frizzy, dry, fuzzy and making me annoyed in the humidity all summer. I received a sample of this product and I rubbed about a dime size dollop with a bit of my living proof styling product which is good but not quite enough. My hair was damp. Then I styled as usual and my fried hay hair is currently transformed to silky strands of platinum paradise. Wow. Summer is almost over but my hair is gonna rock this fall and winter thanks to this product. I am ordering the full size ASAP.'], 'author': u'steamin ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Really impressed. My hair felt like I had just left the salon. I worried it would be a first time fluke- but has kept on delivering. {'title': u'Does what it says', 'text': [u'I first received this as a free sample and was reluctant to try it because I have very fine, oily hair. I have never found a product that doesn\'t make my hair heavy and more oily. ', u'However, I find this product works great! I use just the tiniest bit and only apply it to the ends of my hair. It is very light weight and doesn\'t dry heavy or leave an oily film in your hair. I use this before I blow dry my hair and then straighten it after, and it leaves my hair so soft and looking shinier and healthier. It has also made my split ends look a lot better.', u'I only use this when I plan on blow drying my hair (roughly 3x a week) so I don\'t know what this product is like if you use it daily.'], 'author': u'melissavd ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'Nars Powder Brush', 'text': [u'If I could give 0 star I would ! {'title': u'Mixed feelings', 'text': [u'The cool thing about this brush is that the bristles are densely packed and the bristles are coarse enough to pick up even the sheerest of bronzers, yet are also soft at the same time so that you can comfortably & effectively blend your products. However, it does shed a little bit each time you use the brush, due to the type of natural hair that is used as bristles. As a result, there\'s no denying that you\'d need to replace this brush sooner if you use and wash it on a regular basis, but the effects/finish created by this brush is gorgeous! At the end of the day, you\'re going to have to make the call on whether this brush is worth your money or not. For me, personally, it is worth it because it is a joy to use, despite some light shedding.'], 'author': u'TBear83 ', 'date': [u'2015-05-03'], 'location': u'Hudson, NH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Bio-Performance Super Corrective Serum
reviews: {'title': u'It works in 1 day!', 'text': [u'I am in my mid 40s and I had been getting more depressed about my aging skin, especially around my eyes. I tried everything to reduce my eye bags and dark circles that make me look really old! Plus, my skin had been looking less radiant and dull, even skin tone and a bit of sag starting to happen. I got a trial size of this when I bought some Shiseido for my mom. OVERNIGHT, my face looked like I actually had a good night sleep and my skin was glowing and very smooth! I had to do a double-take when I saw myself in the mirror. I have spent countless hundreds of dollars on expensive products, including NUDE, Dr. Dennis Gross, First Aid Beauty, Philosophy, and so many others that sort of worked, but not really. I can\'t believe this actually works!!! I wish I had known about this product years ago! I wasted so much money on useless products and always had to use makeup concealer to try to hide my bags. Ladies, don\'t waste your money on any other serum! Invest in THIS one. This is the one that is worth the price tag.'], 'author': u'jenx3989 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-02'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Amazing...Coming From a Skincare Skeptic!', 'text': [u'I was given two samples of this by a client (I have many who work in skincare and I receive plentiful freebies of everything imaginable), and I have used it for a week now. It is the only product, over years of sampling, that has impressed me so thoroughly that I will buy a full-size myself. After one night, my skin felt like silk and my rosacea was much clearer. I skipped makeup and still got compliments on my glowing skin. My husband mentioned it, and he notices nothing. My DOGS noticed. After a week, my 36-year-old wrinkles (not awful to begin with but definitely starting) are undetectable, my skin tone is perfectly even and my skin is taut. Incredible. I usually toss sample after sample onto my face and move on each night, but this is a keeper. Oh, and I make sure my face is wetted with warm water before applying (water increases the potency and hydrating effects of all serums and moisturizers), and I follow it with a hyaluronic acid moisturizer. This likely has a lot to do with setting it up for extreme success.'], 'author': u'jen3791 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Bois Blonds Cologne Absolue Per Perfume
reviews: {'title': u'My Love REVISITED', 'text': [u'The folks at Sephora Eaton\'s Centre introduced me to their new service called the Oxygen Facial. The cast member had asked me what my favourite scent was from the store. Immediately I had picked out Atelier\'s Bois Blonde. She had applied this scent on the material shielding my clothing, while they completed the process.', u'As each layer of scrubs, serums, and potions were applied to my face, the scent lingered on and on. It reminded me of the first time I fell in love with it.', u'Perfume scents come and go. Some will will be a hit for a season or until you finish the bottle. This one for me will remain a classic, one that I\'ll keep on repurchasing and coming back to.'], 'author': u'goshgetalife ', 'date': [u'2016-04-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Full Cover Concealer
reviews: {'title': u'Sample now Buying', 'text': [u'I have used Smashbox HD Concealer for years now. But my wedding was coming and needed a fuller cover for dark circles. Well let\'s say I am not going to the Smashbox HD Concealer. With a color corrector my eyes have never been so brighter looking!'], 'author': u'TaylorDanae ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'I love this concealer! I have battled with acne since I was in middle school (now a college graduate) and while I don\'t have the awful acne that comes with puberty, I still break out on a regular basis. So I\'ve tried it all. I was directed towards this product by a Sephora employee and I\'m glad I listened! It covers my dark spots/bags under my eyes and when pairing with a green correcting concealer, covers my acne perfectly! I would have given it 5 stars but I learned the hard way that the matte finish dries FAST so the first time I ever applied it I didn\'t blend fast enough and it dried and I looked like I put my face on in the dark. So blend FAST and you\'ll get the prefect finish!'], 'author': u'HJJC ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'pretty good', 'text': [u'I have moderate acne that of course inflames during that special week. This concealer has been my A-1 from the beginning and has never failed me. Creamy but dries to Matte a little fast so blend in fast.'], 'author': u'AndieMarisa ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best concealer', 'text': [u'This is my favorite concealer that I have ever tried... and believe me... I\'ve tried A LOT!! I use it with my beauty blender and POOF my dark circles under my eyes are gone!'], 'author': u'sierraelle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
