name: Radiant Cream Compact Foundation Refill
reviews: {'title': u'Do not buy this', 'text': [u'I\'ll start off by saying that Nars foundations/concealers always match my skin perfectly, which is something this foundation did also. But another reoccurring theme that this brand has is a terrible finish. I have very dry skin, so I thought that the very creamy texture would make it a bit dewy. But when I tried the product it highlighted all my dry spots on my skin (and I mean all of them) while somehow making my skin look greasy. It seriously looked horrible, one of the worst foundations I tried. Something else I hate is how it never dries. If you accidently brush your face on a shirt or something, it\'s all going to come off your face and onto the fabric. I\'ve never wrote a review this bad about a product but this one just deserves it.'], 'author': u'sweetrefrain ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': u'Calgary, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Get a Beauty Blender and get this NOW!', 'text': [u'My friend is a celebrity MUA and she turned me on to this foundation. I LOVE it. It\'s lightweight but buildable. Looks super natural and feels great on the skin. It\'s amazing.'], 'author': u'collinsinla ', 'date': [u'2016-05-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not great', 'text': [u'Tried this in the "siberia" color as recommended by Sephora\'s color IQ system. I use several Nars products and love their blend-able colors that match my skin tone well. This one did not have that same effect though as it looked very pale on my face compared to what it looked like in the palette. It also left my skin feeling very dry even though it\'s a cream formula which I CANNOT deal with. Overall a disappointment!'], 'author': u'Mplsshopper ', 'date': [u'2016-05-03'], 'location': u'Mpls, MN', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great Foundation', 'text': [u'This foundation provides alot of coverage, gives a great glow and provides good longevity. I recommend this product to everyone. I tried it first by an in store application and couldn\'t believe how wonderful it was. This portable foundation is a definite must have either on the go or at home.'], 'author': u'misslou ', 'date': [u'2016-03-11'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'my favorite', 'text': [u'For years I struggled to find a foundation that I could use everyday that wouldn\'t make me breakout or that I wouldn\'t have an allergic reaction to after a few uses. This Nars foundation is exactly that. If you have sensitive skin this foundation will hopefully be as great for you as it is for me.'], 'author': u'Claudier ', 'date': [u'2015-12-05'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Light Reflecting Pressed Setting Powder
reviews: {'title': u'Best Setting Powder Hands Down', 'text': [u'No matter how much you put on it doesn\'t look cakey which I\'m guessing is the light-reflecting part. Looks BEAUTIFUL on the skin. Easy to get off the pan onto the brush, easy to do everything, stays on all day , sets your foundation to stay.'], 'author': u'gurugirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'San Francisco, California', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I took off a star because sometimes it\'s hard to get onto my brush and I have to scrape the powder a little with the end of a brush or a fingernail. HOWEVer. Once I get it on my face, it\'s amazing. The most lightweight powder I\'ve ever used. It sets beautifully without getting cakey and other products blend beautifully on top of it.'], 'author': u'palindromicgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Madison, WI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Mixed feeling, does it work?', 'text': [u'I tried this product due to the rave and recommendation of a friend. First off, I have combination skin, acne prone, and sensitive. The packaging is pretty as ever. Slim and clean look. I like that a lot and it came with a cushion.', u'I read several reviews where that you need to break off the first layer before you get the powder to work. I did that, but I still feel like it does not do much to my skin in terms of oil control or reducing shine. I will continue to test out this product during the winter, but so far, it have not done anything for me. I used it at least 7 times so far since breaking off the first layer.'], 'author': u'Taeser ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': u'Staten Island, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Finally, a "smoothing" powder for mature skin!', 'text': [u'I was hesitant to buy this initially as I\'ve been blessed with hard to accommodate oily mature skin, and this seemed to glittery or shiny. On the recommendation of the associate I bought this over the Laura Mercier alternative. I was using the MUFE HD loose setting powder, but I found it cakey (the last thing a 40 year-old wants is to accentuate fine lines and wrinkles, especially around the eyes). I\'m in LOVE with the unbelievably silky fine-milled feel/finish of this powder! What I love most is that it sets my tinted moisturizer perfectly and truly does not settle in fine lines or wrinkles! The magic is it\'s basically impossible to over apply this powder as very little is picked up by a brush or sponge. You almost think there\'s nothing on the brush but find it\'s the perfect amount every time! I might have had a heavy hand with the other powders I\'ve tried, but I finally found the best setting powder for my "fussy" skin type! Also, it doesn\'t have a shiny or glittery finish, just a healthy light glow. BEAUTIFUL!'], 'author': u'robynlayne ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'truly great product', 'text': [u'This is an absolute staple and constant top favourite. I start getting a bit nervous when the compact begins to look a bit empty! Something lovely, soft focus and dewy happens to my face after applying this light reflecting powder. Never glittery.'], 'author': u'tressy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Oh, Lola!
reviews: {'title': u'My favorite perfume', 'text': [u'I fell in love with this perfume the moment I first encountered it in 2011. I\'m sad to see this perfume being no longer sold in stores. If you\'re into fruity, light, and everyday-casual type of perfume, I recommend this perfume.'], 'author': u'mcmaster92 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-20'], 'location': u'ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Bubble Gum Fruity-Floral', 'text': [u'This fragrance is pleasant enough, but not very unique or sophisticated. {'title': u'#1 natural and flirty fragrance', 'text': [u'I am always trying new fragrances from Vera Wang to Marc Jacobs, but this is my go-to! I wear this to class, on dates, and even family parties because the smell fits any occasion and any outfit! It smells natural enough to where you can wear it in class or a family dinner and it\'s not too overwhelming, too kiddish, or too flirty. It\'s also perfect for dates because it\'s subtle and when close enough, the fragrance smells flirty enough! It reacts so well with my body chemistry that I still smell good after a workout! Thank you Marc Jacobs for creating my holy grail fragrance!'], 'author': u'BriCastro ', 'date': [u'2015-05-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fresh and Feminine', 'text': [u'I love Oh Lola! It is floral without getting overwhelming. I have been devoted to Body Shop\'s Vanilla Perfume for 13 years, and this is the only fragrance that has ever come close to rivalling my affection for Vanilla.'], 'author': u'birdielaurel ', 'date': [u'2015-04-30'], 'location': u'Kelowna, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Sparkling Fruity Floral', 'text': [u'Raspberry and pear are soft and inoffensive in this fragrance. No barrage of harsh fruity scents assaulting your nostrils. The floral notes, sandalwood and vanilla prevent it from being cloying. If you like fruity/florals, recommend Oh, Lola! Such a nice fragrance for spring and Summer.', u'The flower cap is eye-catching. My other fragrance bottles are so serious in appearance, but Oh, Lola! livens up my vanity.'], 'author': u'LynnLikesMakeup ', 'date': [u'2015-04-10'], 'location': u'Louisville, KY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

reviews: {'title': u'sensational', 'text': [u'10/10 would smash. Bought this for my boo thang\'s bday and let me just tell you, this takes me all the way back to Christmas 2014. Now I gotta go, gonna ride my mans into the sunset like no tomorrow'], 'author': u'AnahiF ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Favorite!', 'text': [u'My husband mentioned a while back that he wanted to invest in a few new colognes to rotate throughout the week. I bought him this one first and that idea just went out the window. This pretty much has become his signature scent since. He gets complimented on it all the time. Now that the bottle is almost done, we\'ve been searching for something new with that same earthy, sweet-spicy, seductive, manly smell...and honestly NOTHING has compared. I will definitely be repurchasing this for him! ', u'Word of caution - be careful when your man is wearing this cause b**ches will be trying to steal yo man!!'], 'author': u'Germurrr ', 'date': [u'2016-07-24'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'While this perfume is classic and great, I don\'t find myself reaching for it as much as my others. {'title': u'bright crystal body lotion', 'text': [u'im so inl ove with this fragrance its crazy, someone is going to have to pry this product from hands I use it so often!!!!!!!!!'], 'author': u'stephanie3434 ', 'date': [u'2013-09-10'], 'location': u'Maryland', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'Average all around', 'text': [u'I was having issues with Bright Crystal disappearing very quickly on my skin- or so it seemed- I would spray and not be able to smell it on myself 15 minutes later. This phenomenon is not unheard of, and several people have already concluded a similar experience with the perfume. However, I think it may be because the perfume so well meshes with my body chemistry- (i\'d like to hope so). Although I rarely can go by what other people say as far as compliments- it\'s rare if I ever do get a compliment on any perfume. People here in the northeast are quite uptight I find. Anyways, I purchased the lotion hoping to find that the longevity of the scent improved. Nope. The lotion absorbs quickly, and is scented upon first application, but marginally helps the longevity of the perfume. The way the lotion dries down, too, is like a stale lotion smell, not the way the perfume dries down- mahogany woody sweetness. You\'re spending $40 something on a lotion that should really be strong enough to wear on its own, and sad to say, it really needs the perfume to boost it. I am not impressed. I feel like this doesn\'t help the experience of wearing the scent. I wish they made the lotion way more concentrated, like companies do for other perfumes.'], 'author': u'eaugirlspirit ', 'date': [u'2013-09-05'], 'location': u'North Central MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

', u'One negative thing: I\'ve been using this product for about 4 years, and I noticed the last couple of times I\'ve bought it that it doesn\'t seem as pigmented. it sometimes starts to appear a little watery.'], 'author': u'WomanInBlack35 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

I also didn\'t like the colour. I got the blackest black they had and if still dried a bit grey. I even tried to build it up a bit for more intensity... big mistake. name: Fuzz' Off™ Bikini Precision Hair Removal Cream
reviews: {'title': u"Doesn't Work", 'text': [u'Even though I read all of the negative reviews, I still decided to try this product in between waxes. I followed all directions and left on for 9 minutes like one review said. The smell is awful, but I figured if it works, it\'s not a big deal. When I wiped off the product, no hair was removed. I scrubbed really hard and 4 hairs were dissolved. Very disappointing. Will be returning tomorrow!'], 'author': u'suzannexoxox ', 'date': [u'2016-07-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}
{'title': u"don't buy", 'text': [u'Didn\'t work. Foul smell/odor.'], 'author': u'mariaJK ', 'date': [u'2016-07-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Did not work', 'text': [u'I am extremely disappointed in this product but I was very much looking forward to a great solution for the summer bikini season after reading other reviews. I left this on for as long as I could and still it was not able to remove my hair. I returned it soon after trying it twice. Also, after trying it on a small area on my bikini line, I had red bumps appear. I guess my skin is too sensitive for this product. Bummer :('], 'author': u'lilypad235 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Works Well - Leave on for 9 minutes', 'text': [u'This stuff really works well, and I would say better than drugstore brands I have used. I did what the other reviewer said, which is to leave on for 9 minutes. The manufacturer will always be conservative when giving time, for the safety of sensitive consumers. The applicator is very nice and the product even took off course hair. I had ZERO irritation until it was time to redo. The results lasted about a week, which means a lot less shaving. I do use a Tend Skin recipe afterwards (I make it myself).'], 'author': u'innotof ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Oklahoma', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: The Cool Fix™
ingredient: -Mediacalm Complex (Boerhavia Root Extract): Helps to instantly soothe skin and reduce redness on contact.
reviews: {'title': u'the best solution for shaving problems', 'text': [u'Cool fix is the best solution to the problems of ingrown hairs and razor bumps. Simple apply it to the freshly shaved area, in my case, my Face. It not only smells good to my wife but since I have been using it every time I shave, I have not had any problems with ingrown hairs which used to plague me. I have heard that it also stops razor bumps although that was never a problem for me. I used to be able to get it at my drug store but now the only way I have been able to get it is to order from the Sephora online store. It would be nice if they could bring it back to the regular store but it is quite easy to order it online and pay for it in the store, it usually arrives in 2-4 days. Again, Cool Fix is, as advertised, the good smelling solution to your shaving problems!'], 'author': u'robzantay ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'only solution for that worked', 'text': [u'Over the last year the skin on my upper legs has become incredibly sensitive from shaving, seemingly out of nowhere. I tried switching razor blades and shaving creams and I even gave an epilator a shot (terrible idea), but nothing was working. I finally found this product and it is the only thing that prevents me from wanting to scratch my legs incessantly the days immediately following shaving. Works well post-bikini wax also.'], 'author': u'iamkim03 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'LOVED IT!!! Was surprised it was so effective!'], 'author': u'XELA38 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Dallas, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Must have for shaving', 'text': [u'I think people expect this product to prevent ingrown hairs from ever coming back, the problem is that as long as you shave you\'ll be prone to getting ingrown hairs.I love it for treating them when I do get them. I apply a drop on the affected area and by the next day it will have noticeably improved'], 'author': u'PaulaMakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-07-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'OK', 'text': [u'Ordered this in anticipation for vacation. I tend to get ingrown hairs and bumps in my bikini area and even legs. I used twice a day during vacation (immediately after showering and then at night) and noticed a bit of an improvement. Since then I have reduced my usage (since I\'m not in a bikini everyday). I wouldn\'t call this a lifesaver, but I did notice a small improvement. Still searching for the miracle...'], 'author': u'ATNikole ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Do Not Age with Dr. Brandt Triple Peptide Eye Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Is just a cream...', 'text': [u'I bought this at sephora because the lady there suggested it for my "dry eyes", which i do not have but i bought it because i had sometime looking for an eye cream to help prevent/minimize fine lines. She said this was perfect for the (non/existing) dryness, also was good for dark circles (which i have) and for fine lines. I have 1 and a half month using it every day and i do not see any difference. I use it as the instructions say and i really do not see any difference. I dont have fine lines (yet) but i do have a bit of darkness and after a month an half... i havent seen any improvement.'], 'author': u'missmandarina ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Do Not Age with Dr. Brandt Time Reversing Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Very nice night cream', 'text': [u'I love this cream! I can see a change in my skin, some of my fine lines I cannot notice anymore and I have only been using it for a couple of weeks. I have normal to dry skin - tends to get dry in the winter so I am not sure that this would be good for oily skin. The smell is not great but I don\'t it because of the results. It\'s pretty pricey so I would recommend getting a sample before purchasing.'], 'author': u'linda254 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'New Haven, CT', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'I keep coming back', 'text': [u'I hate spending the money on this cream but I keep coming back to it after trying other things. I think the essential oils smell great but I can see why others may not like, it is more strongly fragranced than other creams. It is highly moisturizing without causing me any breakout. Makes my skin look more even and healthy. I got hooked from a sample. I really love this stuff. I usually use small amount once daily at night and it lasts me months. I buy one in summer and one in winter.'], 'author': u'kelsol ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': u'Ohio', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Very Hydrating!', 'text': [u'People have mentioned the smell, but I think it smells fine. It feels very soothing going on. I bought this Time Reversing Cream and also bought the kit that had a full size eye cream, small neck cream and night cream. All were wonderful. I like the whole line and I feel like it\'s nourishing my skin. I\'d be OK with the packaging not being so elaborate.'], 'author': u'Kathy100 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This stuff smells to high heaven', 'text': [u'I got this as a deluxe sample in the Do Not Age set and it\'s a fair cream for people who have very dry skin, but OH MY GOD the smell is overwhelming. It never goes away even after the moisturizer has absorbed into your skin. The formula is also pretty heavy and generally I have more oily skin, so I tried using it on some dry spots on my arms and elbows just to not waste it. Even then, people commented on the smell thinking it was a perfume I\'m wearing.', u'I\'m not sure if the scent is artificial or not - it could just be what the ingredients smell like - but I\'m super uncomfortable putting anything very smelly near my face. This one clashes with any other scent I wear on my body throughout the day as well. Overall, it could be a good cream for some people but be mindful about the smell if you\'re thinking of purchasing it.'], 'author': u'sophiasophia ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Average at best', 'text': [u'I hate to be a Debbie-Downer, but this product didn\'t "Wow" me. It is a very nice day cream. It is lightweight and moisturizes nicely. It\'s a beautiful cream. But lets get real. I need real results as an aging woman. I had high expectations when I shelled out $132 for this cream. It did not see any benefits it promised such as anti-aging, lifting, etc. No firming. No plumping. Just an average cream that is lightweight and absorbs well... something a $40 cream can deliver.'], 'author': u'DaniAdkins ', 'date': [u'2016-04-29'], 'location': u'Fredericktown, Ohio', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Do Not Age with Dr. Brandt Transforming Pearl Serum
reviews: {'title': u"Can't live without it", 'text': [u'Love this and buy another when half way through. I\'m 60 and my skin looks 15 years younger... Use twice a day -- morning and night and it has made my skin look gorgeous!'], 'author': u'JeanLongIsland ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wowza', 'text': [u'I bought this on a suggestion of an employee at my local Sephora when she saw me with a PTR serum in my hands. I\'ve always been after something to help me diminish my fine lines in my early 30s. I have been using this religiously for 2 weeks and my skin has never looked better. It\'s quite pricey which is sad, but worth every penny I spent on it. Will continue to re-purchase!'], 'author': u'brenlynn ', 'date': [u'2016-04-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'DNA PEARL SERUM', 'text': [u'This amazing serum helps to keep my skin tight and bright .I also use it on my eye lids to tighten , also around my eyes too.The best serum I have ever used other than the Dr. Brandt Night Serum.'], 'author': u'gabaroot ', 'date': [u'2016-04-12'], 'location': u'Atlanta, Ga.', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Wow', 'text': [u'I am on day 3 of using this serum . I am in my late forties and have been having issues with my combination skin. It is dry and flaky within a couple of minutes after washing it, and horribly oily by mid morning and the flakiness is back too. I have tried all sorts or cleansers, moisturizers, exfoliants, masks- some are better than others but none made the problems go away. I got a sample of this serum to try, not really expecting much since nothing has worked and wow. After one day of use - one day!- I have no flakes, my skin tone is more even, and the oil is more controlled than it has been in years. And heck I\'ll say it- I think I really do look younger. I\'m going to purchase the full size ASAP.I wish that I had tried this product a long time ago'], 'author': u'hhmrsm ', 'date': [u'2016-03-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'noticeable difference!', 'text': [u'I am now closer to 50 than 40 and I felt that I needed a little something extra in my daily routine. I LOVE the Transforming Pearl Serum. I have been using it for about a month and there is a noticeable improvement in the look and feel of my skin. reviews: {'title': u'perfect color for very pale skin', 'text': [u'This is more like a tinted moisturizer than a foundation. It has very light coverage. Great for very dry skin. As I am getting older less is more in the way of doing make up. Less make up makes me look younger. I bought the lightest shade and it is perfect!'], 'author': u'testmakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'absolutely beautiful!', 'text': [u'This foundation is best suited for dryer skin as it is very moisturizing and leaves a dewy finish. The coverage is on the sheer side which is fine with me cause I like a light coverage and conceal blemishes. The finish of this foundation is where it shines, it\'s unlike any other foundation I\'ve tried. I don\'t really know how to explain it but it\'s very beautiful. You must try it for your self!'], 'author': u'sweetpotato5 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very bad foundation', 'text': [u'This makes me so oily and im already too oily, and has barely any coverage. Don\'t invest unless your skin is dry and you already have nice skin'], 'author': u'spiritedaway45 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Beautiful finish', 'text': [u'I love this product. Brightens, softens and moisturizes. It\'s all natural and cruelty free too. ', u'This is a slightly thick cream - I wouldn\'t say it\'s like a BB cream though as it\'s not quite that thick. It is described as a mineral foundation that turns into liquid when applied to the skin. I would say that \'s pretty close - it feels like a creamy moisturizer and once warmed up it does spread and blend easily, but not quite with the fluidity of a liquid foundation. ', u'This finish is quite beautiful, it has a satin finish, so not too matte or too dewey. I find it moisturizing in that by the end of the day my skin doesn\'t feel tight or dehydrated at all, and it still feels very soft to the touch. ', u'It\'s definitely sheer coverage, so it\'s quite light feeling, but still completely masks the light pinkness I have in my cheeks and chin and evens my complexion but without looking like I have a ton of makeup on. It has light reflecting particles that give a soft glow, blurs lines and pores, but without any shimmer or sheen. It does not settle into pores or lines, and in fact I find I can use this on my under eye area without it caking or creasing so I get extra brightness by using this over my concealer. ', u'I find just one pea sized amount is plenty for me to do my whole face, so it will last me a long time. Most days I don\'t do a full face of make up though, but still need to brighten up a bit, so this just on key areas - under eyes, chin, bridge of nose, centre of my forehead, bit of blush and mascara and I\'m good for the whole day. ', u'I have this is 001 - it\'s the lightest and best foundation I have found so far for very fair complexions.'], 'author': u'Cynderlou ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Moisture Foundation', 'text': [u'I agree with some of the previous reviews that the product is nice but it\'s too sheer for any noticeable coverage. Was more like a moisturizer than anything else. I\'m all about paying for a good product but this one is just too expensive for how much product you get. I\'m willing to try some of their other products though.'], 'author': u'cradim ', 'date': [u'2016-06-10'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'ABSOLUTELY AWFUL', 'text': [u'I usually don\'t write reviews, unless I LOVE or HATE a product. This DEFINITELY falls under the latter. I spent $37 on this concealer, so I REALLY wanted to like it, but I ended up throwing it away. It\'s not even worth keeping in my collection. It\'s so think and chunky, that it makes fine lines more visible than wearing nothing at all, and absolutely does NOT cover under eye circles. I\'m 22, so my fine lines are barely even there, but it cakes up, and ends up separating, even with a setting spray. Save your $37 and go buy something that works.'], 'author': u'JurassicJoy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': u'Santa Barbara, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Best brush for eyebrows', 'text': [u'I have one so far, and just picked up another. The one I have now I use for eyebrows and it works amazingly well. My eyebrows have never looked better, almost like I had a makeup artist do them for me. I get compliments on my eyebrows all the time when I use this brush and asked where I get them done, I tell them it\'s this brush and they should buy it asap. ', u'It\'s stiff, but not scratchy. It\'s actually just dense with soft bristles but firm at the same time.', u'Because it\'s stiff I can apply brow powder exactly where needed with no mess or stray powder to clean up. Because it\'s so precise I can do my eyebrows in under 5 minutes. ', u'I never really thought there would be too much difference between eyebrow brushes, until I used this one. It applies colour evenly and because it\'s stiff I can draw perfect lines for shaping my eyebrows. ', u'I have used the one I have for (cream) eyeliner, and I loved it for that too, which is why I bought another one today, so I can have one dedicated to each purpose. ', u'Highly recommend'], 'author': u'Cynderlou ', 'date': [u'2016-03-08'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: The 3-Day Bender 1" Barrel Digital Curling Iron
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'ve never been able to learn how to properly curl my hair without looking like a poodle. I\'ve always wanted to be one of those gorgeous chicks going out with beautiful curled hair with out dropping $$$$ for a blowout. This curling iron really changed my life. It\'s so easy to use and the drybar staff have been the most helpful in teaching me how to use this tool. The trick I use (that I was taught by drybar staff) is to use your opposite hand to curl hair on a specific side. So for the hair left of your part, you use your right hair to hold the iron and clip the hair. Then you use your thumb to turn the barrel away from your hair for these beautiful amazing curls. I haven\'t even used any product for my hair and my curls are still holding well (not to mention that I have super straight asian hair).'], 'author': u'itsOlivier ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'hair gets caught, no finish to ends', 'text': [u'my cut is blunt shoulder length; I have loads of fine hair with some frizz/wave. I prefer a curling iron for styling, and use it like a flat-iron to gently smooth my ends. I had no problems with the drybar\'s rotating function, it heats quickly, and curls seem to hold well. ', u'Unfortunately, my hair continually got caught in the groove at the base of the rod. It also didn\'t have enough tension to smooth my ends. It seems limited to one type of styling option; beachy waves with unfinished ends.'], 'author': u'jcmom2danny ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Milwaukee, WI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Super hot so be careful, but loved how quick it works, curls both my hair and my extensions perfectly.'], 'author': u'EffiA ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gets hot very quickly', 'text': [u'The iron heats up quickly but hair slips right out of it.'], 'author': u'csmith22 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Howell, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not bad not bad', 'text': [u'I have very straight very thick bleached hair(the iron does not damage my hair) that\'s about shoulder length and this iron was very good for my bangs but I found it harder to curl the rest of my hair. It takes a lot of getting used to and my hair used to get caught at the end and I even had to cut the few strands out... But after getting the hang of it, it is fairly simple and as someone who burns them selves a lot I do find the design very helpful. With the bonus of heating up very quickly I find it perfect for my morning routine. (ps the bright yellow and grey looks really nice)'], 'author': u'coughdrops ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Happy Hour Blowout Shampoo
ingredient: Water, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Laurate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Prunus Insititia Seed Oil, Cocoglucosides Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Octocrylene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Citrus Junos Peel Extract, Pfaffia Paniculata Root Extract, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Fragrance (Parfum), Panthenol, Silicone Quaternium-22, Cystine Bis-PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Rice Oil Glycereth-8 Esters, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Rhodiola Rosea Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Keratin, Dipropylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprate, Inulin Lauryl Carbamate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Behentrimonium Chloride, Sucrose Laurate, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Methylisothiazolinone, Linalool.
reviews: {'title': u'it has its place in my st ash', 'text': [u'My experience with this shampoo is as follows, it\'s thick. Like honey. I consider it like a shampoo concentrate. I drizzle a little on my hand, & rub it on my scalp. At this point it FEELS like it won\'t move around and you need to use so much product, but I splash more water on my head and begin to later. If your hair is wet wet wet, it will spread and lather very well. I try to mainly shampoo my scalp area, as I have dry ends of my hair. I figure some gets down there without me deliberately working it root to tip, so I only work the roots. I follow with the companion conditioner. ', u'I have blow dried my hair after, and had it dry naturally over night and straightened my hair in the morning. Both times my hair felt so light and clean, very nice. ', u'I def recommend if your hair is feeling gunked up. It\'s great for oily roots like myself. I wouldn\'t use this daily, but I don\'t wash my hair daily anyways (dry ends! Trying to be gentle on them).'], 'author': u'dingo ', 'date': [u'2016-07-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have very thin hair that I have to wash daily. Most shampoos leave my hair feeling nice for a few hours but it always is greasy by the end of the day. I\'m able to stretch out washes (esp when I use Drybar\'s Detox Dry Shampoo) to 2 days. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with fine hair. I think it\'s worth every penny because it leaves my hair feeling clean without feeling stripped or over-dry.'], 'author': u'AshleyM929 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Smells Terrible!', 'text': [u'I have super-fine hair, and this product works very well. It gave my hair volume, without static-cling, or fly-aways.', u'Unfortunately, I have a sensitivity to heavily perfumed products. It smells very chemically, and over-perfumed. The scent eventually goes away, after the hair is styled.', u'I gave this product 2 stars, because of the scent. It works, but I\'ll never buy it again.'], 'author': u'KeturahYael ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': u'Vancouver, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'BEST blow out ever!!!', 'text': [u'I just gave myself the best blow out I\'ve ever gotten- my salon doesn\'t even do it this well. My hairs incredibly thick, fine and oily, so I get build up at my roots fairly quickly. I\'m on day two, and my hair still feels like day one. It\'s honestly never looked more clean, more bouncy, or more voluminous. I love that this doesn\'t have sulfates or silicones in it; I think that really helped with the build up at my roots from other silicone-based products that I was using before, and the lack of sulfates means that it cleaned without over stripping. However, this is NOT intended for daily use and should only be used 1-2x a week, as directed, or it might dry you out. I only wash my hair 2-3x a week anyways, so I think this will keep working for me. I wouldn\'t use this product if you have dry hair. It really is going to work best on people who are already over-oily and just need some balance to their hair to get it clean. People with thicker hair will have particularly good results, because it really does take the work out of the cleaning process.'], 'author': u'jwest07 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-24'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Back to Normal', 'text': [u'I was using a different shampoo to help with my dandruff, it was working and I was almost done the bottle when my hair starting to have a gross texture at the roots. After washing, it would feel like I had a bunch of product build up. After researching different shampoos, I got a sample of this one and after one use, my hair went back to normal. So I picked up an entire bottle! It keeps my hair clean, soft, shiny and build up free.'], 'author': u'lexabianca ', 'date': [u'2016-03-15'], 'location': u'Montreal, Quebec', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Not too oily for fine hair', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried them all - Morrocanoil, Verb, that stuff you buy at Winners. Trust me. Obviously don\'t put too much in - a dime size amount is plenty - and it doesn\'t 100% deal with fly-aways, so don\'t let that be your sticking point. It lasts ages and I\'ll definitely buy again when I run out. (In like a two years. {'title': u'Not great for curly, dry hair', 'text': [u'This was supposed to be great for curly hair but it did absolutely nothing for mine. It maybe would tamper my frizz a bit but I went in trying to buy Moroccan Oil and the lady sold this to me saying it would do the same but it was nothing like Moroccan Oil.'], 'author': u'Schmells ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Unfortunately...', 'text': [u'I have to give this a 1 star. I love some of their other products and wanted to try everything with the same fragrance as the Hot Toddy, so I tried the 100 proof. It made my hair shiny but after a few uses I noticed my hair felt crunchy like something was building up on there and changing the texture. For that reason I cannot recommend it. I know there are alot of natural oils in this product but I wonder if some of the other ingredients are silicone-based or made of who-knows-what other ingredients to where my hair would react like that. I use professional shampoo and have a mineral-removing water filter on my shower head; this was the only change I made to what I was using on my hair.'], 'author': u'sonianistan ', 'date': [u'2016-08-07'], 'location': u'New Albany, IN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: The Chaser Shine Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Surprisingly good!', 'text': [u'I have what I refer to as crazy hair. It is thick, dry, coarse texture, enough wave to be frizzy, color treated shoulder length reddish brown hair. If there is any ounce of humidity in the air, my hair will frizz and get pouffy. I put a dime size amount of this product in my towel dried hair from mid-shaft to ends and then combed it through. I let my hair air dry since I had errands to run. When I got home and let my hair down from its bun, I was amazed at how soft and smooth my hair looks. I didn\'t notice any special shine to my hair but then again I have coarse hair that never looks glossy/shiny. But smooth and frizz-free hair makes me very happy. As far as scent goes, when I emulsified the product in my hands and before running it through my hair, I detected the same smell as Detox dry shampoo which I do not like the smell. However once I ran the product through my hair, I could no longer smell it. After my hair was dry, I didn\'t detect any scent in my hair whatsoever. Will definitely repurchase when my deluxe sample is gone.'], 'author': u'desertgirl501 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'works well, but use very little', 'text': [u'This cream is extremely moisturizing and will weigh hair down somewhat. I have very thick, wavy hair that is difficult to weigh down and I have to be careful with the amount I use of this product. If used in a very small amount throughout wet hair (dime-sized), and only applied on ends and midshaft, this product works great. It leaves my hair silky and moisturized at the ends. Do not put this anywhere near your roots and I cannot stress enough to use VERY little or this will make your hair greasy. Products rarely are ever too much for my hair to handle, but this one you must be careful with. I will buy again.'], 'author': u'Italiana800 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'WOW! PERFECT HAIR IS POSSIBLE', 'text': [u'I wish I would have discovered this product sooner because my platinum blonde locks have been frizzy, dry, fuzzy and making me annoyed in the humidity all summer. I received a sample of this product and I rubbed about a dime size dollop with a bit of my living proof styling product which is good but not quite enough. My hair was damp. Then I styled as usual and my fried hay hair is currently transformed to silky strands of platinum paradise. Wow. Summer is almost over but my hair is gonna rock this fall and winter thanks to this product. I am ordering the full size ASAP.'], 'author': u'steamin ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'so sleek and nice', 'text': [u'Pros: classy packaging, minty scent, goes on smooth', u'Cons: not long lasting, gets oily', u'In my never-ending quest for hydrating lip balms, this has been one of the better ones. I love the sleek tube and the mint is not overwhelming. It feels so nice after application! My only issue is that seems to last for about 15 minutes before turning oily/gummy, then I reapply. (This may just be my problem though as I got it for my honeymoon in the Caribbean and it may have melted/re-solidified some while on the beach.)'], 'author': u'misslisabeth ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Holy Grail', 'text': [u'Aside from the packaging being totally eye-catching, and the tube screwing shut, which I love, this balm is it! I suffer from year round chapped lips. Having a good balm is a never ending thing with me. I am always looking for the next best product. Recently, I tried Drunk Elephant Lippe, and I liked it well enough, but it you get very little product for the price, it was too sheer, and I didn\'t dig on the flavor. The two products that I have bought over and over are Bobbi Brown Lip Balm -- I always have a few floating around, and La Roche-Possay Nutritic Lips. None have come close to these, until now. The Marc Jacobs glides on, it\'s thick like a chapstick, but not so thick or waxy that it tugs on your lips. In fact I don\'t feel it is waxy at all. It is buttery soft. I put it on all day, and at night when I apply it before bed, well, I wake up and still have some on. So hydrating! The issue I have with Bobbi Brown is that it is in a pot, and while that works in the beginning, because I just put my lips on it and rub it on, when it starts to run out I have to use my finger, and I hate that. They need to put that stuff in a tube! There is a ton of product here, compared to other sticks I have bought (again Drunk Elephant the most recent) and I feel it is worth every dime. I also get botox above my lip for tiny lines, as I don\'t need or want filler, so having a stick is much easier to apply for me when I can\'t move my upper lip for awhile. HA! Aging issues! I will order this again, no doubt, just to have it in multiple places around the house and in my rig. Well done, Marc Jacobs! I\'ll always be looking for another balm, but this is it for now!'], 'author': u'vonsloan ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'PNW', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Made my lips raw from using it daily. Not sure what ingredient was the culprit, usually castor oil dries me out. Had to return.'], 'author': u'xtizzy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'BEST BROW GEL SO FAR', 'text': [u'I wanted a gel that would tame my eyebrows and this one definitely does the trick. I love the brush and how non-sticky and quick drying the gel formula is. I highly recommend this for anyone who wants tame, sexy brows.'], 'author': u'darnell ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': u'Waldorf, MD', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

I asked one of the lovely ladies in store what would be another good option and I was pointed to this! Not really that into the brush (it\'s like a fuzzy one not spoolie-like... If that makes sense) but it really gets the job done and it\'s lasted a long time for me.'], 'author': u'TheTParty ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Enamored Hi-Shine Nail Polish
reviews: {'title': u'color not as appears', 'text': [u'Bought Nirvana bc i have been wanting to purchase an army green polish, definitely appears black with 3 coats. My dr at work asked me if it was black. Thank goodness Sephora accepts returns.'], 'author': u'Livelovefashion ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'nope', 'text': [u'The application is super streaky and it started chipping the second day. Tried it twice with and without a gel coat and still not good at all.'], 'author': u'gabzeeee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'the best!', 'text': [u'This is the best nail polish I have ever tried. I\'m a Chanel polish freak, so for me to buy a Marc Jacobs polish or any other brand is a huge "WHAT?" This polish applies beautifully and dries extremely quickly. The packaging is very pretty as well. I got the color Blanche 162 so I can\'t speak for other colors but this one is superb.'], 'author': u'erinnnn101 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not worth it', 'text': [u'I ordered three separate colors of this nail polish (Ultraviolet, Magenta Violet, and Red Sangria), and unfortunately I cannot recommend any of them. The coverage is terrible (it took three coats of the Ultraviolet to get some real color on my nails, and even then the coverage is uneven and/or sheer in spots), and the colors don\'t always match what you see online (the Red Sangria is very different). Save your money and get something else. :/'], 'author': u'jenjenc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Columbus, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'favorite polish', 'text': [u'Just added Lola to my collection of Marc Jacobs polishes and it is the perfect red for me. If only I could find a lipstick in this exact shade! Many reviewers have noted the poor longevity of MJ polishes, but that hasn\'t been a problem for me. I make sure my nails are clean and dry, and use Formula X base coat and top coat with the MJ polish. This gives me about a week of wear, which is the most I can expect since I\'m hard on my hands. Some colors go on a bit streaky but even themselves out before drying. Two coats usually does it, but sometimes three. With the Lola, two coats looks perfect. Soooo many gorgeous colors, so little time. \u2764\ufe0f'], 'author': u'jackiejr ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Remedy Concealer Pen
reviews: {'title': u'light and smooth', 'text': [u'This is my favorite concealers so far. Lightweight, Smoothy and natural. Thanks Marc Jcobes.'], 'author': u'maaarryyaam ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Color Match', 'text': [u'This is one of the very few concealers that actually matches my skin tone. I don\'t look for a brightener that makes me look like a raccoon ghost. I always look for a concealer to match my skin so I can cover the shadow of my dark circles. I like the natural look so I use just a tiny bit.This concealer is light, easy to blend and looks imperceptible UNLESS you start to put layer over layer over layer, then it starts to crease and look cakey.So to me this is a fantastic discovery, on my top list next to Benefit Erase Paste.'], 'author': u'est18 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': u'Houston', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'not that great', 'text': [u'Well it\'s really lightweight and it gives you this soft soft look but the problem is that it doesn\'t stay for more than 2 hours or less and it\'s not for people that have a greasy skin. Probably I would buy it again but I will try to use it with an eye primer'], 'author': u'viri2021 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'Best concealer/concealer pen I have tried! It\'s lightweight; goes on very smoothly and brightens. I have the Bright Idea (more of a peachy/corrector color for me) and Rendezvous and they have lasted for a while. I love the metal tip - which has a nice cooling effect to the eye area. I\'ve tried the charlotte tilbury pen, Nars concealer, mac concealer, and this is by far my favorite. Pricey but I think it is worth it - and the packaging is nice and feels expensive.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-08-12'], 'location': u'Colorado', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not worth it', 'text': [u'Comes out very light but dries extremely cakey. Very bad creasing with or without powder. Tried it at the store and should have really taken a sample first to see how it wears. Very much regret getting this concealer :('], 'author': u'Valmantha ', 'date': [u'2016-07-16'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, Ca', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Style Eye-Con No.3 - Plush Shadow
reviews: {'title': u'The Innocent', 'text': [u'The innocent is my go to palette! It all works together perfectly. I love so much I bought a backup!'], 'author': u'Zzcrowe ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Mixed feelings', 'text': [u'I got this in the Ingenue shade because I always have a hard time finding palettes that have no dark shades in them. It was super pricey for what you get and I couldn\'t find many reviews but the swatches I did see looked pretty so I went for it, and after receiving it and trying it out I\'m not really sure how I feel. The main thing that really bothers me is how light the biggest shadow is. It looks like a light gold in the picture but in real life it\'s pretty much a shimmery white. It would work well for a highlight for the corners of your eyes but other than that I\'m not really sure what to use it for. Ideally, that one would be the smallest and one of the other two shades would be bigger because they\'re both beautiful. Another issue I have is the amount of fall out from the product -- every time I use it the entire palette gets all powdery and gross. It makes me feel like I\'m wasting product, which is annoying because it\'s so expensive. I\'m going to keep it because the two shades on the right are pretty and I like the formula, but this definitely isn\'t a must have.'], 'author': u'hannahvoctoria ', 'date': [u'2016-07-02'], 'location': u'Ottawa, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Never again', 'text': [u'I\'m not sure if I received a bad batch, but I will never repurchase nor will I recommend these shadows to anyone. Chalky and lacks pigmentation. For the price and the name I expected more, silly me.'], 'author': u'ShanikaB ', 'date': [u'2016-04-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'the supreme', 'text': [u'Amazing pigment and texture. Wore this to a big event and it really brought out my brown eyes. Got so many compliments'], 'author': u'jazz444 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'meh', 'text': [u'The colors I received were a bit different than what was pictured-I thought I was ordering a pink/purple/brown trio and instead it was silver/purple/grey. It doesn\'t go on smoothly nor does it blend easily, it does last all day though so that\'s a plus. I did like the color combo even though it wasn\'t what I expected, not sure if I\'d buy again.'], 'author': u'thefluffyowl ', 'date': [u'2016-03-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Genius Gel Super–Charged Oil–Free Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'Not worth the $$$!', 'text': [u'I remember seeing this foundation for the first time in my Sephora but at the time I didn\'t want to pay the $58 CAD for it. Ever since then it\'s had it\'s place on my wishlist but when I ran out of my previous foundation and decided to finally buy this one, I was disappointed!! It\'s very light coverage, pretty much everything (redness, blemishes, freckles) shows through. Also it is so cakey on my dry skin! Maybe a different story for those with normal to oily skin but I definitely would recommend avoiding this if you have even the slightest dryness on your face. Not worth the money :('], 'author': u'kat31617 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'fades away', 'text': [u'The formula goes on nicely and the color was great however it doesn\'t stick around throughout the day. I even tried it with a setting spray!'], 'author': u'hemp69 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Awesome product for dry skin', 'text': [u'This foundation is amazing. It\'s so lightweight and gives great coverage! My bestie is a huge makeup lover and she went on and on about how awesome my foundation looked! It\'s noticeable. I have very dry skin and it\'s super sensitive. This feels so moisturizing! And it keeps your skin feeling soft and supple for the duration of the wear. Couldn\'t love this product more!'], 'author': u'summerlo77 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Beautiful Finish, Terrible Formula', 'text': [u'Honestly love the finish of this foundation! It looks flawless and natural on my skin and it doesn\'t feel cakey or heavy! Super light coverage but buildable if you want more and it still won\'t look like you have a bunch of foundation on. I honestly wish this foundation was better though because the finish is amazing however, after three or four hours of having this foundation on, it completely melts off my skin after literally doing nothing at all and that\'s even with setting it with powder!! I\'ve tried multiple primers and methods to get this to work and it just won\'t prevent it from melting off or getting beyond shiny. I love a good glow but this looks like I\'m sweaty! Would be awesome if they reformualted!!!'], 'author': u'meggggannnnn ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'so in love', 'text': [u'I have been getting over a skin allergen that turned my face beet red. I have been debating on this foundation. I love this stuff. It\'s a medium coverage and makes your skin look flawless. Its so worth the money. I also want to try the other one.'], 'author': u'bookworm787 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Lash Lifter - Gel Definition Mascara
reviews: {'title': u'Love MJ, but not this', 'text': [u'Really awful mascara for my lashes. I have long fine lashes, which typically work with any mascara, but obvi not this one. Really hated how it made my lashes stick together, even to the bottom ones. the brush is bad too, weird design.'], 'author': u'Maddog1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Manhattan Beach, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'BEST Non-Waterproof for me Oily Eyelids!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried everything and this is THE BEST for my oily eyelids. It\'s the ONLY mascara I\'ve been able to find that doesn\'t leave me looking like I have black eyes at the end of the day. It\'s the only one I buy.', u'To avoid clumps and smudges, let dry between coats.'], 'author': u'ltlliz ', 'date': [u'2016-08-30'], 'location': u'San Jose, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'After receiving this in a gift set I have tried it and love it. It is clumpy but for my eyelashes it works great. No need for my false eyelashes. It seems like you\'re going to love it or hate it. I love it!'], 'author': u'Beauty4Sephora ', 'date': [u'2016-07-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'0 stars. worst mascara ever.', 'text': [u'This is literally the most awful mascara I\'ve ever received. I\'ve tried all there is out there, so this is saying a lot. I received a deluxe sample size in a summer Sephora favorites box and used it on the way to my friends house. The brush is in the shape of a triangle, not even a regular spoole. So it doesn\'t even grip your lashes. Second, it is clumpy AF. literally one swipe did NOTHING for my lashes. After I tried to build it up after over 10 swipes, some of my lashes were still bare. Seriously, move on from this mascara. It\'s horrible.'], 'author': u'KaylynnS ', 'date': [u'2016-07-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my favorite!', 'text': [u'My eyelashes are short and uncurled. After curling my eyelashes, I put on mascara and they get uncurled and I have not tried any mascaras that keep my eyelashes up except for this one. It doesn\'t do much except darken and coat my eyelashes which is perfectly fine. I love this product a lot but, I see why some people don\'t.'], 'author': u'skbeauty01 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Highliner Gel Eye Crayon Eyeliner
reviews: {'title': u'Best eyeliner ever', 'text': [u'This is the best! It gives a smoky, not harsh line. I smudge the edges with a Qtip after application it give the edges a faded look, it makes it look so natural like it blends into your eyelids. After a few mintues the eyeliner sets and becomes smudge free'], 'author': u'buyer01 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Toronto, On', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'so in love with this! i got the ro (cocoa) shade and it looks very natural.... long lasting especially for me who wears it for almost 12 hours a day'], 'author': u'clairet101 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Long-wearing, but irritates my eyes', 'text': [u'I love this eyeliner. It goes on well and has great staying power. Does not move or transfer, despite my oily lids. But, I have the kind of sensitive eyes that do not love every formula I throw at it. After only 1-2 hours of wearing, my eyes start to feel puffy, tired, and sting a little. Even the next day with no make-up, my eyes still feel a little irritated. I\'ll keep using it in a pinch, but it won\'t be in the top of my make-up bag due to the mild irritation.'], 'author': u'SunkneeG ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Huntsville, AL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Almost perfect!', 'text': [u'I really love this liner. It has excellent all-day staying power and the black is very black and pigmented! Also, the pen application is a great size for creating your own look (not too thin or too thick). My only complaint (which may seem silly) is that it seems that too much product comes out during application. I have to work quickly to be sure the line is straight and doesn\'t creep. Perhaps this is only the case in the first few applications? Even with this issue I will definitely purchase again!'], 'author': u'Emma422 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Immaculate® Liquid Powder Foundation Mattifying Oil Free
reviews: {'title': u'My go to foundation', 'text': [u'I love this foundation. I have combination skin so I always struggle with foundations. They are always too dry or too dewy. This one is PERFECT! I don\'t even have to set it. It is that good. Now people are always telling me about how amazing my skin looks. I love it!'], 'author': u'LevaM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Oxidized like crazy!', 'text': [u'I couldn\'t even use this. I bought the Ivory shade and when trying to apply with fingers or a brush, the foundation would immediately separate and leave behind a bright orange color on my fingers or brush and the remaining foundation would not blend at all on my face. I had high hopes as it performed well when sampled in store. Please make sure to check the quality of your bottle, not sure if this applies to all or if it was just the Ivory color, but I bought two bottles with no luck!'], 'author': u'jenna ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Go to Summer Foundation', 'text': [u'This is my go to summer foundation, when my skin is at it\'s oiliest and most tan. It\'s long wearing and I don\'t have to blot the oil spots on my T-zone as much during a night out. ', u'Have to put it on quick since it dries so fast. Would probably agree with other people that the pump could be improved (product often dries in the pump, so I end up squirting it all over when I try to hard to get it out). ', u'However, I can\'t use this product during the winter. It looks way to chalky on my skin and harder to blend.'], 'author': u'Ricola ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'good product', 'text': [u'This by far is the best matte foundation I have ever used. It stays on for hours, my T-zone still gets oily but not as much with this foundation! Cons: 1. Pricey2. Very hard to blend because it dries fast. 3. You will use lots of pumps on your face because it dries fast & hard to blend. 4. Not the best coverage. 5. Since the bottle isn\'t see through you can\'t see how much you have used. 6. After a few hrs the foundation dissolves around my nose.'], 'author': u'biancag7111 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best Yet, but pricey', 'text': [u'I have bad acne and like this product because it gives me good coverage for a decent amount of time. This product lasts longer than any other I\'ve tried, and doesn\'t exaggerate my dry skin. There is a problem with the pump, and it gets stuck, so that\'s very annoying. Nevertheless, great product, will continue to use!'], 'author': u'KennedyB ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Magnificent Metals Foil Finish Eye Shadow
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Just got it this morning and I love it. A little much a hassle in my opinion to have a tray and dropper, but it\'s got to be my shiniest shadow yet. A little hard to apply for me at first, but I can tell I\'m getting better at it with dabbing it on my eyelids with my fingers. Can\'t wait to wear it with my gold heels and gladiator costume for this Halloween <3 way to go stila'], 'author': u'CottonKitten ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love', 'text': [u'I got the dusty rose and Oh my god is it beautiful!!! I apply with a flat brush and then dab it lightly with a finger. A little setting spray and I\'m good to go!!! Soooo sparkly and beautiful. This color is stunning. At the end of the day I have a tiny bit of creasing but honestly I don\'t think it\'s even noticeable to anyone else. Worth the money.'], 'author': u'babyhayhay ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'JUST THE PURPLE ONE', 'text': [u'This eyeshadows are absolutely gorgeous. Everytime I go into Sephora I try them on and especially the gold one blows me away. Thinking they were all the same, I bought the purple one when it was on sale... I don\'t know what it is, but the formula is not the same: the pigmentation is quite transparent and clumpy... I\'m not sure how to explain it but it remind be of one of those kids cream eyeshadows; just not at all great quality for the price.'], 'author': u'Landau ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Kitten', 'text': [u'Still trying to figure out how I feel about it. I really wanna love it but think it\'s alright and might not be worth the buck. When I trye it by itself as instructed (with the priming oil)...I just get a patchy application. I find that I like it better when I wet my brush with a facial spray vs the oil it comes with. Either way, still get patchy application.'], 'author': u'mrsmayrag ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Santa Ana, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'cooper & merlot', 'text': [u'I bought the copper at Sephora for a night out. And after playing around with it the best way to use it is two drops with one tiny amount of color. When the cooper is wet it gets a brown under tone. The merlot gets darker as well'], 'author': u'kstar12 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Konjac Cleansing Sponge
reviews: {'title': u'wow', 'text': [u'I love this sponge. I use it EVERY night with my purity cleanser after using the Boscia makeup breakup cleansing oil. My skin is combo dry/oily and let tell you... my skin glows on its own with this routine. I use the sponge which is hard at first and turns to a gel like puddy when wet. After use I clean it and hang it to dry where it becomes semi hard again. I only gave 4 starts because this is supposed to last 3 months and mine is 2 months old and it already looks as if it was dirty and has a tear but then again, I use every night. Will give it one more month and will repurchase.'], 'author': u'prspctvmua ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Never will be without it', 'text': [u'I started using this sponge a few months ago and have since bought a replacement and given it as a gift. I can\'t overstate how much I love this. I consider it a new essential to my morning and evening skin routine. I am a skin fanatic, and I love that it is soft yet exfoliating. Much easier to clean than a Clarisonic and better for the environment, and it feels incredible. Totally sold.'], 'author': u'hifalutin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Southern californis', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Are you over Buf-puf?', 'text': [u'Has your Buf-Puf been too rough? I switched to this sponge and my skin is thanking me for it. Non-irritating but really helps get my skin clean. Be sure to hang it up to dry after use. Beware of squeezing it too hard. It\'s a natural product & will wear out probably faster than most would like but it\'s been great for me. I\'ve gone through 2 in the past year. Sponges that you use everyday will not last forever.'], 'author': u'bbcaddict ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I bought this after reading good reviews. Unfortunately for me it made my cheeks so red after using. It was just too harsh for my skin type. I also didn\'t really feel great about using it, it seemed like it took forever to dry out and I was worried about bacteria build up'], 'author': u'missbee123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'In LOVE!', 'text': [u'Bestie gave me one of these last Christmas and I fell in love with it. I love my cleanser but never had something to apply it with and didn\'t feel my hands were doing the job well. This little sponge thing cleanses well, rinses out well, and lasts a long time! I use it daily and love it.'], 'author': u'ShabbyPoodle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'Wichita, KS', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

', u'You can use it as a subtle highlighter, or if you put it on a little thicker, it can even double as a blush. <3'], 'author': u'Thinkbox ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

I\'ve had many products before and this has not ever happened.'], 'author': u'roe301 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': u'Monongahela, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Beautiful Eyeshadow', 'text': [u'I bought this today in the Rose Dentelle and Taupe Velours colors. Both are gorgeous brownish neutrals, that can be worn alone. They\'re a little tricky to blend, but with the right brush it\'s as easy as your standard powder eyeshadow. The girl helping me recommended the PRO Airbrush Shadow #30, and it works perfectly. The shadow doesn\'t gunk up the brushes, and if you\'re willing to invest in a higher priced shadow such as this I definitely recommend the brush to help with applying. While the shadow is difficult to blend it does have incredible staying power. I wore it for 8+ hours, and it didn\'t budge or crease, and seemed like it could easily go another 8 hours without creasing. It\'s made to be a smudge-proof formula, which is part of why it\'s so hard to blend. Along with the downside of limited blend-ability, it also feels a little dry once it\'s on your lids (it\'s a very subtle dryness that I imagine some may not even notice). The color looks amazing, and like I said previously with the right brush is easy to apply. I\'m very happy with this purchase.'], 'author': u'amanda0543 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': u'Boise, ID', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'NOT WATERPROOF!', 'text': [u'I bought this with excitement and high hopes. I suffer from chronic dry eyes from wearing contacts, so my eyes tear a lot. I\'m the perfect candidate to test this product out to see if it truly lives up to its claims. So I applied this product to my upper eye lid, lining close to the lash line for my wings. None applied to bottom lash line. First off, when my eyes teared, the eyeliner went into my eyes. Then, the eyeliner totally faded off. What\'s going on Sephora? Even drugstore eyeliner is better than this. I was praying to find a matte black waterproof liquid eyeliner. reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'My pre-teen daughter was having some issues with blemishes, so, after reading other reviews I decided to get this for her to try. {'title': u'Best Spot Treatment', 'text': [u'I\'m fortunate that I have generally clear skin, but when I do break out, the pimples tend to be big and red and to cluster in obvious areas (forehead, chin). Face washes and moisturizers with salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide dry out my skin, so I prefer spot treatments. I\'ve tried numerous drug store and high end products, and nothing is better than Origins Super Spot Remover. Don\'t be fooled by the tiny bottle - just the tiniest amount is all you need. I apply the gel at night, and by the time I wake up, the pimple is dry and significantly smaller. I then apply one more thin layer in the morning, and within hours, the pimple is completely gone. This is definitely worth the money, and I will continue to buy this for as long as I can!'], 'author': u'ctylau ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Zero Oil™ Oil-Free Moisture Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'so far so goog', 'text': [u'Don\'t really see a huge change, I mean my skin is been, is and will always been oily. All I can say is that this product kept it a but under controlled and it\'s the first time a product I use does not make my skin issue worse!'], 'author': u'carol1016 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Grear option for oily skin.', 'text': [u'I love the Origins moisturizer from the Ginzing line, and that one would have been my HG moisturizer but unfortunately they don\'t make it in a squeeze tube! It\'s only available in a jar which I don\'t like. I decided to try this one because the packaging is more hygienic. It\'s also more convenient for traveling.I would say both feel the same on the skin--they aren\'t tacky and mattify pretty quickly. Makeup sits great on top, and they both leave the skin feeling soft.I didn\'t notice this moisturizer having any mattifying effects, but I only used it once at night so far. It does have a medicinal scent to it, but I\'m fine with that since I like using more natural products on my skin. It also has a cooling effect. If you don\'t like that, stay away from this product. The cooling effect only lasts for about ten seconds, though.Hopefully this will help with the tiny pimples all over my forehead and cheeks. I have textured skin and am hopeful that the salicylic acid in this will work.'], 'author': u'Lillsea ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have combo skin and some parts tend to get "tight" when they are dry. While I realize this is a oil-free moisturizer, it barely helps with the tight feeling I have. I like the smell though.'], 'author': u'MacyLu ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}
