name: Lock-It Foundation
reviews: {'title': u'Pretty darn good...', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this foundation for a few needs now, and I think I can write a complete review at this point. As other reviewers write, this foundation has a horrible smell or paint, or chemicals, or something. The good part of this is that there are no added fragrances, so you are just smelling what other manufacturers cover up. I\'m sensitive to fragrance, so this is alright for me. The foundation comes out of the pump thick, and dries quickly. There is almost not even time to get it spread on your face. I tried half a pump for one side of the face, and a second half pump for the other, which worked okay.The best results I\'ve been getting is from putting a tiny dab of Smashbox Primer on my finger, and then putting about 3/4s of a pump of the foundation on my finder over the primer, and blending the two together on my fingers. This gives the foundation a little extra slide to get all over my face, and smooth out to an even finish. My face is fairly oily, I live in Florida, and go to Hot Yoga after work. This foundation has staying power! Some ladies have mentioned oxidation, and turning orange. I did not experience that, but I will say that the first color recommended to me was way too orange. I went back, chose the color myself, and found it does actually come in a shade cool enough for my tone, which is hard to find. Most foundations look too yellow or orange on me, so this is great!All in all, I\'m pretty happy.'], 'author': u'Commoditygrrl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Sarasota, Fl', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'not impressed!', 'text': [u'I have combination skin, I have a few fine lines and I was recommended this foundation by a friend, the coverage is great... But it gets cakey and sometimes I get patches where it pealed a little which was so embarrassing because my face is all did up and here the tip of my nose has a pealed patch. I really wanted to like it because of the awesome coverage but I couldn\'t have patches missing lol. I returned it'], 'author': u'icequeen22 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Top Pick!', 'text': [u'I have tried many many foundations. I have very oily skin and I work long 10 hour minimum days.This stuff has great coverage, I have blemishes and black heads and it covers them up nicely. It lasts me most of the day, it wears off in spots by the end of the day but I believe it is caused by my oily concealer. It creases slightly but not more then other foundations. ', u'I recently purchased Make Up Forevers HD foundation. Have to say, I like this one quite a bit more. Regret paying $52 for stinky foundation that doesn\'t have much coverage, when this one is $10 cheaper for a larger bottle and more coverage.'], 'author': u'Mackensweet ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nice- With One Caveat', 'text': [u'A little bit goes a long way. Start by applying the thinnest layer you possibly can because it can get cakey if you\'re not careful. I\'ve got terrible skin. It\'s acne-prone, sensitive, and some products make me break out with dermatitis. This hasn\'t made me break out so far (been using it for a week or so). It stays matte quite well, but I use oil blotting sheets as well to keep my skin matte. I was very impressed with the shades available. I\'ve got anemia-white skin, and this stuff actually matches it. Overall, I\'d buy it again. This container will last a long time, though, seeing as you don\'t need to use a lot of it.'], 'author': u'MizzzLizzzy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'MIlwaukee, WI', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'LOVE THIS CLEANSER!', 'text': [u'I have combination skin that gets very oily in the summer. This cleanser is amazing for this type of skin. It takes off all of my make up and it leaves my skin so clean and soft. Love Love it. I am definitely going to repurchase the full size version. I always follow up with the complete eye renewal balm, which helps with the bags under my eyes and then I apply drugstore moisturizer. A lot people writing these reviews forget that this is a cleanser not a moisturizer of course your skin might feel after using this. If you have dry skin then you need to buy a cleanser made for your skin type. For oily skin this is great. {'title': u"this is not a curling iron, y'all!", 'text': [u'It says it right in the title. Body. Wave. Not "curling iron". I have thick, combination hair, and frizz. I love how this product smoothes the strands and gives me that Chloe runway hair look. I used to use straightening irons, but it would make my hair look unnaturally straight. This iron gives a natural looking bend to your hair. This product is not supposed to "hold a curl" because the barrel is too big for it in the first place. The heat settings are average for high temp irons. I keep it at the default level its at when you plug it in (it turns on automatically). Of course this will burn your hair. Any iron is going to burn your hair, you are literally pressing 300 degree heat to something. Thats the definition of burning. Just dont set it to the max of 400, and dont iron every single day. As far as crimping marks being left on your hair, thats more of a technique issue. If you are quick with your hands, and turn the barell in the same direction, not opposite, you wont be leaving marks on the lock of hair.The wand is gorgeous, i display it on my vanity. I also like how the end of the wand is safe to put fingers on. It helps so i can use two hands when gliding the iron through my hair. Dont spend too much time on the ends of your hair, or else by the end of the day you will have that weird pin straight yet curls a tiny bit at the bottom look. Buy this if you want smooth hair!'], 'author': u'muybuener ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not worth the $$', 'text': [u'All this bodywaver does is tuck your hair in at the ends and give you that blowed out look. Its not worth 200. I returned it'], 'author': u'cassiewilde ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Adds volume', 'text': [u'This is NOT a curling iron. If you are looking for a curling iron, you should be purchasing the 1.25" curling wand instead. I bought this because I was looking for something to add volume to my flat straight hair, not to curl (I already have a curling iron for that). And I was very impressed! This gave my fine-to medium shoulder length hair lots of volume, shine & bounce, which lasted all day. I find that heat level 2 is enough for my hair.'], 'author': u'zmoon ', 'date': [u'2016-06-12'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Intensive Pore Minimizer
reviews: {'title': u'still waiting but so far so good', 'text': [u'I work for a dermatologist and we use ALA for different skin issues so I thought this might help my oily but older skin and it seems pretty good so far. I still get the occasional pimple at my advanced age so i am very careful about putting stuff on my face and this seems to be clarifying and smoothing a bit..'], 'author': u'batgitl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'san jose, ca', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Expensive, but the difference is there!', 'text': [u'Bought this product after enjoying the feeling of my skin when it was applied during a make up session. I\'ve never had issues with large pores but I struggled with acne scars and break outs prior to my pregnancy (currently, 9 months). ', u'I noticed smoother, less oily and more matte skin. I\'ve been using this product since August and it assists in any breakouts that may attempt to form (hopefully, this doesn\'t change after the baby).', u'It feels cool on the skin and is quite refreshing! I may pick up another bottle when it\'s empty.'], 'author': u'luniara ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really nice despite the price', 'text': [u'I wouldn\'t keep buying this as expensive as it is if it didn\'t work so well. Really effective at removing dirt and oil, but without stripping my skin. It seems to reduce breakouts. I have sensitive skin with t-zone oiliness and it has really calmed my skin down. When I do get breakouts, they seem less deep and to cycle through more quickly. It has an earthy scent which I actually like. But the scent diminishes quickly. I feel like this keeps my skin cleaner and more controlled.'], 'author': u'LalaGee ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'While I can\'t say this product will for sure minimize everyone\'s pores, I can guarantee you that it at least cleans your pores more effectively than any product on the market. The correct way to see this is by pouring some to a cotton pad and put the cotton pad on i.e. your nose. Leave it there until when it gets almost dry. Take it off and you can see all the white dots emerging out of your pores! Once you wipe those dots away you have completely clean pores! This is my fourth bottle and I will keep on buying!'], 'author': u'Castle721 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gentle and Refreshing', 'text': [u'I have sensitive skin and I got this after an esthetician told me to use a toner once a day instead of washing my face . This stuff works wonders. My skin feels refreshed and clean after using it, and it hasn\'t caused me to break out at all. It doesn\'t really moisturize much, so I do occasionally follow this with a light moisturizer.'], 'author': u'Shelila ', 'date': [u'2016-09-01'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: La Petite Robe Noire
reviews: {'title': u'Not sexy', 'text': [u'I\'ll start by saying that, with any perfume, whether you\'ll like it or not, it is subjective. Personally, this is not my kind of scent.I don\'t understand how people say this is a sexy fragrance. With most guerlain scents I get a more mature feel from them.The notes I can detect are definitely rose and jasmine as the heart of the fragrance, with a warm touch of amber in the background and some muskiness. But mainly what throws me off from this, is the heavy powdery note, that mixed with the heavy floral blend makes this a mature "old-lady" kind of scent.For an EDT it is long-lasting and has good projection.'], 'author': u'PaulaMakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Signature Scent', 'text': [u'I\'ve always been very picky when it comes to my perfumes, they\'ve got to have a certain uniqueness to them.Pour Femme by D&G is absolutely delicious; it\'s exactly the right blend of fresh/soft/floral/woodsy/sweet and if it melds with your body it becomes even better.I think that the complaint about the longevity of the scent is only because you stop being able to smell it after awhile, I\'ve got compliments on my scent after I\'ve been wearing it for 9 hours and I can\'t smell it at all.That being said, this perfume is kind of hard to describe in a way that does it justice, but I will try; it smells like sitting outside on a warm balcony with a glass of sun tea, smelling the orange blossoms wafting on a gentle breeze that also brings the powdery warmth of marshmallows and vanilla sugar from the bakery below. It\'s soothing and nostalgic and deliciously sensual; it\'s a close, cuddly skin scent but men definitely love it and it will change with your own chemistry to become something unique on you.I highly recommend it and I would definitely say to order the rollerball before the big bottle so you can live in it for a week or two before deciding. Once you fall in love though, it\'s forever!'], 'author': u'bri4 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'beautiful scent!!!!', 'text': [u'my god this is the prettiest scent ive smelled. so warm and comforting great for all seasons in my opinion. only downside to this perfume is the wear. i put this on and the smell is strong but after a couple of minutes (20 minutes) the smell is gone. no traces of the perfume scent anywhere. my britney spears fantasy lasts longer than this. sadly i wont repurchase because of this even though its the prettiest scent.'], 'author': u'ilovemyboys ', 'date': [u'2016-04-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Give this a chance!', 'text': [u'So I received this as part of Bite\'s spring fling set and I threw it in a drawer because I didn\'t understand what it was for. Found it and decided to look up its purpose and actually use it and I\'m so happy I did! I own about six lip liners because I don\'t have issues with bleeding or feathering and I can get a precise application just fine without them, so the concept of this product was perfect for me. Now, I do agree with people that this does not hydrate or even really condition the lips. It does also require a bit of work to apply because of the formula but nothing crazy like people have said. Feels like a drier version of a Chapstick. The reason I love this now is because it serves as the PERFECT lip base for me. I am of a medium/deep skin tone and have issues with MANY lip colors not showing up true to color because of my skin tone or not translating the same way on me as they do on fair to light complexions. This solves that problem perfectly!! Now I can actually use all those lip products and get my money\'s worth. Also I find that this does in fact make my lip products last A LOT longer and make them wear even better. This has been amazing with my very creamy, almost balmy lipstick formulations but especially for liquid lipsticks!! Im not a big fan of liquid lipsticks in general, but when I wear this primer underneath, my lips don\'t feel as dried out and the liquid lipsticks lay SOO much better on my lips. It prevents the liquid lip from sinking into my lip lines too much and looking gross and old which has been awesome so I\'m now able to wear them. This lip primer also helps with the way my liquid lipsticks wear as well. They last even longer without fading and when they do start to go, it\'s very subtle and they fade very evenly. I\'ve tested this with many lip products and formulations and all in all I\'m super happy with it and will definitely repurchase once I run out!!'], 'author': u'AngeliqueL ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'nope', 'text': [u'Not a fan of this product at all! Won\'t purchase again.'], 'author': u'epati ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Nice but doesn't last", 'text': [u'Miss Dior is a mix between Flowerbomb and Lancome\'s La vie est belle. It is floral but not the white floral/grandma kind, more heavy mixed in with the sweetness from the amber. If you are familiar with Flowerbomb the you won\'t be shocked to find that there is patchouli in this which gives it a deeper, darker feel.The downside is definitely the longevity, it doesn\'t last very long on the skin. I haven\'t tried the EDP version so I don\'t know if it is the same (sometimes EDT and EDP have different notes, doesn\'t necessarily mean that one is a more concentrated version of the other) so if you are looking for a more long lasting perfume I\'d go for Flowerbomb, which on me lasts days when sprayed on clothes.'], 'author': u'PaulaMakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-02-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Terracotta Healthy Glow Blush Bronzer Powder Duo
reviews: {'title': u'A Rare Miss From Guerlain', 'text': [u'I am a lover of all things Guerlain, but this was a miss. I purchased the blonde version, and this just didn\'t work on my skin. Not enough pigment to work as blush or bronzer. No glow at all. Perhaps I needed a darker color, but I have NC15 skin, and didn\'t want something that looked muddy. I may try a fellow reviewer\'s suggest to use as an all over face color, but this wasn\'t marketed as a finishing powder, so two stars it is. The only saving grace is the product itself is cute, and the smell is great, but I already have enough cute Guerlain products that I didn\'t need this just for looks!'], 'author': u'Nikki ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Mo', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'flawless', 'text': [u'Huge guerlain fan hereI purchase 02 and have nw20 skintoneIt is PERFECT! {'title': u'Great for Pale Complexions', 'text': [u'After seeing reviews and tips about getting a bronzed look for summer I decided to give this a go. This smells divine but may be too strong if you are sensitive to fragrances. The product is matte and has a small part that has a "blush" color. This color is either a cool or warm tone depending on what you need. I chose the 00 as I wanted a pale bronzer that isn\'t orange. The blush part is a pale pinky color. I just use the whole surface together with a big soft brush and then place it as I would for a bronzer. The result is a lovely summer glow and it helps enhance my cheekbones.'], 'author': u'lovemakeupca ', 'date': [u'2016-06-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love the product. Hate the packaging.', 'text': [u'Most bronzers either look dirty or orange on me. This one is fantastic. Although I\'m a brunette, I got the light/blonde shade. This one is not weighted and feels like cheap plastic.'], 'author': u'IlonaK ', 'date': [u'2016-05-25'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Love!!', 'text': [u'I love this type of crease brush! It\'s precise, yet it blends beautifully while it deposits color. Great especially for hooded eyes, and for applying transition colors. While I\'m glad I was able to pick up a couple extra on sale (I have 3 total now), I\'m sad this brush is being discontinued since this type of shape for a crease brush is often hard to find. This is one of the best iterations I\'ve found, so pick one on sale while you can! reviews: {'title': u'Bye Bye Dark Spots', 'text': [u'Let me start off by saying that my dark spots were fairly new and weren\'t super super dark they were acne scars from when I didn\'t stop picking at something I shouldn\'t have.', u'I love this stuff I had a few dark spots that I wanted gone. I tried the Murad Dark Spot Correcter and that worked wonders in greatly reducing their appearance but after the 4 week mark I no longer saw any progress. I decided to try something else and stumbled upon this. I have been using this in conjunction with the peel pads and the results are amazing. I saw results around the 3rd day my dark spots are almost completely gone. Im not acne prone but every once in a while i get random small blemished usually around check area ever since I started using this nothing. I am seriously loving this serum.'], 'author': u'Aimer94 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'AWESOME', 'text': [u'This is my first time trying a brightening solution and literally every morning my skin looks a little more amazing! I will re-use the application pads a few times since they only give you a limited amount and I\'m not sure how to get more.'], 'author': u'Anya91 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'fight the forties!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using the peels and serum for about a year now, and they are perfect for me. No wrinkles yet, but my pores are enlarged and this product really helps. The serum originally came with these little scratchy pads for application, but they run out quickly and Sephora does not sell them separately. I got 2 different recommendations at the store: 1) apply with my hands 2) apply with a cotton pad. Cotton pads absorb the liquid, so that won\'t work, and, according to the other consultant, applying with my hands is not as effective because the serum needs to be rubbed below the skin\'s surface. The serum should come with more of the pads that don\'t absorb the liquid.'], 'author': u'imallhere ', 'date': [u'2016-08-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This serum is wonderful. Potent but works. I have acne scaring and this serum has lightened them up more then anything else I\'ve tried. It\'s help even out texture, making my skin smooth. It\'s helped clear blackheads on my nose area, and also help clear breakouts. It is drying though. And I can only use it 1x a day or else my skin gets dried out and flaky. I like to use a very hydrating face cream with this and I have combination, acne prone skin. and if you have dry skin I would definitely suggest using a face oil with it like Josie maran argon oil plus a face cream. But overal wonderful product and I would definitely suggest giving it a try'], 'author': u'jellybee ', 'date': [u'2016-07-21'], 'location': u'toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Only serum you need', 'text': [u'If you are worried about skin rough texture, hyperpigmentation and fine lines/prevention this is the serum for you. Amazing stuff. My hyperpigmentation from prior acne is greatly diminished and my rough skin from dryness is smooooooth. Just make sure to apply an appropriate moisturizer after, and a good toner before. I recommend the First Aid Beauty Facial Radiance pads as the best toner to use before this.'], 'author': u'Jazz123 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-19'], 'location': u'houston, tx', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'love this product', 'text': [u'I love how soft and beautiful my skin looks after using this product for about 3 weeks now. I have some discoloration on my cheeks. Then with clean hands I rub the excess into my skin and sometimes apply a vitamin C serum on top of this product before bed if I was in the sun a lot that day. {'title': u'A++ mask', 'text': [u'I got 2 pods of this mask as part of the 500 points perk set they had out a few weeks ago. This is the only thing in the set that I liked, but the mask was so amazing that I don\'t feel like I wasted 500 points at all! This mask made my face so soft and smooth after using it. My husband even commented that it was really soft and he never notices things like that. I usually put it on Sunday evening after supper, leave it for 10 minutes and then get in the shower and rinse it off as I am washing my hair and have no problems rinsing it off. And I found that it left my skin nice for the entire week, got rid of some little bumps I had and smoothed it all out. I didn\'t notice anything about my pores, I didn\'t really look for that though. Its been 2 weeks since I used up my last pod and I am going this weekend to buy a tube of it because all this week I feel like my skin hasn\'t been as nice as the 2 weeks previous.'], 'author': u'meliebean ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Ottawa, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u"Best Cleanser I've used", 'text': [u'The checks and balances froth face wash is life!!! I\'ve had sensitive skin all my life and thanks to my eczema I\'ve always had to be particularly careful of what I used on my skin. Checks and Balances cleanses without drying. It gets rid of all the dirt and grime from the day and does a good job taking off my makeup. Another plus is that a little bit truly goes a long way so it\'s definitely cost efficient if that\'s a concern. I use my hands to cleanse sometimes but this cleanser and my Clarisonic is a winning combo'], 'author': u'Jodiamor ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'TOTALLY UNEXPECTED SKIN SAVER', 'text': [u'My skin has finally just started recovering from years of moderate adult acne. I\'m so surprised by this cleanser because 1. it removes all of my makeup, but doesn\'t suck the life out of my skin. my skin doesn\'t feel dry at all after washing! 2. This doesn\'t really having acne fighting ingredients but for some reason, its helped clear up my skin and keep it clear. I\'ve tried almost every kind of acne cleansers and treatments out there and I cant believe this is the thing that is doing the trick. I know this cleanser balances the pH levels of your skin, and i know that plays a big role in acne and oil production. SOOO that could be it. but I honestly love this cleanser. It\'s so gentle on my skin and its been months of using it and I\'m not even halfway finished with it yet. So big product with such a great price tag!'], 'author': u'sheeeeezy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Favorite Cleanser Ever', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using Checks and Balances every day, twice a day, for about 3 years, and I\'ll probably never buy any other cleanser. ', u'I have very oily skin and mild acne, and this cleanser has helped with both immensely. A little product goes a very long way and takes even the most stubborn make up completely off. ', u'It does dry my skin out, and give it a very squeaky clean feeling, which did bother me when I first started using it, but it\'s easily fixed with a bit of moisturizer.'], 'author': u'Kuhdelsee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Plantscription™ Youth-Renewing Face Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Fantastic eye treatment', 'text': [u'I was looking for a new eye cream (currently use Benefit eye bright), and got a sample of this stuff (little pod). I have combination sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts with anything oily. I gave this a shot as a substitute eye treatment (after a few glasses of wine, I was throwing caution into the wind). And who knew, it was amazing! The next morning my fine lines had started smoothing and my under eyes were bright and youthful! I\'m in my early 30\'s so I\'m frequently fighting those new little lines.That single pod has lasted me nearly a month now, using it every day. I use 1 drop under each eye at night and I don\'t think I\'ll be going back to my previous eye creams.I don\'t think I\'ll use this on my entire face since the level of hydration it provides is a bit much for my habitually oily areas.', u'Happy hydrating!'], 'author': u'renems ', 'date': [u'2016-04-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'compliments on the 1st day!', 'text': [u'Ok, yes it CAN be oily, so I use only a drop or two. It absorbs nicely, feels good, and must make some difference- the morning after I tried it, four people complimented my skin, and nothing else had changed. Worth it!'], 'author': u'barady1201 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'For Normal/Dry Skin', 'text': [u'I have combination skin and this face oil was a little too oily on my face. It didn\'t make me break out or anything but I also didn\'t see any results after two weeks. It was very hydrating but left my face oily, and woke up with an oily face if I used it as a night cream...I guess that\'s how you achieve a glowy face? Oil. It makes light bounce off the face?'], 'author': u'taro876 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-19'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Works as advertised!', 'text': [u'I truly love how it makes my face feel. It is moisturizing without being greasy. I\'ve used it daily for a few weeks now, and you can\'t even tell...the bottle is still full. The skin care specialist at Sephora told me - 2 drops in hand - rub hands together - gently press on face. That\'s it.'], 'author': u'WorkingSFMama ', 'date': [u'2015-07-12'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Absorbs quickly, Non-greasy moisture', 'text': [u'I started using this by mixing 2-4 drops of it with the Origins Genzing moisturizer. I\'ve been using this combination with the Checks and Balances cleanser (I remove this cleanser with water and a square cotton pad in order to get it all off) and the new Original Skin mask and my skin looks great, better than it has in years.', u'This product absorbs quickly when I add it to my moisturizer.', u'I also apply 1 drop under my eyes and on my eyelids at night. I would read the directions to see if that is recommended or not, but it\'s adding moisture to my very dry under eye area.', u'Overall this product is gently moisturizing my sensitive skin. I would repurchase.'], 'author': u'Schnickerfritz ', 'date': [u'2015-07-05'], 'location': u'Lake Forest, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Best skin cream in the world', 'text': [u'First off I never write reviews. But I just had to say something about this cream! I only ever wear mascara for makeup, so I like to spend money when it comes to skin care products. This cream smells delicious, and you put it on at night and I swear in the morning you wake up with the most softest, glowing skin. I have gotten compliments on my skin ranging from "you look so healthy" to "your skin is glowing". It is honestly the best cream in the world and if you are debating over the millions of skin care products out there just start with this one.'], 'author': u'momodoey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Calgary, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I love this product. It\'s lightweight, absorbs quickly, and doesn\'t make my face break out. name: See By Chloé
reviews: {'title': u'Favorite for years.', 'text': [u'I have a full on fragrance addiction. I love having a wardrobe of scents to chose from that match my mood or to go with certain looks. I rarely repurchase a fragrance because I love discovering and buying new ones.With that being said, See by Chloe is one of the few that I love so much, that I will repurchase a full size bottle. It\'s such a lovely scent that is feminine but not overly sweet, floral or cloying. It strikes the right balance between girlish and womanly with those vanilla notes keeping it warm and grounded. People literally stop me in stores and ask what I\'m wearing.'], 'author': u'TamTam01 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is my signature scent. I love this perfume so much. I tested it in a perfume gift set from Sephora a couple of years ago and have been repurchasing full sizes ever since (note: this is also the only perfume I\'ve ever had a guy compliment me on as well). This perfume lasts so long, as do all of the Chloe perfumes. It is feminine, slightly powdery, but fresh and great for spring/summer. The main scents are jasmine and vanilla. After the scent settles, more musk comes through. It is a simple scent, but it doesn\'t need to be complicated because it smells so darn good. I will never be out of this for as long as Chloe makes it.'], 'author': u'CharlotteL92 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Obsessed', 'text': [u'The first time I smelled this I had to buy it,and to this day I can\'t get enough. This is definitely one of my new favs! I love perfumes that balance sweet, fruity, and floral notes---especially when there are berries! ', u'This scent isn\'t so "young-smelling" that it makes you smell like a 10 year old who bathes in cotton candy,, but it also doesn\'t age you and make you smell like your grandma. It\'s classy but still playful.', u'If/when I finish the rollerball, I\'m buying a larger size for sure!'], 'author': u'PreppyBeauty28 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-24'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'Awesome.', 'text': [u'This stuff is great. It lasts quite a long time. My only problem is that the gloss doesn\'t last.. like basically at all. But still, I bought another one anyway :)'], 'author': u'hanaleiezz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Jeddah, KSA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Steamer Solutions
reviews: {'title': u'Obsessed', 'text': [u'I\'ve been wanting a good quality face steamer for some time now where I can just lay down and not have to stick my head in anything which is very uncomfortable. This steamer is very good quality and works very well! It blows a lot of steam and has two options on how you want the steam blown. This is great for face masks and opens up your pores and also great if you want to extract black heads & pimples! Def a must have!'], 'author': u'kyrajean ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'life changing', 'text': [u'Absolute must have for every skin type and skin concern. Great before doing the alpha beta peels or anything you want to penetrate deep in to the skin!'], 'author': u'shellyb0612 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Recommend', 'text': [u'I have use this 3 times already and have to say that there is a difference to my face. It does help get moisture back in your skin without sitting in a sauna. Be sure to watch Dr. Gross youtube video though on how to use it. Dr. Gross says do not use distilled water even though you tubers say they do. Find a routine that works for you also. Some people do 1/2 steam then add face cream on face w/steam for other 10mins. This does not work for me. I use it with beta peel mask to open pores or without anything on my face. Good investment. Also, it must be flat on surface due to button on bottom. You don\'t need both buttons turned on. The steam only you cannot see, the ozone turned on you can see the steam. You can also ad essential oils to the top part that slides back. I tried lavender. Did not do anything for me.'], 'author': u'JT1985 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Magic', 'text': [u'Combine the steamer with Dr. gross peels & your skin will be so wonderful......its magic!'], 'author': u'mikeysgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'woodstock, ga.', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u"Best thing I've ever bought!", 'text': [u'I am in LOVE with this steamer. First off it\'s wonderfully relaxing and feels amazing on your skin. Perfect for an at home spa night. I find myself wanting to use it every day if I have the time. It has done wonders for my skin! My skin glows and feels firm and soft after. It\'s perfect after a hot shower to really open up those pores and use your favorite mask or do some extractions. It hydrates my skin and never irritates no matter how often I am using it. It\'s majorly help clear up breakouts. It steams all the gunk out of your pores. It\'s also easy to operate and the perfect size for mobility around your house. Easy to get comfortable with and enjoy it. Well worth the money! If mine ever breaks down on me I\'d gladly buy another ASAP!'], 'author': u'kann15 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Studded X: Mini Lip + Nail Polish Duo
reviews: {'title': u'Eh', 'text': [u'I like these sets, I do. The price is right and sizes are enough to really give product a go. My gripes are with shades and formulas; I have Poe and Coven. Lipsticks: beautiful packaging and shades, but Coven is on a sheer side, while Poe is gritty and might be just the most terribly wearing lip product I own. Nail polishes are pretty, but nothing extremely novel and shades don\'t match the lipsticks! Coven is a mid-toned dusty purple, not a pastel lavender and Poe is a borderline duochrome.'], 'author': u'alexhider10 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'dissatisfied', 'text': [u'I got the color Poe and it doesn\'t go on nicely and the nail polish isn\'t really pigmented it only is after like four coats.........'], 'author': u'Heatherpackman ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: HYDRATE - Hand Crème with Kpangnan Butter
reviews: {'title': u'greatt!', 'text': [u'I got this for my mother and she loves it! she says it leaves her hands really soft.'], 'author': u'whorchataaaa ', 'date': [u'2016-07-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'staple product', 'text': [u'This is such a weird under-the-radar product. Don\'t get me wrong; I love it and would recommend it, but it\'s not craveable, and I think that\'s because it has a very forgettable, light fragrance (which, yay! doesn\'t clash with your daily fragrance and won\'t elicit snide comments from the fragrance-averse in your office). It\'s also only moderately healing. If your hands are majorly damaged, this is probably not going to be the tube that makes you praise your gods because it is not a miracle worker. It IS, however, likely to be the cream you use afterward, consistently, so that your hands never get so bad again. ', u'I do love how my hands feel after I use it: very soft, slightly warm, powdery-ish and *not* sticky if you are using an appropriate amount. It takes a minute to sink in, but I\'m using a dab that\'s about the size of a dime. It\'s full of a very intense butter, so your skin can\'t absorb all of it if you over-apply. Because it\'s used in such small amounts, I think the price is more than fair. I also think you only need to over-apply it once before you realize, "Welp, I\'m not doing that again."', u'It is not the life-changer that the Formula X cuticle remover is, but it\'s exactly the kind of hand cream that I think works well as a product in a mani/hand care line as opposed to a bath-and-body-care line. If you\'re the kind of person who takes your mani care seriously, it\'s worth a try and a two-week trial period.'], 'author': u'mymanina ', 'date': [u'2016-04-26'], 'location': u'MB, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Best Lotion Ever...no seriously', 'text': [u'I have always hated the feeling of lotion on my hands. After moisturizing my face or body I always wash my hands, and would only use hand cream at night in the winter when I was desperate, but this lotion changed the game for me. I\'m obsessed. It\'s lightweight while also extremely hydrating and absorbs into the skin almost instantly leaving no greasy after feeling. It has a mild but delicious smell. I use it multiple times a day because I adore how soft it makes my hand. This lotion will always be a staple for me.'], 'author': u'ewokcupcake ', 'date': [u'2016-01-07'], 'location': u'Bay Area, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Excellent Hand Creme!', 'text': [u'I have already repurchased this once, and will do again. It is high-quality and moisturizing without being overly greasy. I like to put it on before bedtime, and a few times during the day.', u'I\'m very happy with it. It has a pleasant, extremely unobtrusive, non-obnoxious scent.', u'I\'ve always loved L\'Occitane\'s regular shea hand creme, but the high price means I don\'t buy it consistently. I like this Formula X creme just as much. Great new product.'], 'author': u'lucyshnoosy ', 'date': [u'2015-08-06'], 'location': u'Rhode Island', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'love', 'text': [u'Love this lotion. Hydrates my skin, smells great, and makes my hands feel as soft as a baby\'s bum!'], 'author': u'cuppercakes ', 'date': [u'2015-07-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I wish I got it sooner', 'text': [u'The best quickest and easiest way to remove your nail polish! You really won\'t regret buying this if you want to spend less than 20 seconds erasing all your nails, if you are slow maybe 30 seconds. I think this is really worth it. You only need to make sure the lid is closed properly and open it carefully to not let it evaporate or spill it.'], 'author': u'choyoung ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'MD', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Black Opium
reviews: {'title': u'Favorite perfume!', 'text': [u'I tried this perfume on while at sephora a few months back, just spritzed it on my wrist. It smelled wonderful, but due to the price tag I wasn\'t in the position to buy it at the moment. Fast forward to six hours later, after SHOWERING, it was still lingering on my wrist! Except the scent was even better, it was like my body chemistry changed it into something amazing. I ended up buying the 3 oz. bottle because I just couldn\'t get enough of this perfume. I\'m 21 years old for reference, so for some of those comments saying that it\'s more of a mature scent, I agree but in a youthful way that makes you feel sexy. My boyfriend loves it as well! Also, I can 100% attest that it has incredible staying power. I accidentally got some of it on my foundation brush (oops) and my brush smells like the heavens of yves saint laurent still a week later haha. I encourage giving it a try and seeing how it works with your natural body oils before purchasing of course, but for me its 5 stars.'], 'author': u'jhanshew ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'tampa, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Omg', 'text': [u'I\'m a perfume junkie. This is my absolute favourite one. I\'ve gotten so many compliments when I\'m wearing it. It smells incredible.'], 'author': u'Ayrika ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sensual, seductive and sexy', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this perfume. It is a sensual, seductive and sexy fragrance that truly is intoxicating!!! I never thought that I would find a fragrance that could complete against my number 1 favorite (Knowing by Estee Lauder), But this one really does. Absolutely gorgeous. I give it 5 stars all around! .....and I just bought a travel size bottle to carry in my purse :)'], 'author': u'Saffron16 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I bought this Fragrance in the UK. I absolutely love it. It is like a shot of pure energy.It is like coffee & florals mixed together as the Top notes of this fragrance. I love fragrances in general mostly fresh, floral, and light. But this is different it\'s like dark meets light if that makes sense. It\'s an addicting scent you never feel like you have too much on. My girlfriend was over last weekend and she likes one of the Diesel scents it\'s in a purple odd shaped bottle. It\'s. . nice but too spicey for me but she loves it. Well I was shocked when she spotted my Black Opium bottle and just closes her eyes,asked if she could try it and oh my gosh I Almost thought I lost it! But thank God she just said mmm... over @ over! I really was shocked but thTs what I mean when I say the dark meets light. The dark is what she fell in love with and it\'s so sensual and seductive and then there\'s that light side of this scent that\'s so clean and fresh! It\'s a really different perfume but well worth the $100.00. I\'m 51 years old and I even like Juicey fragrances which a lot of my friends say is too florally and sweet but I like it. But honestly right now my all time fav is Black Opium by yvesSaintLaurent. I love it! Try a sampler if you can find one. I\'m sure you\'ll find one in Sephora!!!'], 'author': u'audicthebody ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE THIS!', 'text': [u'Got this in a sample at the store a month or two ago and fell in love with it since. I\'ve heard it is a kind of pretty punk rebel scent but it\'s not really it\'s very very sweet but also distinct and makes you feel special and sexy. Dang that price tho, but I will definitely purchase the full size in the November VIB sale.'], 'author': u'ShannonKing0516 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

name: Nirvana White
reviews: {'title': u'unique and musky without being old ladyish', 'text': [u'Bought this simply because I needed a new rollerball perfume. I had so many compliments on it I had to buy the bottle'], 'author': u'StaceyChau ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'loud', 'text': [u'This is my least favorite out of the Nirvana scents. I was surprised as I really like musks. The opening is really loud and generic, but it does dry down into something very pretty. It reminds me of Barbie perfume or something nostalgic to childhood. It\'s not bad--just isn\'t quite right for me. (The rose and black are my favorite if that helps and I prefer skin scents so I use roller balls.)'], 'author': u'victoriarita ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I smell like a sophisticated flower', 'text': [u'honestly this scent kind of reminds me of Happy by Clinique, although they are not really similar. it\'s a bit dark but still has a hint of flower which i love! this is the first perfume that i\'ve gotten compliments on by passersby (which is usually great and not creepy at all)'], 'author': u'jezza47 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'It took me some time to decide on what perfume I wanted. This is definitely a good choice. I like it better than the black one. The scent stays on me pretty much all day.'], 'author': u'HEasley ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'clean scent', 'text': [u'I found that this perfume made me smell clean and fresh Vs. Floral despite of it being advertised as such. The scent did last on me about 6hrs before I had to reapply later in the afternoon to go out. I also got asked a lot by my fellow coworkers what scent I was wearing and if they could spritz some on when I brought it into work. I would say this scent was great purchase.'], 'author': u'tofuhippie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Tory Burch Absolu
reviews: {'title': u'New favorite!', 'text': [u'I\'m one of those women who are very picky about their fragrances. I hate sickeningly sweet florals, too masculine musks, and anything that smells like a dessert. I really love how this is not too feminine and not too masculine, it\'s just right. I can never resist sniffing those perfume samples that come in magazines, and so glad I tried this one. It is sheer perfection, very good for daily wear, and never overwhelms. I have a worn Eau de Merveilles by Hermes for the last 10 years, and currently replaced it with this fragrance. Tori, please do a rollerball version in this scent!'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-08-26'], 'location': u'Memphis, TN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Just No.', 'text': [u'I got this as a sample. I am sure glad that I did. Because as soon as I put it on, I wished that I hadn\'t. This smelled straight up like I had just put on bug spray. Even after a 9 hour work day the smell was still there. Bug spray is not the scent that I was going for.'], 'author': u'Elbow0043 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-21'], 'location': u'Minneapolis, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Just what I was looking for', 'text': [u'I don\'t typically write reviews for scents because I\'m terrible at describing them but also they are extremely personal and therefore relative. That said, I have been looking for a new scent for over a year now and must have tested almost everything that Sephora currently has to offer, without success. I wanted something new and interesting that I could wear daily. I tend to go for fragrances that have staying power but aren\'t overwhelming, as strong fragrances give me headaches and I\'d rather have a subtle fresh scent than have my perfume announcing my presence. I also prefer a fresh mix of floral and spicy and am not a fan of anything powdery or overly sweet. I am so glad I gave this a try as it is exactly what I had in mind. I purchased the larger bottle and am very happy that I did. For reference, I have most recently worn and enjoyed are Cartier Baser Vole and Maison Martin Margiela Beach Walk.'], 'author': u'hipmomof3 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'lasts and is stunning but$$$$', 'text': [u'I\'ve been wearing this perfume for about 6 months and I have received numerous compliments on it. I was asked which perfume I was wearing 4 hours (and lots of travel) after applying this perfume!! It is on the pricey side. Thus, only 4 stars. But it does smell so wonderful!!!'], 'author': u'EmLish ', 'date': [u'2016-07-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love Love Love', 'text': [u'Got this as a gift with the lotion too and I\'m in love. The scent is not to strong and not to sweet right in the middle. Last almost all dayWould definitely recommend'], 'author': u'NudeDiva ', 'date': [u'2016-07-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Nirvana Black
reviews: {'title': u'THE Definition of a Sexy Perfume.', 'text': [u'I\'ve always been a vanilla kinda girl, but this.. I have nothing that even remotely smells like this or have I smelled anything that smells like this. When I first put the rollerball on.. I bought it because of my dedication to vanilla scents... but never really picked it up again.. but I gave it another shot and maybe it\'s the changing season (to Fall, my fave.. I\'m basic. Whatever). I LOVE IT. Purchased the 1.7 mL bottle ASAP. It\'s so intriguing and sexy and strong. This scent exudes sexiness and dries down to a comforting creamy vanilla. Literally.. it\'s like rolling around in the softest cashmere blanket in front of a fireplace with your man/woman with sweet nothings being whispered into your ear. It\'s heaven. Plus, the bottle is freaking CUTE. It stands out on my dresser of glass bottles.'], 'author': u'BrianaMae ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Staten Island, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Heavenly', 'text': [u'I smelled Nirvana Black for the first time from a magazine insert. As soon as I smelled it I knew I had to have it. Nirvana Black has got to be one of the most Heavenly fragrances I have ever had the pleasure of experiencing.. Since my purchase (which was 2 days after my first sniff from the insert) Nirvana Black has become one of my everyday fragrances.'], 'author': u'loverofperfumes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A little Disppointed in the lasting power', 'text': [u'Nirvana Black is a pretty, sexy and sensual scent all in one. HOWEVER, for the price, I was ver disappointed in it\'s lack of lasting power. It does not last long at all. After an hour the scent is nonexistent. I have to carry the bottle in my purse so that i can reapply throughout the day.'], 'author': u'CityBelle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'pretty and spicy', 'text': [u'I was surprised by how much I liked this. I never gravitate toward scents with vanilla in them. This one translates to a hint of vanilla on me so I don\'t mind it. It\'s a beautiful scent. I don\'t like clouds of perfume so I use the rollerball--which I need for this one because it starts off very strong. Lovely.'], 'author': u'victoriarita ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'This is hands down my go to purfume, I use it everyday!'], 'author': u'zoiemarie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Black Opium Dry Oil For Body and Hair
reviews: {'title': u'I love this!', 'text': [u'I like the opium perfume but this isn\'t as instense or strong smelling. It\'s softer smelling and leaves me smelling great but not with an overpowering bam! Compliments the perfume but definitely perferable if your wanting A softer cozier scent. Also, i spray a bit in my hand then run them threw my hair to avoid an oil overload.'], 'author': u'nattygam ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': u'Waldeck, sk', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Do you smell anything at all?', 'text': [u'Worse Sephora purchase ever. This oil does not do absolutely anything for 60 dollars - I was so disappointed. There is not the faintest scent, might as well used any hair dry oil. I had heard wonderful things about Black Opium. You should only try personally before buying. Never again.'], 'author': u'keykey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"not my fav but it's good", 'text': [u'The oil is kinda too oily for my thin hair and the smell is too throng for me. Other people may love it'], 'author': u'nadyawen ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Most favorite scent ever!', 'text': [u'I tried this dry oil on a crazy whim because I love the scent so much. Well haven\'t looked back since. Absolutely love it but most importantly my hair looks amazing with this with the added bonus of my favorite scent in my hair. I had zero expectations for it on levels outside of olfactory. Every time I use this the compliments on how healthy + shiny my hair looks (this is despite swimming 3-5 times a week) don\'t stop. My friend claims I have "mermaid hair" hahaha! I didn\'t care for it on my body/skin though.', u'Star for hair softnessStar for shininess Star for non-greasinessStar for the addictive welcoming scent'], 'author': u'aly79 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': u'Dallas, Texas', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love this product -- the body oil works well to sooth dry skin and the smell is subtle, yet sophisticated.'], 'author': u'Mary300 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Elgin, Illinois', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Black Opium Shimmering Moisture Fluid For The Body
reviews: {'title': u"maybe it's just me...", 'text': [u'I was so excited to get this....but then was disappointed with the smell and the shimmer. I don\'t think it smells like the perfume at all. And it doesn\'t have much of a shimmer to me. I hate it because I really wanted to like it after the positive reviews. :('], 'author': u'dentalrn ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Delicate & perfect for layering', 'text': [u'A delicate lotion version of the scent that works well on its own or layered with your Black Opium perfume. The \'shimmer\' is an extremely fine pink micro glitter that gives just a hint of shine.'], 'author': u'LyraB ', 'date': [u'2016-05-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Smells like the perfume', 'text': [u'Some lotions let you down but this one smells just like the original perfume scent and I like that it is a big tube bottle (even though the price tag is also high) so I feel like it will last a long time. It does have glittery shiny speckles in the lotion to give your skin a summer glow. That isn\'t normally my thing but it looks great on the neck and chest! Highly addictive scent I have the perfume and hair oil and now the lotion and I hope they make a shower gel or bath powder because this is my absolute favorite perfume! (I also use PRADA Candy, Dolce & Gabbana Pour Femme, Marc Jacobs Daisy, Christian Dior Hypnotic Posion, and Chanel coco mademoiselle... But this is my favorite now)'], 'author': u'LaylaKitten ', 'date': [u'2016-05-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Liliana
reviews: {'title': u'like it a lot!!!', 'text': [u'I actually really like Lilianna, especially for the summer months. What\'s super fun is that it does actually evoke the feel & smell of a crisp glass of Veuve cliquot :)'], 'author': u'champagnebubble ', 'date': [u'2016-02-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great to layer', 'text': [u'Liliana has many of the same notes as some of todays top fragrances: Italian Bergamot, Gardenia, Sandalwood and Musk...however, without quite their silage. So, to get the most out of this fragrance--which, on my skin turns a hint spicy on the dry down--I layer it with the accompanying hand cream, which is rich with Shea butter; or for even more depth, I layer it with Tom Fords Black Orchid emulsion. Outside of that, Liliana is not a very long lasting, stand alone fragrance.'], 'author': u'diva111 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very fresh, and my name!', 'text': [u'I really love Tocca scents, and was looking for the perfect one to take home. What are the chances that the best scent for me is actually the same name as mine?! I rarely say it was meant to be, but it was totally meant to be.', u'This is such a lovely, light fragrance. I love spritzing it right out of the shower. It\'s very fresh, and perfect for the day. The top notes are fruity, and it\'s supported by some nice floral middle notes. My only complaint is that it\'s not quite held together enough by base notes. I wish it was slightly muskier or had a little but more woodsy-ness, and it doesn\'t last quite as long as I\'d like. Overall, though, it\'s a wonderful, refreshing scent.'], 'author': u'LilFM ', 'date': [u'2015-06-22'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Floral Woods', 'text': [u'This is the perfect scent for me! I love the floral and woody notes in this fragrance. It\'s by far my favorite scent so far.'], 'author': u'KimberAnn00 ', 'date': [u'2015-02-16'], 'location': u'Bucyrus, Kansas', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'pretty good', 'text': [u'This came in a Tocca fragrance collection kit I purchased. Top notes remind me of a Jamba Juice orange mango smoothie. It then turns into a green, fresh, crisp scent. There\'s nothing wow about this but it\'s not bad either.'], 'author': u'summersaidhello ', 'date': [u'2015-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Wool Travel Spray
reviews: {'title': u'Sweater weather!', 'text': [u'So this was a blund buy for me, and I am pleasantly surprised to say I love it! It really does remind of me cozy sweaters, a cup of tea and sitting by the fire. It is soft spicy-not strong or a headache trigger at all. It fades quite nicely while not hiding the perfume\'s notes. A great buy!'], 'author': u'MeliBee94 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this scent...', 'text': [u'I purchased the Wool scent with the Whiskey scent to wear independently as well as mixed and I have not been disappointed in the least. I love them both... can\'t wait to try and purchase more.'], 'author': u'arit ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Belmont, Massachusetts', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great unisex scent', 'text': [u'This perfume is the first I\'ve found that I actually feel works well with my natural smell. I can\'t wear anything that smells sweet because with my body chemistry they lean WAY too sweet. Unfortunately those are the only smells I enjoy. This one isn\'t too sweet, but still a little sweet, very warm and fresh and inviting.'], 'author': u'AnitaOman ', 'date': [u'2016-04-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'lovely', 'text': [u'Simply lovely! Wasn\'t sure I would like it, but i LOVE it!Very warm and delicious'], 'author': u'agws ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': u'glenwood springs, co', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'clean fresh yet sexy', 'text': [u'I love this fragrance for summer! I also like that this is small and easy to throw in my bag or car for quick pick me ups on the go'], 'author': u'naturebeautylov ', 'date': [u'2016-02-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'only like the top note', 'text': [u'I totally love the top note. However on my skin chemistry it bloomed into something heavier and muskier than I wanted.'], 'author': u'hiltzy ', 'date': [u'2016-01-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Simone Rollerball
reviews: {'title': u'absolutely love', 'text': [u'The smell is amazing, and it lasts all day.'], 'author': u'MsVanwolf ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Doesn't wear well (on me)", 'text': [u'I loved, loved, loved the scent of this in store and and had it on for about half an hour before purchasing. Unfortunately, today after wearing it an entire work day, I realized it just doesn\'t work that well with my personal body chemistry. It becomes very earthy smelling and heavier and that wasn\'t what I wanted from this product. I\'ll be returning. I\'m sad, it still smells amazing when I first apply and in the bottle.'], 'author': u'Audralou ', 'date': [u'2016-09-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SexxiFresh', 'text': [u'Absolutely love this fragrance that stays on All day. Made the entire room smell delicious. So many complements'], 'author': u'GirlnameTrish ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Does not last on skin long', 'text': [u'I was debating or not to get this scent because I really loved it but it just did not seem to last on my skin long (only 1-2 hours). I give it a 5 for such a beautiful fresh scent but a 3 because it only lasted for, at most, 2 hours on my skin before I would need to reapply.', u'I also tried a sample in a bottle from Sephora but it\'s the same result. It could just be that the scent and my skin don\'t mix?'], 'author': u'VickieC ', 'date': [u'2016-05-03'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gorgeous', 'text': [u'I recieved a sample in my play box, and oh my goodness! It reminds me of something from my childhood and I love it! It\'s a very sweet rose and not musky at all. It\'s very light almost like rosewater. I think this is a perfect daytime fragrance for warmer weather or running errands. It\'s not a sexy fragrance. It\'s more sweet delicate and pure. I will probably buy the small spray for my purse.'], 'author': u'crazyaboutbeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-03-25'], 'location': u'Cincy', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Nirvana Black Solid Perfume Compact
reviews: {'title': u'Shh! Best secret ever!', 'text': [u'This is a great product for travelling. No need to worry about perfume leaking or evaporating. I just love the incredible scent. This is the best kept secret in perfumes!'], 'author': u'dasher13 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': u'Surrey,BC, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'perfect', 'text': [u'this is great! i had an older perfume compact and couldnt find a replacement for my handbag. this it it Great idea for bridemaids gifts, your whole wedding will smell wonderful'], 'author': u'bornctc ', 'date': [u'2016-05-17'], 'location': u'Greenwich CT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Honestly I love this. I picked one up in stores because it\'s been out of stock online for a while. The scent payoff is good, but you need to make sure to get a decent amount of product. The oils heat and blend with my skin well and on me it has a nice soft vanilla dry down and I adore it!'], 'author': u'gutterbrain ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Indulgent', 'text': [u'I\'m going to be completely honest here...I don\'t need this product.', u'I have the rollerball version of Nirvana Black and the scent is heavenly. Its definitely muskier than White, but in a good way. I\'m not good at explaining scents.', u'The reason I bought this solid perfume is because I wanted to treat myself to an indulgent product. The packaging is perfection. This little box is smaller than a credit card, but boy is it heavy! I like that it weighs more than you expect, it makes it feel solid and high quality. The inside has a nice mirror on the top and the perfume on the bottom.', u'It is kind of awkward to try to put the perfume on my wrist, and trying to put it on my finger and then transfer it does not work well. Also, the scent doesn\'t last as long as the liquid version of the product.', u'However, I still give this 5 stars because I like having it sitting on my desk. It looks nice, and sometimes I\'ll just open it so that I can smell it and put it back. It\'s not the most practical beauty product I own, but it is still one of my favorites.'], 'author': u'Lefingebi ', 'date': [u'2015-12-07'], 'location': u'Williamsburg, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'Love the packaging.I like that the compact is heavy and not flimsy.The scent is great, but is not a dupe for the actual perfume.It doesn\'t nearly smell as strong as the bottle.'], 'author': u'amanda1012 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Nirvana White Solid Perfume Compact
reviews: {'title': u'An eye catcher', 'text': [u'It sure looks cute to have in your bag. However.. It is heavy, such a small amount and the fragrance is NOT strong.I read comments that it was a strong scent and not to use too much, but i find it to be the opposite.The scent lingers for less than 30 minutes and then evaporates, please don\'t waste your money and just get the rollerball. {'title': u'not so good', 'text': [u'This is my go-to fragrance so I just had to have it in every form it comes in! The solid perfume is no bueno. {'title': u'Southern Summer Bottled', 'text': [u'Having not cared for Lilliana or Stella, I resigned myself to life without adorable Tocca bottles and their absurdly cheap minis until I received a sample of Emelia. Every note listed is was right up my alley so I tried a tiny spray and took a sniff; soon half the sample spritzer was gone! Emelia is the equivalent of bottling a Deep South summer. It\'s top notes are bright green without being sharp or sour, there\'s an aquatic fruitiness (not a perfume writer but I\'m trying), white florals, and a gorgeous creamy base. The blend is beautifully executed and the longevity is as expected. This is a unique perfume but, as another reviewer noted, it also reminds me of a more feminine version of Atelier\'s Figuier Ardent while being much more affordable. There\'s also similarities to Sud Magnolia, which is one of my summer favorites. I can\'t think of a reason not to try Emelia if you\'re in the market for a new perfume; it\'s definitely a great deal while sharing little with the perfumes dominating sales counters and flyers this spring/summer.'], 'author': u'Amanda2413 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Eehh', 'text': [u'Nothing like the description. Smells mediocre - no distinctive layers. If it had been a magazine insert, I\'d have discarded it without a second thought. {'title': u'Warm, smoky goodness', 'text': [u'I love this scent. I have two other Commodity scents (Gold and Book) and am so glad that I checked out Whiskey recently, as it is delicious on its own and adds a lot layered with either Gold or Book.', u'Whiskey is a somewhat masculine scent, but to me it smells more like a men\'s fragrance that\'s been re-imagined for women, with the masculine elements muted way down. On me the amber and cinnamon are most evident, with hints of the mahogany and oak. I don\'t detect much of the listed citrus or herbal notes, but that might just be my chemistry. This scent to me is way softer and less masculine than something like MM \'Replica\' Jazz Club, which I also own.', u'Lasts about 12 hours on me, but stays close to the skin. I would happily wear this during the day, though it is extra nice as a date night/going out fragrance, especially layered with Gold. My usual day-to-day scent is Atelier Vanille Insensee, another warm, unisex scent, but I will happily mix in Whiskey sometimes for variety, since it\'s lovely and not overly intense on me.'], 'author': u'cityprof ', 'date': [u'2016-07-09'], 'location': u'Illinois', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Very liight, perfect for spring/summer', 'text': [u'I am not a huge fragrance girl. For the last three+ years, I\'ve pretty much stuck to the same light body spray or lotion every day. I hate anything that smells too strong and perfume-y. Since I have been in a fragrance rut, I decided to force myself to try a new scent this spring. I opted for this, because it was described as light and citrus-y. ', u'When I first sprayed it in the air, I was not a fan. I was picking up a little too many floral notes, which I hate. Despite this, I decided to give it a try on my skin, and LOVE it. On my skin, I really pick up the citrus notes. My boyfriend, who also hates strong fragrances and has only ever smelled me with my go-to body spray, actually noticed the difference. He said I smelled amazing, and asked what it was called. When I said it was called "mimosa," his response was "oh my gosh, it smells just like a mimosa! I love it!"', u'After that reaction, it\'s safe to say that this scent is a keeper. I\'m taking away one star because it isn\'t the most long-lasting scent I\'ve worn, but I can live with respritzing after a few hours. I\'m looking forward to trying more scents from the Commodity line to mix and match with this new staple!'], 'author': u'paleinwi ', 'date': [u'2016-05-06'], 'location': u'Minneapolis, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: 03 Amber Vanilla
reviews: {'title': u'smells like Christmas!', 'text': [u'I don\'t know why, but this smells like Xmas to me. Vanilla and amber are go-to\'s for me, but this particular blend is amazing for whatever reason. Very warm, comfortable (if that were a scent). I wish Sephora would carry larger sizes of this brand, but I have to say I love how they are branching out with the brands they carry! Always something new :)'], 'author': u'avner ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Couldn't leave it behind!", 'text': [u'I came into the store to re-up on a moisturizer and spent a little time smelling fragrances. This one I picked upon a whim and loved it so much that I had to buy it, even though it was not in the budget. It\'s much simpler than the many other amber and/or vanilla fragrances I own, but not in an overly sugary way. Just warm and inviting. I can see wearing this every day in the winter, and often even in the summer. Love that it\'s an oil--reminds me of my college and grad school days wearing natural fragrance oils, but this one smells and wears better than anything I wore back then. Will definitely keep in the rotation and replace when I run out.'], 'author': u'cityprof ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u'love', 'text': [u'Great shade for my chocolat face! Highly pigmented and perfect shine.'], 'author': u'ellojello ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Black Up Lipstick is the best', 'text': [u'I purchased two colors of BlackUp lipstick--and I adore both colors. And, let me assure you: these colors are not "just for Black women." The fact of the matter is that, while BlackUp\'s colors may look very much like similar colors from other brands, this line has somehow managed to engineer these colors to fit the multi-color undertones unique to darker skin. ', u'I purchased 24, a deep pinkish purple in a satin/cream finish. This color is almost like a mix of raspberry and plum--definitely purple, but with a hint of berry thrown in. The texture is so comfortable--even though it does tend to transfer. Unlike other brands, this brand has no fragrance.', u'I later purchased 38M, a very fun and bright lavender plum. While this color is bright, it is by no means neon and can be toned down quite nicely with a brown lip pencil. I was surprised by how matte this lipstick became within a few moments. The texture is comfortable (a little bit stiff, but that\'s to be expected), not at all sticky, and applies evenly.', u'It\'s so exciting that Sephora has BlackUp because I internet stalked the company for years. At least go into a Sephora the next time you\'re in the neighborhood and try out this wonderful line.'], 'author': u'KawaiiFeeniqx ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'The lipstick color is absolutely gorgeous and looks amazing in photos! However, the packaging leave a lot to desired, especially considering the packaging of the competition. Also, the lipstick broke after only a couple of days of use which was disappointing. The color could stay a little longer, but it wasn\'t too bad.'], 'author': u'DomoBeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-06-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'the color is nice, but it doesn\'t have any staying power. also the packaging seems pretty cheap for the price. i have had black lipsticks that were a dollar and have better packing then these.'], 'author': u'jessieleigh2794 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-07'], 'location': u'hillsborough, nj', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'My first visit to a Sephora store', 'text': [u'June3,2016 was my first visit to a Sephora store and my first time purchasing one of your products. I visited the Cumberland mall store.The sales associate was very friendly and helpful. In fact all the associates were very upbeat and polite. I purchased a lipstick by blackup and am very pleased with your free samples program with any purchase. I also found me a new fragrance which i will purchase on my next visit. And i saw some beautiful eyeshadow that i will purchase also. I enrolled in your beauty insider program which i am already liking very much. Thanks Cumberland Mall store and associates for making Sephora one of my favorite stores.'], 'author': u'msjuicyjazz ', 'date': [u'2016-06-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
