{'title': u'Elegant Scent', 'text': [u'This fragrance isn\'t my favorite out of the NEST line, but I definitely have used an entire bottle. It is very elegant and feminine- a little too girly for me to wear every day. I usually dislike powdery fragrances but I do like this one. The floral notes linger throughout use. Stay power isn\'t amazing, but unfortunately most NEST perfumes do not last very long.'], 'author': u'Jmango ', 'date': [u'2016-08-01'], 'location': u'Sherman Oaks, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I layer this with the Verde perfume from NEST and the combination is truly amazing!'], 'author': u'Mushu77 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sweet and Elegant', 'text': [u'I was in the store searching for a new fragrance and this line stuck out to me with the bottles being all black with a color pop of flowers. I tried 2 of them the purple and the pink and asked for a sample. I very quickly fell in love with the Dahlia & Vines! Its floral but dries down to smell sweet almost reminding me of childhood cotton candy & barbie perfume but in an adult essence. My boyfriend complements me every time I wear this. I bought the bottle 3 days later and wear it ever time we have date night! A must have for a girly girl!'], 'author': u'PlatinumMua ', 'date': [u'2016-07-06'], 'location': u'Albany, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Two Way Cake
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I personally like this product, Its definitely pigmented, little goes a long way on my end. I use this strictly for contour/bronzer. I like the orange tone to it so it doesnt leave my fave flat. I actually use this in conjunction with the satiny/highlighter products from Black Up. I use this strictly as a shadow for my contours. I havent used it wet, but I notice this product isnt nice when layered over 2 to 3 times. Emphasizes pores and scars after that. I like that it blends well.'], 'author': u'queenkhia ', 'date': [u'2016-04-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Still Supporting', 'text': [u'I was thrilled that Sephora had a line that had shades closer to my complexion. This line had great variations of brown hues.The product is slightly disappointing. If you choose to apply the cake in a dry powder form then it has light coverage with little variations in pigment. Meaning that it doesn\'t have the mix of lighter pigments and darker pigments included like my previous powder. This powder is monochromatic so it doesn\'t enhance variations of shades in my face. No one is one total shade. We all have light and dark areas.If you choose to use this product in the wet form then forget about it. It will "cake" up on you and clump. That was disappointing.I will still support the Brand\'s line of cosmetics. I just will not repurchase the "Two Way Cake".'], 'author': u'WhatPrettyDoes ', 'date': [u'2016-02-17'], 'location': u'Las Vegas', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Really Good Multi-Use Product', 'text': [u'First of all, let me say that I LOVE the concept of this brand! I have tried two products, the Two Way Cake and the Full Coverage Complexion Cream and both are stunning! I\'m about an NC42/NC43ish and I\'m TW02 in the Two Way Cake and HC03 the Full Coverage Complexion Cream - both match my medium-medium tan olive skin tone gorgeously. The Two Way Cake does work very well at both setting liquid foundation as well as for a powder foundation - though I prefer it for a powder foundation since I usually set my liquids with translucent powders. It\'s not too creamy nor is it too dry, so I think it\'ll suit many skin types. Built-up I would say it\'s a medium-high coverage. The only slight issue I have with it is that it does oxidize quite a a shade or so. Besides that I think it\'s beautiful!'], 'author': u'NabihaYusufali ', 'date': [u'2016-01-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'thank god', 'text': [u'I lucked up one day and asked a friend what makeup she used and she reached in her purse and showed me this brand which I had never heard of. I couldn\'t believe how flawless and natural her skin looked. I couldn\'t get to sephora fast enough. The instant I put it on, I knew that there was no turning back. Glided on easy and instantly erased my oily skin. It\'s so natural looking and light. It does transfer a bit but it\'s a small price to pay for the excellent coverage you get. I\'ll never go back to mac again.... I\'m so in LOVE right now!!! I even stocked up on some when I got a special coupon. This is grade A!'], 'author': u'phillykendall ', 'date': [u'2015-12-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'cakey/ undertones too warm', 'text': [u'I tried this powder in store. It settled so orange on me, it was crazy. Plus it doesn\'t layer well... Leaves a very cakey appearance. I\'m a 173 in MUFE HD for reference'], 'author': u'JasmineCamille ', 'date': [u'2015-12-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Brilliant Color!', 'text': [u'Beautiful Hues is the first description that comes to mind!! Wow, the colors are incredible! The shades are represented well on Sephora.com\'s site, which is often not the case. Not Sephora\'s fault necessarily just the way color is reproduced on line and in photos...OK, back to the shadow! Love the way it applies so easily, the colors just pop and they last all day without fading...with a shadow primer used prior to application. I cant think of any other brands, at the moment that I can say honestly offers such an all around fantastic shadow!!! Going to purchase more of my favorite colors, just in case they get discontinued any time soon. LM really created a great product in these Baked Eye Colors!!'], 'author': u'kathleenbp ', 'date': [u'2016-02-23'], 'location': u'Northeastern California', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Gorgeous Colors', 'text': [u'I ordered these in the shades Child and Truth. Child is a light nude (similar to MAC Boy Bait) and Truth is a medium rose color. I absolutely love Truth. Neither of the shades are comletely opaque but they are quite pigmented. High shine, not overly sticky. The staying power was only about one to two hours for me. For nearly $30 it should last a but longer, which is the reason for four stars instead of five.'], 'author': u'catterpie ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great lip gloss', 'text': [u'The best I\'ve tried ! Not sticky, shines and hydrates. The colour truth is very natural, wear it alone or on top of your favourite lipstick.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'Quebec', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u"it's great.", 'text': [u'So I hate lipstick, lip gloss, lip sheen, Etc. I\'m that type of person who licks their lips and bites too much to keep any color or gloss on them adequately. When I tried this on in the store, I noticed how it felt almost like a Chapstick. It was very moisturizing which I feel I don\'t get from a lot of lip glosses. It also didn\'t feel heavy like a gloss. It gave me a pop of color without being too vibrant (I was aiming for something natural). I liked it enough to splurge on the price and I\'m glad I did. It keeps your lips soft and glossy without being heavy. I have a habit of licking my lips too much but I feel with this, I can develop a habit of not doing so. I know I won\'t have to worry about my lips feeling moisturizer with this on. Def worth it and can\'t wait to try more color with this brand.'], 'author': u'theRougeClient7 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Dahlia & Vines Body Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Best body cream ever', 'text': [u'Thick, fragrant, luxurious, and sinks into the skin. I have this and Midnight Fleur.'], 'author': u'DCGinger ', 'date': [u'2015-11-14'], 'location': u'Washington, DC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A rich indulgence', 'text': [u'It\'s pricy for body lotion, but a nice after-bath (or shower) indulgence and it is packed with the "good stuff\' near the top of the ingredient list (like shea butter, aloe, grape seed oil, and and vitamin E). The cream is very rich and thick and very emollient, so a little seems to go a long way, which is a good thing, as it\'s pretty costly. I love this particular scent and carry the rollerball in my purse as my go-to fragrance. The body cream is a nice boost. When I slather some on right before bed, I fall asleep in the subtle fragrance and it\'s a nice, sensory indulgence (if not a sensuous one as well). It may even help me fall asleep faster!'], 'author': u'lesliesara ', 'date': [u'2015-06-04'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Black Label Detox BB Beauty Balm
reviews: {'title': u'not what i expected', 'text': [u'i purchased this product looking for an easy-application, skin-benefiting product to replace foundation for casual, daily use. the first issue i have with this product is lack of tint, which is crazy, as i have pale skin (burn in the sun, freckles everywhere type of pale). after application, my face had a very washed-out, lifeless look. when i tried to build the product to cover blemishes, it turned a strange green-grey colorthe product was much thicker than i any BB cream i\'ve tried before, making the application a little uneven and the resulting texture on my face seeming tacky or goopy. which turned out to be more than a feeling- i was walking to work, the wind kicked up dirt, and all the little specks of dirt that had flown at me stuck to the BB cream. it also seemed that the creamy density caused the product to highlight any flaws in my skin- larger pores, dry bits, protruding blackheads. this product was also very difficult remove at the end of the day. i use make-up removing oils to cleanse, and had to wash at least twice to get all the BB cream off my face.i tried the product for a full week to see if my experience would change, but knew that it would be a return after two days of use.'], 'author': u'bunnyhug ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'chicago, il', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A MUST HAVE', 'text': [u'I have been using this for years and I absolutely love it. I have dry and oily skin and this works well with both of them!'], 'author': u'rachelw8119 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this BB', 'text': [u'I have been wearing this brand of BB Cream for a few years. Full coverage. Not dry looking.'], 'author': u'bethpetez1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Simi Valley, CA.', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dr. Jart+ Black Label Detox BB -simple perfection', 'text': [u'I was amazed at how quickly this became my "go-to" everyday BB. This stuff certainly lives up to its claims. However strange it may appear when first applied, the results are nearly flawless after a couple of moments to rest on the skin. This BB evens skin tone, adds enough of a glow without being oily, doesn\'t settle in fine lines and lasts all day with a little Guerlain Meteorites to set. I am back for more of this little gem. If it appears gray, give it a couple of moments and it calms down to look beautifully natural. I put this on first so it has time to set while I finish my look of the day, giving it just the time it needs to transform into a simply perfect complexion.'], 'author': u'jlibbyb ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Charleston, SC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I find it goes on best with a moisturizing primer underneath and using a Beauty Blender to apply. Applying with the fingers just doesn\'t work for me. A little goes a long way.'], 'author': u'catiecake ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'san jose, ca', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Lip Tar - Matte
reviews: {'title': u'Converted me to lip color!', 'text': [u'I bought a stained gloss in the lip tar line -- it was an impulse buy from the Sephora checkout line -- and it made me a lip color convert. In general, I cannot stand the feel of lipstick, or the need to reapply it, or the fact that it comes of on everything. This product in a thin application goes on easily (I have no skills) doesn\'t need a liner, and stays color all day with no reapplication. It does fade a bit but not as much as typical lipstick. I also bought a couple as a present for a friend who wears hers much thicker and she is also in love with it. I am really disappointed that Sephora has discontinued carrying the line.'], 'author': u'raye215 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-30'], 'location': u'Philadelphia PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'CUTE ..... BUT.....', 'text': [u'Very happy I only purchased this for $9 and not regular $18 price. Had to reapply 3 times during a 7am - 3:15 pm day. Didn\'t eat and the product STILL faded/disappeared. Only a stain was left on lips. Did not use a liner and this lipstick was shifting all OVER my lips. I would have been HAPPIER if this product was $5 !!! The color is amazing but this product does NOT WORK 4 ME!! will use this product to run errands.'], 'author': u'8pERRYLAND1 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-04'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'awful lip product', 'text': [u'This lip tar is the worst product I have ever used on my lips. It\'s super sticky & goes on very thick. {'title': u'Unbeatable', 'text': [u'This is absolutely THE BEST eyeshadow palette I\'ve ever owned. I got the olive greens, and they are beyond gorgeous. The greens are the perfect shades because they\'re definitely distinguishable from the browns but not outrageous and costume-y. Very flattering. I wish they made these palettes in more colors!'], 'author': u'melissalld ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'Dayton, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Nice Coverage!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using the Light-Medium for about a month now. The yellow side is for around the eye area and the peach is for blemishes and dark spots, etc. I love the peach corrector under my Amazing Concealer. The combination of the two make my skin look flawless. As for the yellow corrector, I find that it doesn\'t apply as smoothly as I would like. I find myself pulling on the delicate eye area to get the product to smooth out. So I will continue to use the peach end and try to work with the yellow end maybe mixed with other products that will make this corrector glide more gently around the eye area.'], 'author': u'frankie62 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': u'Lake Villa, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bad Packaging, Decent Product', 'text': [u'I would have given the actual concealer 4 stars, it provides a natural medium coverage, and is a really good match for my skin. It also did not look cakey on my very dry skin. I used this mostly to cover some imperfections on my skin, rather than highlighting (doesn\'t anyone use concealer to actually conceal anymore?), and it worked well, but I would have liked a little better coverage. Also, since its a stick, its hard to use it for spot concealing. I took off another 2 stars though because after less than a week, the turn mechanism broke, and the concealer wouldn\'t come up anymore. I can still use it by sticking a concealer brush into the tube, or I can depot it, but seriously? For $34 I expect the packaging not to fail after less than a week. I would exchange this, but hate to waste the product. For a luxury bland like Hourglass, I expect much better.'], 'author': u'pinkypenguin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'love this!', 'text': [u'I love the great coverage that this gives me. I will be using this for a long time!'], 'author': u'aggiegirl06 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is, hands down, the best concealer I\'ve used. I made it through 29.5 years of life with barely any pimples, but I\'ve had some mild adult acne develop in the last six months, and this has been a game-changer. I\'ve only been using it for a week but am happy with coverage and staying power. I don\'t wear foundation or other heavier makeups so was a bit put off by the texture, but I really only notice it at time of application. Blends seamlessly and works so well that I don\'t even need to use a green-toned color corrector before applying.'], 'author': u'NSkwared ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'super volumizing!', 'text': [u'I never buy mascara from sephora, I always stick with drugstore mascaras in hopes of finding a cheap holy grail without breaking bank. I have very fine and short eyelashes that I apply at least 3-4 layers of mascara before I\'m completely satisfied. I got this as a sample and decided to try it and oh my goodness is it AMAZING! I still apply 3-4 layers because I love dramatic lashes, but this mascara is perfect for those days you don\'t feel like putting on eye liner or shadow. It makes my lashes look just a little bit longer than they actually are, but it really makes the base of my lashes look fuller because of how thick the product actually is. It has not been clumpy for me, and actually separates them due to the bristles on the brush. I always rip off extra product to prevent my lashes from getting clumpy. Overall I love this thing and get so excited to put it on everyday! I will be purchasing!'], 'author': u'kakidee ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'just no', 'text': [u'I got this stuff as a sample and I liked it the first time. All the times after made my lashes SUPER clumpy and stick together. Hard pass on buying this full size'], 'author': u'christin2lee5 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'No more oily-lid-caused raccoon eyes! It doesn\'t lift and create huge volume, but it defines and lines and is easily buildable - two coats does it for me. name: Pro Flat Liner Brush #25
reviews: {'title': u'Loved Once I Angled It!', 'text': [u'This brush, at $11, is a great price! I lost my long time, go-to, brow brush. So I purchased several brow brushes to compare. This one was the best!1. The bristles are strong, which keeps them in the exact spot I want on my eyebrows. I have thinner brows, so I didn\'t want bristles that were too fine.I even cut the bristles to make the brush an angled brush, which I was nervous about. But, since the bristles are so sturdy, cutting them didn\'t compromise the integrity of the bristles.2. I like that this brush is a bit wider than the Anastasia Beverly Hills brush # 15. The ABH brush had shorter bristles, and they tended to bend with the pressure of applying to the brow line. The Sephora # 25 brush didn\'t bend, and I can turn the brush sideways to fill in the thicker areas of my brows.'], 'author': u'valstar001 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': u'Salt Lake City, Utah', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I really like this brush, and I actually use it to contour my nose. It gives a very neat, precise line. I\'ve had it for quite a while now, and it\'s held up nicely.'], 'author': u'MissSarah03 ', 'date': [u'2015-05-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great brush for lashline', 'text': [u'I have to say - this brush works great for getting on the lash line. For whatever reason, I have issues with getting liners directly on the line, but this brush makes that so much easier. Done right, the liner makes my lashes look much fuller and this brush speeds up the application.'], 'author': u'IEDucksfan ', 'date': [u'2015-04-30'], 'location': u'IE California', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not as good as the other brushes', 'text': [u'for some reason i think this brush is slightly too sharp'], 'author': u'gurlilla ', 'date': [u'2015-02-02'], 'location': u'NY, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Bristles do NOT soften with use and washing', 'text': [u'I prefer not reviewing a product harshly since opinions are subjective. The bristles on this liner brush are as hard as a scrub or hair brush. That\'s a fact, not an opinion. I didn\'t return it because I\'ve been pleased with every other Sephora brush and thought a couple washings would do the trick. They didn\'t. I\'ve tried to use it over and over again, thinking maybe it was me...that I just didn\'t know how to use this type of liner brush...that\'s how much I wanted it to work. Please don\'t buy this with the expectation it will soften. If you like coarse, hard bristles for your eyelids, do buy this.'], 'author': u'arise ', 'date': [u'2015-01-06'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I honestly have never used Kevin Aucoin before and I received this as gratis (CRAZY!) and I FLIPPED OUT. I\'m still flipping out now because I\'ve heard so many great things about this brand.', u'First off, if you do have a darker complexion, these colors may not work for you (as someone stated before that this would work for fair to medium complexions). I believe Kevin Aucoin has darker shades by itself if you are still interested!', u'With this palette, it comes with a cream highlighter and bronzer, a powdered bronzer and highlighter (that\'s SUPER pigmented), and four eyeshadow shades (2 shimmery, 2 matte).', u'I\'m going to honestly say that this book/palette is definitely worth the money. Everything glides on SO well and it\'s super pigmented! It\'s travel friendly if you want to take this along rather than your normal contour kits. It is on the pricier side since you are buying from a luxury brand, but I definitely recommend this!'], 'author': u'teddybotz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': u'Daly City, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'A mixed bag', 'text': [u'I have both the Pinks palette and a Black Honey Affair. The pinks aren\'t very pigmented and don\'t build or blend well - I don\'t recommend. The BHA palette, on the other hand, does build well, has good pigmentation and wears well. I like certain items from Clinique - mascara for my sensitive eyes, skincare and even lipstick. But their eye shadow game just isn\'t up to what other brands are putting out - even the Sephora eye shadows are stronger.'], 'author': u'Mango312 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not What I Call Matt', 'text': [u'If you are looking for a truly matt eye shadow, this is not the one. {'title': u'love love love this eyeliner but...', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this eyeliner! I have ver oily skin and the smudging is minimal with this eyeliner. The only reason why it\'s not five stars is because once the tip breaks off which happens fairly often, there isnt a way to get the eyeliner back up to use. Seems like a lot of people have this issue. It\'s a shame the issue hasn\'t been corrected.'], 'author': u'AWebb1986 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my everyday eyeliner!', 'text': [u'I love this eyeliner! It is my go to everyday liner. I\'ve used this for about a year now and my only complaint is that I\'ve had to repurchase it twice, because if the tip breaks lower than the top of the plastic tube, the sharpener does not work. So it\'s basically a bust if the tip breaks, but it\'s such a good liner I always go back to get another! It\'s the only pencil type of liner I can use to make a wing (wings are not just for gel and liquid!) I have the brown color that makes a nice natural look, I also have black which works well too.'], 'author': u'mandynoons ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I live in an extremely dry climate with very dry sensitive, eczema prone skin. Even after masks, toners, and serums this soaks in beautifully to my skin making it baby soft. This is a little heavy for me in the summer and feels a bit greasy but during the transition to winter it\'s beautiful. For anti-aging I can\'t really tell, I\'ve been using this since I was 23 (I\'m 27 now) and people still think I\'m 23 but that could just be genetics. For people that don\'t like the smell, it\'s made with kombucha which is fermented tea; if you don\'t like the smell of fermented food (ie. pickles, sour kraut, kim chi...etc..) you probably won\'t like the smell of this, though it\'s not a strong scent.'], 'author': u'bendybee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'FANTASTIC NIGHT CREAM FOR DRY/COMBO SKIN!', 'text': [u'I typically use night creams like La Mer, La Prairie and Aveda. I tried this in a travel set and I liked the feel of it. I purchased the full size and was quite pleased with the results! Compared to some other very high end moisturizers, I feel like this really comes close to comparison. Having dry skin in the fall/winter, this quenches the dryness and takes away the flakiness. Not for oily skin, as this really is quite rich. Overall, this is fantastic! Highly recommend.'], 'author': u'vocalvixen ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Okay, but Heavy', 'text': [u'I got this product in a 500pt perk. It actually isn\'t bad, but it is a little heavy for me. It is kind of greasy, but it does not break me out. I have trouble finding anti ageing products that don\'t break me out. This one didn\'t, but my face was left shiny. I wouldn\'t use it in the daytime. {'title': u'Impressed', 'text': [u'I was very surprised and impressed by how great their shadows are. I bought Buxom lipglosses years ago and did not like them at all! I wish they had more colorful colors, but for now they only have neutral and a couple of fun colors. They have both matte and metallics so take your pick! These shadows are very pigmented and that\' is what\'s so great about them! You can easily use these without primer. They have a very smooth finish. This palette comes with a mini eyeshadow brush. However the brush isn\'t the best quality and is made of synthetic hairs. I recommend using a different brush than the one that comes with the palette.'], 'author': u'vicmicmal ', 'date': [u'2016-05-23'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Wonderful hydration!', 'text': [u'Not oily - provides wonderful hydration morning and night!!!'], 'author': u'Rebeleigh ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'good day lotion', 'text': [u'The scent doesn\'t bother me the way it has some other reviewers... I love the texture. Light, dries quickly. I\'ve been using it in conjunction with UFO dry oil and it is going very well for day under makeup. Before bed I use a pore minimizing toner, this aqua-gel, and then layer a heavier cream such as origins night-a-mins. This system works for me, but that being said I can\'t say how it would perform on its own. I think that it helps my other products work better, but on its own it may not provide enough moisture. I have been using two pumps morning and two pumps at night for four months straight and I am only halfway through the bottle, so I do think it is a good value.'], 'author': u'pollybirdie ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Want My Deluxe Samples Back!!', 'text': [u'I amassed six deluxe sample bottles of this product, figuring I would love it. First time I finally used it, I sprayed it directly on to my hair and absolutely hated the results. Promptly gave away the other five bottles. Yesterday I tried spraying it into my hands then running the product through my hair. OMG sheer PERFECTION!!! Now I see it\'s $60 a bottle!!! {'title': u'Expensive, but it replaces all other hair products', 'text': [u'This is one of those products that you have to play around with a few times in your wet and dry hair. Once you get the right amount and technique, it\'s more than worth the money.', u'For my short, fine, thin hair, 4 short pumps is enough. The nozzle doesn\'t spray a fine mist, it\'s more like a shot of wet water. Spray once, work it in with your fingers, then spray in another area, and repeat. Like I said, it takes a few times to get it right for your hair type, length, style, etc. In the end, trust me, you\'ll be glad you took the time and patience to figure out how this product works for your hair and style.', u'While it\'s crazy expensive, you can eliminate all other products such as styling gel, mousse, hairspray,etc. So it balances out the cost. Better still, your hair will appreciate how well this product works.'], 'author': u'JJImage ', 'date': [u'2016-02-12'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Great!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for just over a week now and I\'m very happy with it. I like the coverage and the way it makes my skin look even. I really like using the wand to put the foundation on my face (then beauty blender to blend). I haven\'t\' had any problems with it oxidizing or changing weird colours once its on my face. It doesn\'t make me feel cakey and the coverage is very buildable. It\'s a great buy for what you pay, too. I\'m sure I\'ll use this for months. I use about a wand & a half of makeup to cover my face. Then set with Laura Mercier translucent powder.'], 'author': u'Megpetes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Norquay, SK', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Great for very dry, sensitive skin. Bringing my skin back to life and helping eliminate dry patches! (I also use an exfoliator and good moisturizer to assist, but this is a key part of my routine- I notice if I skip this step)', u'Not super prone to breakouts due to dry skin so not sure how it would do for oily skin.. But personally, I have not had any new breakouts since using this.'], 'author': u'LadyTremaine ', 'date': [u'2016-04-01'], 'location': u'Lafayette, LA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Best Retinol Serum On The Market', 'text': [u'I have extremely sensitive oily/dehydrated skin that reacts negatively to most skincare products and cosmetics. ', u'This product earns a 5 star rating and here are my reasons why:', u'1) This product is hydrating but does not look greasy on my oily skin. I apply it in the morning and at night. It works well under makeup.', u'2) It has completely changed the texture of my skin for the better. My skin is no longer dehydrated and it feels incredibly soft like silk. ', u'3) This serum has lightened the hyperpigmentation on my my face from acne scars and does not break me out at all. ', u'Yes, this product is expensive but it\'s one of the best over the counter retinol serums I\'ve tried.'], 'author': u'biobrunette ', 'date': [u'2016-03-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Silicones = Breakouts', 'text': [u'Yikes, I hadn\'t realized that KS made another version of this serum but this is the one that broke me out so badly. I know cones aren\'t an issue for most people so if youre one of them, please disregard my review. I wanted to love this product after reading Paula Beguon\'s raving review on it and the highly-rated reviews on Sephora\'s website but only after a few days of using this serum, my skin around my cheeks and chin started getting tiny bumps all over. I didn\'t understand why my pores were getting this clogged until I actually read the ingredient list. Seriously, how many different cones are in this product?? I find cones to be pore-clogging and this formula doesn\'t seem too special. It just seems overpriced for something that\'s mostly made up of silicones.. there are far more advanced formulas out there that\'re in the same price range'], 'author': u'tiffanyluuwho ', 'date': [u'2016-03-09'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Love!', 'text': [u'My skin has been so dry this winter, so went to Sephora and was recommended the Quench Face Serum. I love it! I use other Kate Summerville products so it was an easy choice, definitely helps hydrate my skin.'], 'author': u'JessMWright ', 'date': [u'2016-02-17'], 'location': u'Portland OR', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'great!', 'text': [u'This moisturizer has been great for me. I have very sensitive skin, and the skin under my eyes was very very dry. It combats that amazingly, and spreads nicely on the rest of my face which is less dry. I think the retinol is also improving uneven skin tone some. It feels really nice (slippery from the dimethicone which I like), and I love that it has absolutely NO SMELL WHATSOEVER. Perfume makes me sick, and I don\'t like most cosmetic smells anyways.'], 'author': u'AMB1475 ', 'date': [u'2016-02-16'], 'location': u'NY NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Vitamin C+ Serum
reviews: {'title': u'This product is genius!', 'text': [u'I obtained a deluxe sample and used every last drop; I was tempted to break the container open to see if I could salvage anything remaining, lol. In just one application, my face was brighter, my pores less visible and the texture of my skin was smoother. I wasn\'t using this in conjunction with my serum, so I attribute the results to this product. I have tried at least 20 Vit C serums and none have performed as remarkably. I haven\'t ordered a full size due to the cost and I wanted to try Algenist Elevate Firming treatment (which didn\'t work). I am so unhappy with the cost; I have a hard time spending over $100 USD on any skin care product - but I am so unhappy with my skin in the 5 days since I stopped using it. I will likely purchase it as a one-time treat until I can find something less expensive - or hope I will a lottery!'], 'author': u'ellie50 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Cary, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'worth every penny', 'text': [u'I\'m on my 2nd bottle. I have such oily breakout prone skin w bad scarring and dark marks. This brightened n lightened up the spots n got rid of my Harry Potter scar type wrinkle on my forehead like magic. No more creasing in between my eyebrows. I love the smell. The price is so sad, but until I find a better vitamin c serum. I\'ll keep buying this.'], 'author': u'yevecast ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f', 'text': [u'This serum has done wonders for my skin. My lines have diminished and my skin feels firm and smooth. When I don\'t use it, I can tell the difference immediately.'], 'author': u'molazagasti ', 'date': [u'2016-09-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"please don't discontinue", 'text': [u'Came back to using this after trying other serums for a couple months. BIG difference in overall texture, dewiness and lack of visible wrinkles.'], 'author': u'richd76 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'very good quality', 'text': [u'This brush was a bit of an impulse buy, but it works well with the marc jacobs gel concealer. Seems to be solidly built and easy to clean.'], 'author': u'radrad ', 'date': [u'2016-07-17'], 'location': u'montreal', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Incredible brush', 'text': [u'Like all of the Marc Jacobs brushes, the bristles are super soft, the handle smooth and yummy to hold, and there\'s no shedding. This brush in particular impressed me. I\'ve used it for several things but my favorite is placing brush pen concealer under my eyes and on spots around my face and perfecting it with this brush. I can control the thickness in each area easily and it blends amazingly well. It reduces creasing even where I leave concealer thick and gives it a more natural finish than I get by the pen brush or my finger. I wish they\'d make a set of eye shadow brushes like this one.'], 'author': u'Wambamzam ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Le Marc Lip Crème Lipstick
reviews: {'title': u'Long Lasting!', 'text': [u'I\'ve used Smashbox, Nars, and Kat Von D they all seem to disappoint me and I thought to give this lipstick a try and I love the color! The lipstick does not smear or get in my teeth. It does not dry up at all. Love it!!!'], 'author': u'Nena30 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Honestly Incredible', 'text': [u'I really didn\'t want to like this. $30 is a bit too expensive for a normal lipstick, in my opinion. I picked this and the eyeliner up for Sephora\'s free birthday gift. I can see why it is priced so high. This is so amazing! The color payoff blew my mind. I got full color with one swipe. It went on smooth and not patchy at all. It feels so comfortable. I would say it\'s somewhere between a satin and a matte. I can rub my lips together and there is no pulling, but it doesn\'t feel so slippery that I would get annoyed. Honestly, I barely feel it on my lips. I ate rosemary and olive oil potatoes, quiche, and an omelette. I drank milk and coffee with lots of creamer. I fully expected to have bare lips after all of that, but to my surprise I still had full color on my lips. This is a product for those that want the longevity of liquid lipsticks without the hassle. The color I got was Kiss Kiss Bang Bang, which is so beautiful. It is the perfect muted rose that I feel would flatter all skin tones.'], 'author': u'plumfairy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Providence, RI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Creamy, Pigmented', 'text': [u'This is my go-to matte lipstick, it goes on smoothly, it\'s less drying than other lipsticks, the color is amazing (I recommend Kiss Kiss Bang Bang because it seems to be universally flattering, especially Asian skin tones). The design is also sleek, and the case is magnetic so it ensures that it\'ll never fall off and ruin your makeup bag. It\'s not too strong to seem overdone, but is pigmented enough so that you could just apply lipstick for the day. This is truly amazing and definitely worth the $30.'], 'author': u'cwcrystal8 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it', 'text': [u'It has perfect texture and lasts long time.'], 'author': u'MaryLoveBeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Effective!', 'text': [u'I\'m just looking for an effective serum. This is it. I\'m using for a while now and it works. I still look young and I\'m using this as a preventive measure. I\'m 38 and I still get mistaken for being early college age 22 is the highest. I was traveling for about a month and did not replenish. I could tell the difference in my skin. Glad I\'m back on track. By the way my skin tends to be oily if I use the wrong items however this keeps my skin soft and supple, radiant and smooth. And it really does work very well with other products. Great value.'], 'author': u'SabrinaAM ', 'date': [u'2016-08-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Keep coming back', 'text': [u'Every so often I decide to venture out and try a new moisturizer. I use genius at night. The texture is whipped and not to heavy but very hydrating. I started using this on a 10 day sample and noticed my skin looked brighter and smoother. This is probably my 6th jar. I keep coming back to it because it does what it says. I did take a star away because Algenist snuck in a small price increase along with some of there other products.'], 'author': u'granola39 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

If you are looking for a product that looks invisible, but locks things into place without emphasizing fine lines, this is a great product. It\'s feathery light on the skin and a light dusting is all that\'s needed. Great for 30-40+ aged women in my opinion. Holy grail for me.'], 'author': u'kaylz19 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'TLDR at bottom', 'text': [u'I love the product, I found it was lightweight and easy to use. I applied it multiple times during the day and never experienced a chalky or caked on look, that is a common problem I have. Unfortunately after only 3 weeks of using this product(3-4 times a week) the whole pressed powder disk separated from the compact! I never dropped it and I was extremely gentle while using and transporting it. You can\'t even tell I\'ve used it! I am disappointed because I bought this to leave in my purse and there is no way it would survive in there! I wasn\'t bothered by the price tag but I would advise others not to purchase this product because of the separation of the pressed powder disk from the compact.', u'TLDR Great product, bad adhesion to compact. Don\'t bother with this product.'], 'author': u'CULTLEADER ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Disappointing', 'text': [u'It is almost impossible to use this powder with a brush of any sort, and with the sponge you have to press quite hard to get product. The product ended up separating from the pan, it also cracked and fell apart. The powder left my skin looking chalky and faded, dull.'], 'author': u'tmacdougs ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'so smooth', 'text': [u'This powder is amazing. I have extremely sensitive allergy prone skin that gets oily in the tzone throughout the day. The first time the powder can be a bit hard to get on the brush or sponge but after that, WOW. It\'s so smooth, I just apply a tiny bit to set everything and my skin has been looking so airbrushed lately. {'title': None, 'text': [u'I really love this product. After I use this my skin feels the most smooth it\'s ever felt. My pores disappeared and my toner seals the deal. I use this product every third day and people comment on my skin regularly. My only issue is that I feel like I go through so much product in one use and it certainly is not a cheap product. I love this whole line!!'], 'author': u'Shutes15 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"don't understand other reviews", 'text': [u'I got a sample of this and then bought a mini size from a set... all you need to do is cleanse your face prior, and then once you use this product you\'ll need to rinse it off with water and if you get little balls.... human that\'s your skin coming off. To get it off just wash your face with water and gentle tap off the excess with a wash cloth. Easy and works for my sensitive skin. I just need to buy the full size now!'], 'author': u'kap13 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Leaves residue on face', 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this product to remove my dead skin. I live in a very dry climate with already dry skin and was excited to find a good exfoliator. It has done a good job with keeping some small bumps on my face at bay, but it WILL NOT come off my cheeks. I used this one morning before an important event, and it left little balls of residue all over my face. I followed the directions as explained to me at the store (clean first, dry, use product, rinse) and I could not get this off my cheeks for the life of me. Some people are saying it gets stuck to hair, maybe that\'s it, not sure. Using it at night might help to reduce the impact, but still pretty frustrating. Will give it a few more tries before I return.'], 'author': u'laceface2 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Denver, CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Perfect Morning BB Mask
reviews: {'title': u'honestly the best pick me up', 'text': [u'I\'ve never had a mask give me this kind of result. It is truly the best morning pick me up. Give this a try!'], 'author': u'beyoutee ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Undecided...', 'text': [u'Honestly, I thought I would love this addition to a morning routine... My face usually responds well to treatments or masks pretty noticeably. When I tried this mask, now several times, I really don\'t notice anything special about my skin or face after using. I will keep using it until the box is done, but without seeing or feeling noticeable results, it is just time-consuming in the AM with little payoff.'], 'author': u'les33 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': u'Troy, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I find it quite messy to apply, but my face does end up smoother and refreshed after use. The smell is quite enticing too! I did not have any \'wow\' effect. 3 starts is just appropriate in my opinion.'], 'author': u'frenchfox ', 'date': [u'2016-03-25'], 'location': u'Hononlulu, HI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'lovely little mask!', 'text': [u'My skin: Normal/Combination - Sensitive(Disclaimer: OBSESSED with Korean beauty products!)I bought this mask on a whim when I was trying to finish off a gift card (the struggle!). I use a pretty lengthy skincare regimen and often incorporate a mask in my a.m. routine if I have the time. This is my go-to mask for mornings when my skin is looking a little tired or dull and I don\'t want to do too much exfoliating, but I want a quick pick me up. Though this mask does remove impurities and cleanse the skin, I find I get the best results when I use this on pre-cleansed skin. I then finish my routine by patting on some essence, moisturizer, and eye cream. Some people don\'t seem to like the mix it yourself aspect of this mask, but I don\'t mind. I will definitely be repurchasing!(Side note: this mask does NOT make my finicky skin turn red or irritated at all)'], 'author': u'samanthagrace ', 'date': [u'2015-12-27'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'refreshing', 'text': [u'This is a very refreshing mix of a cleanser and a masque. However it\'s a bit annoying to have to add water to the powder-- can be a mess.
